Alert.Name: EDRMON
Alert.Title: EDRMON
Alert.AlertMessage: A nyomtatási igényt az EDRMONITORING megkapta, a feldolgozás folyamatban van!

Trigger.Name: ON-POPULATE-DETAILS
Trigger.TriggerText:
--
-- Begin default relation declare section
--
DECLARE
 recstat VARCHAR2(20) := :System.record_status; 
 startitm VARCHAR2(61) := :System.cursor_item; 
 rel_id Relation;
--
-- End default relation declare section
--
--
-- Begin default relation program section
--
BEGIN
 IF ( recstat = 'NEW' or recstat = 'INSERT' ) THEN 
 RETURN;
 END IF;
 --
 -- Begin KKPARTELER detail program section
 --
 IF ( (:KKPARTNER_CORE.U_PARTNER is not null) ) THEN 
 rel_id := Find_Relation('KKPARTNER_CORE.KKPARTNER_KKPARTELER'); 
 Query_Master_Details(rel_id, 'KKPARTELER'); 
 END IF;
 --
 -- End KKPARTELER detail program section
 --
 --
 -- Begin KKPARTBANK detail program section
 --
 IF ( (:KKPARTNER_CORE.U_PARTNER is not null) ) THEN 
 rel_id := Find_Relation('KKPARTNER_CORE.KKPARTNER_KKPARTBANK'); 
 Query_Master_Details(rel_id, 'KKPARTBANK'); 
 END IF;
 --
 -- End KKPARTBANK detail program section
 --
 --
 -- Begin KKUGYLET detail program section
 --
 IF ( (:KKPARTNER_CORE.U_PARTNER is not null) ) THEN 
 rel_id := Find_Relation('KKPARTNER_CORE.KKPARTNER_KKUGYLET'); 
 Query_Master_Details(rel_id, 'KKUGYLET'); 
 END IF;
 --
 -- End KKUGYLET detail program section
 --
 --
 -- Begin KKJOGKARTF detail program section
 --
 IF ( (:KKPARTNER_CORE.U_PARTNER is not null) ) THEN 
 rel_id := Find_Relation('KKPARTNER_CORE.KKPARTNER_CORE_KKJOGKARTF'); 
 Query_Master_Details(rel_id, 'KKJOGKARTF'); 
 END IF;
 --
 -- End KKJOGKARTF detail program section
 --
 --
 -- Begin KKSPID_USERS detail program section
 --
 IF ( (:KKPARTNER_CORE.U_PARTNER is not null) ) THEN 
 rel_id := Find_Relation('KKPARTNER_CORE.KKPARTNER_CORE_KKSPID_USERS'); 
 Query_Master_Details(rel_id, 'KKSPID_USERS'); 
 END IF;
 --
 -- End KKSPID_USERS detail program section
 --
 --
 -- Begin KKWO_KART detail program section
 --
 IF ( (:KKPARTNER_CORE.U_PARTNER is not null) ) THEN 
 rel_id := Find_Relation('KKPARTNER_CORE.KKPARTNER_CORE_KKWO_KART'); 
 Query_Master_Details(rel_id, 'KKWO_KART'); 
 END IF;
 --
 -- End KKWO_KART detail program section
 --

 IF ( :System.cursor_item <> startitm ) THEN 
 Go_Item(startitm); 
 Check_Package_Failure; 
 END IF;
END;
--
-- End default relation program section
--

Trigger.Name: ON-CHECK-DELETE-MASTER
Trigger.TriggerText:
--
-- Begin default relation declare section
--
DECLARE
 Dummy_Define CHAR(1);
 --
 -- Begin KKPARTELER detail declare section
 --
 CURSOR KKPARTELER_cur IS 
 SELECT 1 FROM KKPARTELER K 
 WHERE K.U_PARTNER = :KKPARTNER_CORE.U_PARTNER;
 --
 -- End KKPARTELER detail declare section
 --
 --
 -- Begin KKPARTBANK detail declare section
 --
 CURSOR KKPARTBANK_cur IS 
 SELECT 1 FROM KKPARTBANK K 
 WHERE K.U_PARTNER = :KKPARTNER_CORE.U_PARTNER;
 --
 -- End KKPARTBANK detail declare section
 --
 --
 -- Begin KKUGYLET detail declare section
 --
 CURSOR KKUGYLET_cur IS 
 SELECT 1 FROM KKUGYLET K 
 WHERE K.L_VEVO = :KKPARTNER_CORE.U_PARTNER;
 --
 -- End KKUGYLET detail declare section
 --
 --
 -- Begin KKJOGKARTF detail declare section
 --
 CURSOR KKJOGKARTF_cur IS 
 SELECT 1 FROM KKJOGKARTF_V K 
 WHERE K.U_PARTNER = :KKPARTNER_CORE.U_PARTNER;
 --
 -- End KKJOGKARTF detail declare section
 --
 --
 -- Begin KKSPID_USERS detail declare section
 --
 CURSOR KKSPID_USERS_cur IS 
 SELECT 1 FROM KKSPID_USERS K 
 WHERE K.U_PARTNER = :KKPARTNER_CORE.U_PARTNER;
 --
 -- End KKSPID_USERS detail declare section
 --
 --
 -- Begin KKWO_KART detail declare section
 --
 CURSOR KKWO_KART_cur IS 
 SELECT 1 FROM KKWO_KART_V K 
 WHERE K.U_PARTNER = :KKPARTNER_CORE.U_PARTNER;
 --
 -- End KKWO_KART detail declare section
 --
--
-- End default relation declare section
--
--
-- Begin default relation program section
--
BEGIN
 --
 -- Begin KKPARTELER detail program section
 --
 OPEN KKPARTELER_cur; 
 FETCH KKPARTELER_cur INTO Dummy_Define; 
 IF ( KKPARTELER_cur%found ) THEN 
 Message('A szülő rekord nem törölhető, ha léteznek hozzá tartozó gyerek rekordok.'); 
 CLOSE KKPARTELER_cur; 
 RAISE Form_Trigger_Failure; 
 END IF;
 CLOSE KKPARTELER_cur;
 --
 -- End KKPARTELER detail program section
 --
 --
 -- Begin KKPARTBANK detail program section
 --
 OPEN KKPARTBANK_cur; 
 FETCH KKPARTBANK_cur INTO Dummy_Define; 
 IF ( KKPARTBANK_cur%found ) THEN 
 Message('A szülő rekord nem törölhető, ha léteznek hozzá tartozó gyerek rekordok.'); 
 CLOSE KKPARTBANK_cur; 
 RAISE Form_Trigger_Failure; 
 END IF;
 CLOSE KKPARTBANK_cur;
 --
 -- End KKPARTBANK detail program section
 --

 --
 -- Begin KKUGYLET detail program section
 --
 OPEN KKUGYLET_cur; 
 FETCH KKUGYLET_cur INTO Dummy_Define; 
 IF ( KKUGYLET_cur%found ) THEN 
 Message('Cannot delete master record when matching detail records exist.'); 
 CLOSE KKUGYLET_cur; 
 RAISE Form_Trigger_Failure; 
 END IF;
 CLOSE KKUGYLET_cur;
 --
 -- End KKUGYLET detail program section
 --
 --
 -- Begin KKJOGKARTF detail program section
 --
 OPEN KKJOGKARTF_cur; 
 FETCH KKJOGKARTF_cur INTO Dummy_Define; 
 IF ( KKJOGKARTF_cur%found ) THEN 
 Message('Cannot delete master record when matching detail records exist.'); 
 CLOSE KKJOGKARTF_cur; 
 RAISE Form_Trigger_Failure; 
 END IF;
 CLOSE KKJOGKARTF_cur;
 --
 -- End KKJOGKARTF detail program section
 --
 --
 -- Begin KKSPID_USERS detail program section
 --
 OPEN KKSPID_USERS_cur; 
 FETCH KKSPID_USERS_cur INTO Dummy_Define; 
 IF ( KKSPID_USERS_cur%found ) THEN 
 Message('Cannot delete master record when matching detail records exist.'); 
 CLOSE KKSPID_USERS_cur; 
 RAISE Form_Trigger_Failure; 
 END IF;
 CLOSE KKSPID_USERS_cur;
 --
 -- End KKSPID_USERS detail program section
 --
 --
 -- Begin KKWO_KART detail program section
 --
 OPEN KKWO_KART_cur; 
 FETCH KKWO_KART_cur INTO Dummy_Define; 
 IF ( KKWO_KART_cur%found ) THEN 
 Message('Cannot delete master record when matching detail records exist.'); 
 CLOSE KKWO_KART_cur; 
 RAISE Form_Trigger_Failure; 
 END IF;
 CLOSE KKWO_KART_cur;
 --
 -- End KKWO_KART detail program section
 --
END;
--
-- End default relation program section
--

Trigger.Name: WHEN-NEW-RECORD-INSTANCE
Trigger.TriggerText:
begin
 if :KKPARTNER_CORE.DATE_CREATED is not null and :system.mode <> 'QUERY' and :KKPARTNER_CORE.U_PARTNER <> nvl(globals.PARTNER,'X') then
 globals.PARTNER := :KKPARTNER_CORE.U_PARTNER; 
 KKSZERZODES_QUERY;
 TOOLBAR_SET;
 GO_ITEM('KKSZERZODES_CORE.M_L_CEG');
 EXECUTE_QUERY;
 GO_ITEM('KKPARTNER_CORE.U_PARTNER');
 set_window_property('W_UGYLET',TITLE, globals.KK_NAME || ' - ' || :KKPARTNER_CORE.L_NEV || ' (' || :KKPARTNER_CORE.U_PARTNER || ' )');
 end if;
 if :KKPARTNER_CORE.DATE_CREATED is not null and :system.mode <> 'QUERY' then
 go_item('KKSPID_USERS.USERID');
 execute_query;
 GO_ITEM('KKPARTNER_CORE.U_PARTNER');
 end if; 
end;

Trigger.Name: KEY-ENTQRY
Trigger.TriggerText:
declare
 ret pls_integer;
 
 cursor c_jogkartf is
 select U_PARTNER, U_JOGIKARTON
 from KKJOGKARTF
 where U_VERZIOST = 'DRAFT'
 and U_VERZIOUG = :GLOBAL.USERID; 
 v_jogkartf c_jogkartf%rowtype; 
begin
 if globals.KK_NAME = 'KKJOG' then
 open c_jogkartf;
 fetch c_jogkartf into v_jogkartf;
 close c_jogkartf; 
 if v_jogkartf.U_JOGIKARTON is not null then
 return;
 end if;
 end if; 
 
 GO_KEYGO;
 /*
 P_KKLOCKS_OFF; 
 go_item('KEYGO.U_PARTNER');
 delete_record;
 commit_form;
 go_item('KKUGYLET_JEGYZET_ALERT.UGYL_ID');
 execute_query; 
 go_item('KEYGO.U_PARTNER');
 */
end;

Trigger.Name: KEY-EXEQRY
Trigger.TriggerText:
declare
 ret pls_integer;
 uj varchar2(9);
begin
 if :system.mode <> 'QUERY' then
--message(' KKLOCKS_WF_GET '); 
 ret := "report.KKLOCKS_WF_GET" ( :GLOBAL.USERID, :KKPARTNER_CORE.U_PARTNER, uj);
 commit;
--message(uj); 
 if nvl(:KKPARTNER_CORE.U_PARTNER,'X')<>nvl(uj,'X') and uj is not null then 
 globals.PARTNER := uj; 
 
 go_item('KKPARTNER_CORE.U_PARTNER');
--message(' go_item(KKPARTNER_CORE.U_PARTNER); '); 
 execute_query;
--message(' execute_query '); 

 if :KKPARTNER_CORE.U_PARTNER <> uj then
 message('HIBA - Nincs meg a partner !');
 return;
 end if;
 
 set_pugyall_0;
--message(' set_pugyall_0; ');
 
 go_item('KKPUGYALL.U_CEG');
 execute_query;
--message(' KKPUGYALL.U_CEG; '); 
 
 KKSZERZODES_QUERY; 
--message(' KKSZERZODES_QUERY; '); 
 
 GO_ITEM('KKSZERZODES_CORE.M_L_CEG');
 EXECUTE_QUERY; 
 TOOLBAR_SET;
--message(' KKSZERZODES_QUERY EXECUTE_QUERY '); 
 SET_WINDOWS_TITLE;
 
 go_item('KKPARTNER_CORE.U_PARTNER');
 end if;
 end if;
end;

--EXECUTE_QUERY;

Trigger.Name: POST-QUERY
Trigger.TriggerText:
if globals.KK_NAME <> 'OKKO' then
 :KKPARTNER_KART.U_ST := name_in ('KKPARTNER_KART.U_' || globals.KK_NAME || '_ST');
 :KKPARTNER_KART.U_FE := name_in ('KKPARTNER_KART.U_' || globals.KK_NAME || '_FE');
 set_record_property(to_number(:system.trigger_record),'KKPARTNER_KART',status,query_status);
end if;

Trigger.Name: KEY-COMMIT
Trigger.TriggerText:
declare 
 feladat number;
 ret pls_integer;
begin
 if :KKPARTNER_KART.U_CSALAS is not null then
 ret := "report.KK_CSALAS_ALERT"(
 :KKPARTNER_CORE.U_PARTNER
 ,GLOBALS.KK_NAME
 ,:GLOBAL.USERID
 ,:KKPARTNER_KART.U_CSALAS
 ,feladat
 );
 commit;
 if feladat is not null then
 NAV_KKPARTNER_CTRL('GO_KKPARTNER_KKFELADAT');
 LAST_RECORD;
 if :KKFELADAT.U_ID = feladat then
 KKFELADAT_CSALAS_MAIL;
 end if;
 end if;
 end if;
 go_item('KKPARTNER_KART.U_MGJ');
 execute_query;
end;

:KKPARTELER.CREATED_BY := :GLOBAL.USERID;

Trigger.Name: PRE-UPDATE
Trigger.TriggerText:
:KKPARTELER.DATE_MODIFIED := SYSDATE; 
:KKPARTELER.MODIFIED_BY := :GLOBAL.USERID;
:KKPARTELER.U_FORRAS := globals.KK_NAME;

Trigger.Name: KEY-COMMIT
Trigger.TriggerText:
declare
 a number;
 cursor c is
 select distinct U_STATUS
 from KKPARTELER_V
 where U_PARTNER = :KKPARTNER_CORE.U_PARTNER
 and U_UGYFTIP = 'PARTNER'
 and U_STATUS <> 'TOROLT';
 
 v c%rowtype;
 
 e varchar2(13); 
begin
 execute_query; 
 last_record;
 if globals.KK_NAME in ( 'KKTUSZ' , 'KKBO' ) then 
 e := null;
 open c;
 loop
 fetch c into v;
 if c%notfound then
 close c;
 exit;
 end if;
 
 if v.U_STATUS = 'KIPROBALNI' then
 e := 'KIPROBALNI';
 exit; 
 end if;
 
 if v.U_STATUS = 'SIKERES HIVAS' then
 e := 'VAN TELEFON';
 exit; 
 end if;
 
 end loop;
 
 if nvl(e,'KERESNI') not in ( 'KIPROBALNI', 'VAN TELEFON' ) then
 if :KKPARTNER_KART.U_ELERJELL = 'NINCS MEG' then
 e := 'NINCS MEG';
 else
 e := 'KERESNI';
 end if;
 end if; 
 if e <> nvl(:KKPARTNER_KART.U_ELERJELL,'NULL') then
 go_item('KKPARTNER_KART.U_KKTUSZ_ST');
 set_block_property('KKPARTNER_KART',update_allowed,property_true); 
 :KKPARTNER_KART.U_ELERJELL := e; 
 commit_form;
 set_block_property('KKPARTNER_KART',update_allowed,property_false); 
 execute_query;
 go_item('KKPARTELER.U_FORRAS');
 end if; 
 end if; 
 --execute_query;
 
end;

Block.Name: KKPARTNER_TORTENET
Block.WhereClause:
UGYL_ID in (select UGYL_ID from KKUGYLET (nolock) where L_VEVO=:KKPARTNER_CORE.U_PARTNER)
and UGYL_JEGYZET_TIP IN (SELECT L_LOMBKOD from KOD_V where L_KODCSOP='JEGYZET TIP' and L_JELLEG='PARTNER')
and UGYL_JEGYZET_ST <> 'TOROLT'

Trigger.Name: PRE-INSERT
Trigger.TriggerText:
declare
 db number;
 u varchar2(16);
begin
 u := :KKPARTNER_CORE.U_PARTNER || 'U0000';
 select count(*) into db from KKUGYLET where UGYL_ID = u;
 if db = 0 then
 insert into KKUGYLET (
 L_VEVO, UGYL_ID, UGYL_TIPUS, UGYL_AIT, UGYL_ST, UGYL_FUGGO, UGYL_OSZTALY, UGYL_SZEREGY, UGYL_UG,
 UGYL_FELADAT_DB, UGYL_SZARMAZO_DB, UGYL_SZARMAZA_DB,
 DATE_CREATED, CREATED_BY, DATE_MODIFIED, MODIFIED_BY
 ) values (
 :KKPARTNER_CORE.U_PARTNER, u, 'PARTNER INFO', 'INAKTIV', 'LEZART', 'NEM', 'KKTUSZ', 'URES', 'URES',
 0,0,0,
 sysdate, :GLOBAL.USERID, sysdate, :GLOBAL.USERID
 );
 end if;
 :KKPARTNER_TORTENET.UGYL_JEGYZET_ID := 0;
 :KKPARTNER_TORTENET.UGYL_ID := u;
 :KKPARTNER_TORTENET.DATE_CREATED := sysdate;
 :KKPARTNER_TORTENET.CREATED_BY := :GLOBAL.USERID;
 :KKPARTNER_TORTENET.DATE_MODIFIED := sysdate;
 :KKPARTNER_TORTENET.MODIFIED_BY := :GLOBAL.USERID;
end;

Trigger.Name: PRE-UPDATE
Trigger.TriggerText:
:KKPARTNER_TORTENET.DATE_MODIFIED:= sysdate;
:KKPARTNER_TORTENET.MODIFIED_BY := :GLOBAL.USERID;

Trigger.Name: WHEN-CHECKBOX-CHANGED
Trigger.TriggerText:
declare
 cursor c (u varchar2) is
 select U_ID
 from KKVARTBEFIZ
 where U_UGYID = u
 and U_FORRAS = 'KKBEH'
 and U_VISSZAOSSZ is not null
 and U_LEZAROSSZ is not null;
 
 v c%rowtype;
begin 
 if nvl(:KKSZERZODES_CORE.SEL,'NEM') = 'IGEN' then 
 if :KKSZERZODES_KART.U_UGYID is null or :KKSZERZODES_CORE.U_UTOLSOUGY = 'NEM' then
 :KKSZERZODES_CORE.SEL := 'NEM';
 Message('A szerződés nem jelölhető ki!');
 raise form_trigger_failure; 
 else
 if globals.kk_name = 'KKBEH' then
 open c (:KKSZERZODES_CORE.U_UGYID);
 fetch c into v;
 close c;
 if v.U_ID is null then
 :KKSZERZODES_CORE.SEL := 'NEM';
 Message('A szerződés nem jelölhető ki!');
 raise form_trigger_failure;
 end if; 
 end if;
 end if;
 end if;
end;

Trigger.Name: WHEN-BUTTON-PRESSED
Trigger.TriggerText:
declare
 pl_id PARAMLIST; 
 ret pls_integer; 
 al number;
 result varchar2(256);
begin 
 if :KKSZERZODES_CORE.L_SZERSZAM is not null then
 if globals.kktree_open = 'TRUE' then
 CLOSE_FORM('KKTREE'); 
 end if; 
 pl_id := Get_Parameter_List('tmpdata');
 IF NOT Id_Null(pl_id) THEN 
 Destroy_Parameter_List( pl_id );
 END IF;
 pl_id := Create_Parameter_List('tmpdata');
 Add_Parameter(pl_id, 'P_L_VEVO', TEXT_PARAMETER, :KKSZERZODES_CORE.L_VEVO);
 Add_Parameter(pl_id, 'P_L_SZERSZAM', TEXT_PARAMETER, :KKSZERZODES_CORE.L_SZERSZAM); 
 new_form(:GLOBAL.FORMS ||'KK2_CENZURA',NO_ROLLBACK,NO_QUERY_ONLY,pl_id); 
 end if;
end;

Trigger.TriggerText:

Trigger.Name: ON-POPULATE-DETAILS
Trigger.TriggerText:
--
-- Begin default relation declare section
--
DECLARE
 recstat VARCHAR2(20) := :System.record_status; 
 startitm VARCHAR2(61) := :System.cursor_item; 
 rel_id Relation;
--
-- End default relation declare section
--
--
-- Begin default relation program section
--
BEGIN

 IF ( recstat = 'NEW' or recstat = 'INSERT' ) THEN 
 RETURN;
 END IF;
 --
 -- Begin KKESZKOZ_CORE detail program section
 --
 IF ( (:KKSZERZODES_CORE.U_UGYID is not null) ) THEN 
 rel_id := Find_Relation('KKSZERZODES_CORE.KKSZERZODES_CORE_KKESZKOZ_CORE'); 
 Query_Master_Details(rel_id, 'KKESZKOZ_CORE'); 
 END IF;
 
 --
 -- End KKESZKOZ_CORE detail program section
 --
 --
 -- Begin KKSZERZODES_KART detail program section
 --
 IF ( (:KKSZERZODES_CORE.U_UGYID is not null) ) THEN 
 rel_id := Find_Relation('KKSZERZODES_CORE.KKSZERZODES_COR_KKSZERZODES_KA'); 
 Query_Master_Details(rel_id, 'KKSZERZODES_KART'); 
 END IF;
 
 --
 -- End KKSZERZODES_KART detail program section
 --
 --

 IF ( :System.cursor_item <> startitm ) THEN 
 Go_Item(startitm); 
 Check_Package_Failure; 
 END IF;
END;
--
-- End default relation program section
--

Trigger.Name: ON-CHECK-DELETE-MASTER
Trigger.TriggerText:
--
-- Begin default relation declare section
--
DECLARE
 Dummy_Define CHAR(1);
 --
 -- Begin KKESZKOZ_CORE detail declare section
 --
 CURSOR KKESZKOZ_CORE_cur IS 
 SELECT 1 FROM KKESZKOZ_CORE_V K 
 WHERE K.U_UGYID = :KKSZERZODES_CORE.U_UGYID;
 --
 -- End KKESZKOZ_CORE detail declare section
 --
 --
 -- Begin KKSZERZODES_KART detail declare section
 --
 CURSOR KKSZERZODES_KART_cur IS 
 SELECT 1 FROM KKSZERZODES_KART_V K 
 WHERE K.U_UGYID = :KKSZERZODES_CORE.U_UGYID;
 --
 -- End KKSZERZODES_KART detail declare section
 --
--
-- End default relation declare section
--
--
-- Begin default relation program section
--
BEGIN
 --
 -- Begin KKESZKOZ_CORE detail program section
 --
 OPEN KKESZKOZ_CORE_cur; 
 FETCH KKESZKOZ_CORE_cur INTO Dummy_Define; 
 IF ( KKESZKOZ_CORE_cur%found ) THEN 
 Message('Cannot delete master record when matching detail records exist.'); 
 CLOSE KKESZKOZ_CORE_cur; 
 RAISE Form_Trigger_Failure; 
 END IF;
 CLOSE KKESZKOZ_CORE_cur;
 --
 -- End KKESZKOZ_CORE detail program section
 --
 --
 -- Begin KKSZERZODES_KART detail program section
 --
 OPEN KKSZERZODES_KART_cur; 
 FETCH KKSZERZODES_KART_cur INTO Dummy_Define; 
 IF ( KKSZERZODES_KART_cur%found ) THEN 
 Message('Cannot delete master record when matching detail records exist.'); 
 CLOSE KKSZERZODES_KART_cur; 
 RAISE Form_Trigger_Failure; 
 END IF;

 --
 -- End KKSZERZODES_KART detail program section
 --
END;
--
-- End default relation program section
--

Trigger.Name: WHEN-NEW-RECORD-INSTANCE
Trigger.TriggerText:
:TOOLBAR.U_UGYID := :KKSZERZODES_CORE.U_UGYID;
:TOOLBAR.L_SZERAZON := :KKESZKOZ_CORE.L_SZERAZON;
:TOOLBAR.L_ESZKNEV1 := :KKESZKOZ_CORE.L_ESZKNEV1;
:TOOLBAR.L_ESZKNEV2 := :KKESZKOZ_CORE.L_ESZKNEV2;
:TOOLBAR.L_RENDSZAM := :KKESZKOZ_CORE.L_RENDSZAM;

set_window_property('W_UGYLET' , TITLE, globals.KK_NAME || ' - ' || :KKPARTNER_CORE.L_NEV || ' (' || :KKPARTNER_CORE.U_PARTNER || ' ) ' || :KKSZERZODES_CORE.L_SZERSZAM || ' / ' || :KKESZKOZ_CORE.L_SZERAZON ); 

if :KKSZERZODES_CORE.U_UGYID is not null and nvl(:KKUGYLET.U_UGYID,' ') <> :KKSZERZODES_CORE.U_UGYID then
 KKUGYLET_QUERY(null, :system.trigger_item);
end if;

if :KKSZERZODES_CORE.L_KOVETKIVEZ is not null then
 set_item('KKSZERZODES_KART.L_KOVERTCSO' , 'NINNNN'); -- P_EVNIUD
 set_item('KKSZERZODES_KART.L_KOVERTETIP', 'NINNNN'); -- P_EVNIUD 
 set_item('KKSZERZODES_KART.L_KOVERTE' , 'NINNNN'); -- P_EVNIUD 
 set_item('KKSZERZODES_KART.L_KOVERTVAS' , 'NINNNN'); -- P_EVNIUD 
 set_item('KKSZERZODES_KART.L_KOVERTVASN', 'NINNNN'); -- P_EVNIUD 
 set_item('KKSZERZODES_KART.L_KOVERTDAT' , 'NINNNN'); -- P_EVNIUD 
 set_item('KKSZERZODES_KART.L_KOVERTOSSZ' , 'NINNNN'); -- P_EVNIUD 
else
 set_item('KKSZERZODES_KART.L_KOVERTCSO' , 'IIIIII'); -- P_EVNIUD
 set_item('KKSZERZODES_KART.L_KOVERTETIP', 'IIIIII'); -- P_EVNIUD 
 set_item('KKSZERZODES_KART.L_KOVERTE' , 'IIIIII'); -- P_EVNIUD 
 set_item('KKSZERZODES_KART.L_KOVERTVAS' , 'IIIIII'); -- P_EVNIUD 
 set_item('KKSZERZODES_KART.L_KOVERTVASN', 'IIIIII'); -- P_EVNIUD 
 set_item('KKSZERZODES_KART.L_KOVERTDAT' , 'IIIIII'); -- P_EVNIUD 
 set_item('KKSZERZODES_KART.L_KOVERTOSSZ' , 'IIIIII'); -- P_EVNIUD 
end if;

Trigger.Name: POST-QUERY
Trigger.TriggerText:
declare
 cursor c (u varchar2) is
 select U_ID
 from KKVARTBEFIZ_V
 where U_UGYID = u
 and U_FORRAS = 'KKBEH'
 and U_VISSZAOSSZ is not null
 and U_LEZAROSSZ is not null;
 
 v c%rowtype;
begin
 /*
 :KKSZERZODES.U_ST := name_in ('KKSZERZODES.U_' || globals.KK_NAME || '_ST');
 :KKSZERZODES.U_FE := name_in ('KKSZERZODES.U_' || globals.KK_NAME || '_FE');
 :KKSZERZODES.U_UG := name_in ('KKSZERZODES.U_' || globals.KK_NAME || '_UG');
 :KKSZERZODES.M_U_ST := name_in ('KKSZERZODES.U_' || globals.KK_NAME || '_ST');
 :KKSZERZODES.M_U_FE := name_in ('KKSZERZODES.U_' || globals.KK_NAME || '_FE');
 
 :KKSZERZODES.U_LEJART := to_number(name_in( 'GLOBALS_BLK.' || replace(:KKSZERZODES_CORE.L_CEG,' ','_') || '_U_LEJART' ));
 :KKSZERZODES.U_VISSZAALL := to_number(name_in( 'GLOBALS_BLK.' || replace(:KKSZERZODES_CORE.L_CEG,' ','_') || '_U_VISSZAALL'));
 :KKSZERZODES.U_LEZAR := to_number(name_in( 'GLOBALS_BLK.' || replace(:KKSZERZODES_CORE.L_CEG,' ','_') || '_U_LEZAR' ));
 
 if :KKSZERZODES.U_UTOLSO = 'IGEN' then
 :KKSZERZODES.CALC_HATALYNAP := trunc(sysdate)-trunc(:KKSZERZODES.U_VHATALY);
 end if;
 
 if :KKSZERZODES_CORE.U_STATUS_ALL = 'LEZART UGY' and length(:KKSZERZODES_CORE.U_UGYID)> 10 then
 set_item_instance_property('KKSZERZODES.SZINAKT',to_number(:system.trigger_record),visual_attribute,'UGY_INAKTIV');
 set_item_instance_property('KKSZERZODES.SZINVER',to_number(:system.trigger_record),visual_attribute,'UGY_INAKTIV');
 if :KKSZERZODES.U_UTOLSO = 'NEM' then
 set_item_instance_property('KKSZERZODES.SZINVER',to_number(:system.trigger_record),visual_attribute,'UGY_INAKTIV_E');
 end if;
 elsif :KKSZERZODES_CORE.U_STATUS_ALL = 'ELO UGY' AND :KKSZERZODES_CORE.L_SZSTATUS IN ( 'FELMONDOTT', 'ELSZAMOLT' ) then
 set_item_instance_property('KKSZERZODES.SZINAKT',to_number(:system.trigger_record),visual_attribute,'UGY_AKTIV');
 set_item_instance_property('KKSZERZODES.SZINVER',to_number(:system.trigger_record),visual_attribute,'UGY_AKTIV');
 if :KKSZERZODES.U_UTOLSO = 'NEM' then
 set_item_instance_property('KKSZERZODES.SZINVER',to_number(:system.trigger_record),visual_attribute,'UGY_AKTIV_E');
 end if;
 elsif :KKSZERZODES_CORE.U_STATUS_ALL = 'ELO UGY' AND :KKSZERZODES_CORE.L_SZSTATUS = 'FELTFELMONDOT' then 
 set_item_instance_property('KKSZERZODES.SZINAKT',to_number(:system.trigger_record),visual_attribute,'UGY_ELO_FELTFEL');
 set_item_instance_property('KKSZERZODES.SZINVER',to_number(:system.trigger_record),visual_attribute,'UGY_ELO_FELTFEL'); 
 elsif :KKSZERZODES_CORE.U_STATUS_ALL = 'ELO SZERZODES' AND :KKSZERZODES_CORE.L_SZSTATUS = 'HATALYOS' and length(:KKSZERZODES_CORE.U_UGYID)> 10 then 
 set_item_instance_property('KKSZERZODES.SZINAKT',to_number(:system.trigger_record),visual_attribute,'UGY_ELO_INAKTIV');
 set_item_instance_property('KKSZERZODES.SZINVER',to_number(:system.trigger_record),visual_attribute,'UGY_ELO_INAKTIV'); 
 else
 set_item_instance_property('KKSZERZODES.SZINAKT',to_number(:system.trigger_record),visual_attribute,'UGY_ELO');
 set_item_instance_property('KKSZERZODES.SZINVER',to_number(:system.trigger_record),visual_attribute,'UGY_ELO'); 
 end if;
 if globals.KK_NAME = 'KKBEH' then 
 if :KKSZERZODES_KART.U_UGYID is null then 
 set_item_instance_property('KKSZERZODES.SEL',to_number(:system.trigger_record),VISUAL_ATTRIBUTE,'UGY_INAKTIV');
 else 
 open c (:KKSZERZODES_CORE.U_UGYID);
 fetch c into v;
 close c;
 if v.U_ID is null then
 set_item_instance_property('KKSZERZODES.SEL',to_number(:system.trigger_record),VISUAL_ATTRIBUTE,'UGY_INAKTIV');
 else
 set_item_instance_property('KKSZERZODES.SEL',to_number(:system.trigger_record),VISUAL_ATTRIBUTE,'UGY_ELO');
 end if;
 end if; 
 end if;
 */
 set_record_property(to_number(:system.trigger_record),'KKSZERZODES_KART',status,query_status);
end;

Trigger.TriggerText:
if rec.editmode is not null then
 do_key('COMMIT_FORM'); 
end if;

Trigger.Name: WHEN-CHECKBOX-CHANGED
Trigger.TriggerText:
declare
 cursor c (u varchar2) is
 select U_ID
 from KKVARTBEFIZ
 where U_UGYID = u
 and U_FORRAS = 'KKBEH'
 and U_VISSZAOSSZ is not null
 and U_LEZAROSSZ is not null;
 
 v c%rowtype;
begin 
 if nvl(:KKSZERZODES_CORE.SEL,'NEM') = 'IGEN' then 
 if :KKSZERZODES_KART.U_UGYID is null or :KKSZERZODES_CORE.U_UTOLSOUGY = 'NEM' then
 :KKSZERZODES_CORE.SEL := 'NEM';
 Message('A szerződés nem jelölhető ki!');
 raise form_trigger_failure; 
 else
 if globals.kk_name = 'KKBEH' then
 open c (:KKSZERZODES_CORE.U_UGYID);
 fetch c into v;
 close c;
 if v.U_ID is null then
 :KKSZERZODES_CORE.SEL := 'NEM';
 Message('A szerződés nem jelölhető ki!');
 raise form_trigger_failure;
 end if; 
 end if;
 end if;
 end if;
end;

declare
 cursor c is
 select U_ELOFOGLALAS
 from KKESZKOZ_KART
 where U_UGYID = :KKESZKOZ_CORE.U_UGYID
 and L_SZERAZON = :KKESZKOZ_CORE.L_SZERAZON;
 
 v c%rowtype;
begin
 open c;
 fetch c into v;
 close c;
 if nvl(v.U_ELOFOGLALAS,0)>0 and :KKSZERZODES_CORE.U_UTOLSOUGY = 'IGEN' then
 :KKESZKOZ_CORE.M_U_ELOFOGLALAS := v.U_ELOFOGLALAS;
 end if;
end;

Trigger.Name: ON-POPULATE-DETAILS
Trigger.TriggerText:
--
-- Begin default relation declare section
--
DECLARE
 recstat VARCHAR2(20) := :System.record_status; 
 startitm VARCHAR2(61) := :System.cursor_item; 
 rel_id Relation;
--
-- End default relation declare section
--
--
-- Begin default relation program section
--
BEGIN
 IF ( recstat = 'NEW' or recstat = 'INSERT' ) THEN 
 RETURN;
 END IF;
 --
 -- Begin KK_FOGLALAS_V detail program section
 --
 IF ( (:KKESZKOZ_CORE.L_SZERAZON is not null) ) THEN 
 rel_id := Find_Relation('KKESZKOZ_CORE.KKESZKOZ_CORE_KK_FOGLALAS_V'); 
 Query_Master_Details(rel_id, 'KK_FOGLALAS_V'); 
 END IF;
 --
 -- End KK_FOGLALAS_V detail program section
 --
 --
 -- Begin KKESZKOZ_KART detail program section
 --
 IF ( (:KKESZKOZ_CORE.U_UGYID is not null) or (:KKESZKOZ_CORE.L_SZERAZON is not null) ) THEN 
 rel_id := Find_Relation('KKESZKOZ_CORE.KKESZKOZ_CORE_KKESZKOZ_KART'); 
 Query_Master_Details(rel_id, 'KKESZKOZ_KART'); 
 END IF;
 --
 -- End KKESZKOZ_KART detail program section
 --
 --
 -- Begin KKESZKOZ_CORE_HISTORY_KKINF detail program section
 --
 IF ( (:KKESZKOZ_CORE.U_UGYID is not null) or (:KKESZKOZ_CORE.L_SZERAZON is not null) ) THEN 
 rel_id := Find_Relation('KKESZKOZ_CORE.KKESZKOZ_CORE_KKESZKOZ_CORE_'); 
 Query_Master_Details(rel_id, 'KKESZKOZ_CORE_HISTORY_KKINF'); 
 END IF;
 --
 -- End KKESZKOZ_CORE_HISTORY_KKINF detail program section
 --

 IF ( :System.cursor_item <> startitm ) THEN 
 Go_Item(startitm); 
 Check_Package_Failure; 
 END IF;
END;
--
-- End default relation program section
--

Trigger.Name: ON-CHECK-DELETE-MASTER
Trigger.TriggerText:
--
-- Begin default relation declare section
--
DECLARE
 Dummy_Define CHAR(1);
 --
 -- Begin KK_FOGLALAS_V detail declare section
 --
 CURSOR KK_FOGLALAS_V_cur IS 
 SELECT 1 FROM KK_FOGLALAS_V K 
 WHERE K.L_SZERAZON = :KKESZKOZ_CORE.L_SZERAZON;
 --
 -- End KK_FOGLALAS_V detail declare section
 --
 --
 -- Begin KKESZKOZ_KART detail declare section
 --
 CURSOR KKESZKOZ_KART_cur IS 
 SELECT 1 FROM KKESZKOZ_KART_V K 
 WHERE K.U_UGYID = :KKESZKOZ_CORE.U_UGYID and K.L_SZERAZON = :KKESZKOZ_CORE.L_SZERAZON;
 --
 -- End KKESZKOZ_KART detail declare section
 --
 --
 -- Begin KKESZKOZ_CORE_HISTORY_KKINF detail declare section
 --
 CURSOR KKESZKOZ_CORE_HISTORY_KKIN_cur IS 
 SELECT 1 FROM KKESZKOZ_CORE_HISTORY_KKINF K 
 WHERE K.U_UGYID = :KKESZKOZ_CORE.U_UGYID and K.L_SZERAZON = :KKESZKOZ_CORE.L_SZERAZON;
 --
 -- End KKESZKOZ_CORE_HISTORY_KKINF detail declare section
 --
--
-- End default relation declare section
--
--
-- Begin default relation program section
--
BEGIN
 --
 -- Begin KK_FOGLALAS_V detail program section
 --
 OPEN KK_FOGLALAS_V_cur; 
 FETCH KK_FOGLALAS_V_cur INTO Dummy_Define; 
 IF ( KK_FOGLALAS_V_cur%found ) THEN 
 Message('Cannot delete master record when matching detail records exist.'); 
 CLOSE KK_FOGLALAS_V_cur; 
 RAISE Form_Trigger_Failure; 
 END IF;
 CLOSE KK_FOGLALAS_V_cur;
 --
 -- End KK_FOGLALAS_V detail program section
 --
 --
 -- Begin KKESZKOZ_KART detail program section
 --
 OPEN KKESZKOZ_KART_cur; 
 FETCH KKESZKOZ_KART_cur INTO Dummy_Define; 
 IF ( KKESZKOZ_KART_cur%found ) THEN 
 Message('Cannot delete master record when matching detail records exist.'); 
 CLOSE KKESZKOZ_KART_cur; 
 RAISE Form_Trigger_Failure; 
 END IF;
 CLOSE KKESZKOZ_KART_cur;
 --
 -- End KKESZKOZ_KART detail program section
 --
 --
 -- Begin KKESZKOZ_CORE_HISTORY_KKINF detail program section
 --
 OPEN KKESZKOZ_CORE_HISTORY_KKIN_cur; 
 FETCH KKESZKOZ_CORE_HISTORY_KKIN_cur INTO Dummy_Define; 
 IF ( KKESZKOZ_CORE_HISTORY_KKIN_cur%found ) THEN 
 Message('Cannot delete master record when matching detail records exist.'); 
 CLOSE KKESZKOZ_CORE_HISTORY_KKIN_cur; 
 RAISE Form_Trigger_Failure; 
 END IF;
 CLOSE KKESZKOZ_CORE_HISTORY_KKIN_cur;
 --
 -- End KKESZKOZ_CORE_HISTORY_KKINF detail program section
 --
END;
--
-- End default relation program section
--

begin

 then

 end if;
 end if;
end;

Trigger.Name: WHEN-VALIDATE-ITEM
Trigger.TriggerText:
declare
 cursor c (p_partners varchar2) is 
 select F_PARTNER, F_NEV
 from PARTNER_KODNEV
 where F_PARTNERS = p_partners;
 
 v c%rowtype;
begin
 if length(nvl(:KKESZKOZ_KART.L_ERTPAR,' '))=6 then
 open c (:KKESZKOZ_KART.L_ERTPAR || ' ');
 fetch c into v;
 close c;
 if v.F_NEV is null then
 message('Nincs ilyen partner!');
 raise form_trigger_failure;
 else
 :KKESZKOZ_KART.L_ERTPARN := v.F_NEV;
 end if; 
 elsif :KKESZKOZ_KART.L_ERTPAR is not null and length(:KKESZKOZ_KART.L_ERTPAR)<6 then
 raise form_trigger_failure; 
 elsif :KKESZKOZ_KART.L_ERTPAR is null and :KKESZKOZ_KART.L_ERTPARN is not null then
 :KKESZKOZ_KART.L_ERTPARN := null;
 end if;
end;

Szakértés dátuma 
csak VB-s opciós elszámoláshoz - 
a mező nem kerül tárolásra!

Trigger.Name: ON-POPULATE-DETAILS
Trigger.TriggerText:
--
-- Begin default relation declare section
--
DECLARE
 recstat VARCHAR2(20) := :System.record_status; 
 startitm VARCHAR2(61) := :System.cursor_item; 
 rel_id Relation;
--
-- End default relation declare section
--
--
-- Begin default relation program section
--
BEGIN
 IF ( recstat = 'NEW' or recstat = 'INSERT' ) THEN 
 RETURN;
 END IF;
 --
 -- Begin KKESZKOZ_KART_AR detail program section
 --
 IF ( (:KKESZKOZ_KART.U_UGYID is not null) or (:KKESZKOZ_KART.L_SZERAZON is not null) ) THEN 
 rel_id := Find_Relation('KKESZKOZ_KART.KKESZKOZ_KART_KKESZKOZ_KART_AR'); 
 Query_Master_Details(rel_id, 'KKESZKOZ_KART_AR'); 
 END IF;
 --
 -- End KKESZKOZ_KART_AR detail program section
 --
 --
 -- Begin KKESZKOZ_KART_KESZLET_V detail program section
 --
 IF ( (:KKESZKOZ_KART.U_UGYID is not null) or (:KKESZKOZ_KART.L_SZERAZON is not null) ) THEN 
 rel_id := Find_Relation('KKESZKOZ_KART.KKESZKOZ_KART_KKESZKOZ_KART_'); 
 Query_Master_Details(rel_id, 'KKESZKOZ_KART_KESZLET_V'); 
 END IF;
 --
 -- End KKESZKOZ_KART_KESZLET_V detail program section
 --

 IF ( :System.cursor_item <> startitm ) THEN 
 Go_Item(startitm); 
 Check_Package_Failure; 
 END IF;
END;
--
-- End default relation program section
--

Trigger.Name: ON-CHECK-DELETE-MASTER
Trigger.TriggerText:
--
-- Begin default relation declare section
--
DECLARE
 Dummy_Define CHAR(1);
 --
 -- Begin KKESZKOZ_KART_AR detail declare section
 --
 CURSOR KKESZKOZ_KART_AR_cur IS 
 SELECT 1 FROM KKESZKOZ_KART_AR K 
 WHERE K.U_UGYID = :KKESZKOZ_KART.U_UGYID and K.L_SZERAZON = :KKESZKOZ_KART.L_SZERAZON;
 --
 -- End KKESZKOZ_KART_AR detail declare section
 --
 --
 -- Begin KKESZKOZ_KART_KESZLET_V detail declare section
 --
 CURSOR KKESZKOZ_KART_KESZLET_V_cur IS 
 SELECT 1 FROM KKESZKOZ_KART_KESZLET_V K 
 WHERE K.U_UGYID = :KKESZKOZ_KART.U_UGYID and K.L_SZERAZON = :KKESZKOZ_KART.L_SZERAZON;
 --
 -- End KKESZKOZ_KART_KESZLET_V detail declare section
 --
--
-- End default relation declare section
--
--
-- Begin default relation program section
--
BEGIN
 --
 -- Begin KKESZKOZ_KART_AR detail program section
 --
 OPEN KKESZKOZ_KART_AR_cur; 
 FETCH KKESZKOZ_KART_AR_cur INTO Dummy_Define; 
 IF ( KKESZKOZ_KART_AR_cur%found ) THEN 
 Message('Cannot delete master record when matching detail records exist.'); 
 CLOSE KKESZKOZ_KART_AR_cur; 
 RAISE Form_Trigger_Failure; 
 END IF;
 CLOSE KKESZKOZ_KART_AR_cur;
 --
 -- End KKESZKOZ_KART_AR detail program section
 --
 --
 -- Begin KKESZKOZ_KART_KESZLET_V detail program section
 --
 OPEN KKESZKOZ_KART_KESZLET_V_cur; 
 FETCH KKESZKOZ_KART_KESZLET_V_cur INTO Dummy_Define; 
 IF ( KKESZKOZ_KART_KESZLET_V_cur%found ) THEN 
 Message('Cannot delete master record when matching detail records exist.'); 
 CLOSE KKESZKOZ_KART_KESZLET_V_cur; 
 RAISE Form_Trigger_Failure; 
 END IF;
 CLOSE KKESZKOZ_KART_KESZLET_V_cur;
 --
 -- End KKESZKOZ_KART_KESZLET_V detail program section
 --
END;
--
-- End default relation program section
--

Trigger.Name: POST-QUERY
Trigger.TriggerText:
declare
 ret pls_integer;
 db number;
 v varchar2(5);
 
 cursor c_ertmod (cp_ertmod varchar2) is
 select L_LOMBKNEV from KOD_V where L_KODCSOP = 'ERTMOD' and L_LOMBKOD = cp_ertmod;
 
 v_ertmod c_ertmod%rowtype;

 cursor c_eszkertkat (p_ertkat varchar2) is
 select L_TILTAS UJ, L_JELLEG HASZNALT from KOD_V where L_KODCSOP = 'ESZKERTKAT' and L_LOMBKOD = p_ertkat;
 
 v_eszkertkat c_eszkertkat%rowtype;
 
begin 
 set_block_property('KKESZKOZ_KART',update_allowed,property_true);
-- message(:KKESZKOZ_KART.L_SZERAZON||'*');
-- ret := "IS_WEBLICIT"(:KKESZKOZ_KART.L_SZERAZON,v);


 select count(*) into db
 from KKWEBLICF f, KKWEBLICS s
 where f.WF_CSOMAGID = s.WS_CSOMAGID
 and f.WF_VERAZON = s.WS_VERAZON
 and f.WF_STATUS not in ( 'LEZART', 'MEGHIUSULT' )
 and s.WS_SZERAZON = :KKESZKOZ_KART.L_SZERAZON
 and f.WF_UTOLSO = 'IGEN';
 
 if db > 0 then
 :KKESZKOZ_KART.WEBLICIT1 := 'WEBLICIT';
 end if;

 if :KKESZKOZ_KART.EM_ERTMOD is not null then
 open c_ertmod (:KKESZKOZ_KART.EM_ERTMOD);
 fetch c_ertmod into v_ertmod;
 close c_ertmod;
 :KKESZKOZ_KART.ERTMODNEV := v_ertmod.L_LOMBKNEV;
 end if;
/* 
 if :KKSZERZODES_CORE.L_IGAZGATO = 'GEFI' and :KKESZKOZ_KART.U_ESZKERTKAT is not null then
 open c_eszkertkat(:KKSZERZODES.L_IGAZGATO || '-' || :KKESZKOZ_KART.U_ESZKERTKAT);
 fetch c_eszkertkat into v_eszkertkat;
 close c_eszkertkat;
 
 if :KKESZKOZ_CORE.L_ESTATUS = 'UJ' then
 if v_eszkertkat.UJ is not null then
 :KKESZKOZ_KART.L_EDERT_CALC := :KKESZKOZ_KART.L_ESZKPE * to_number(v_eszkertkat.UJ) / 100;
 end if;
 end if;
 if :KKESZKOZ_KART.L_ESTATUS = 'HASZNALT' then
 if v_eszkertkat.HASZNALT is not null then
 :KKESZKOZ_KART.L_EDERT_CALC := :KKESZKOZ_KART.L_ESZKPE * to_number(v_eszkertkat.HASZNALT) / 100;
 end if;
 end if; 
 end if;
*/ 
 set_block_property('KKESZKOZ_KART',update_allowed,property_false);
 set_record_property(to_number(:system.trigger_record),'KKESZKOZ_KART',status,query_status);
end;

Trigger.Name: PRE-UPDATE
Trigger.TriggerText:
:KKESZKOZ_KART.DATE_MODIFIED := SYSDATE; 
:KKESZKOZ_KART.MODIFIED_BY := :GLOBAL.USERID;
if :KKESZKOZ_KART.W_MARKA is not null and :KKESZKOZ_KART.W_MARKA <> upper(:KKESZKOZ_KART.W_MARKA) then
 :KKESZKOZ_KART.W_MARKA := upper(:KKESZKOZ_KART.W_MARKA);
end if;

else

Trigger.Name: KEY-LISTVAL
Trigger.TriggerText:
declare
 cursor c is
 select UGYL_KODCSOPORT_JELLEG 
 from KKUGYLET_TIPUS_KODCSOPORT 
 where UGYL_TIPUS = :TOOLBAR.UGYL_TIPUS
 and UGYL_KODCSOPORT = 'MODOZAT';
 
 v c%rowtype;
begin
 open c;
 fetch c into v;
 close c;

 if v.UGYL_KODCSOPORT_JELLEG = 'EGY' then
 set_item_property('TOOLBAR.UGYL_MODOZATOK',VALIDATE_FROM_LIST,property_true);
 list_values;
 else 
 set_item_property('TOOLBAR.UGYL_MODOZATOK',VALIDATE_FROM_LIST,property_false);
 CALL_SEL2( 'select UGYL_KOD KOD, UGYL_KOD_NEV NEV, ''*'' CSOPORT, ''*'' CSOPORTNEV from KKUGYLET_UGYL_MODOZAT_V where UGYL_TIPUS=''' || :TOOLBAR.UGYL_TIPUS || ''' order by UGYL_KOD_NEV', :SYSTEM.TRIGGER_ITEM );
 end if; 
end;

Trigger.Name: POST-QUERY
Trigger.TriggerText:
declare eredmeny varchar2(13);
begin
 eredmeny := :KKUGYLET_CL_TETEL_V.RESULT;
 if eredmeny = 'OK' then
 set_item_instance_property('KKUGYLET_CL_TETEL_V.SZIN',current_record,VISUAL_ATTRIBUTE,'ZOLD');
 elsif eredmeny = 'FIGYELEM' then
 set_item_instance_property('KKUGYLET_CL_TETEL_V.SZIN',current_record,VISUAL_ATTRIBUTE,'NARANCS');
 elsif eredmeny = 'TILOS' then
 set_item_instance_property('KKUGYLET_CL_TETEL_V.SZIN',current_record,VISUAL_ATTRIBUTE,'PIROS'); 
 end if; 
end;

 else

 CALL_SEL2( 'select UGYL_KOD KOD, UGYL_KOD_NEV NEV, ''*'' CSOPORT, ''*'' CSOPORTNEV from KKUGYLET_UGYL_JELLEMZO_V where UGYL_TIPUS=''' || :KKUGYLET.UGYL_TIPUS || ''' order by UGYL_KOD_NEV', :SYSTEM.TRIGGER_ITEM ); 
 end if; 
end;

Trigger.Name: POST-QUERY
Trigger.TriggerText:
if :KKUGYLET.UGYL_AIT= 'AKTIV' then
 if nvl(:KKUGYLET.UGYL_UG,'URES') = :GLOBAL.USERID then
 set_item_instance_property('KKUGYLET.SZINAKT',to_number(:system.trigger_record),visual_attribute,'BLOKKOLT');
 elsif instr(:GLOBAL.USERGROUPS, nvl(:KKUGYLET.UGYL_SZEREGY,'URES'))>1 then
 set_item_instance_property('KKUGYLET.SZINAKT',to_number(:system.trigger_record),visual_attribute,'ELLENORZES');
 elsif nvl(:KKUGYLET.UGYL_OSZTALY,'URES')=globals.KK_NAME then 
 set_item_instance_property('KKUGYLET.SZINAKT',to_number(:system.trigger_record),visual_attribute,'KIFOGAS');
 else 
 set_item_instance_property('KKUGYLET.SZINAKT',to_number(:system.trigger_record),visual_attribute,'LELTAR'); 
 end if;
 
--elsif :KKUGYLET.UGYL_AIT= 'INAKTIV' then 
-- set_item_instance_property('KKUGYLET.SZINAKT',to_number(:system.trigger_record),visual_attribute,'UGY_ELO');
--else
-- set_item_instance_property('KKUGYLET.SZINAKT',to_number(:system.trigger_record),visual_attribute,'UGY_INAKTIV');
end if;

Trigger.Name: ON-POPULATE-DETAILS
Trigger.TriggerText:
--
-- Begin default relation declare section
--
DECLARE
 recstat VARCHAR2(20) := :System.record_status; 
 startitm VARCHAR2(61) := :System.cursor_item; 
 rel_id Relation;
--
-- End default relation declare section
--
--
-- Begin default relation program section
--
BEGIN
 IF ( recstat = 'NEW' or recstat = 'INSERT' ) THEN 
 RETURN;
 END IF;
 --
 -- Begin KKUGYLET_SZEREPLO_V detail program section
 --
 IF ( (:KKUGYLET.UGYL_ID is not null) ) THEN 
 rel_id := Find_Relation('KKUGYLET.KKUGYLET_KKUGYLET_SZEREPLO_V'); 
 Query_Master_Details(rel_id, 'KKUGYLET_SZEREPLO_V'); 
 END IF;
 --
 -- End KKUGYLET_SZEREPLO_V detail program section
 --
 --
 -- Begin KKUGYLET_JEGYZET detail program section
 --
 IF ( (:KKUGYLET.UGYL_ID is not null) ) THEN 
 rel_id := Find_Relation('KKUGYLET.KKUGYLET_KKUGYLET_JEGYZET'); 
 Query_Master_Details(rel_id, 'KKUGYLET_JEGYZET'); 
 END IF;
 --
 -- End KKUGYLET_JEGYZET detail program section
 --
 --
 -- Begin KKUGYLET_EVENTS_V detail program section
 --
 IF ( (:KKUGYLET.UGYL_ID is not null) ) THEN 
 rel_id := Find_Relation('KKUGYLET.KKUGYLET_KKUGYLET_EVENTS_V'); 
 Query_Master_Details(rel_id, 'KKUGYLET_EVENTS_V'); 
 END IF;
 --
 -- End KKUGYLET_EVENTS_V detail program section
 --
 --
 -- Begin KKUGYLET_HISTORY_UGYL_ST detail program section
 --
 IF ( (:KKUGYLET.UGYL_ID is not null) ) THEN 
 rel_id := Find_Relation('KKUGYLET.KKUGYLET_KKUGYLET_HISTO'); 
 Query_Master_Details(rel_id, 'KKUGYLET_HISTORY_UGYL_ST'); 
 END IF;
 --
 -- End KKUGYLET_HISTORY_UGYL_ST detail program section
 --

 IF ( :System.cursor_item <> startitm ) THEN 
 Go_Item(startitm); 
 Check_Package_Failure; 
 END IF;
END;
--
-- End default relation program section
--

Trigger.Name: ON-CHECK-DELETE-MASTER
Trigger.TriggerText:
--
-- Begin default relation declare section
--
DECLARE

 --

 -- Begin KKUGYLET_JEGYZET detail declare section

 IF ( KKUGYLET_SZEREPLO_V_cur%found ) THEN 
 Message('Cannot delete master record when matching detail records exist.'); 
 CLOSE KKUGYLET_SZEREPLO_V_cur;

 END IF;
 CLOSE KKUGYLET_SZEREPLO_V_cur;
 --
 -- End KKUGYLET_SZEREPLO_V detail program section

 -- Begin KKUGYLET_JEGYZET detail program section

 IF ( KKUGYLET_JEGYZET_cur%found ) THEN 
 Message('Cannot delete master record when matching detail records exist.'); 
 CLOSE KKUGYLET_JEGYZET_cur; 
 RAISE Form_Trigger_Failure; 
 END IF;
 CLOSE KKUGYLET_JEGYZET_cur;
 --
 -- End KKUGYLET_JEGYZET detail program section
 --
 --
 -- Begin KKUGYLET_EVENTS_V detail program section

 OPEN KKUGYLET_EVENTS_V_cur; 
 FETCH KKUGYLET_EVENTS_V_cur INTO Dummy_Define; 
 IF ( KKUGYLET_EVENTS_V_cur%found ) THEN 
 Message('Cannot delete master record when matching detail records exist.'); 
 CLOSE KKUGYLET_EVENTS_V_cur; 
 RAISE Form_Trigger_Failure; 
 END IF;

 --
 -- End KKUGYLET_EVENTS_V detail program section

 -- Begin KKUGYLET_HISTORY_UGYL_ST detail program section

 IF ( KKUGYLET_HISTORY_UGYL_ST_cur%found ) THEN 
 Message('Cannot delete master record when matching detail records exist.'); 
 CLOSE KKUGYLET_HISTORY_UGYL_ST_cur; 
 RAISE Form_Trigger_Failure; 
 END IF;
 CLOSE KKUGYLET_HISTORY_UGYL_ST_cur;
 --
 -- End KKUGYLET_HISTORY_UGYL_ST detail program section

END;

Trigger.Name: PRE-UPDATE
Trigger.TriggerText:
declare
 ret pls_integer;
 
 cursor c is 
 select UGYL_KOD_JELLEG
 from KKUGYLET_TIPUS_KOD
 where UGYL_TIPUS = :KKUGYLET.UGYL_TIPUS
 and UGYL_KODCSOPORT = 'STATUSZ'
 and UGYL_KOD = :KKUGYLET.UGYL_ST;
 
 v c%rowtype; 
begin 
 :KKUGYLET.DATE_MODIFIED := SYSDATE; 
 :KKUGYLET.MODIFIED_BY := :GLOBAL.USERID;
 
 if :KKUGYLET.UGYL_SZUNKEZD is not null and nvl(:KKUGYLET.UGYL_SZUNVEGE,to_date('2030.12.31','YYYY.MM.DD'))>trunc(sysdate) then
 :KKUGYLET.UGYL_FUGGO := 'IGEN';
 else
 :KKUGYLET.UGYL_FUGGO := 'NEM';
 end if; 
 
 open c;
 fetch c into v;
 close c;
 
 if v.UGYL_KOD_JELLEG = 'VEGE' then
 :KKUGYLET.UGYL_AIT := 'INAKTIV';
 else
 :KKUGYLET.UGYL_AIT := 'AKTIV';
 end if;
end;

Trigger.Name: WHEN-NEW-RECORD-INSTANCE
Trigger.TriggerText:
declare
 aktitm varchar2(80);
begin 
 if :KKUGYLET.UGYL_ID is not null and rec.editmode is null then

 aktitm := :system.cursor_item;
 go_item('KKUGYLET.UGYL_TIPUS'); 
 if :KKUGYLET.U_UGYID is not null and :KKUGYLET.U_UGYID <> :KKSZERZODES_CORE.U_UGYID then
 go_item('KKSZERZODES_CORE.U_UGYID');

-- first_record;
 loop 
 if :KKSZERZODES_CORE.U_UGYID = :KKUGYLET.U_UGYID then
 exit;
 end if;
 if :KKSZERZODES_CORE.U_UGYID < :KKUGYLET.U_UGYID then
 if :system.LAST_RECORD = 'TRUE' then
 exit;
 else
 next_record;
 end if;
 else
 if :system.cursor_record = 1 then
 exit;
 else
 previous_record;
 end if;
 end if;
 end loop;
 end if;
 if :KKUGYLET.U_UGYID = :KKSZERZODES_CORE.U_UGYID 
 and :KKUGYLET.L_SZERAZON is not null 
 and :KKUGYLET.L_SZERAZON <> :KKESZKOZ_CORE.L_SZERAZON 
 then
 go_item('KKESZKOZ_CORE.L_SZERAZON');
 first_record;
 loop
 if (:KKESZKOZ_CORE.L_SZERAZON = :KKUGYLET.L_SZERAZON) then
 exit;
 end if; 
 if :KKESZKOZ_CORE.L_SZERAZON < :KKUGYLET.L_SZERAZON then
 if :system.LAST_RECORD = 'TRUE' then
 exit;
 else
 next_record;
 end if;
 else
 if :system.cursor_record = 1 then
 exit;
 else
 previous_record;
 end if;
 end if;
 end loop;
 
 end if;
 :TOOLBAR.U_UGYID := :KKSZERZODES_CORE.U_UGYID;
 :TOOLBAR.L_SZERAZON := :KKESZKOZ_CORE.L_SZERAZON;
 :TOOLBAR.L_ESZKNEV1 := :KKESZKOZ_CORE.L_ESZKNEV1;
 :TOOLBAR.L_ESZKNEV2 := :KKESZKOZ_CORE.L_ESZKNEV2;
 :TOOLBAR.L_RENDSZAM := :KKESZKOZ_CORE.L_RENDSZAM; 
 
 set_window_property('W_UGYLET' , TITLE, globals.KK_NAME || ' - ' || :KKPARTNER_CORE.L_NEV || ' (' || :KKPARTNER_CORE.U_PARTNER || ' ) ' || :KKESZKOZ_CORE.L_SZERSZAM || ' / ' || :KKESZKOZ_CORE.L_SZERAZON ); 
 
 go_item('KKUGYLET.UGYL_TIPUS'); 
 KKUGYLET_SET;
 go_item(aktitm);
 
 end if;
end;

Trigger.Name: KEY-F1
Trigger.TriggerText:
declare 
 ret pls_integer;
 msg varchar2(256);
begin
 CMDGLB.undo_record;
 ret := "report.KKUGYLET_DEL_SPID" (:KKUGYLET.UGYL_ID, :GLOBAL.USERID, msg); 
 commit; 
end;

Trigger.Name: WHEN-VALIDATE-ITEM
Trigger.TriggerText:
declare
 cursor c is
 select F_PARTNER U_PARTNER, F_NEV L_NEV
 from KKERPART
 where F_PARTNER = :KKUGYLET_SZEREPLO_V.SZEREPLO_ID;
 
 v c%rowtype;

 cursor p is
 select P_F_PARTNER U_PARTNER, P_F_NEV L_NEV 
 from PARTNER 
 where P_F_PARTNER = :KKUGYLET_SZEREPLO_V.SZEREPLO_ID;
 
 x p%rowtype; 
 nev varchar2(100);
begin
 if rec.editmode is not null then
 open c;
 fetch c into v;
 close c;
 nev := v.L_NEV;
 if nev is null then
 open p;
 fetch p into x;
 close p;
 nev := x.L_NEV;
 end if;
 
 if nev is not null then
 :KKUGYLET_SZEREPLO_V.SZEREPLO_NEV := nev;
 end if;
 
 if :KKUGYLET_SZEREPLO_V.SZEREPLO_ST in ( 'ADAT ROGZIT' , 'KESOBB' )
 and (:KKUGYLET_SZEREPLO_V.SZEREPLO_ID is not null or :KKUGYLET_SZEREPLO_V.SZEREPLO_KOD is not null)
 then
 :KKUGYLET_SZEREPLO_V.SZEREPLO_ST := 'AKTIV';
 end if;
 
 if :KKUGYLET_SZEREPLO_V.SZEREPLO_ST = 'AKTIV' 
 and :KKUGYLET_SZEREPLO_V.SZEREPLO_ID is null 
 and :KKUGYLET_SZEREPLO_V.SZEREPLO_KOD is null
 then
 :KKUGYLET_SZEREPLO_V.SZEREPLO_ST := 'ADAT ROGZIT';
 end if; 
 end if;
end;

Trigger.Name: WHEN-VALIDATE-ITEM
Trigger.TriggerText:
declare
 cursor c_tel_megkeres_db (p_szerszam varchar2) is
 select count(*) DB
 from KKUGYLET 
 where UGYL_TIPUS = 'TEL MEGKERES'
 and UGYL_AIT = 'AKTIV' 
 and L_VEVO = :KKKONTAKT.U_PARTNER
 and L_SZERSZAM = p_szerszam;
 v_tel_megkeres_db c_tel_megkeres_db%rowtype;
 
 cursor c_tel_megkeres (p_szerszam varchar2) is
 select UGYL_ID, UGYL_FAJTA
 from KKUGYLET 
 where UGYL_TIPUS = 'TEL MEGKERES'
 and UGYL_AIT = 'AKTIV'
 and L_VEVO = :KKKONTAKT.U_PARTNER
 and L_SZERSZAM = p_szerszam;
 v_tel_megkeres c_tel_megkeres%rowtype; 
begin
 if globals.KK_NAME = 'KKTUSZ' then
 open c_tel_megkeres_db (substr(:KKKONTAKT.U_UGYID,1,10));
 fetch c_tel_megkeres_db into v_tel_megkeres_db;
 close c_tel_megkeres_db;
 
 if v_tel_megkeres_db.DB = 1 then
 open c_tel_megkeres (substr(:KKKONTAKT.U_UGYID,1,10));
 fetch c_tel_megkeres into v_tel_megkeres;
 close c_tel_megkeres;
 :KKKONTAKT.UGYL_ID := v_tel_megkeres.UGYL_ID;
 :KKKONTAKT.UGYL_FAJTA := v_tel_megkeres.UGYL_FAJTA;
 end if;
 end if; 
end;

Trigger.Name: KEY-COMMIT

declare
 ret pls_integer;
begin
 KKKONTAKT_POST;
 KKKONTAKT_QUERY;
 SET_CTRL_ENABLE(:system.trigger_block,'TRUE');
end;

Trigger.Name: POST-QUERY
Trigger.TriggerText:
declare
 cursor c (tag varchar2) is
 select 'X' VAN from KKTAGLINKS_V where U_TAGTABLE = 'KKKONTAKT' and U_KULSOID = :KKKONTAKT.U_ID and U_TAGID = tag;
 
 v c%rowtype; 
begin 
 if :KKKONTAKT_CTRL.TAG <> '*' then
 open c (globals.TAG);
 fetch c into v;
 close c;
 if v.VAN = 'X' then
 :KKKONTAKT.TAGCHECK := 'I';
 else
 :KKKONTAKT.TAGCHECK := 'N';
 end if;
 else
 :KKKONTAKT.TAGCHECK := 'N';
 end if;
 set_record_property(to_number(:system.trigger_record),'KKKONTAKT',status,query_status);
end;

Trigger.Name: WHEN-VALIDATE-ITEM
Trigger.TriggerText:
declare
 cursor c is 
 select L_RENDSZAM, L_ESZKNEV1, L_ESZKNEV2, L_ESZKNEV3, L_ESZKNEV4 
 from KKESZKOZ 
 where U_UGYID = :KKFELADAT.U_UGYID
 and U_UTOLSO = 'IGEN'
 and L_SZERAZON = :KKFELADAT.U_SZERAZON;
 
 v c%rowtype;
begin
 if :KKFELADAT.U_TARGY = 'Információ foglalásról' then
 :KKFELADAT.U_FELELOS := 'KKBO';
 :KKFELADAT.U_SZEREGY := 'KKBOFOLY';
 :KKFELADAT.U_SZEMELYNEV := 'Nádasdi Ferenc';
 :KKFELADAT.U_SZEMELY := '0424';
 :KKFELADAT.U_LOMBVKELL := 'NEM';
 :KKFELADAT.U_PARTVKELL := 'NEM';
 :KKFELADAT.U_HATARIDO := trunc(sysdate)+5;
 if :KKFELADAT.U_SZERAZON is null then
 :KKFELADAT.U_SZERAZON := :KKFELADAT.U_SZERSZAM || '01'; 
 end if;
 
 open c;
 fetch c into v;
 close c;
 
 :KKFELADAT.U_SZOVEG := 'Információm szerint a ' || rtrim(nvl(v.L_RENDSZAM,' ') || ' forgalmi rendszámú ' || v.L_ESZKNEV1 || ' ' || nvl(v.L_ESZKNEV2,' ') || ' ' || nvl(v.L_ESZKNEV3,' ') || ' ' || nvl(v.L_ESZKNEV4,' ')) || ' eszköz foglalt.
 Kérem a foglalással kapcsolatos információk beszerzését és rögzítését!'; 
 end if; 
end;

:KKFELADAT.U_KKTUSZ_ST := 'NINCS FELADAT';
:KKFELADAT.U_KKBO_ST := 'NINCS FELADAT';

:KKFELADAT.U_KKER_ST := 'NINCS FELADAT';

copy (:KKFELADAT.U_STATUS, 'KKFELADAT.U' ||:KKFELADAT.U_FELELOS || '_ST' );

Trigger.Name: PRE-UPDATE
Trigger.TriggerText:
declare 
 feladat_forras varchar2(13);
 
begin
 :KKFELADAT.DATE_MODIFIED := SYSDATE; 
 :KKFELADAT.MODIFIED_BY := :GLOBAL.USERID;
 :KKFELADAT.U_FORRAS := globals.KK_NAME;
 :KKFELADAT.U_KKTUSZ_ST := 'NINCS FELADAT';
 :KKFELADAT.U_KKBO_ST := 'NINCS FELADAT';
 :KKFELADAT.U_KKBEH_ST := 'NINCS FELADAT';
 :KKFELADAT.U_KKER_ST := 'NINCS FELADAT';
 :KKFELADAT.U_KKJOG_ST := 'NINCS FELADAT';
 copy (:KKFELADAT.U_STATUS, 'KKFELADAT.U_' || :KKFELADAT.U_FELELOS || '_ST');

 if get_item_property ('KKFELADAT.U_STATUS', database_value) <> :KKFELADAT.U_STATUS
 and :KKFELADAT.U_STATUS = 'VISSZAADVA' then
 feladat_forras := :KKFELADAT.U_FORRAS;
 :KKFELADAT.U_FORRAS := :KKFELADAT.U_FELELOS;
 :KKFELADAT.U_FELELOS := feladat_forras;
 copy ('VISSZAADVA', 'KKFELADAT.U_' || rtrim(:KKFELADAT.U_FORRAS) || '_ST');
 copy ('VISSZAADVA', 'KKFELADAT.U_' || rtrim(:KKFELADAT.U_FELELOS) || '_ST');
 end if; 
END;

Trigger.Name: KEY-COMMIT
Trigger.TriggerText:
declare
 ret pls_integer; 
begin
 if :KKFELADAT.U_FELELOS in ('BEHAJTO','ERTHELY') and :KKFELADAT.DATE_CREATED = :KKFELADAT.DATE_MODIFIED then
 KKFELADAT_SMS;
 end if;
 
 if :KKFELADAT.U_STATUS = 'ELVEGEZVE' and :KKFELADAT.DATE_MODIFIED > SYSDATE then
 KKFELADAT_ELVEGEZVE_MAIL;
 end if;
 
 ret := "report.KKFELADAT_FRISSIT" ( :KKPARTNER_CORE.U_PARTNER );
 commit;
 
 go_block('KKPARTNER');
 execute_query;
 --set_block_property('KKPARTNER',onetime_where,'U_PARTNER=''' || :KKPARTNER_CORE.U_PARTNER || '''');
 

 KKSZERZODES_QUERY;
 GO_ITEM('KKSZERZODES_CORE.M_L_CEG');
 EXECUTE_QUERY;
 TOOLBAR_SET;
 
 go_block('KKFELADAT'); 
 KKFELADAT_QUERY; 
 SET_CTRL_ENABLE(:system.trigger_block,'TRUE');
end;

Trigger.Name: POST-QUERY
Trigger.TriggerText:
begin
 if :KKFELADAT.U_SZEMELY is not null then
 begin
 select NAME3 into :KKFELADAT.U_SZEMELYNEV from KKUSERS where USERID = :KKFELADAT.U_SZEMELY;
 exception
 when no_data_found then
 return;
 end;
 set_record_property(:system.trigger_record,'KKFELADAT',status,query_status);
 end if;
end;

declare
 cursor c (tag varchar2) is
 select 'X' VAN from KKTAGLINKS_V where U_TAGTABLE = 'KKFELADAT' and U_KULSOID = :KKFELADAT.U_ID and U_TAGID = tag;
 
 v c%rowtype; 
begin 
 if :KKFELADAT_CTRL.TAG <> '*' then
 open c (globals.TAG);
 fetch c into v;
 close c;
 if v.VAN = 'X' then
 :KKFELADAT.TAGCHECK := 'I';
 else
 :KKFELADAT.TAGCHECK := 'N';
 end if;
 else
 :KKFELADAT.TAGCHECK := 'N';
 end if;
 set_record_property(to_number(:system.trigger_record),'KKFELADAT',status,query_status);
end;

Trigger.Name: KEY-DELREC
Trigger.TriggerText:
declare
 id number;
begin
 id := :KKFELADAT.U_ID;
 cmdglb.key_delrec;
 if :KKFELADAT.U_ID <> id then
 delete from KKTAGLINKS where U_PARTNER = :KKPARTNER_CORE.U_PARTNER and U_TAGTABLE = 'KKFELADAT' and U_KULSOID = id;
 commit;
 end if;
end;

Trigger.Name: WHEN-NEW-RECORD-INSTANCE
Trigger.TriggerText:
declare
 al number;
begin
 if rec.editmode is null and :system.mode <> 'ENTER-QUERY ' and :KKKOLTSEG.U_ID is not null then
 set_item('KKKOLTSEG_CTRL.MEGTEKINT','FIFFFF');
 set_item('KKKOLTSEG_CTRL.ENGEDELYEZVE','FIFFFF');
 set_item('KKKOLTSEG_CTRL.ELUTASITVA' ,'FIFFFF');
 set_item('KKKOLTSEG_CTRL.KIADVA' ,'FIFFFF'); 
 set_item('KKKOLTSEG_CTRL.UTALVA' ,'FIFFFF'); 
 
 if rec.editmode is null then
 if nvl(:KKKOLTSEG.U_STATUS,'X') = 'ENGEDELYT VAR' then
 set_item('KKKOLTSEG_CTRL.ENGEDELYEZVE','IIIFFF');
 set_item('KKKOLTSEG_CTRL.ELUTASITVA' ,'IIIFFF');
 elsif (nvl(:KKKOLTSEG.U_STATUS,'X') = 'ENGEDELYEZVE' and nvl(:KKKOLTSEG.U_FIZMOD,'X')='ILLETEK') then
 set_item('KKKOLTSEG_CTRL.KIADVA' ,'IIIFFF');
 set_item('KKKOLTSEG_CTRL.ELUTASITVA' ,'IIIFFF'); 
 elsif (nvl(:KKKOLTSEG.U_STATUS,'X') = 'ENGEDELYEZVE' and nvl(:KKKOLTSEG.U_FIZMOD,'X') in ('ATUTALAS','BKARTYAJOG')) then
 set_item('KKKOLTSEG_CTRL.UTALVA' ,'IIIFFF'); 
 set_item('KKKOLTSEG_CTRL.ELUTASITVA' ,'IIIFFF'); 
 end if;
 if :KKKOLTSEG.U_DOCID is not null then
 set_item('KKKOLTSEG_CTRL.MEGTEKINT','IIIFFF');
 end if;

 go_item('KKTAG_KKKOLTSEG_V.U_TAGNAME');
 execute_query;
 go_item(:system.trigger_item);
 
 end if; 
 end if;
end;

Trigger.Name: POST-QUERY
Trigger.TriggerText:
declare
 cursor c (tag varchar2) is
 select 'X' VAN from KKTAGLINKS where U_TAGTABLE = 'KKKOLTSEG' and U_KULSOID = :KKKOLTSEG.U_ID and U_TAGID = tag;
 
 v c%rowtype; 
begin
 if :KKKOLTSEG_CTRL.TAG <> '*' then
 --open c (globals.TAG);
 --fetch c into v;
 --close c;
 if instr(','||:KKKOLTSEG.TAGLIST,globals.TAG)>0 then
 v.VAN := 'X';
 end if; 
 if v.VAN = 'X' then
 :KKKOLTSEG.TAGCHECK := 'I';
 else
 :KKKOLTSEG.TAGCHECK := 'N';
 end if;
 else
 :KKKOLTSEG.TAGCHECK := 'N';
 end if;

 if :KKKOLTSEG.U_STATUS <> 'TOROLT' then 
 if :KKKOLTSEG.U_FORRAS = 'KKJOG' and :KKKOLTSEG.ISLINKED = 'NEM' then
 set_item_instance_property('KKKOLTSEG.U_ID',to_number(:system.trigger_record),visual_attribute,'KIFOGAS');
 set_item_instance_property('KKKOLTSEG.U_STATUS',to_number(:system.trigger_record),visual_attribute,'KIFOGAS'); 
 set_item_instance_property('KKKOLTSEG.U_FORRAS',to_number(:system.trigger_record),visual_attribute,'KIFOGAS'); 
 end if;
 
 
 if :KKKOLTSEG.U_DOCID is null then
 set_item_instance_property('KKKOLTSEG.SZINAKT',to_number(:system.trigger_record),visual_attribute,'BLOKKOLT');
 else
 set_item_instance_property('KKKOLTSEG.SZINAKT',to_number(:system.trigger_record),visual_attribute,'ELLENORZES');
 end if;
 end if;
 set_record_property(to_number(:system.trigger_record),'KKKOLTSEG',status,query_status);
end;

Trigger.Name: POST-QUERY
Trigger.TriggerText:
if :KKPUGYALL.U_CEG = 'PARTNER OSSZ.' then
 set_item_instance_property( 'KKPUGYALL.U_CEG', to_number(:system.trigger_record) , visual_attribute, 'PUGYALL_PARTNER' );
 set_item_instance_property( 'KKPUGYALL.U_FOLEGY', to_number(:system.trigger_record) , visual_attribute, 'PUGYALL_PARTNER' );
 set_item_instance_property( 'KKPUGYALL.U_LEJART', to_number(:system.trigger_record) , visual_attribute, 'PUGYALL_PARTNER' );
 set_item_instance_property( 'KKPUGYALL.U_VISSZAALL', to_number(:system.trigger_record), visual_attribute, 'PUGYALL_PARTNER' );
 set_item_instance_property( 'KKPUGYALL.U_LEZAR', to_number(:system.trigger_record) , visual_attribute, 'PUGYALL_PARTNER' ); 
 set_item_instance_property( 'KKPUGYALL.U_INFOLAPE', to_number(:system.trigger_record) , visual_attribute, 'PUGYALL_PARTNER' );
else
 copy (:KKPUGYALL.U_LEJART ,'GLOBALS_BLK.' || replace(:KKPUGYALL.U_CEG,' ','_') || '_U_LEJART' );
 copy (:KKPUGYALL.U_VISSZAALL,'GLOBALS_BLK.' || replace(:KKPUGYALL.U_CEG,' ','_') || '_U_VISSZAALL');
 copy (:KKPUGYALL.U_LEZAR ,'GLOBALS_BLK.' || replace(:KKPUGYALL.U_CEG,' ','_') || '_U_LEZAR' );
end if;

Trigger.Name: WHEN-VALIDATE-ITEM
Trigger.TriggerText:
declare
 cursor c is
 select L_CEG, L_DNEMV, L_FINKTIP from KKSZERZODES_V where U_UGYID = :KKVARTBEFIZ.U_UGYID and U_UTOLSO = 'IGEN';
 v c%rowtype;
 ceg varchar2(13);
 szerz varchar2(10);
 finktip varchar2(13);
 dev varchar2(3);
 ret pls_integer;
begin
 -- Eljárásid díj meghatározása
 if rec.editmode = 'FELVITEL' and :KKVARTBEFIZ.U_UGYID <> :KKSZERZODES_CORE.U_UGYID then 
 szerz := substr(:KKVARTBEFIZ.U_UGYID,1,10);

 open c;
 fetch c into v;
 close c;
 
 finktip := v.L_FINKTIP;
 ceg := v.L_CEG;
 dev := v.L_DNEMV; 
 
 ret := "report.GET_ELJARDIJ_DEV" (ceg, szerz, 'FT', :KKVARTBEFIZ.U_ELJARDIJ ); 
 :KKVARTBEFIZ.U_JELJARDIJ := :KKVARTBEFIZ.U_ELJARDIJ;

 if substr(finktip,2,1)='D' then 
 :KKVARTBEFIZ.U_DNEM := dev;
 ret := "report.GET_ELJARDIJ_DEV" (ceg, szerz, dev, :KKVARTBEFIZ.U_ELJARDIJD );
 :KKVARTBEFIZ.U_JELJARDIJD := :KKVARTBEFIZ.U_ELJARDIJD; 
 end if;

 end if; 
end;

Trigger.Name: WHEN-VALIDATE-ITEM
Trigger.TriggerText:
if :KKVARTBEFIZ.U_ELJARDIJ is not null and :KKVARTBEFIZ.U_JELJARDIJ is null then
 :KKVARTBEFIZ.U_JELJARDIJ := :KKVARTBEFIZ.U_ELJARDIJ;
end if;
/*
if :KKVARTBEFIZ.U_ELJARDIJ is not null then
 if :KKSZERZODES_CORE.L_SZSTATUS = 'FELTFELMONDOT' then
 if 
 tüsz
 gefi 17000
 tefi 51000
 
 beh 50%
 end if; 
end if;
*/

Trigger.TriggerText:

 al number;
begin 
 if rec.editmode is null and :system.mode <> 'ENTER-QUERY ' and :KKDOCSTAR.U_ID is not null then 
 if :KKDOCSTAR.U_DOCNAME is null and :KKDOCSTAR.U_STATUS = 'UJ' and rec.editmode is null then

 else

 end if;
 if :KKDOCSTAR.U_STATUS = 'FELTOLTVE' then

 else

 end if;
 if :KKDOCSTAR.LATITDEGREE is not null then
 set_item_property('KKDOCSTAR_CTRL.GOOGLEMAP',enabled,property_true);
 else
 set_item_property('KKDOCSTAR_CTRL.GOOGLEMAP',enabled,property_false);
 end if;
 
 if :KKDOCSTAR.U_FORRAS = 'KKJOG' and :KKDOCSTAR.ISLINKED = 'NEM' then
 set_item_instance_property('KKDOCSTAR.U_ID',to_number(:system.trigger_record),visual_attribute,'KIFOGAS');
 set_item_instance_property('KKDOCSTAR.U_STATUS',to_number(:system.trigger_record),visual_attribute,'KIFOGAS'); 
 set_item_instance_property('KKDOCSTAR.U_FORRAS',to_number(:system.trigger_record),visual_attribute,'KIFOGAS'); 
 end if;
 /*
 if rec.editmode is null then
 go_item('KKTAG_KKDOCSTAR_V.U_TAGNAME');
 execute_query;
 go_item(:system.trigger_item); 
 end if; 
 */
 end if;
end;

Trigger.Name: KEY-COMMIT
Trigger.TriggerText:
declare
 r pls_integer;
 fs varchar2(15);
 hiba number;

BEGIN
 if rec.editmode is not null then

 fs := name_in('system.form_status');
 if rec.editmode is not null or fs = 'CHANGED' then
 rec.set_reqakt_on;
 -- msg(fs);
 if fs = 'CHANGED' then
 begin
 rec.validate_record; 
 exception 
 when others then
 raise form_trigger_failure;
 return;
 end;
 end if;

--r := get_alert('STOP', 'validated'); 
 
 -- msg('validated');
 
 if fs = 'CHANGED' then
 begin 
 commit_form; 
 exception
 when others then 
 return;
 end;

--r := get_alert('STOP', 'commited'); 

 if not FORM_SUCCESS or name_in('system.form_status') in ('CHANGED','NEW') then 
--r := get_alert('STOP', 'hiba'); 
 
 /*
 if not FORM_SUCCESS then
 msg('not FORM_SUCCESS');
 end if;
 msg(name_in('system.form_status'));*/
 rec.set_reqakt_off;
 hiba := get_alert('STOP',
 'Hiba : ' || ERROR_TYPE || '-' || TO_CHAR(ERROR_CODE) || ' ' || ERROR_TEXT 
 || ' ' || DBMS_ERROR_CODE || ' ' || DBMS_ERROR_TEXT 
 );
 -- raise form_trigger_failure;
 end if; 
 end if;
 set_block_property(:system.trigger_block,insert_allowed,property_false);
 set_block_property(:system.trigger_block,update_allowed,property_false);
 set_block_property(:system.trigger_block,delete_allowed,property_false); 
 cmdglb.post_cur_item;
 rec.editmode := NULL; 
 rec.save;
 mnu.dml_off;
 cmdglb.set_edit_menu;
 end if;

 
--r := get_alert('STOP', 'commit end'); 
 --commit_form; 
 end if;
 if nvl(:KKDOCSTAR.U_ID,0) = 0 then
 :KKDOCSTAR_CTRL.SORREND := 'DOK_DATUM,DATE_CREATED,U_ID';
 set_block_property('KKDOCSTAR',order_by,:KKDOCSTAR_CTRL.SORREND);
 KKDOCSTAR_QUERY; 
 Last_record; 
 KKDOCSTAR_FELTOLT; 
 end if; 

 SET_CTRL_ENABLE(:system.trigger_block,'TRUE'); 
END;

Trigger.Name: PRE-INSERT
Trigger.TriggerText:
if :KKDOCSTAR.U_ID is null then
 :KKDOCSTAR.U_ID := 0;
end if;
:KKDOCSTAR.DOK_DATUM := SYSDATE;
:KKDOCSTAR.DATE_CREATED := SYSDATE;
:KKDOCSTAR.CREATED_BY := :GLOBAL.USERID;
:KKDOCSTAR.DATE_MODIFIED := SYSDATE; 
:KKDOCSTAR.MODIFIED_BY := :GLOBAL.USERID;

Trigger.Name: POST-QUERY
Trigger.TriggerText:
declare
 cursor c (tag varchar2) is
 select 'X' VAN from KKTAGLINKS where U_TAGTABLE = 'KKDOCSTAR' and U_KULSOID = :KKDOCSTAR.U_ID and U_TAGID = tag;
 
 v c%rowtype; 
begin 
 if :KKDOCSTAR_CTRL.TAG <> '*' then
 --open c (globals.TAG);
 --fetch c into v;
 --close c;
 if instr(','||:KKDOCSTAR.TAGLIST,globals.TAG)>0 then
 v.VAN := 'X';
 end if;
 
 if v.VAN = 'X' then
 :KKDOCSTAR.TAGCHECK := 'I';
 else
 :KKDOCSTAR.TAGCHECK := 'N';
 end if;
 else
 :KKDOCSTAR.TAGCHECK := 'N';
 end if;
 :KKDOCSTAR.CHECK := 'N';
 :KKDOCSTAR.U_SORREND2 := :KKDOCSTAR.U_SORREND;
 if :KKDOCSTAR.U_SORREND >0 then
 :KKDOCSTAR.CHECK := 'I';
 end if;
 
 
 if :KKDOCSTAR.U_FORRAS = 'KKJOG' and :KKDOCSTAR.ISLINKED = 'NEM' then
 set_item_instance_property('KKDOCSTAR.U_ID',to_number(:system.trigger_record),visual_attribute,'KIFOGAS');
 set_item_instance_property('KKDOCSTAR.DOK_DATUM',to_number(:system.trigger_record),visual_attribute,'KIFOGAS'); 
 set_item_instance_property('KKDOCSTAR.U_STATUS',to_number(:system.trigger_record),visual_attribute,'KIFOGAS'); 
 set_item_instance_property('KKDOCSTAR.U_FORRAS',to_number(:system.trigger_record),visual_attribute,'KIFOGAS'); 
 end if;
 
 set_record_property(to_number(:system.trigger_record),'KKDOCSTAR',status,query_status);
end;

Trigger.Name: KEY-DUPREC
Trigger.TriggerText:
declare 
 ret pls_integer;
 uj number;
begin
 if get_alert('NEMIGEN','Biztos, hogy duplikálja a tételt?') = ALERT_BUTTON1 then
 ret := "report.KKDOCSTAR_DUP"(:KKDOCSTAR.U_ID, uj);
 commit;
 go_item('KKDOCSTAR.U_ID');
 execute_query;
 last_record; 
 loop
 if :KKDOCSTAR.U_ID = uj or :system.cursor_record = 1 then
 exit;
 end if;
 previous_record;
 end loop;
 end if;
 if :KKDOCSTAR.U_ID = uj then
 go_item('KKDOCSTAR.U_DOCTYPE');
 end if;
end;

 end if;
end if;

Trigger.Name: ON-POPULATE-DETAILS
Trigger.TriggerText:
--
-- Begin default relation declare section
--
DECLARE
 recstat VARCHAR2(20) := :System.record_status; 
 startitm VARCHAR2(61) := :System.cursor_item; 
 rel_id Relation;
--
-- End default relation declare section
--
--
-- Begin default relation program section
--
BEGIN
 IF ( recstat = 'NEW' or recstat = 'INSERT' ) THEN 
 RETURN;
 END IF;
 --
 -- Begin KKTAG_KKDOCSTAR_V detail program section
 --
 IF ( (:KKDOCSTAR.U_PARTNER is not null) ) THEN 
 rel_id := Find_Relation('KKDOCSTAR.KKDOCSTAR_KKTAG_KKDOCSTAR_V'); 
 Query_Master_Details(rel_id, 'KKTAG_KKDOCSTAR_V'); 
 END IF;
 --
 -- End KKTAG_KKDOCSTAR_V detail program section
 --

 IF ( :System.cursor_item <> startitm ) THEN 
 Go_Item(startitm); 
 Check_Package_Failure; 
 END IF;
END;
--
-- End default relation program section
--

Trigger.Name: ON-CHECK-DELETE-MASTER
Trigger.TriggerText:
--
-- Begin default relation declare section
--
DECLARE
 Dummy_Define CHAR(1);
 --
 -- Begin KKTAG_KKDOCSTAR_V detail declare section
 --
 CURSOR KKTAG_KKDOCSTAR_V_cur IS 
 SELECT 1 FROM KKTAG_SELECT_V K 
 WHERE K.U_PARTNER = :KKDOCSTAR.U_PARTNER;
 --
 -- End KKTAG_KKDOCSTAR_V detail declare section
 --
--
-- End default relation declare section
--
--
-- Begin default relation program section
--
BEGIN
 --
 -- Begin KKTAG_KKDOCSTAR_V detail program section
 --
 OPEN KKTAG_KKDOCSTAR_V_cur; 
 FETCH KKTAG_KKDOCSTAR_V_cur INTO Dummy_Define; 
 IF ( KKTAG_KKDOCSTAR_V_cur%found ) THEN 
 Message('Cannot delete master record when matching detail records exist.'); 
 CLOSE KKTAG_KKDOCSTAR_V_cur; 
 RAISE Form_Trigger_Failure; 
 END IF;
 CLOSE KKTAG_KKDOCSTAR_V_cur;
 --
 -- End KKTAG_KKDOCSTAR_V detail program section
 --
END;
--
-- End default relation program section
--

Trigger.Name: WHEN-BUTTON-PRESSED
Trigger.TriggerText:
declare
 a number;
 cursor c is
 select count(*) DB
 from KKPARTELER_V
 where U_PARTNER = :KKPARTNER_CORE.U_PARTNER
 and U_STATUS IN ( 'KIPROBALNI', 'SIKERES HIVAS');
 
 v c%rowtype; 
begin
 go_item('KKPARTELER.U_STATUS');
 set_alert_property('NEMIGEN',alert_message_text,'Biztos, hogy töröltre állítja a számot?');
 if :KKPARTELER.U_PROBA > 0 and show_alert('NEMIGEN') = ALERT_BUTTON1 then
 set_block_property('KKPARTELER',update_allowed,property_true); 
 :KKPARTELER.U_STATUS := 'TOROLVE';
 commit_form;
 set_block_property('KKPARTELER',update_allowed,property_false); 
 open c;
 fetch c into v;
 close c;
 if v.DB = 0 then 
 set_block_property('KKPARTNER_KART',update_allowed,property_true); 
 :KKPARTNER_KART.U_ELERJELL := 'KERESNI';
 commit_form;
 set_block_property('KKPARTNER_KART',update_allowed,property_false); 
 end if;
 else
 set_alert_property('CFG_ERROR',alert_message_text,'A telefonszámra még nem volt próba,ezért nem törölhető !');
 a := show_alert('CFG_ERROR'); 
 end if;
end;

Trigger.Name: WHEN-BUTTON-PRESSED
Trigger.TriggerText:
declare
 a number;
 cursor c is
 select count(*) DB
 from KKPARTELER_V
 where U_PARTNER = :KKPARTNER_CORE.U_PARTNER
 and U_STATUS IN ( 'KIPROBALNI', 'SIKERES HIVAS');
 
 v c%rowtype; 
begin
 go_item('KKPARTELER.U_STATUS');
 open c;
 fetch c into v;
 close c;
 
 if v.DB>0 then
 set_alert_property('NEMIGEN',alert_message_text,'Van kipróbálásra váró vagy sikeresen hívott telefonszám!'); 
 else
 set_alert_property('NEMIGEN',alert_message_text,'Biztos, hogy a partner nem elérhető ?');
 if show_alert('NEMIGEN') = ALERT_BUTTON1 then 
 set_block_property('KKPARTNER_KART',update_allowed,property_true); 
 :KKPARTNER_KART.U_ELERJELL := 'NINCS MEG';
 commit_form;
 set_block_property('KKPARTNER_KART',update_allowed,property_false); 
 end if;
 end if;
end;

Trigger.Name: WHEN-CHECKBOX-CHANGED
Trigger.TriggerText:
declare
 sorrend number;
 ret pls_integer;
begin 
 --set_block_property('KKDOCSTAR_CTRL',UPDATE_ALLOWED,PROPERTY_TRUE);
 set_block_property('KKDOCSTAR',UPDATE_ALLOWED,PROPERTY_TRUE);
 --if nvl(:KKDOCSTAR_CTRL.CHECK,'N') = 'N' then
 -- :KKDOCSTAR_CTRL.CHECK := 'I';
 --else
 -- :KKDOCSTAR_CTRL.CHECK := 'N';
 --end if;
 go_item('KKDOCSTAR.CHECK');
 first_record;
 loop
 if :KKDOCSTAR.U_ID is not null then
 :KKDOCSTAR.CHECK := :KKDOCSTAR_CTRL.CHECK;
 if :KKDOCSTAR.CHECK = 'I' then
 ret := "report.KKDOCSTAR_SPID_SET" (:KKDOCSTAR.U_ID, 0, sorrend);
 else
 ret := "report.KKDOCSTAR_SPID_SET" (:KKDOCSTAR.U_ID, null, sorrend);
 end if;
 commit;
 end if; 
 if :system.last_record = 'TRUE' or :KKDOCSTAR.U_ID is null then
 exit;
 end if;
 next_record;
 end loop;
 set_block_property('KKDOCSTAR',UPDATE_ALLOWED,PROPERTY_FALSE);
 --set_block_property('KKDOCSTAR_CTRL',UPDATE_ALLOWED,PROPERTY_FALSE);
end;

Trigger.Name: WHEN-BUTTON-PRESSED
Trigger.TriggerText:
if :KKKOLTSEG.U_DOCID is not null then
 DOKUMENTUM_MEGTEKINT (:KKKOLTSEG.U_DOCID);
end if;

Trigger.Name: WHEN-BUTTON-PRESSED
Trigger.TriggerText:
declare 
 id number;
begin
 if :KKKOLTSEG.U_STATUS = 'ENGEDELYT VAR' and :KKKOLTSEG.U_ENGEDELYEZTE = :GLOBAL.USERID then
 if get_alert('NEMIGEN','Biztos, hogy engedélyezi a költséget?') = ALERT_BUTTON1 then
 go_item('KKKOLTSEG.U_UGYID');
 set_block_property('KKKOLTSEG',UPDATE_ALLOWED,PROPERTY_TRUE);
 id := :KKKOLTSEG.U_ID;
 :KKKOLTSEG.U_STATUS := 'ENGEDELYEZVE';
 :KKKOLTSEG.U_ENGEDELY := 'IGEN';
 :KKKOLTSEG.U_ENGEDELYEZVE := sysdate;
 commit_form; 
 execute_trigger('WHEN-NEW-RECORD-INSTANCE');
 /* 
 execute_query;
 loop
 if upper(:system.last_record) = 'TRUE' or :KKKOLTSEG.U_ID = id then
 exit;
 else
 next_record;
 end if;
 end loop;
 */
 end if;
 end if;
end;

Trigger.Name: WHEN-BUTTON-PRESSED
Trigger.TriggerText:
if :KKKOLTSEG.U_STATUS = 'ENGEDELYEZVE' and nvl(:KKKOLTSEG.U_FIZMOD,'X')='ILLETEK' then
 if get_alert('NEMIGEN','Biztos, hogy kiadta az illetéket?') = ALERT_BUTTON1 then
 go_item('KKKOLTSEG.U_UGYID');
 set_block_property('KKKOLTSEG',UPDATE_ALLOWED,PROPERTY_TRUE);
 :KKKOLTSEG.U_STATUS := 'KIADVA'; 
 commit_form;
 execute_trigger('WHEN-NEW-RECORD-INSTANCE');
 end if;
end if;

Trigger.Name: WHEN-BUTTON-PRESSED
Trigger.TriggerText:
if :KKKOLTSEG.U_STATUS = 'ENGEDELYEZVE' and nvl(:KKKOLTSEG.U_FIZMOD,'X') in ('ATUTALAS','BKARTYAJOG') then
 if get_alert('NEMIGEN','Biztos, hogy utalva?') = ALERT_BUTTON1 then
 go_item('KKKOLTSEG.U_UGYID');
 set_block_property('KKKOLTSEG',UPDATE_ALLOWED,PROPERTY_TRUE);
 :KKKOLTSEG.U_STATUS := 'UTALVA'; 
 commit_form;
 execute_trigger('WHEN-NEW-RECORD-INSTANCE');
 end if;
end if;

Trigger.Name: WHEN-BUTTON-PRESSED
Trigger.TriggerText:
if :KKKOLTSEG.U_STATUS in ( 'ENGEDELYT VAR', 'ENGEDELYEZVE' ) and :KKKOLTSEG.U_ENGEDELYEZTE = :GLOBAL.USERID then
 if get_alert('NEMIGEN','Biztos, hogy elutasítja a költséget?') = ALERT_BUTTON1 then
 go_item('KKKOLTSEG.U_UGYID');
 set_block_property('KKKOLTSEG',UPDATE_ALLOWED,PROPERTY_TRUE);
 :KKKOLTSEG.U_STATUS := 'ELUTASITVA';
 :KKKOLTSEG.U_ENGEDELY := 'NEM';
 :KKKOLTSEG.U_ENGEDELYEZVE := sysdate;
 commit_form;
 execute_trigger('WHEN-NEW-RECORD-INSTANCE');
 end if;
end if;

 go_block('KKKOLTSEG');
 raise form_trigger_failure;
end if;

Trigger.Name: WHEN-VALIDATE-ITEM
Trigger.TriggerText:
declare
 cursor c is
 SELECT distinct f.U_JOGIKARTON, e.U_PARTNER, e.L_NEV, 
 e.L_SZIGSZAM, e.L_AIASZ, e.L_HELYSEG, 
 e.L_CIM, e.L_IRSZ, e.U_PARTNER F_PARTNER
 FROM KKJOGKARTF f, KKPARTNER_CORE e, KKKEYGO_V k
 where f.U_PARTNER = k.U_PARTNER
 and f.U_JOGIKARTON = k.U_JOGIKARTON
 and f.U_PARTNER = e.U_PARTNER
 and f.U_JOGIKARTON = :KEYGO.U_JOGIKARTON;
 
 v c%rowtype;
begin
 if :KEYGO.U_JOGIKARTON is not null then
 open c;
 fetch c into v;
 close c;
 
 if v.U_JOGIKARTON is not null then
 :KEYGO.U_PARTNER := v.U_PARTNER;
 :KEYGO.L_NEV := v.L_NEV;
 :KEYGO.L_SZIGSZAM := v.L_SZIGSZAM;
 :KEYGO.L_AIASZ := v.L_AIASZ;
 :KEYGO.F_PARTNER := v.U_PARTNER;
 end if;
 end if;
end;

Trigger.Name: KEY-LISTVAL
Trigger.TriggerText:
KEYGO_SET.SETVAR;
commit;
if name_in(:SYSTEM.TRIGGER_ITEM) is null then
 message ('Meg kell adni minimum egy karaktert !');
 raise form_trigger_failure;
else
 list_values;
end if;

Trigger.Name: WHEN-NEW-ITEM-INSTANCE
Trigger.TriggerText:
declare
 cursor r is 
 select count(distinct U_PARTNER) PARTNER, count(distinct U_UGYID) UGY, count(*) ESZKOZ
 from KKKEYGO_V;
 n r%rowtype; 
 cursor c is select * from KKKEYGO_V order by U_PARTNER, U_VERAZON, L_SZERAZON;
 v c%rowtype;
begin
 if nvl(KEYGO_SET.AKT,'X') = :system.trigger_item then
 raise form_trigger_failure; 
 end if;
 
 if KEYGO_SET.AKT is null then
 KEYGO_SET.AKT := :system.trigger_item;
 end if;

 KEYGO_SET.WHEN_NEW_ITEM;
 
 KEYGO_SET.AKT := :system.trigger_item;
 raise form_trigger_failure;
end;

end;

Trigger.Name: WHEN-MOUSE-DOUBLECLICK
Trigger.TriggerText:
begin
 if :KKSPID_HISTORY_V.U_PARTNER is not null then
 P_KKLOCKS_OFF; 
 KEYGO_SET.CLEARVAR;
 commit;
 --go_item('KKUGYLET_JEGYZET_ALERT.UGYL_ID');
 --execute_query;
 go_item('SCHEDULER_KEYGO_V.U_PARTNER');
 set_block_property('SCHEDULER_KEYGO_V',default_where,'U_OSZTALY = '''||globals.KK_NAME||'''
and (U_UG = ''URES'' or U_UG = '''||:GLOBAL.USERID||''' or SZIN in (''PIROS'',''NARANCS''))
and (U_SZEREGY = ''URES'' or replace('','||:GLOBAL.USERGROUPS||','','',''+U_SZEREGY+'','','''')<>'','||:GLOBAL.USERGROUPS||','')');

 set_block_property('SCHEDULER_KEYGO_V',order_by,'HATARIDO,case when U_UG='''||:GLOBAL.USERID||''' then 1 else 2 end, U_UG');
/*
 go_item('SCHEDULER_KEYGO_V.U_PARTNER');
 set_block_property('SCHEDULER_KEYGO_V',default_where,'U_OSZTALY = '''||:PARAMETER.KK||'''
and (U_SZEREGY = ''URES'' or replace('','||:GLOBAL.USERGROUPS||','','',''+U_SZEREGY+'','','''')<>'','||:GLOBAL.USERGROUPS||','')'); 
*/
 execute_query; 
 go_item('KEYGO.U_PARTNER');
 delete_record;
 commit_form;
 :KEYGO.U_UTOLSOUGY := 'IGEN'; 
 :KEYGO.U_PARTNER := :KKSPID_HISTORY_V.U_PARTNER;
 :KEYGO.L_NEV := :KKSPID_HISTORY_V.L_NEV;
 KEYGO_SET.WHEN_NEW_ITEM;
 KEYGO_SET.CLEARVAR;
 commit;
 KEYGO_OPEN_KK; 
 end if;
end;

Trigger.Name: WHEN-BUTTON-PRESSED
Trigger.TriggerText:
/*

Azoknál a bérletes szerződéseknél, ahol az igazgatóság az LFLOTTA, vagy VBLFLOTTA, és a szerződés státusz HATÁLYOS, kérlek hogy az Intézkedés fülben legenerálható "Értesítés az eszköz értékesítéséről" gombra kattintva jelenjen meg egy felugró ablak a lenti szövegezéssel:
Figyelem!
Az értesítő generálása ügyvitelileg nem indokolt.
Biztos hogy legenerálja?
Nem Igen

*/

if :PRINT_ESZKERT.L_ERTMOD is not null and :PRINT_ESZKERT.L_DATUM is not null then
 if (:KKSZERZODES_CORE.L_FINTIP = 'BERLET' and :KKSZERZODES_CORE.L_IGAZGATO in ('LFLOTTA','VBLFLOTTA') and :KKSZERZODES_CORE.L_SZSTATUS = 'HATALYOS')
 then
 if GET_ALERT('NEMIGEN','Figyelem! Az értesítő generálása ügyvitelileg nem indokolt! Biztos, hogy legenerálja?') = ALERT_BUTTON1 then
 PRINT_KKESZKERT;
 end if;
 else
 PRINT_KKESZKERT; 
 end if;
end if;

Trigger.Name: WHEN-BUTTON-PRESSED
Trigger.TriggerText:
globals.forms_spec := 'OFF';
go_block('FORMS_SPEC');
first_record;
if :FORMS_SPEC.CANVAS_NAME is not null then
 globals.forms_spec_va_canvas_all := substr(globals.forms_spec_va_canvas_all,2);
 loop 
 globals.forms_spec_va_canvas := substr(globals.forms_spec_va_canvas_all,1,instr(globals.forms_spec_va_canvas_all,',')-1);
 globals.forms_spec_va_canvas_all := substr(globals.forms_spec_va_canvas_all,instr(globals.forms_spec_va_canvas_all,',')+1); 
 set_canvas_property(:FORMS_SPEC.CANVAS_NAME,visual_attribute,globals.forms_spec_va_canvas);
 if upper(:SYSTEM.LAST_RECORD)='TRUE' or :FORMS_SPEC.CANVAS_NAME is null then
 exit;
 end if;
 next_record;
 end loop;
 first_record;
end if;
if globals.forms_spec_va_canvas is not null then
 globals.forms_spec_va_canvas := null;
 globals.forms_spec_va := null;
end if;
go_item('KKPARTNER_CORE.U_PARTNER');
hide_window('W_FORMS_SPEC');

Trigger.Name: WHEN-CHECKBOX-CHANGED
Trigger.TriggerText:
go_item('KKSZERZODES_CORE.M_L_CEG');
first_record;
loop
 if :KKSZERZODES_KART.U_UGYID is not null then
 if :GLOBALS_BLK.SEL = 'IGEN' then
 if globals.KK_NAME = 'KKBEH' then
 if :KKSZERZODES_KART.U_KKBEH_ST = 'BEHAJTRA ATAD' then
 :KKSZERZODES_CORE.SEL := :GLOBALS_BLK.SEL; 
 end if;
 else
 :KKSZERZODES_CORE.SEL := :GLOBALS_BLK.SEL; 
 end if; 
 else
 :KKSZERZODES_CORE.SEL := :GLOBALS_BLK.SEL;
 end if;
 end if;
 if :system.last_record = 'FALSE' then
 next_record;
 else
 exit;
 end if;
end loop;

Trigger.Name: WHEN-VALIDATE-ITEM
Trigger.TriggerText:
declare
 ret pls_integer;
begin
 ret := "report.GET_PARTNERNEV"(:PARTNERBE.U_PARTNER,1,:PARTNERBE.U_PARTNERN);
end;

Trigger.Name: WHEN-BUTTON-PRESSED
Trigger.TriggerText:
declare
 cursor p (p_partner varchar2) is 
 SELECT 
 L_NEV, 
 L_SZIGSZAM, L_AIASZ, L_HELYSEG, 
 L_CIM, L_IRSZ, U_PARTNER F_PARTNER
 FROM KKPARTNER_V_POZ 
 WHERE U_PARTNER = p_partner;

 pp p%rowtype;
 ret pls_integer;
 
 feladat number;
begin
 if :PARTNERBE.U_PARTNER is not null and :PARTNERBE.U_PARTNERN is not null and rec.editmode is null then 
 
 KK_INS_RUN(:PARTNERBE.U_PARTNER);
 
 P_KKLOCKS_OFF; 
 KEYGO_SET.CLEARVAR;
 commit; 
 commit_form;
 
 if :PARTNERBE.U_CSALAS is not null then
 update KKPARTNER 
 set U_CSALAS = :PARTNERBE.U_CSALAS
 where U_PARTNER = :PARTNERBE.U_PARTNER;
 commit;
 end if;
 
 go_item('KEYGO.U_PARTNER');
 delete_record;
 commit_form; 
 :KEYGO.U_UTOLSOUGY := 'IGEN';
 
 open p (:KEYGO.U_PARTNER);
 fetch p into pp;
 close p;

 :KEYGO.L_NEV := pp.L_NEV; 
 :KEYGO.L_SZIGSZAM := pp.L_SZIGSZAM;
 :KEYGO.L_AIASZ := pp.L_AIASZ;
 
 KEYGO_OPEN_KK;
 
 if :KKPARTNER_KART.U_CSALAS is not null then
 ret := "report.KK_CSALAS_ALERT"(
 :KKPARTNER_CORE.U_PARTNER
 ,GLOBALS.KK_NAME
 ,:GLOBAL.USERID
 ,:KKPARTNER_KART.U_CSALAS
 ,feladat
 );
 commit;
 if feladat is not null then
 NAV_KKPARTNER_CTRL('GO_KKPARTNER_KKFELADAT');
 LAST_RECORD;
 if :KKFELADAT.U_ID = feladat then
 KKFELADAT_CSALAS_MAIL;
 end if;
 end if;
 end if;
 
/* 
 set_pugyall_0;
 go_item('KKPUGYALL.U_CEG');
 execute_query;
 
 KKSZERZODES_QUERY; 
 GO_ITEM('KKSZERZODES_CORE.M_L_CEG');
 EXECUTE_QUERY; 
*/ 
 end if;
end;

Trigger.Name: WHEN-BUTTON-PRESSED
Trigger.TriggerText: go_item('KKPARTNER_CORE.U_PARTNER');

Trigger.Name: WHEN-BUTTON-PRESSED
Trigger.TriggerText:
declare
 ret pls_integer;
 tran_id pls_integer;
 exist pls_integer;
 dmrefid varchar2(100);
 result varchar2(256);
 url varchar2(2000);
 marka varchar2(100);
 
 
begin
 ret := "report.KK_GIRO_TDJ4_ISEXIST"(
 'TDJ4',
 :KKESZKOZ_CORE.L_SZERAZON,
 tran_id,
 exist,
 dmrefid,
 result
 );
 commit;
 --msg(exist);
 
 if exist = 1 then 
 if nvl(dmrefid,' ')<'!' then
 msg(result);
 else
 ret := "report.GET_DM_URL"( dmrefid, url );
 Web.Show_document(url,'_blank');
 end if;
 else
 marka := nvl(nvl(:KKESZKOZ_CORE.L_MARKA,:KKESZKOZ_KART.W_MARKA),upper(substr(:KKESZKOZ_CORE.L_ESZKNEV1,1,instr(:KKESZKOZ_CORE.L_ESZKNEV1,' ')-1)));
 if instr(marka,'(')>0 then
 marka := rtrim(substr(marka,1,instr(marka,'(')-1));
 end if;
 ret := "report.KK_GIRO_ADD_NEW_TDJ4"(
 'LOMBARD',
 :GLOBAL.USERID,
 :KKESZKOZ_CORE.L_SZERAZON,
 :KKESZKOZ_CORE.L_RENDSZAM,
 null,
 marka,
 4,
 :GIRO.GIRODOC,
 globals.KK_NAME,
 result,
 tran_id
 ); 
 commit;
 if result is not null then
 msg(result);
 else
 msg('Kérés elküldve!');
 end if;
 end if;
 go_item('KKESZKOZ_CORE.M_L_SZERAZON');
end;

Trigger.TriggerText: go_item('KKESZKOZ_CORE.M_L_SZERAZON');

Trigger.Name: WHEN-CHECKBOX-CHANGED
Trigger.TriggerText:
declare 
 i int;
 
begin
-- msg(:KKFMH_CTRL.ELOUGY);
 
 if :KKFMH_CTRL.ELOUGY = 'IGEN' then 
 i := "report.EDR_EXEC"('update FMH_SZERZLIST set FMH = ''N'' where PID = ' || to_char(:KKFMH_CTRL.FMH_PID) || ' 
 and U_STATUS not in (''ELO SZERZODES'',''ELO UGY'')',''); 
 
 set_block_property('FMH_SZERZLIST', default_where, 'PID = :KKFMH_CTRL.FMH_PID and U_STATUS in (''ELO SZERZODES'',''ELO UGY'')');
 else 
 i := "report.EDR_EXEC"('update FMH_SZERZLIST set FMH = ''I'' where PID = ' || to_char(:KKFMH_CTRL.FMH_PID) || ' 
 and U_STATUS not in (''ELO SZERZODES'',''ELO UGY'')',''); 
 
 set_block_property('FMH_SZERZLIST', default_where, 'PID = :KKFMH_CTRL.FMH_PID ');
 end if;

 commit;
 
 FMH_DIJ;
 
 KKFMH_TECHNICALID;
 
 go_block ('FMH_SZERZLIST');
 execute_query;
 go_block('KKFMH_CTRL');
 
end;

DECLARE

BEGIN

 commit;

END;

Trigger.Name: WHEN-BUTTON-PRESSED
Trigger.TriggerText:
KKFMH_EXIT; 
 
 rec.editmode:='MODOSITAS';
 clear_block;
 CMDGLB.undo_record;
 GO_BLOCK(:GLOBAL.FMH_PREV_BLOCK );
 --GO_ITEM('KKSZERZODES_CORE.M_L_CEG');

Trigger.Name: WHEN-BUTTON-PRESSED
Trigger.TriggerText:
DECLARE
 cursor c_szerzlist (cp_pid int) is select count(*) DARAB from (select distinct L_CEG from FMH_SZERZLIST where PID = cp_pid and FMH = 'I') i;
 v_szerzlist c_szerzlist%rowtype;
 
 i int;
 
BEGIN 
 
 commit;
 
 commit_form;
 
 open c_Szerzlist(:KKFMH_CTRL.FMH_PID);
 fetch c_szerzlist into v_szerzlist;
 close c_szerzlist;
 
 if nvl(v_szerzlist.DARAB,0) > 1 then
 set_alert_property('NEMIGEN', alert_message_text, 'Több cégben is vannak kijelölt szerződések. Folytatja?');
 i := show_alert('NEMIGEN');
 if i = ALERT_BUTTON2 then
 go_block('KKFMH_CTRL');
 return;
 end if;
 end if;
 
 i := "report.EDR_EXEC"('delete from FMH_PARAMLIST where PID =' || to_char(:KKFMH_CTRL.FMH_PID) ,''); 
 
 commit;
 
 i := "report.EDR_EXEC"('insert into FMH_PARAMLIST (PID, L_LOMBKNEV, L_SZOVEG, U_PARTNER)
 (select ' || to_char(:KKFMH_CTRL.FMH_PID) || ', ''INDOKLAS'', ''' || :KKFMH_CTRL.INDOKLAS || ''',''' || :KKPARTNER_CORE.U_PARTNER ||
 ''' from dual)',''); 
 
 
 i := "report.EDR_EXEC"('insert into FMH_PARAMLIST (PID, L_LOMBKNEV, L_SZOVEG, U_PARTNER)
 (select ' || to_char(:KKFMH_CTRL.FMH_PID) || ', ''KAMAT'', ''' || :KKFMH_CTRL.KAMAT || ''',''' || :KKPARTNER_CORE.U_PARTNER ||
 ''' from dual)',''); 
 
 i := "report.EDR_EXEC"('insert into FMH_PARAMLIST (PID, L_LOMBKNEV, L_SZOVEG, U_PARTNER)
 (select ' || to_char(:KKFMH_CTRL.FMH_PID) || ', ''PONTOSITAS_LIZ'', ''' || :KKFMH_CTRL.PONTOSITAS_LIZ || ''',''' || :KKPARTNER_CORE.U_PARTNER ||
 ''' from dual)',''); 
 
 i := "report.EDR_EXEC"('insert into FMH_PARAMLIST (PID, L_LOMBKNEV, L_SZOVEG, U_PARTNER)
 (select ' || to_char(:KKFMH_CTRL.FMH_PID) || ', ''PONTOSITAS_FIN'', ''' || :KKFMH_CTRL.PONTOSITAS_FIN || ''',''' || :KKPARTNER_CORE.U_PARTNER ||
 ''' from dual)',''); 
 
 i := "report.EDR_EXEC"('insert into FMH_PARAMLIST (PID, L_LOMBKNEV, L_SZOVEG, U_PARTNER)
 (select ' || to_char(:KKFMH_CTRL.FMH_PID) || ', ''EGYEBMEGJ'', ''' || :KKFMH_CTRL.EGYEBMEGJ || ''',''' || :KKPARTNER_CORE.U_PARTNER ||
 ''' from dual)',''); 
 
 i := "report.EDR_EXEC"('insert into FMH_PARAMLIST (PID, L_LOMBKNEV, L_SZOVEG, U_PARTNER)
 (select ' || to_char(:KKFMH_CTRL.FMH_PID) || ', ''ILLETEKESSEG'', ''' || :KKFMH_CTRL.ILLETEKESSEG || ''',''' || :KKPARTNER_CORE.U_PARTNER ||
 ''' from dual)',''); 
 
 
 i := "report.EDR_EXEC"('insert into FMH_PARAMLIST (PID, L_LOMBKNEV, L_SZOVEG, U_PARTNER)
 (select ' || to_char(:KKFMH_CTRL.FMH_PID) || ', ''UGYVEDIDIJ'', ''' || :KKFMH_CTRL.UGYVEDIDIJ || ''',''' || :KKPARTNER_CORE.U_PARTNER ||
 ''' from dual)',''); 
 
 
 i := "report.EDR_EXEC"('insert into FMH_PARAMLIST (PID, L_LOMBKNEV, L_SZOVEG, U_PARTNER)
 (select ' || to_char(:KKFMH_CTRL.FMH_PID) || ', ''ELJARASIDIJ'', ''' || :KKFMH_CTRL.ELJARASIDIJ || ''',''' || :KKPARTNER_CORE.U_PARTNER ||
 ''' from dual)',''); 
 
 i := "report.EDR_EXEC"('insert into FMH_PARAMLIST (PID, L_LOMBKNEV, L_SZOVEG, U_PARTNER)
 (select ' || to_char(:KKFMH_CTRL.FMH_PID) || ', ''BIROSAG'', ''' || :KKFMH_CTRL.BIROSAG || ''',''' || :KKPARTNER_CORE.U_PARTNER ||
 ''' from dual)',''); 
 
 i := "report.EDR_EXEC"('insert into FMH_PARAMLIST (PID, L_LOMBKNEV, L_SZOVEG, U_PARTNER)
 (select ' || to_char(:KKFMH_CTRL.FMH_PID) || ', ''TECHNICALID'', ''' || :KKFMH_CTRL.TECHNICALID || ''',''' || :KKPARTNER_CORE.U_PARTNER ||
 ''' from dual)',''); 
 
 commit;
 
 commit_form;
 PRINT_KKFMH_XML;
END;

Trigger.Name: KEY-COMMIT
Trigger.TriggerText:
declare
 
 i int;
 cmd varchar2(1000);

begin
 
 cmd := 'update FMH_SZEREPLO set SZ_FMH = ''' || :FMH_SZERZLIST.FMH || ''' where PID = ' || to_char(:KKFMH_CTRL.FMH_PID) || 
 ' AND rtrim(SZ_SZEREPKOR)=''KOTELEZETT_G'' and SZ_FEDSZERZ =''' || :FMH_SZERZLIST.L_SZERSZAM || '''';
 
 i := "report.EDR_EXEC"(cmd,''); 
 
 KKFMH_TECHNICALID;
 
 go_block('FMH_SZEREPLO');
 execute_query;
 go_block('FMH_SZERZLIST');
end;

Trigger.Name: KEY-COMMIT
Trigger.TriggerText:
declare
 i int;
 cmd varchar2(1000);
 
begin 
 if rtrim(:FMH_SZEREPLO.SZ_SZEREPKOR) = 'KOTELEZETT' 
 and rtrim(:FMH_SZEREPLO.SZ_JOGALL) not in ('MAGANSZEMELY','OSTERMELO','EGYENI VALLALKOZO') then
 
 cmd := 'update FMH_SZEREPLO set SZ_FMH = '''|| :FMH_SZEREPLO.SZ_FMH || ''' where PID = ' || 
 to_char(:FMH_SZEREPLO.PID) || ' AND rtrim(SZ_SZEREPKOR)=''KOTELEZETT_A''';
 
 i := "report.EDR_EXEC"(cmd,'');
 commit;
 --go_block('FMH_SZEREPLO');
 execute_query;
 
 first_record;
 while :FMH_SZEREPLO.SZ_SZEREPKOR <> 'KOTELEZETT' loop
 next_record;
 end loop;
 end if; 
end;

 ( :KKJOG_CTRL.UTOLSO = 'I'

 )
