 mnu.spec_menu_item := null;
 end if;
 mnu.spec_menu_item := null;
 end;
END;

ProgramUnit.Name: CHECK_PACKAGE_FAILURE
ProgramUnit.ProgramUnitText:
Procedure Check_Package_Failure IS
BEGIN
 IF NOT ( Form_Success ) THEN
 RAISE Form_Trigger_Failure;
 END IF;
END;

ProgramUnit.Name: QUERY_MASTER_DETAILS
ProgramUnit.ProgramUnitText:
PROCEDURE Query_Master_Details(rel_id Relation,detail VARCHAR2) IS
 oldmsg VARCHAR2(2); -- Old Message Level Setting
 reldef VARCHAR2(5); -- Relation Deferred Setting
BEGIN
 --
 -- Initialize Local Variable(s)
 --
 reldef := Get_Relation_Property(rel_id, DEFERRED_COORDINATION);
 oldmsg := :System.Message_Level;
 --
 -- If NOT Deferred, Goto detail and execute the query.
 --
 IF reldef = 'FALSE' THEN
 Go_Block(detail);
 Check_Package_Failure;
 :System.Message_Level := '10';
 Execute_Query;
 :System.Message_Level := oldmsg;
 ELSE
 --
 -- Relation is deferred, mark the detail block as un-coordinated
 --
 Set_Block_Property(detail, COORDINATION_STATUS, NON_COORDINATED);
 END IF;

EXCEPTION
 WHEN Form_Trigger_Failure THEN
 :System.Message_Level := oldmsg;
 RAISE;
END Query_Master_Details;

ProgramUnit.Name: CLEAR_ALL_MASTER_DETAILS
ProgramUnit.ProgramUnitText:
PROCEDURE Clear_All_Master_Details IS
 mastblk VARCHAR2(30); -- Initial Master Block Causing Coord
 coordop VARCHAR2(30); -- Operation Causing the Coord
 trigblk VARCHAR2(30); -- Cur Block On-Clear-Details Fires On
 startitm VARCHAR2(61); -- Item in which cursor started
 frmstat VARCHAR2(15); -- Form Status
 curblk VARCHAR2(30); -- Current Block
 currel VARCHAR2(30); -- Current Relation
 curdtl VARCHAR2(30); -- Current Detail Block

 FUNCTION First_Changed_Block_Below(Master VARCHAR2)
 RETURN VARCHAR2 IS
 curblk VARCHAR2(30); -- Current Block
 currel VARCHAR2(30); -- Current Relation
 retblk VARCHAR2(30); -- Return Block
 BEGIN
 --
 -- Initialize Local Vars
 --
 curblk := Master;
 currel := Get_Block_Property(curblk, FIRST_MASTER_RELATION);
 --
 -- While there exists another relation for this block
 --
 WHILE currel IS NOT NULL LOOP
 --
 -- Get the name of the detail block
 --
 curblk := Get_Relation_Property(currel, DETAIL_NAME);
 --
 -- If this block has changes, return its name
 --
 IF ( Get_Block_Property(curblk, STATUS) = 'CHANGED' ) THEN
 RETURN curblk;
 ELSE
 --
 -- No changes, recursively look for changed blocks below
 --
 retblk := First_Changed_Block_Below(curblk);
 --
 -- If some block below is changed, return its name
 --
 IF retblk IS NOT NULL THEN
 RETURN retblk;
 ELSE
 --
 -- Consider the next relation
 --
 currel := Get_Relation_Property(currel, NEXT_MASTER_RELATION);
 END IF;
 END IF;
 END LOOP;

 --
 -- No changed blocks were found
 --
 RETURN NULL;
 END First_Changed_Block_Below;

BEGIN
 --
 -- Init Local Vars
 --
 mastblk := :System.Master_Block;
 coordop := :System.Coordination_Operation;
 trigblk := :System.Trigger_Block;
 startitm := :System.Cursor_Item;
 frmstat := :System.Form_Status;

 --
 -- If the coordination operation is anything but CLEAR_RECORD or
 -- SYNCHRONIZE_BLOCKS, then continue checking.
 --
 IF coordop NOT IN ('CLEAR_RECORD', 'SYNCHRONIZE_BLOCKS') THEN
 --
 -- If we're processing the driving master block...
 --
 IF mastblk = trigblk THEN
 --
 -- If something in the form is changed, find the
 -- first changed block below the master
 --
 IF frmstat = 'CHANGED' THEN
 curblk := First_Changed_Block_Below(mastblk);
 --
 -- If we find a changed block below, go there
 -- and Ask to commit the changes.
 --
 IF curblk IS NOT NULL THEN
 Go_Block(curblk);
 Check_Package_Failure;
 Clear_Block(ASK_COMMIT);
 --
 -- If user cancels commit dialog, raise error
 --
 IF NOT ( :System.Form_Status = 'QUERY'
 OR :System.Block_Status = 'NEW' ) THEN
 RAISE Form_Trigger_Failure;
 END IF;
 END IF;
 END IF;
 END IF;
 END IF;

 --
 -- Clear all the detail blocks for this master without
 -- any further asking to commit.
 --
 currel := Get_Block_Property(trigblk, FIRST_MASTER_RELATION);
 WHILE currel IS NOT NULL LOOP
 curdtl := Get_Relation_Property(currel, DETAIL_NAME);
 IF Get_Block_Property(curdtl, STATUS) <> 'NEW' THEN
 Go_Block(curdtl);
 Check_Package_Failure;
 Clear_Block(NO_VALIDATE);
 IF :System.Block_Status <> 'NEW' THEN
 RAISE Form_Trigger_Failure;
 END IF;
 END IF;
 currel := Get_Relation_Property(currel, NEXT_MASTER_RELATION);
 END LOOP;

 --
 -- Put cursor back where it started
 --
 IF :System.Cursor_Item <> startitm THEN
 Go_Item(startitm);
 Check_Package_Failure;
 END IF;

EXCEPTION
 WHEN Form_Trigger_Failure THEN
 IF :System.Cursor_Item <> startitm THEN
 Go_Item(startitm);
 END IF;
 RAISE;

END Clear_All_Master_Details;

ProgramUnit.Name: SET_WINDOW_CENTER
ProgramUnit.ProgramUnitText:
PROCEDURE SET_WINDOW_CENTER (P_WINDOW varchar2) IS
 h number;
 w number;
 x number;
 y number;
 max_w number;
 max_h number;
 w_w number;
 w_h number;
BEGIN
 max_w := 757; -- 948
 --max_h := 435;
 --max_w := 806;
 max_h := 625;
 
 w_w := get_window_property( P_WINDOW, WIDTH );
 w_h := get_window_property( P_WINDOW, HEIGHT );

 if w_w > max_w then
 max_w := w_w;
 end if;

 if w_w > max_w then
 max_h := w_h;
 end if;

 h := w_h;
 w := w_w;
 x := trunc((max_w - w) / 2);
 y := trunc((max_h - h) / 2);
 set_window_property(P_WINDOW, POSITION, x, y );
END;

ProgramUnit.Name: NAV
ProgramUnit.ProgramUnitText:
PROCEDURE NAV (p_blk varchar2, p_itm varchar2) IS
 itm varchar2(30);
BEGIN
 KK_FORM_LOG.KEZD('NAV ' || p_blk || ' ' || p_itm); 
 itm := substr(p_itm,instr(p_itm,'.')+1);
 if p_blk = 'KKPARTNER_CTRL' then
 NAV_KKPARTNER_CTRL(itm);
 elsif p_blk = 'KKPARTNER_HISTORY_CTRL' then
 NAV_KKPARTNER_HISTORY_CTRL(itm);
 elsif p_blk = 'KKSZERZODES_V_CTRL' then
 null;
 elsif p_blk = 'KKSZERZODES_CTRL' then
 NAV_KKSZERZODES_CTRL(itm);
 elsif p_blk = 'KKKONTAKT_CTRL' then
 NAV_KKKONTAKT_CTRL(itm);
 elsif p_blk = 'KKFELADAT_CTRL' then
 NAV_KKFELADAT_CTRL(itm);
 elsif p_blk = 'KKDOCSTAR_CTRL' then
 NAV_KKDOCSTAR_CTRL(itm);
 elsif p_blk = 'KKKOLTSEG_CTRL' then
 NAV_KKKOLTSEG_CTRL(itm);
 elsif p_blk = 'KKPUALL_CTRL' then
 NAV_KKPUALL_CTRL(itm);
 elsif p_blk = 'KKMFED_CTRL' then
 NAV_KKMFED_CTRL(itm);
 elsif p_blk = 'KKLSZKAR_CTRL' then
 NAV_KKLSZKAR_CTRL(itm);
 elsif p_blk = 'KK_FOGLALAS_CTRL' then
 NAV_KK_FOGLALAS_CTRL(itm); 
 elsif p_blk = 'KK_LSZERINFO_CTRL' then
 NAV_KK_LSZERINFO_CTRL(itm); 
 elsif p_blk = 'KKTAG_CTRL' then
 NAV_KKTAG_CTRL(itm); 
 elsif p_blk = 'KKLKMEGALL_CTRL' then
 NAV_KKLKMEGALL_CTRL(itm); 
 elsif p_blk = 'KKJOGKARTK_CTRL' then
 go_item('KKJOGKARTF.U_JOGIKARTON'); 
 end if; 
 KK_FORM_LOG.VEGE; 
END;

ProgramUnit.Name: NAV_KKPARTNER_CTRL
ProgramUnit.ProgramUnitText:
PROCEDURE NAV_KKPARTNER_CTRL (P_ITM varchar2) IS
 ret pls_integer; 
BEGIN
 /*
 * KKPARTNER_CTRL
 */
 
 if p_itm = 'GO_KKPARTNER_KKSZERZODES_V' then
 go_item('KKSZERZODES_V.L_CEG');
 if :KKPARTNER_CORE.U_PARTNER is not null then
 execute_query;
 end if;

 elsif p_itm = 'GO_KKPARTNER_KKPARTNER_HISTORY' then
 go_item('KKPARTNER_HISTORY.U_HISDATUM');
 if :KKPARTNER_CORE.U_PARTNER is not null then
 execute_query;
 last_record;
 end if; 

 elsif p_itm = 'GO_KKPARTNER_KKKONTAKT' then
 globals.KKKONTAKT_HIVO := 'KKPARTNER_CORE.U_PARTNER';
 
 set_radio_button_property ( 'KKKONTAKT_CTRL.SZINT','PARTNER' ,ENABLED,PROPERTY_TRUE);
 set_radio_button_property ( 'KKKONTAKT_CTRL.SZINT','SZERZODES',ENABLED,PROPERTY_FALSE);
 set_radio_button_property ( 'KKKONTAKT_CTRL.SZINT','ESZKOZ' ,ENABLED,PROPERTY_FALSE);
 
 :KKKONTAKT_CTRL.SZINT := 'PARTNER';
 
 :KKKONTAKT_CTRL.FORRAS_00 := 'IGEN';
 :KKKONTAKT_CTRL.FORRAS_01 := 'NEM';
 :KKKONTAKT_CTRL.FORRAS_02 := 'NEM';
 :KKKONTAKT_CTRL.FORRAS_03 := 'NEM';
 :KKKONTAKT_CTRL.FORRAS_04 := 'NEM';
 :KKKONTAKT_CTRL.FORRAS_05 := 'NEM';
 :KKKONTAKT_CTRL.FORRAS_06 := 'NEM';
 :KKKONTAKT_CTRL.FORRAS_07 := 'NEM';
 :KKKONTAKT_CTRL.FORRAS_08 := 'NEM';
 :KKKONTAKT_CTRL.FORRAS_09 := 'NEM';
 
 set_record_property(1,'KKKONTAKT_CTRL',status,query_status);
 
 go_item('KKKONTAKT.U_STATUS');
 if :KKPARTNER_CORE.U_PARTNER is not null then
 KKKONTAKT_QUERY;
 LAST_RECORD;
 end if;

 elsif p_itm = 'GO_KKPARTNER_KKFELADAT' then
 globals.KKFELADAT_HIVO := 'KKPARTNER_CORE.U_PARTNER';
 
 set_radio_button_property ( 'KKFELADAT_CTRL.SZINT','PARTNER' ,ENABLED,PROPERTY_TRUE);
 set_radio_button_property ( 'KKFELADAT_CTRL.SZINT','SZERZODES',ENABLED,PROPERTY_FALSE);
 set_radio_button_property ( 'KKFELADAT_CTRL.SZINT','ESZKOZ' ,ENABLED,PROPERTY_FALSE);
 set_radio_button_property ( 'KKFELADAT_CTRL.SZINT','KONTAKT' ,ENABLED,PROPERTY_FALSE);
 
 :KKFELADAT_CTRL.SZINT := 'PARTNER';
 
 :KKFELADAT_CTRL.FORRAS_00 := 'IGEN';
 :KKFELADAT_CTRL.FORRAS_01 := 'NEM';
 :KKFELADAT_CTRL.FORRAS_02 := 'NEM';
 :KKFELADAT_CTRL.FORRAS_03 := 'NEM';
 :KKFELADAT_CTRL.FORRAS_04 := 'NEM';
 :KKFELADAT_CTRL.FORRAS_05 := 'NEM';
 :KKFELADAT_CTRL.FORRAS_06 := 'NEM';
 :KKFELADAT_CTRL.FORRAS_07 := 'NEM';
 :KKFELADAT_CTRL.FORRAS_08 := 'NEM';

 :KKFELADAT_CTRL.FELELOS_00 := 'IGEN';
 :KKFELADAT_CTRL.FELELOS_01 := 'NEM';
 :KKFELADAT_CTRL.FELELOS_02 := 'NEM';
 :KKFELADAT_CTRL.FELELOS_03 := 'NEM';
 :KKFELADAT_CTRL.FELELOS_04 := 'NEM';
 :KKFELADAT_CTRL.FELELOS_05 := 'NEM';
 :KKFELADAT_CTRL.FELELOS_06 := 'NEM';
 :KKFELADAT_CTRL.FELELOS_07 := 'NEM';
 :KKFELADAT_CTRL.FELELOS_08 := 'NEM';
 
 :KKFELADAT_CTRL.STATUS_00 := 'IGEN';
 :KKFELADAT_CTRL.STATUS_01 := 'NEM';
 :KKFELADAT_CTRL.STATUS_02 := 'NEM';
 :KKFELADAT_CTRL.STATUS_03 := 'NEM';
 :KKFELADAT_CTRL.STATUS_04 := 'NEM';
 :KKFELADAT_CTRL.STATUS_05 := 'NEM';
 
 set_record_property(1,'KKFELADAT_CTRL',status,query_status);
 
 go_item('KKFELADAT.U_ID');
 if :KKPARTNER_CORE.U_PARTNER is not null then
 KKFELADAT_QUERY;
 last_record;
 --set_block_property('KKFELADAT',default_where,'U_PARTNER=''' || :KKPARTNER_CORE.U_PARTNER || '''');
 --execute_query;
 --last_record;
 end if;


 elsif p_itm = 'GO_KKPARTNER_KKDOCSTAR' then
 globals.KKDOCSTAR_HIVO := 'KKPARTNER_CORE.U_PARTNER';
 
 set_radio_button_property ( 'KKDOCSTAR_CTRL.SZINT','PARTNER' ,ENABLED,PROPERTY_TRUE);
 set_radio_button_property ( 'KKDOCSTAR_CTRL.SZINT','SZERZODES',ENABLED,PROPERTY_FALSE);
 set_radio_button_property ( 'KKDOCSTAR_CTRL.SZINT','ESZKOZ' ,ENABLED,PROPERTY_FALSE);
 set_radio_button_property ( 'KKDOCSTAR_CTRL.SZINT','KONTAKT' ,ENABLED,PROPERTY_FALSE);
 
 :KKFELADAT_CTRL.SZINT := 'PARTNER';
 
 :KKDOCSTAR_CTRL.FORRAS_00 := 'IGEN';
 :KKDOCSTAR_CTRL.FORRAS_01 := 'NEM';
 :KKDOCSTAR_CTRL.FORRAS_02 := 'NEM';
 :KKDOCSTAR_CTRL.FORRAS_03 := 'NEM';
 :KKDOCSTAR_CTRL.FORRAS_04 := 'NEM';
 :KKDOCSTAR_CTRL.FORRAS_05 := 'NEM'; 
 :KKDOCSTAR_CTRL.FORRAS_06 := 'NEM';
 :KKDOCSTAR_CTRL.FORRAS_07 := 'NEM';
 :KKDOCSTAR_CTRL.FORRAS_08 := 'NEM';
 :KKDOCSTAR_CTRL.FORRAS_09 := 'NEM';
 :KKDOCSTAR_CTRL.FORRAS_10 := 'NEM'; 
 :KKDOCSTAR_CTRL.FORRAS_11 := 'NEM';
 :KKDOCSTAR_CTRL.FORRAS_12 := 'NEM'; 
 
 set_record_property(1,'KKFELADAT_CTRL',status,query_status);
 
 go_item('KKDOCSTAR.U_ID');
 KKDOCSTAR_QUERY;
 LAST_RECORD;
 
 elsif p_itm = 'GO_KKPARTNER_KKKOLTSEG' then
 globals.KKKOLTSEG_HIVO := 'KKPARTNER_CORE.U_PARTNER';
 
 set_radio_button_property ( 'KKKOLTSEG_CTRL.SZINT','PARTNER' ,ENABLED,PROPERTY_TRUE);
 set_radio_button_property ( 'KKKOLTSEG_CTRL.SZINT','SZERZODES',ENABLED,PROPERTY_FALSE);
 set_radio_button_property ( 'KKKOLTSEG_CTRL.SZINT','ESZKOZ' ,ENABLED,PROPERTY_FALSE);
 
 :KKKOLTSEG_CTRL.SZINT := 'PARTNER';
 
 :KKKOLTSEG_CTRL.FORRAS_00 := 'IGEN';
 :KKKOLTSEG_CTRL.FORRAS_01 := 'NEM';
 :KKKOLTSEG_CTRL.FORRAS_02 := 'NEM';
 :KKKOLTSEG_CTRL.FORRAS_03 := 'NEM';
 :KKKOLTSEG_CTRL.FORRAS_04 := 'NEM';
 :KKKOLTSEG_CTRL.FORRAS_05 := 'NEM';
 :KKKOLTSEG_CTRL.FORRAS_06 := 'NEM';
 
 :KKKOLTSEG_CTRL.STATUS_00 := 'IGEN';
 :KKKOLTSEG_CTRL.STATUS_01 := 'NEM';
 :KKKOLTSEG_CTRL.STATUS_02 := 'NEM';
 :KKKOLTSEG_CTRL.STATUS_03 := 'NEM';
 :KKKOLTSEG_CTRL.STATUS_04 := 'NEM';
 :KKKOLTSEG_CTRL.STATUS_05 := 'NEM';
 :KKKOLTSEG_CTRL.STATUS_06 := 'NEM'; 
 if globals.KK_NAME = 'KKJOG' then
 :KKKOLTSEG_CTRL.STATUS_07 := 'NEM';
 else
 :KKKOLTSEG_CTRL.STATUS_07 := 'IGEN';
 end if; 
 :KKKOLTSEG_CTRL.STATUS_08 := 'NEM';

 set_record_property(1,'KKKOLTSEG_CTRL',status,query_status);
 
 go_item('KKKOLTSEG.U_ID');
 if :KKPARTNER_CORE.U_PARTNER is not null then
 KKKOLTSEG_QUERY;
 last_record;
 --set_block_property('KKKOLTSEG',default_where,'U_PARTNER=''' || :KKPARTNER_CORE.U_PARTNER || '''');
 --execute_query;
 --last_record;
 end if;

 elsif p_itm = 'GO_KKPARTNER_KKPUALL' then
 globals.KKPUALL_HIVO := 'KKPARTNER_CORE.U_PARTNER';

 if nvl(:UF_LEVALTBL_TMP_V.U_PARTNER,'X') <> :KKPARTNER_CORE.U_PARTNER then
 ret := "report.UF_LEVALTBL_TMP_TOLT"(:KKPARTNER_CORE.U_PARTNER, :GLOBAL.USERID);
 commit; 
 end if;
 
 set_pugyall_0;
 go_item('KKPUGYALL.U_CEG');
 execute_query;

 go_item('KKLPUGYASZ.L_CEG');
 execute_query;

 go_item('UF_LEVALTBL_TMP_V.L_CEG');
 execute_query;
 
 go_item('KKBEFKOV.U_DATUM');
 if :KKPARTNER_CORE.U_PARTNER is not null then
 set_block_property('KKBEFKOV',default_where,'U_PARTNER=''' || :KKPARTNER_CORE.U_PARTNER || '''');
 execute_query;
 last_record;
 end if; 

 go_item('KKBEFKOVSZ_SZERZ.U_CEG');
 if :KKPARTNER_CORE.U_PARTNER is not null then
 --set_block_property('KKBEFKOVSZ',default_where,'U_PARTNER=''' || :KKPARTNER_CORE.U_PARTNER || '''');
 execute_query; 
 end if; 
 
 go_item('KKBEFKOVSZ.U_DATUM');
 if :KKPARTNER_CORE.U_PARTNER is not null then
 set_block_property('KKBEFKOVSZ',default_where,'U_PARTNER=''' || :KKPARTNER_CORE.U_PARTNER || '''');
 execute_query;
 last_record;
 end if; 
 
 go_item('KKVARTBEFIZ.U_FORRAS');
 set_block_property('KKVARTBEFIZ',default_where,'U_STATUS<>''TOROLT''');
 execute_query;
 set_block_property('KKVARTBEFIZ',default_where,'');
 last_record;

 go_item('KKLSZKER.F_BIZLAT');
 execute_query;
 last_record; 

 go_item('KKPUGYALL.U_CEG');
 
 /*
 go_item('KKVARTBEFIZ.U_FORRAS');
 if :KKPARTNER_CORE.U_PARTNER is not null then
 set_block_property('KKVARTBEFIZ',default_where,'U_PARTNER=''' || :KKPARTNER_CORE.U_PARTNER || '''');
 execute_query;
 last_record;
 end if;
 */
 elsif p_itm = 'GO_KKPARTNER_KKMFED' then
 globals.KKMFED_HIVO := 'KKPARTNER_CORE.U_PARTNER';

 go_item('KKMFED_ADOTT.U_CEG');
 if :KKPARTNER_CORE.U_PARTNER is not null then
 --set_block_property('KKMFED',default_where,'U_KAPTA=''' || :KKPARTNER_CORE.U_PARTNER || '''');
 execute_query;
 last_record;
 end if;
 
 go_item('KKMFED.U_CEG');
 if :KKPARTNER_CORE.U_PARTNER is not null then
 --set_block_property('KKMFED',default_where,'U_KAPTA=''' || :KKPARTNER_CORE.U_PARTNER || '''');
 execute_query;
 last_record;
 end if;
 
 elsif p_itm = 'GO_KKPARTNER_KKLSZKAR' then
 globals.KKLSZKAR_HIVO := 'KKPARTNER_CORE.U_PARTNER';
 
 go_item('KKLSZKAR.L_RENDSZAM');
 if :KKPARTNER_CORE.U_PARTNER is not null then
 set_block_property('KKLSZKAR',default_where,'L_SZERZODO=''' || :KKPARTNER_CORE.U_PARTNER || '''');
 execute_query;
 last_record;
 end if;
 
 elsif p_itm = 'GO_KKPARTNER_KK_FOGLALAS' then
 globals.KK_FOGLALAS_HIVO := 'KKPARTNER_CORE.U_PARTNER';
 
 go_item('KK_FOGLALAS_V.U_DONTES');
 if :KKPARTNER_CORE.U_PARTNER is not null then
 set_block_property('KK_FOGLALAS_V',default_where,'F_PARTNER=''' || :KKPARTNER_CORE.U_PARTNER || '''');
 execute_query;
 loop
 if :KK_FOGLALAS_V.L_SZERAZON=:KKESZKOZ_CORE.L_SZERAZON or upper(:system.LAST_RECORD) = 'TRUE' then
 exit;
 end if;
 next_record;
 end loop; 
 end if; 
 go_item('KK_FOGLALAS_V.U_DONTES');
 elsif p_itm = 'GO_KKPARTNER_KK_LSZERINFO' then
 globals.KK_LSZERINFO_HIVO := 'KKPARTNER_CORE.U_PARTNER'; 
 
 go_item('KK_LSZERINFO_V.L_SZERSZAM');
 if :KKPARTNER_CORE.U_PARTNER is not null then
 set_block_property('KK_LSZERINFO_V',default_where,'L_VEVO=''' || :KKPARTNER_CORE.U_PARTNER || '''');
 execute_query;
 loop
 if :KK_LSZERINFO_V.L_SZERAZON=:KKESZKOZ_CORE.L_SZERAZON or :KK_LSZERINFO_V.L_SZERAZON=:KKESZKOZ_CORE.L_SZERSZAM or upper(:system.LAST_RECORD) = 'TRUE' then
 exit;
 end if;
 next_record;
 end loop; 
 end if; 

 elsif p_itm = 'GO_KKPARTNER_KKTAG' then
 globals.KKTAG_HIVO := 'KKPARTNER_CORE.U_PARTNER';
 
 go_item('KKTAG_V.U_TAGID');
 execute_query;
-- last_record;


 elsif p_itm = 'GO_KKPARTNER_KKLKMEGALL' then
 globals.KKLKMEGALL_HIVO := 'KKPARTNER_CORE.U_PARTNER';
 
 go_item('KKLKMEGALL.L_SZERSZAM');
 if :KKPARTNER_CORE.U_PARTNER is not null then
 --set_block_property('KKMFED',default_where,'U_KAPTA=''' || :KKPARTNER_CORE.U_PARTNER || '''');
 execute_query;
 last_record;
 end if;

 elsif p_itm = 'GO_KKPARTNER_KKUGYLET' then
 go_item('KKUGYLET.M_UGYL_ID');
 if :KKPARTNER_CORE.U_PARTNER is not null then
 execute_query;
 end if;

 elsif p_itm = 'GO_KKPARTNER_KKJOGKARTF' then
 go_item('KKJOGKARTF.U_JOGIKARTON');
 if :KKPARTNER_CORE.U_PARTNER is not null then
 execute_query;
 end if;


 end if;

END;

ProgramUnit.Name: NAV_KKSZERZODES_CTRL
ProgramUnit.ProgramUnitText:
PROCEDURE NAV_KKSZERZODES_CTRL (p_itm varchar2) IS
BEGIN
 
 /*
 * KKSZERZODES_CTRL
 */

 if p_itm in ( 'GO_KKSZERZODES_KKPARTNER1' , 'GO_KKSZERZODES_KKPARTNER2' , 'GO_KKSZERZODES_KKPARTNER3' , 'GO_KKSZERZODES_KKPARTNER4' ) then
 go_item('KKPARTNER_CORE.U_PARTNER');
 
 elsif p_itm in ( 'GO_KKSZERZODES_KKSZERZODES_V1', 'GO_KKSZERZODES_KKSZERZODES_V2', 'GO_KKSZERZODES_KKSZERZODES_V3', 'GO_KKSZERZODES_KKSZERZODES_V4') then
 go_item('KKSZERZODES_V.L_CEG');

 elsif p_itm = 'GO_KKSZERZODES_KKKONTAKT' then
 globals.KKKONTAKT_HIVO := 'KKSZERZODES_CORE.M_L_CEG';

 set_radio_button_property ( 'KKKONTAKT_CTRL.SZINT','PARTNER' ,ENABLED,PROPERTY_TRUE);
 set_radio_button_property ( 'KKKONTAKT_CTRL.SZINT','SZERZODES',ENABLED,PROPERTY_TRUE);
 set_radio_button_property ( 'KKKONTAKT_CTRL.SZINT','ESZKOZ' ,ENABLED,PROPERTY_FALSE);
 set_radio_button_property ( 'KKFELADAT_CTRL.SZINT','KONTAKT' ,ENABLED,PROPERTY_FALSE);
 
 :KKKONTAKT_CTRL.SZINT := 'SZERZODES';
 
 :KKKONTAKT_CTRL.FORRAS_00 := 'IGEN';
 :KKKONTAKT_CTRL.FORRAS_01 := 'NEM';
 :KKKONTAKT_CTRL.FORRAS_02 := 'NEM';
 :KKKONTAKT_CTRL.FORRAS_03 := 'NEM';
 :KKKONTAKT_CTRL.FORRAS_04 := 'NEM';
 :KKKONTAKT_CTRL.FORRAS_05 := 'NEM';
 :KKKONTAKT_CTRL.FORRAS_06 := 'NEM';
 :KKKONTAKT_CTRL.FORRAS_07 := 'NEM';
 :KKKONTAKT_CTRL.FORRAS_08 := 'NEM';
 :KKKONTAKT_CTRL.FORRAS_09 := 'NEM';
 
 
 set_record_property(1,'KKKONTAKT_CTRL',status,query_status);
 
 go_item('KKKONTAKT.U_STATUS');
 if :KKPARTNER_CORE.U_PARTNER is not null then
 KKKONTAKT_QUERY;
 LAST_RECORD;
 end if;
 
 elsif p_itm = 'GO_KKSZERZODES_KKFELADAT' then
 globals.KKFELADAT_HIVO := 'KKSZERZODES_CORE.M_L_CEG';
 
 set_radio_button_property ( 'KKFELADAT_CTRL.SZINT','PARTNER' ,ENABLED,PROPERTY_TRUE);
 set_radio_button_property ( 'KKFELADAT_CTRL.SZINT','SZERZODES',ENABLED,PROPERTY_TRUE);
 set_radio_button_property ( 'KKFELADAT_CTRL.SZINT','ESZKOZ' ,ENABLED,PROPERTY_FALSE);
 set_radio_button_property ( 'KKFELADAT_CTRL.SZINT','KONTAKT' ,ENABLED,PROPERTY_FALSE);
 
 :KKFELADAT_CTRL.SZINT := 'SZERZODES';
 
 :KKFELADAT_CTRL.FORRAS_00 := 'IGEN';
 :KKFELADAT_CTRL.FORRAS_01 := 'NEM';
 :KKFELADAT_CTRL.FORRAS_02 := 'NEM';
 :KKFELADAT_CTRL.FORRAS_03 := 'NEM';
 :KKFELADAT_CTRL.FORRAS_04 := 'NEM';
 :KKFELADAT_CTRL.FORRAS_05 := 'NEM';

 --set_block_property('KKMFED',default_where,'U_KAPTA=''' || :KKPARTNER_CORE.U_PARTNER || ''' AND U_FEDSZER=''' || :KKSZERZODES_CORE.L_SZERSZAM || '''');

 loop
 if :KK_LSZERINFO_V.L_SZERAZON=:KKESZKOZ_CORE.L_SZERAZON or :KK_LSZERINFO_V.L_SZERAZON=:KKESZKOZ_CORE.L_SZERSZAM or upper(:system.LAST_RECORD) = 'TRUE' then
 exit;

 go_item('KKTAG_V.U_TAGID');
 execute_query;
-- last_record;


 end if; 

END;

ProgramUnit.Name: NAV_KKKONTAKT_CTRL
ProgramUnit.ProgramUnitText:
PROCEDURE NAV_KKKONTAKT_CTRL (p_itm varchar2) IS
BEGIN
 if p_itm = 'GO_KKKONTAKT_KKFELADAT' then
 globals.KKFELADAT_HIVO := 'KKKONTAKT.U_STATUS';
 
 set_radio_button_property ( 'KKFELADAT_CTRL.SZINT','PARTNER' ,ENABLED,PROPERTY_TRUE);
 set_radio_button_property ( 'KKFELADAT_CTRL.SZINT','SZERZODES',ENABLED,PROPERTY_FALSE);
 set_radio_button_property ( 'KKFELADAT_CTRL.SZINT','ESZKOZ' ,ENABLED,PROPERTY_FALSE);

 :KKFELADAT_CTRL.SZINT := 'KONTAKT';
 
 :KKFELADAT_CTRL.FORRAS_00 := 'IGEN';
 :KKFELADAT_CTRL.FORRAS_01 := 'NEM';
 :KKFELADAT_CTRL.FORRAS_02 := 'NEM';
 :KKFELADAT_CTRL.FORRAS_03 := 'NEM';
 :KKFELADAT_CTRL.FORRAS_04 := 'NEM';
 :KKFELADAT_CTRL.FORRAS_05 := 'NEM';
 :KKFELADAT_CTRL.FORRAS_06 := 'NEM';
 :KKFELADAT_CTRL.FORRAS_07 := 'NEM';
 :KKFELADAT_CTRL.FORRAS_08 := 'NEM'; 

 :KKFELADAT_CTRL.FELELOS_00 := 'IGEN';
 :KKFELADAT_CTRL.FELELOS_01 := 'NEM';
 :KKFELADAT_CTRL.FELELOS_02 := 'NEM';
 :KKFELADAT_CTRL.FELELOS_03 := 'NEM';
 :KKFELADAT_CTRL.FELELOS_04 := 'NEM';
 :KKFELADAT_CTRL.FELELOS_05 := 'NEM';
 :KKFELADAT_CTRL.FELELOS_06 := 'NEM';
 :KKFELADAT_CTRL.FELELOS_07 := 'NEM';
 :KKFELADAT_CTRL.FELELOS_08 := 'NEM';
 :KKFELADAT_CTRL.FELELOS_08 := 'NEM';
 
 :KKFELADAT_CTRL.STATUS_00 := 'IGEN';
 :KKFELADAT_CTRL.STATUS_01 := 'NEM';
 :KKFELADAT_CTRL.STATUS_02 := 'NEM';
 :KKFELADAT_CTRL.STATUS_03 := 'NEM';
 :KKFELADAT_CTRL.STATUS_04 := 'NEM';
 :KKFELADAT_CTRL.STATUS_05 := 'NEM';
 
 set_record_property(1,'KKFELADAT_CTRL',status,query_status);
 
 go_item('KKFELADAT.U_ID');
 if :KKPARTNER_CORE.U_PARTNER is not null then
 set_block_property('KKFELADAT',default_where,'U_PARTNER=''' || :KKPARTNER_CORE.U_PARTNER || ''' AND U_KONTAKT = ' || to_char(:KKKONTAKT.U_ID) );
 execute_query;
 last_record;
 end if;
 
 elsif p_itm = 'GO_KKKONTAKT_KKDOCSTAR' then 
 globals.KKDOCSTAR_HIVO := 'KKKONTAKT.U_STATUS';
 
 set_radio_button_property ( 'KKDOCSTAR_CTRL.SZINT','PARTNER' ,ENABLED,PROPERTY_TRUE);
 set_radio_button_property ( 'KKDOCSTAR_CTRL.SZINT','SZERZODES',ENABLED,PROPERTY_FALSE);
 set_radio_button_property ( 'KKDOCSTAR_CTRL.SZINT','ESZKOZ' ,ENABLED,PROPERTY_FALSE);
 set_radio_button_property ( 'KKDOCSTAR_CTRL.SZINT','KONTAKT' ,ENABLED,PROPERTY_TRUE);
 
 :KKDOCSTAR_CTRL.SZINT := 'KONTAKT';
 
 :KKDOCSTAR_CTRL.FORRAS_00 := 'IGEN';
 :KKDOCSTAR_CTRL.FORRAS_01 := 'NEM';
 :KKDOCSTAR_CTRL.FORRAS_02 := 'NEM';
 :KKDOCSTAR_CTRL.FORRAS_03 := 'NEM';
 :KKDOCSTAR_CTRL.FORRAS_04 := 'NEM';
 :KKDOCSTAR_CTRL.FORRAS_05 := 'NEM';
 :KKDOCSTAR_CTRL.FORRAS_07 := 'NEM';
 :KKDOCSTAR_CTRL.FORRAS_08 := 'NEM';
 :KKDOCSTAR_CTRL.FORRAS_09 := 'NEM';
 :KKDOCSTAR_CTRL.FORRAS_10 := 'NEM'; 
 
 set_record_property(1,'KKDOCSTAR_CTRL',status,query_status);
 
 go_item('KKDOCSTAR.U_ID');
 KKDOCSTAR_QUERY;
 
 elsif p_itm = 'GO_VISSZA' then
 Hide_Window( :System.Event_Window );
 go_item(GLOBALS.KKKONTAKT_HIVO);
 end if;
END;

PROCEDURE NAV_KKESZKOZ_CTRL (p_itm varchar2) IS

 :KKKONTAKT_CTRL.SZINT := 'ESZKOZ';

 :KKKONTAKT_CTRL.FORRAS_01 := 'NEM';
 :KKKONTAKT_CTRL.FORRAS_02 := 'NEM';
 :KKKONTAKT_CTRL.FORRAS_03 := 'NEM';
 :KKKONTAKT_CTRL.FORRAS_04 := 'NEM';
 :KKKONTAKT_CTRL.FORRAS_05 := 'NEM';
 :KKKONTAKT_CTRL.FORRAS_06 := 'NEM';
 :KKKONTAKT_CTRL.FORRAS_07 := 'NEM';
 :KKKONTAKT_CTRL.FORRAS_08 := 'NEM';
 :KKKONTAKT_CTRL.FORRAS_09 := 'NEM';
 
 set_record_property(1,'KKKONTAKT_CTRL',status,query_status);
 
 go_item('KKKONTAKT.U_ID');
 if :KKPARTNER_CORE.U_PARTNER is not null then
 KKKONTAKT_QUERY;
 LAST_RECORD;
 end if;
 
 
 elsif p_itm = 'GO_KKESZKOZ_KKFELADAT' then 
 globals.KKFELADAT_HIVO := 'KKESZKOZ_CORE.M_L_SZERAZON';
 
 set_radio_button_property ( 'KKFELADAT_CTRL.SZINT','PARTNER' ,ENABLED,PROPERTY_TRUE);
 set_radio_button_property ( 'KKFELADAT_CTRL.SZINT','SZERZODES',ENABLED,PROPERTY_TRUE);
 set_radio_button_property ( 'KKFELADAT_CTRL.SZINT','ESZKOZ' ,ENABLED,PROPERTY_TRUE);
 set_radio_button_property ( 'KKFELADAT_CTRL.SZINT','KONTAKT' ,ENABLED,PROPERTY_FALSE);
 
 :KKFELADAT_CTRL.SZINT := 'ESZKOZ';
 
 :KKFELADAT_CTRL.FORRAS_00 := 'IGEN';
 :KKFELADAT_CTRL.FORRAS_01 := 'NEM';
 :KKFELADAT_CTRL.FORRAS_02 := 'NEM';
 :KKFELADAT_CTRL.FORRAS_03 := 'NEM';
 :KKFELADAT_CTRL.FORRAS_04 := 'NEM';
 :KKFELADAT_CTRL.FORRAS_05 := 'NEM';
 :KKFELADAT_CTRL.FORRAS_06 := 'NEM';
 :KKFELADAT_CTRL.FORRAS_07 := 'NEM';
 :KKFELADAT_CTRL.FORRAS_08 := 'NEM';

 :KKFELADAT_CTRL.FELELOS_01 := 'NEM';
 :KKFELADAT_CTRL.FELELOS_02 := 'NEM';
 :KKFELADAT_CTRL.FELELOS_03 := 'NEM';
 :KKFELADAT_CTRL.FELELOS_04 := 'NEM';
 :KKFELADAT_CTRL.FELELOS_05 := 'NEM';
 :KKFELADAT_CTRL.FELELOS_06 := 'NEM';
 :KKFELADAT_CTRL.FELELOS_07 := 'NEM';
 :KKFELADAT_CTRL.FELELOS_08 := 'NEM';
 
 :KKFELADAT_CTRL.STATUS_00 := 'IGEN';
 :KKFELADAT_CTRL.STATUS_01 := 'NEM';
 :KKFELADAT_CTRL.STATUS_02 := 'NEM';
 :KKFELADAT_CTRL.STATUS_03 := 'NEM';
 :KKFELADAT_CTRL.STATUS_04 := 'NEM';

 set_record_property(1,'KKFELADAT_CTRL',status,query_status);
 
 go_item('KKFELADAT.U_ID');
 if :KKPARTNER_CORE.U_PARTNER is not null then
 /*
 set_block_property(
 'KKFELADAT',
 default_where,
 'U_PARTNER=''' || :KKSZERZODES_CORE.L_VEVO || ''' AND U_SZERSZAM=''' || :KKSZERZODES_CORE.L_SZERSZAM || ''' AND U_SZERAZON=''' || :KKESZKOZ_CORE.L_SZERAZON || ''''
 );
 execute_query;
 */
 KKFELADAT_QUERY;
 last_record;
 end if;

 elsif p_itm = 'GO_KKESZKOZ_KKDOCSTAR' then 
 globals.KKDOCSTAR_HIVO := 'KKESZKOZ_CORE.M_L_SZERAZON';
 
 set_radio_button_property ( 'KKDOCSTAR_CTRL.SZINT','PARTNER' ,ENABLED,PROPERTY_TRUE);
 set_radio_button_property ( 'KKDOCSTAR_CTRL.SZINT','SZERZODES',ENABLED,PROPERTY_TRUE);
 set_radio_button_property ( 'KKDOCSTAR_CTRL.SZINT','ESZKOZ' ,ENABLED,PROPERTY_TRUE);
 set_radio_button_property ( 'KKDOCSTAR_CTRL.SZINT','KONTAKT' ,ENABLED,PROPERTY_FALSE);
 
 :KKDOCSTAR_CTRL.SZINT := 'ESZKOZ';
 
 :KKDOCSTAR_CTRL.FORRAS_00 := 'IGEN';
 :KKDOCSTAR_CTRL.FORRAS_01 := 'NEM';
 :KKDOCSTAR_CTRL.FORRAS_02 := 'NEM';
 :KKDOCSTAR_CTRL.FORRAS_03 := 'NEM';
 :KKDOCSTAR_CTRL.FORRAS_04 := 'NEM';
 :KKDOCSTAR_CTRL.FORRAS_05 := 'NEM'; 
 :KKDOCSTAR_CTRL.FORRAS_06 := 'NEM';
 :KKDOCSTAR_CTRL.FORRAS_07 := 'NEM';
 :KKDOCSTAR_CTRL.FORRAS_08 := 'NEM';
 :KKDOCSTAR_CTRL.FORRAS_09 := 'NEM';
 :KKDOCSTAR_CTRL.FORRAS_10 := 'NEM'; 
 :KKDOCSTAR_CTRL.FORRAS_11 := 'NEM'; 
 :KKDOCSTAR_CTRL.FORRAS_12 := 'NEM'; 
 
 set_record_property(1,'KKDOCSTAR_CTRL',status,query_status);
 
 go_item('KKDOCSTAR.U_ID');
 KKDOCSTAR_QUERY;
 LAST_RECORD; 
 
 elsif p_itm = 'GO_KKESZKOZ_KKKOLTSEG' then 
 globals.KKKOLTSEG_HIVO := 'KKESZKOZ_CORE.M_L_SZERAZON';
 
 set_radio_button_property ( 'KKKOLTSEG_CTRL.SZINT','PARTNER' ,ENABLED,PROPERTY_TRUE);
 set_radio_button_property ( 'KKKOLTSEG_CTRL.SZINT','SZERZODES',ENABLED,PROPERTY_TRUE);
 set_radio_button_property ( 'KKKOLTSEG_CTRL.SZINT','ESZKOZ' ,ENABLED,PROPERTY_TRUE);

 :KKKOLTSEG_CTRL.SZINT := 'ESZKOZ';
 
 :KKKOLTSEG_CTRL.FORRAS_00 := 'IGEN';
 :KKKOLTSEG_CTRL.FORRAS_01 := 'NEM';
 :KKKOLTSEG_CTRL.FORRAS_02 := 'NEM';
 :KKKOLTSEG_CTRL.FORRAS_03 := 'NEM';
 :KKKOLTSEG_CTRL.FORRAS_04 := 'NEM';
 :KKKOLTSEG_CTRL.FORRAS_05 := 'NEM';
 :KKKOLTSEG_CTRL.FORRAS_06 := 'NEM';
 
 :KKKOLTSEG_CTRL.STATUS_00 := 'IGEN';
 :KKKOLTSEG_CTRL.STATUS_01 := 'NEM';
 :KKKOLTSEG_CTRL.STATUS_02 := 'NEM';
 :KKKOLTSEG_CTRL.STATUS_03 := 'NEM';
 :KKKOLTSEG_CTRL.STATUS_04 := 'NEM';
 :KKKOLTSEG_CTRL.STATUS_05 := 'NEM';
 :KKKOLTSEG_CTRL.STATUS_06 := 'NEM';
 if globals.KK_NAME = 'KKJOG' then
 :KKKOLTSEG_CTRL.STATUS_07 := 'NEM';
 else
 :KKKOLTSEG_CTRL.STATUS_07 := 'IGEN';
 end if;
 :KKKOLTSEG_CTRL.STATUS_08 := 'NEM'; 
 
 set_record_property(1,'KKKOLTSEG_CTRL',status,query_status);
 
 go_item('KKKOLTSEG.U_ID');
 if :KKPARTNER_CORE.U_PARTNER is not null then
 /*
 set_block_property(
 'KKKOLTSEG',
 default_where,
 'U_PARTNER=''' || :KKSZERZODES_CORE.L_VEVO || ''' AND U_SZERSZAM=''' || :KKSZERZODES_CORE.L_SZERSZAM || ''' AND U_SZERAZON=''' || :KKESZKOZ_CORE.L_SZERAZON || ''''
 );
 execute_query;
 */
 KKKOLTSEG_QUERY;
 last_record;
 end if;

 elsif p_itm = 'GO_KKESZKOZ_KK_LSZERINFO' then
 globals.KK_LSZERINFO_HIVO := 'KKESZKOZ_CORE.M_L_SZERAZON'; 
 
 go_item('KK_LSZERINFO_V.L_SZERSZAM');
 if :KKPARTNER_CORE.U_PARTNER is not null then
 set_block_property('KK_LSZERINFO_V',default_where,'L_VEVO=''' || :KKPARTNER_CORE.U_PARTNER || '''');
 execute_query;
 loop
 if :KK_LSZERINFO_V.L_SZERAZON=:KKESZKOZ_CORE.L_SZERAZON or :KK_LSZERINFO_V.L_SZERAZON=:KKESZKOZ_CORE.L_SZERSZAM or upper(:system.LAST_RECORD) = 'TRUE' then
 exit;
 end if;
 next_record;
 end loop; 
 end if; 

 elsif p_itm = 'GO_KKESZKOZ_KKTAG' then
 globals.KKTAG_HIVO := 'KKESZKOZ_CORE.M_L_SZERAZON'; 
 
 go_item('KKTAG_V.U_TAGID');
 execute_query;
-- last_record;
 
 end if; 

END;

ProgramUnit.Name: RENDEZO
ProgramUnit.ProgramUnitText:
PROCEDURE rendezo IS 
 y_pos number := 0;
 y_max number := 0;
BEGIN
 null;
 --KK2
 /* 
 go_item('FORMS_SPEC.X_POS');
 execute_query;
 if :FORMS_SPEC.CANVAS_NAME is not null then
 loop 
 set_view_property(:FORMS_SPEC.CANVAS_NAME,DISPLAY_POSITION, :FORMS_SPEC.X_POS,:FORMS_SPEC.Y_POS);
 if :FORMS_SPEC.VISIBLE = 'IGEN' then
 y_pos := :FORMS_SPEC.Y_POS + get_view_property(:FORMS_SPEC.CANVAS_NAME,HEIGHT);
 if y_max < y_pos then
 y_max := y_pos;
 
 if :FORMS_SPEC.CANVAS_NAME in ('C_SZERZODES', 'C_SZERZODES_UGYV', 'C_ESZKOZ', 'C_ESZKOZ_ALL', 'C_ESZKOZ_BEH', 'C_ESZKOZ_ERT' ) then
 if :FORMS_SPEC.CANVAS_NAME in ('C_SZERZODES', 'C_SZERZODES_UGYV') then
 set_item_property('KKSZERZODES_V_CTRL.' || :FORMS_SPEC.CANVAS_NAME, visible, property_false);
 else
 set_item_property('KKESZKOZ_V_CTRL.' || :FORMS_SPEC.CANVAS_NAME, visible, property_false);
 end if;
 end if;
 
 end if; 
 else
 set_view_property(:FORMS_SPEC.CANVAS_NAME,DISPLAY_POSITION, :FORMS_SPEC.X_POS,:FORMS_SPEC.Y_POS); 
 set_view_property(:FORMS_SPEC.CANVAS_NAME,VISIBLE,PROPERTY_FALSE); 
 end if;

 if upper(:SYSTEM.LAST_RECORD) = 'TRUE' or :FORMS_SPEC.CANVAS_NAME is null then
 exit;
 else
 next_record;
 end if;
 end loop;
 first_record;
 end if;
 set_canvas_property('C_DESKTOP1', CANVAS_SIZE, 740, y_max+100); 
 go_item('KKPARTNER_CORE.U_PARTNER');
 */
END;

ProgramUnit.Name: SET_VIEW_DETAIL
ProgramUnit.ProgramUnitText:
PROCEDURE set_view_detail ( p_master_canvas varchar2, p_detail_canvas varchar2, p_call_item varchar2 ) IS 
 master_y_pos number := 0;
 detail_y_pos number := 0;
 detail_x_pos number := 0;
 detail_h number := 0;
 akt_y_pos number := 0;
 
 cursor c is
 select * from FORMS_SPEC where MODULE_ID = :PARAMETER.KK AND CANVAS_TYPE = 'STACKED' order by VISIBLE, Y_POS, X_POS;
 
 v c%rowtype;
begin
 master_y_pos := get_view_property(p_master_canvas,VIEWPORT_Y_POS);
 detail_y_pos := get_view_property(p_master_canvas,VIEWPORT_Y_POS) + get_view_property(p_master_canvas,HEIGHT) + 5; 
 detail_x_pos := get_view_property(p_detail_canvas,VIEWPORT_X_POS);
 detail_h := get_view_property(p_detail_canvas,HEIGHT);
 if name_in(p_call_item) = 'I' then 
 open c; 
 --go_block('FORMS_SPEC');
 --first_record;
 loop
 fetch c into v;
 if c%notfound then
 close c;
 exit;
 end if;
 if v.CANVAS_NAME is not null then
 akt_y_pos := get_view_property(v.CANVAS_NAME,VIEWPORT_Y_POS); 
 --if akt_y_pos > detail_y_pos-5 and v.CANVAS_NAME not in (p_detail_canvas, p_master_canvas) then
 if v.CANVAS_NAME not in ('C_PARTNER_BANK', 'C_PARTNER_UGYV', 'C_PARTNER_ALL') then
 if akt_y_pos > detail_y_pos-5 and v.CANVAS_NAME <> p_detail_canvas and v.CANVAS_NAME <> p_master_canvas then
 set_view_property(v.CANVAS_NAME, DISPLAY_POSITION, v.X_POS,akt_y_pos + 2 + detail_h ); 
 end if; 
 else
 if p_master_canvas = 'C_PARTNER_ALAP' and v.VISIBLE = 'IGEN' then
 set_view_property(v.CANVAS_NAME, VISIBLE, PROPERTY_TRUE ); 
 end if;
 end if; 
 end if;
 --if v.CANVAS_NAME is null or upper(:SYSTEM.LAST_RECORD)='TRUE' then
 -- exit;
 --else
 -- next_record;
 --end if;
 end loop;
 first_record;
 set_view_property(p_detail_canvas, DISPLAY_POSITION, detail_x_pos, detail_y_pos );
 set_view_property(p_detail_canvas, VISIBLE, PROPERTY_TRUE ); 
 else
 open c; 
 --go_block('FORMS_SPEC');
 --first_record;
 loop
 fetch c into v;
 if c%notfound then
 close c;
 exit;
 end if; 
 if v.CANVAS_NAME is not null then
 akt_y_pos := get_view_property(v.CANVAS_NAME,VIEWPORT_Y_POS);
 --if akt_y_pos > detail_y_pos-5 and v.CANVAS_NAME not in (p_detail_canvas, p_master_canvas) then
 if v.CANVAS_NAME not in ('C_PARTNER_BANK', 'C_PARTNER_UGYV', 'C_PARTNER_ALL') then
 if akt_y_pos > detail_y_pos-5 and v.CANVAS_NAME <> p_detail_canvas and v.CANVAS_NAME <> p_master_canvas then 
 set_view_property(v.CANVAS_NAME, DISPLAY_POSITION, v.X_POS,akt_y_pos - 2 - detail_h ); 
 end if; 
 else
 if p_master_canvas = 'C_PARTNER_ALAP' and v.VISIBLE = 'IGEN' then 
 set_view_property(v.CANVAS_NAME, VISIBLE, PROPERTY_FALSE ); 
 end if;
 end if; 
 end if;
 --if v.CANVAS_NAME is null or upper(:SYSTEM.LAST_RECORD)='TRUE' then
 -- exit;
 --else
 -- next_record;
 --end if;
 end loop;
 --first_record;
 --set_view_property(p_detail_canvas, DISPLAY_POSITION, v.X_POS, detail_y_pos );
 set_view_property(p_detail_canvas, VISIBLE, PROPERTY_FALSE ); 
 end if;
 scroll_view('C_DESKTOP1',0,master_y_pos); 
 go_item (p_call_item);
 end;

ProgramUnit.Name: NAV_KKDOCSTAR_CTRL
ProgramUnit.ProgramUnitText:
PROCEDURE NAV_KKDOCSTAR_CTRL (p_itm varchar2) IS
BEGIN
 if p_itm = 'GO_VISSZA' then
 Hide_Window( :System.Event_Window );
 go_item(GLOBALS.KKDOCSTAR_HIVO); 
 end if;
END;

ProgramUnit.Name: KKSZERZODES_QUERY
ProgramUnit.ProgramUnitText:
PROCEDURE KKSZERZODES_QUERY IS 
 w varchar2(2000);
 al number;
BEGIN
 KK_FORM_LOG.KEZD('KKSZERZODES_QUERY');
 w := 'L_VEVO=''' || :KKPARTNER_CORE.U_PARTNER || ''''; 
 if :KKUGYLET_GRID_CTRL.ELOUGY='IGEN' and :KKUGYLET_GRID_CTRL.UTOLSO='NEM' then
 w := w || ' AND U_UGYID in (select a.U_UGYID from KKKEYGO_AKTIV a (nolock) where U_STATUS=''ELO UGY'' or AKTIV=''IGEN'')';
 end if;
 if :KKUGYLET_GRID_CTRL.ELOUGY='NEM' and :KKUGYLET_GRID_CTRL.UTOLSO='IGEN' then
 w := w || ' AND U_UGYID in (select a.U_UGYID from KKKEYGO_AKTIV a (nolock) where U_UTOLSOUGY=''IGEN'' or AKTIV=''IGEN'')';
 end if;
 if :KKUGYLET_GRID_CTRL.ELOUGY='IGEN' and :KKUGYLET_GRID_CTRL.UTOLSO='IGEN' then
 w := w || ' AND U_UGYID in (select a.U_UGYID from KKKEYGO_AKTIV a (nolock) where (U_UTOLSOUGY=''IGEN'' and U_STATUS=''ELO UGY'') or AKTIV=''IGEN'')';
 end if;
 KKUGYLET_WHERE;
 
 -- w := w || ' AND U_STATUS_ALL IN (''ELO UGY'',''ELO SZERZODES'' )';
 set_block_property('KKSZERZODES_CORE',DEFAULT_WHERE,w);
-- set_block_property('KKSZERZODES_KART',DEFAULT_WHERE,w); 
END;

ProgramUnit.Name: KKKONTAKT_QUERY
ProgramUnit.ProgramUnitText:
PROCEDURE KKKONTAKT_QUERY IS
 qry varchar2(1000);
 lis varchar2(500);
 tag varchar2(30);
BEGIN
 if ( :KKKONTAKT_CTRL.FORRAS_01 = 'IGEN'
 and :KKKONTAKT_CTRL.FORRAS_02 = 'IGEN'
 and :KKKONTAKT_CTRL.FORRAS_03 = 'IGEN'
 and :KKKONTAKT_CTRL.FORRAS_04 = 'IGEN'
 and :KKKONTAKT_CTRL.FORRAS_05 = 'IGEN'
 and :KKKONTAKT_CTRL.FORRAS_06 = 'IGEN'
 and :KKKONTAKT_CTRL.FORRAS_07 = 'IGEN'
 and :KKKONTAKT_CTRL.FORRAS_08 = 'IGEN'
 ) or 
 ( :KKKONTAKT_CTRL.FORRAS_01 = 'NEM'
 and :KKKONTAKT_CTRL.FORRAS_02 = 'NEM'
 and :KKKONTAKT_CTRL.FORRAS_03 = 'NEM'
 and :KKKONTAKT_CTRL.FORRAS_04 = 'NEM'
 and :KKKONTAKT_CTRL.FORRAS_05 = 'NEM' 
 and :KKKONTAKT_CTRL.FORRAS_06 = 'NEM' 
 and :KKKONTAKT_CTRL.FORRAS_07 = 'NEM' 
 and :KKKONTAKT_CTRL.FORRAS_08 = 'NEM' 
 ) 
 then
 :KKKONTAKT_CTRL.FORRAS_01 := 'NEM';
 :KKKONTAKT_CTRL.FORRAS_02 := 'NEM';
 :KKKONTAKT_CTRL.FORRAS_03 := 'NEM';
 :KKKONTAKT_CTRL.FORRAS_04 := 'NEM';
 :KKKONTAKT_CTRL.FORRAS_05 := 'NEM';
 :KKKONTAKT_CTRL.FORRAS_06 := 'NEM'; 
 :KKKONTAKT_CTRL.FORRAS_07 := 'NEM'; 
 :KKKONTAKT_CTRL.FORRAS_08 := 'NEM'; 
 :KKKONTAKT_CTRL.FORRAS_00 := 'IGEN'; 
 end if;
 set_record_property(1,'KKKONTAKT_CTRL',status,query_status);
 
 qry := 'U_PARTNER=''' || :KKPARTNER_CORE.U_PARTNER || '''';

 if :KKKONTAKT_CTRL.SZINT = 'SZERZODES' then
 qry := qry || ' and U_SZERSZAM=''' || :KKSZERZODES_CORE.L_SZERSZAM || '''';
 end if;

 if :KKKONTAKT_CTRL.SZINT = 'ESZKOZ' then
 qry := qry || ' and U_SZERAZON=''' || :KKESZKOZ_CORE.L_SZERAZON || '''';
 end if;

 if :KKKONTAKT_CTRL.FORRAS_00 = 'NEM' then
 qry := qry || ' and U_FORRAS IN (';
 lis := ',';
 if :KKKONTAKT_CTRL.FORRAS_01 = 'IGEN' then
 lis := lis || '''KKTUSZ'',';
 end if;
 if :KKKONTAKT_CTRL.FORRAS_02 = 'IGEN' then
 lis := lis || '''KKBO'',';
 end if; 
 if :KKKONTAKT_CTRL.FORRAS_03 = 'IGEN' then
 lis := lis || '''KKBEH'',';
 end if; 
 if :KKKONTAKT_CTRL.FORRAS_04 = 'IGEN' then
 lis := lis || '''KKER'',';
 end if; 
 if :KKKONTAKT_CTRL.FORRAS_05 = 'IGEN' then
 lis := lis || '''KKJOG'',';
 end if;
 if :KKKONTAKT_CTRL.FORRAS_06 = 'IGEN' then
 lis := lis || '''BEHAJTO'',';
 end if;
 if :KKKONTAKT_CTRL.FORRAS_07 = 'IGEN' then
 lis := lis || '''SZAKERT'',';
 end if;
 if :KKKONTAKT_CTRL.FORRAS_08 = 'IGEN' then
 lis := lis || '''ERTHELY'',';
 end if;
 lis := substr(lis,2,length(lis)-2);
 qry := qry || lis || ')';
 end if;
 
 
 tag := globals.TAG;
 if globals.TAGCHECK = 'IGEN' and globals.TAG <> '*' then
 qry := qry || ' and U_ID in (select U_KULSOID from KKTAGLINKS_V where U_TAGTABLE = ''KKKONTAKT'' and U_TAGID = ' || tag || ' )';
 end if;
 
 set_block_property('KKKONTAKT',default_where,qry);
 go_item('KKKONTAKT.U_STATUS');
 execute_query;
 last_record;
END;

ProgramUnit.Name: KKFELADAT_QUERY
ProgramUnit.ProgramUnitText:
PROCEDURE KKFELADAT_QUERY IS
 qry varchar2(1000);
 lis varchar2(500);
 tag varchar2(30);
BEGIN
 if ( :KKFELADAT_CTRL.FORRAS_01 = 'IGEN'
 and :KKFELADAT_CTRL.FORRAS_02 = 'IGEN'
 and :KKFELADAT_CTRL.FORRAS_03 = 'IGEN'
 and :KKFELADAT_CTRL.FORRAS_04 = 'IGEN'
 and :KKFELADAT_CTRL.FORRAS_05 = 'IGEN'
 and :KKFELADAT_CTRL.FORRAS_06 = 'IGEN'
 and :KKFELADAT_CTRL.FORRAS_07 = 'IGEN'
 and :KKFELADAT_CTRL.FORRAS_08 = 'IGEN'
 ) or 
 ( :KKFELADAT_CTRL.FORRAS_01 = 'NEM'
 and :KKFELADAT_CTRL.FORRAS_02 = 'NEM'
 and :KKFELADAT_CTRL.FORRAS_03 = 'NEM'
 and :KKFELADAT_CTRL.FORRAS_04 = 'NEM'
 and :KKFELADAT_CTRL.FORRAS_05 = 'NEM' 
 and :KKFELADAT_CTRL.FORRAS_06 = 'NEM'
 and :KKFELADAT_CTRL.FORRAS_07 = 'NEM'
 and :KKFELADAT_CTRL.FORRAS_08 = 'NEM'
 ) 
 then
 :KKFELADAT_CTRL.FORRAS_01 := 'NEM';
 :KKFELADAT_CTRL.FORRAS_02 := 'NEM';
 :KKFELADAT_CTRL.FORRAS_03 := 'NEM';
 :KKFELADAT_CTRL.FORRAS_04 := 'NEM';
 :KKFELADAT_CTRL.FORRAS_05 := 'NEM';
 :KKFELADAT_CTRL.FORRAS_06 := 'NEM';
 :KKFELADAT_CTRL.FORRAS_07 := 'NEM';
 :KKFELADAT_CTRL.FORRAS_08 := 'NEM'; 
 :KKFELADAT_CTRL.FORRAS_00 := 'IGEN'; 
 end if;
 
 if ( :KKFELADAT_CTRL.FELELOS_01 = 'IGEN'
 and :KKFELADAT_CTRL.FELELOS_02 = 'IGEN'
 and :KKFELADAT_CTRL.FELELOS_03 = 'IGEN'
 and :KKFELADAT_CTRL.FELELOS_04 = 'IGEN'
 and :KKFELADAT_CTRL.FELELOS_05 = 'IGEN'
 and :KKFELADAT_CTRL.FELELOS_06 = 'IGEN'
 and :KKFELADAT_CTRL.FELELOS_07 = 'IGEN'
 and :KKFELADAT_CTRL.FELELOS_08 = 'IGEN'
 ) or 
 ( :KKFELADAT_CTRL.FELELOS_01 = 'NEM'
 and :KKFELADAT_CTRL.FELELOS_02 = 'NEM'
 and :KKFELADAT_CTRL.FELELOS_03 = 'NEM'
 and :KKFELADAT_CTRL.FELELOS_04 = 'NEM'
 and :KKFELADAT_CTRL.FELELOS_05 = 'NEM' 
 and :KKFELADAT_CTRL.FELELOS_06 = 'NEM'
 and :KKFELADAT_CTRL.FELELOS_07 = 'NEM'
 and :KKFELADAT_CTRL.FELELOS_08 = 'NEM'
 ) 
 then
 :KKFELADAT_CTRL.FELELOS_01 := 'NEM';
 :KKFELADAT_CTRL.FELELOS_02 := 'NEM';
 :KKFELADAT_CTRL.FELELOS_03 := 'NEM';
 :KKFELADAT_CTRL.FELELOS_04 := 'NEM';
 :KKFELADAT_CTRL.FELELOS_05 := 'NEM';
 :KKFELADAT_CTRL.FELELOS_06 := 'NEM';
 :KKFELADAT_CTRL.FELELOS_07 := 'NEM';
 :KKFELADAT_CTRL.FELELOS_08 := 'NEM'; 
 :KKFELADAT_CTRL.FELELOS_00 := 'IGEN'; 
 end if;
 
 set_record_property(1,'KKFELADAT_CTRL',status,query_status); 
 
 qry := 'U_PARTNER=''' || :KKPARTNER_CORE.U_PARTNER || '''';

 if :KKFELADAT_CTRL.SZINT = 'SZERZODES' then
 qry := qry || ' and U_SZERSZAM=''' || :KKSZERZODES_CORE.L_SZERSZAM || '''';
 end if;

 if :KKFELADAT_CTRL.SZINT = 'ESZKOZ' then
 qry := qry || ' and U_SZERAZON=''' || :KKESZKOZ_CORE.L_SZERAZON || '''';
 end if;

 if :KKFELADAT_CTRL.SZINT = 'KONTAKT' then
 qry := qry || ' and U_KONTAKT=' || to_char(:KKKONTAKT.U_ID) ;
 end if;

 if :KKFELADAT_CTRL.FORRAS_00 = 'NEM' then
 qry := qry || ' and U_FORRAS IN (';
 lis := ',';
 if :KKFELADAT_CTRL.FORRAS_01 = 'IGEN' then
 lis := lis || '''KKTUSZ'',';
 end if;
 if :KKFELADAT_CTRL.FORRAS_02 = 'IGEN' then
 lis := lis || '''KKBO'',';
 end if; 
 if :KKFELADAT_CTRL.FORRAS_03 = 'IGEN' then
 lis := lis || '''KKBEH'',';
 end if; 
 if :KKFELADAT_CTRL.FORRAS_04 = 'IGEN' then
 lis := lis || '''KKER'',';
 end if; 
 if :KKFELADAT_CTRL.FORRAS_05 = 'IGEN' then
 lis := lis || '''KKJOG'',';
 end if;
 if :KKFELADAT_CTRL.FORRAS_06 = 'IGEN' then
 lis := lis || '''BEHAJTO'',';
 end if;
 if :KKFELADAT_CTRL.FORRAS_07 = 'IGEN' then
 lis := lis || '''SZAKERT'',';
 end if;
 if :KKFELADAT_CTRL.FORRAS_08 = 'IGEN' then
 lis := lis || '''ERTHELY'',';
 end if;
 lis := substr(lis,2,length(lis)-2);
 qry := qry || lis || ')';
 end if;

 if :KKFELADAT_CTRL.FELELOS_00 = 'NEM' then
 qry := qry || ' and U_FELELOS IN (';
 lis := ',';
 if :KKFELADAT_CTRL.FELELOS_01 = 'IGEN' then
 lis := lis || '''KKTUSZ'',';
 end if;
 if :KKFELADAT_CTRL.FELELOS_02 = 'IGEN' then
 lis := lis || '''KKBO'',';
 end if; 
 if :KKFELADAT_CTRL.FELELOS_03 = 'IGEN' then
 lis := lis || '''KKBEH'',';
 end if; 
 if :KKFELADAT_CTRL.FELELOS_04 = 'IGEN' then
 lis := lis || '''KKER'',';
 end if; 
 if :KKFELADAT_CTRL.FELELOS_05 = 'IGEN' then
 lis := lis || '''KKJOG'',';
 end if;
 if :KKFELADAT_CTRL.FELELOS_06 = 'IGEN' then
 lis := lis || '''BEHAJTO'',';
 end if;
 if :KKFELADAT_CTRL.FELELOS_07 = 'IGEN' then
 lis := lis || '''SZAKERT'',';
 end if;
 if :KKFELADAT_CTRL.FELELOS_08 = 'IGEN' then
 lis := lis || '''ERTHELY'',';
 end if;
 lis := substr(lis,2,length(lis)-2);
 qry := qry || lis || ')';
 end if;
 
 if :KKFELADAT_CTRL.STATUS_00 = 'NEM' then
 qry := qry || ' and U_STATUS IN (';
 lis := ',';
 if :KKFELADAT_CTRL.STATUS_01 = 'IGEN' then
 lis := lis || '''FELADAT'',';
 end if;
 if :KKFELADAT_CTRL.STATUS_02 = 'IGEN' then
 lis := lis || '''HATARIDOS'',';
 end if; 
 if :KKFELADAT_CTRL.STATUS_03 = 'IGEN' then
 lis := lis || '''LEJART'',';
 end if; 
 if :KKFELADAT_CTRL.STATUS_04 = 'IGEN' then
 lis := lis || '''ELVEGEZVE'',';
 end if; 
 if :KKFELADAT_CTRL.STATUS_05 = 'IGEN' then
 lis := lis || '''TOROLT'',';
 end if;
 lis := substr(lis,2,length(lis)-2);
 qry := qry || lis || ')';
 end if;


 tag := globals.TAG;
 if globals.TAGCHECK = 'IGEN' and globals.TAG <> '*' then
 qry := qry || ' and U_ID in (select U_KULSOID from KKTAGLINKS_V where U_TAGTABLE = ''KKFELADAT'' and U_TAGID = ' || tag || ' )';
 end if;
 
 set_block_property('KKFELADAT',default_where,qry);
 go_item('KKFELADAT.U_STATUS');
 execute_query;
END;

ProgramUnit.Name: GET_LOMBKNEV
ProgramUnit.ProgramUnitText:
FUNCTION GET_LOMBKNEV (cs varchar2, ko varchar2) RETURN varchar2 IS
 cursor c (p_cs varchar2, p_ko varchar2) is 
 select L_LOMBKNEV
 from KOD_V
 where L_KODCSOP = p_cs
 and L_LOMBKOD = p_ko;
 
 v c%rowtype;
BEGIN
 open c (cs,ko);
 fetch c into v;
 close c;
 return v.L_LOMBKNEV;
END;

ProgramUnit.Name: TREE_OPEN_KK
ProgramUnit.ProgramUnitText:
PROCEDURE TREE_OPEN_KK (p_nav varchar2) IS
 ret pls_integer;
 q varchar2(255); -- paraméter
 t varchar2(30); -- tipus
 p varchar2(9); -- partner
 u varchar2(16); -- ugyid
 e varchar2(12); -- eszkoz id
 g varchar2(16); -- ügylet id
 f number; -- feladat id
 k number; -- kontaktus id
 j varchar2(14); -- jogi karton id
BEGIN
 
--msg(p_nav); 
 q := p_nav || ':' ;
--msg(q);
 t := substr(q,1,instr(q,':')-1);
--msg(t); 
 q := substr(q,instr(q,':')+1);
 p := substr(q,1,instr(q,':')-1);
 q := substr(q,instr(q,':')+1);
--msg(p); 
 if t in ( 'SZERZODES', 'ESZKOZ' ) then
 u := substr(q,1,instr(q,':')-1);
 q := substr(q,instr(q,':')+1);
 end if;
--msg(u); 
 if t = 'ESZKOZ' then
 e := substr(q,1,instr(q,':')-1);
 q := substr(q,instr(q,':')+1);
 end if;
--msg(e); 
 if t = 'FELADAT' then
 f := substr(q,1,instr(q,':')-1);
 q := substr(q,instr(q,':')+1);
 end if; 
--msg(f); 
 if t = 'KONTAKTUS' then
 k := substr(q,1,instr(q,':')-1);
 q := substr(q,instr(q,':')+1);
 end if; 
--msg(k);
 if t = 'UGYLET' then
 u := substr(q,1,instr(q,':')-1);
 q := substr(q,instr(q,':')+1);
 g := substr(q,1,instr(q,':')-1);
 end if;
--msg(u);
 if t = 'JOGIKARTON' then
 j := substr(q,1,instr(q,':')-1);
 q := substr(q,instr(q,':')+1);
 end if;
--msg(j);
 
 globals.PARTNER := p; 
 if nvl(p,'XXXXXX') < '000000000' or nvl(p,'XXXXXX') > '999999999' then
 message ( 'HIBA: A partner kódja nem megfelelő !');
 raise form_trigger_failure;
 return;
 end if;
-- if SET_LOCK_PARTNER(p) <> 'TRUE' then
-- return;
-- end if;
 ret := "report.KK2SPID_SET"(p,:GLOBAL.USERID);
 commit; 
 
 go_item('KKPARTNER_CORE.U_PARTNER');
 execute_query;
 
-- message('4 ...1 ' || to_char(sysdate,'HH24:MI:SS')); 
 
 go_item('KKPARTNER_KART.U_CSALAS');
 execute_query;

-- message('4 ...2 ' || to_char(sysdate,'HH24:MI:SS')); 
 
 go_item('KKPARTNER_TORTENET.UGYL_JEGYZET_ST');
 execute_query;
 
-- message('4 ...3 ' || to_char(sysdate,'HH24:MI:SS')); 
 go_item('KKJOGKARTF.M_U_JOGIKARTON');
 execute_query;
 go_item('KKPARTNER_CORE.U_PARTNER');
 
 set_pugyall_0;
 go_item('KKPUGYALL.U_CEG');
 execute_query;
 
 KKSZERZODES_QUERY;
 GO_ITEM('KKSZERZODES_CORE.M_L_CEG');
 EXECUTE_QUERY; 
 TOOLBAR_SET;
 
 SET_WINDOWS_TITLE;
 
 go_item('KKPARTNER_CORE.U_PARTNER');
 synchronize;
 
 if t in ('SZERZODES','ESZKOZ','UGYLET') then
 go_item('KKSZERZODES_CORE.M_U_UGYID');
 if :KKSZERZODES_CORE.M_U_UGYID is not null then
 first_record;
 loop
 if :KKSZERZODES_CORE.M_U_UGYID = u or upper(:SYSTEM.LAST_RECORD) = 'TRUE' then
 exit;
 end if;
 next_record;
 end loop; 
 go_item('KKSZERZODES_CORE.M_L_CEG');
 if t = 'ESZKOZ' then 
 go_item('KKESZKOZ_CORE.M_L_SZERAZON');
 if :KKESZKOZ_CORE.M_L_SZERAZON is not null then
 first_record;
 loop
 if :KKESZKOZ_CORE.M_L_SZERAZON = e or upper(:SYSTEM.LAST_RECORD) = 'TRUE' then
 exit;
 end if;
 next_record;
 end loop;
 end if;
 end if; 
 end if;
 end if;

 if t = 'FELADAT' then 
 NAV_KKPARTNER_CTRL('GO_KKPARTNER_KKFELADAT'); 
 first_record;
 loop
 if :KKFELADAT.U_ID <> to_number(f) and upper(:SYSTEM.LAST_RECORD)='FALSE' then
 next_record;
 else
 exit;
 end if;
 end loop;
 end if;


 if t = 'KONTAKTUS' then 
 NAV_KKPARTNER_CTRL('GO_KKPARTNER_KKKONTAKT'); 
 first_record;
 loop
 if :KKKONTAKT.U_ID <> to_number(k) and upper(:SYSTEM.LAST_RECORD)='FALSE' then
 next_record;
 else
 exit;
 end if;
 end loop;
 end if;


 if t = 'UGYLET' then 
 NAV_KKPARTNER_CTRL('GO_KKPARTNER_KKUGYLET');
 KKUGYLET_WHERE;
 execute_query;
 first_record;
 loop
 if :KKUGYLET.UGYL_ID <> g and upper(:SYSTEM.LAST_RECORD)='FALSE' then
 next_record;
 else
 exit;
 end if;
 end loop;
 end if;


 if t = 'JOGIKARTON' then 
 go_item('KKJOGKARTF.U_JOGIKARTON'); 
 first_record;
 loop
 if :KKJOGKARTF.U_JOGIKARTON <> j and upper(:SYSTEM.LAST_RECORD)='FALSE' then
 next_record;
 else
 exit;
 end if;
 end loop;
 go_item('KKJOGKARTF.U_JOGIKARTON'); 
 end if;
 
END;

ProgramUnit.Name: KEYGO_OPEN_KK
ProgramUnit.ProgramUnitText:
PROCEDURE KEYGO_OPEN_KK IS
 p varchar2(9);
 v varchar2(20);
 s varchar2(12);
 j varchar2(14);
 ret pls_integer;
 nev varchar2(255);
BEGIN
/*
 :KKUGYLET_GRID_CTRL.SZINT := 'UGY';
 :KKUGYLET_GRID_CTRL.AKTIV := 'IGEN';
 :KKUGYLET_GRID_CTRL.INAKTIV := 'IGEN';
 :KKUGYLET_GRID_CTRL.TOROLT := 'NEM';
 :KKUGYLET_GRID_CTRL.OSZTALY := null; --'*';
 :KKUGYLET_GRID_CTRL.SZEREGY := null; --'*';
 :KKUGYLET_GRID_CTRL.UGYL_UG := null; --'*';
 :KKUGYLET_GRID_CTRL.UTOLSO := 'IGEN';
 :KKUGYLET_GRID_CTRL.ELOUGY := 'IGEN';
*/ 
-- message('1 ... ' || to_char(sysdate,'HH24:MI:SS')); 
 go_item('KEYGO.U_PARTNER');
 --set_record_property(1, 'KEYGO', status, query_status); 
 
 p := :KEYGO.U_PARTNER;
 v := :KEYGO.U_UGYID;
 s := :KEYGO.L_SZERAZON; 
 j := :KEYGO.U_JOGIKARTON; 
 
 if p is null then
 return;
 end if; 
 
 globals.PARTNER := p; 
 
 delete_record;
 commit_form;
 :KEYGO.U_UTOLSOUGY := 'IGEN';
 
 --clear_form; 
 --go_item('FORMS_SPEC.ITEM_NAME');
 --execute_query; 
 --go_item('KEYGO.U_PARTNER');
 
 go_item('KKPARTNER_CORE.U_PARTNER'); 

 --if SET_LOCK_PARTNER(p) <> 'TRUE' then 
 -- return;
 --end if;

 KK_FORM_LOG.KEZD('KEYGO_OPEN_KK 1'); 
-- message('3 ... ' || to_char(sysdate,'HH24:MI:SS')); 
 ret := "report.KK2SPID_SET"(p,:GLOBAL.USERID);
 commit; 

 KK_FORM_LOG.VEGE; 

 KK_FORM_LOG.KEZD('KEYGO_OPEN_KK 1-1'); 
 
-- message('4 ... ' || to_char(sysdate,'HH24:MI:SS')); 
 
 --set_block_property('KKPARTNER',default_where,'U_PARTNER=''' || p || '''');
 go_item('KKPARTNER_CORE.U_PARTNER');
 execute_query;

 KK_FORM_LOG.VEGE; 

 KK_FORM_LOG.KEZD('KEYGO_OPEN_KK 1-2'); 

-- message('4 ...1 ' || to_char(sysdate,'HH24:MI:SS')); 
 
 go_item('KKPARTNER_KART.U_CSALAS');
 execute_query;

 KK_FORM_LOG.VEGE; 

 KK_FORM_LOG.KEZD('KEYGO_OPEN_KK 1-3'); 

-- message('4 ...2 ' || to_char(sysdate,'HH24:MI:SS')); 
 
 go_item('KKPARTNER_TORTENET.UGYL_JEGYZET_ST');
 execute_query;
 
 KK_FORM_LOG.VEGE; 

 KK_FORM_LOG.KEZD('KEYGO_OPEN_KK 1-4'); 

 go_item('KKPARTNER_CORE.U_PARTNER');
 
-- message('4 ...4 ' || to_char(sysdate,'HH24:MI:SS')); 

 if :KKPARTNER_CORE.U_PARTNER <> p then
 -- message('HIBA - Nincs meg a partner !');
 return;
 end if;

-- message('4 ...5 ' || to_char(sysdate,'HH24:MI:SS')); 
 
 set_pugyall_0;
 go_item('KKPUGYALL.U_CEG');
 execute_query;
 
 KK_FORM_LOG.VEGE; 
 
-- message('5 ... ' || to_char(sysdate,'HH24:MI:SS')); 

 KKSZERZODES_QUERY; 
 KK_FORM_LOG.VEGE; 

 GO_ITEM('KKSZERZODES_CORE.M_L_CEG');
 KK_FORM_LOG.KEZD('KEYGO_OPEN_KK 1-5');
 EXECUTE_QUERY; 
 KK_FORM_LOG.VEGE; 

 KK_FORM_LOG.KEZD('KEYGO_OPEN_KK 1-6');

 if :KKSZERZODES_CORE.U_UGYID is null then
 :KKUGYLET_GRID_CTRL.SZINT := 'PARTNER';
 else
 :KKUGYLET_GRID_CTRL.SZINT := 'UGY';
 end if;
-- message('5 ...1 ' || to_char(sysdate,'HH24:MI:SS')); 

 TOOLBAR_SET;
 
 KK_FORM_LOG.VEGE; 

 KK_FORM_LOG.KEZD('KEYGO_OPEN_KK 1-7'); 

-- message('5 ...2 ' || to_char(sysdate,'HH24:MI:SS')); 

 KKUGYLET_QUERY(null, null); 

-- message('5 ...3 ' || to_char(sysdate,'HH24:MI:SS')); 
 KK_FORM_LOG.VEGE; 

 KK_FORM_LOG.KEZD('KEYGO_OPEN_KK 2'); 
 
 SET_WINDOWS_TITLE;

-- message('5 ...4 ' || to_char(sysdate,'HH24:MI:SS')); 
/*
 KKPARTNER_TREE_INIT; -- itt a 113837-es partnernél összeomlott a form!
*/ 
 go_item('KKPARTNER_CORE.U_PARTNER');
 
 if v is not null then
 go_item('KKSZERZODES_CORE.M_U_UGYID');
 if :KKSZERZODES_CORE.U_UGYID is not null then
 first_record;
 loop
 if :KKSZERZODES_CORE.U_UGYID = v or upper(:SYSTEM.LAST_RECORD) = 'TRUE' then
 exit;
 end if;
 next_record;
 end loop; 
 go_item('KKSZERZODES_CORE.M_L_CEG');

 if s is not null then
 go_item('KKESZKOZ_CORE.M_L_SZERAZON');
 if :KKESZKOZ_CORE.M_L_SZERAZON is not null then
 first_record;
 loop
 if :KKESZKOZ_CORE.M_L_SZERAZON = s or upper(:SYSTEM.LAST_RECORD) = 'TRUE' then
 exit;
 end if;
 next_record;
 end loop;
 end if;
 end if;
 
 end if;
 end if; 

-- message('5 ...5 ' || to_char(sysdate,'HH24:MI:SS')); 

 if j is not null then
 go_item('KKJOGKARTF.M_U_JOGIKARTONV');
 while upper(:system.last_record)='FALSE' and :KKJOGKARTF.U_JOGIKARTON is not null and :KKJOGKARTF.U_JOGIKARTON <> j
 loop
 next_record;
 end loop;
 go_item('KKJOGKARTF.U_JOGIKARTON');
 else 
 go_item('KKPARTNER_CORE.U_PARTNER');
 end if; 
 
 KK_FORM_LOG.VEGE; 
 --hide_window('W_UGYLET');


-- message('5 ...6 ' || to_char(sysdate,'HH24:MI:SS')); 
 
 --commit_form;
END;

ProgramUnit.Name: KEYGO_KEY_LISTVAL
ProgramUnit.ProgramUnitText:
PROCEDURE KEYGO_KEY_LISTVAL IS
 rg_name VARCHAR2(40) := 'RG_KEYGO_ESZKOZ'; 
 rg_id RecordGroup; 
 errcode NUMBER; 
 qry VARCHAR2(4000);
 i VARCHAR2(255);
BEGIN
 i := name_in (:system.trigger_item); 
/*
 :KEYGO.U_PARTNER := null;
 :KEYGO.L_NEV := null;
 :KEYGO.L_SZIGSZAM := null;
 :KEYGO.L_AIASZ := null;
 :KEYGO.U_UGYID := null;
 :KEYGO.U_VERAZON := null;
 :KEYGO.L_SZERSZAM := null;
 :KEYGO.L_RENDSZAM := null;
 :KEYGO.L_ALVAZSZ := null;
 :KEYGO.L_MOTORSZ := null;
 :KEYGO.L_FORGALMI := null;
 :KEYGO.L_GEPKSZ := null;
 :KEYGO.L_GYARISZ := null;
 :KEYGO.L_HELYRSZ := null;
 :KEYGO.L_SZERAZON := null; 
 copy (i,:system.trigger_item); 
*/
 DELETE_RECORD;
 rg_id := Find_Group( rg_name ); 
 if not ID_NULL(rg_id) then
 Delete_Group( rg_id );
 end if; 
 GO_ITEM(i); 
 copy (i,:system.trigger_item);
 KEYGO_SET_LISTVAL;
 errcode := Populate_Group( rg_id );
 list_values;
END;

ProgramUnit.Name: KEYGO_SET_LISTVAL
ProgramUnit.ProgramUnitText:
PROCEDURE KEYGO_SET_LISTVAL IS
 rg_name VARCHAR2(40); 
 rg_id RecordGroup; 
 errcode NUMBER; 
 qry VARCHAR2(4000);
 i VARCHAR2(255);
BEGIN 
 rg_name := 'RG_KEYGO_' || replace(:SYSTEM.TRIGGER_ITEM,'KEYGO.','') ; 
 rg_id := Find_Group( rg_name ); 
 if not ID_NULL(rg_id) then
 Delete_Group( rg_id );
 end if;
 
 qry := 
'SELECT ALL U_VERAZON, U_UGYID, 
L_SZERSZAM, U_PARTNER, L_NEV, 
L_SZIGSZAM, L_AIASZ, L_HELYSEG, 
L_CIM, L_IRSZ, L_SZERAZON, 
L_RENDSZAM, L_ALVAZSZ, L_MOTORSZ, 
L_FORGALMI, L_GEPKSZ, L_GYARISZ, 
L_HELYRSZ, L_ESZKNEV, U_PARTNER F_PARTNER
FROM KKESZKOZ_V_POZ
WHERE ' || replace(:SYSTEM.TRIGGER_ITEM,'KEYGO.','') || '>''!''';

--message(qry); 

 if name_in ( :SYSTEM.TRIGGER_ITEM ) is not null then
 qry := qry || ' AND ' || replace(:SYSTEM.TRIGGER_ITEM,'KEYGO.','') || ' LIKE ''' || name_in ( :SYSTEM.TRIGGER_ITEM ) || '%''';
 end if;

--message(qry); 
 
 if :KEYGO.L_SZERAZON is not null then 
 qry := qry || ' AND U_PARTNER = ''' || :KEYGO.U_PARTNER || ''''; 
 qry := qry || ' AND U_UGYID = ''' || :KEYGO.U_UGYID || ''''; 
 qry := qry || ' AND L_SZERAZON = ''' || :KEYGO.L_SZERAZON || ''''; 
 end if; 

--message(qry); 
 rg_id := Create_Group_From_Query( rg_name, qry); 
 set_lov_property('LOV_KEYGO_' || replace(:SYSTEM.TRIGGER_ITEM,'KEYGO.',''), GROUP_NAME, rg_name); 
END;

ProgramUnit.Name: SET_LOCK_PARTNER
ProgramUnit.ProgramUnitText:
FUNCTION SET_LOCK_PARTNER ( P_PARTNER varchar2 ) RETURN varchar2 IS
 ret pls_integer;
 lock_siker varchar2(100);
 r varchar2(5);
BEGIN
 KK_FORM_LOG.KEZD('SET_LOCK_PARTNER');
 P_KKLOCKS_ON(P_PARTNER, lock_siker);
 KK_FORM_LOG.VEGE; 
 if lock_siker <> 'TRUE' then
 set_alert_property('CFG_ERROR',alert_message_text,'A partner ' || lock_siker ||' által foglalt ! ' );
 ret := show_alert('CFG_ERROR');
 r := 'FALSE';
 else
 r := 'TRUE';
 end if;
 return r;
END;

ProgramUnit.Name: KKDOCSTAR_QUERY
ProgramUnit.ProgramUnitText:
PROCEDURE KKDOCSTAR_QUERY IS
 qry varchar2(2000);
 lis varchar2(500);
 tag varchar2(60);
 ret pls_integer;
BEGIN
 ret := "report.KKDOCSTAR_SPID_DEL";
 commit;
 
 if ( :KKDOCSTAR_CTRL.FORRAS_01 = 'IGEN'
 and :KKDOCSTAR_CTRL.FORRAS_02 = 'IGEN'
 and :KKDOCSTAR_CTRL.FORRAS_03 = 'IGEN'
 and :KKDOCSTAR_CTRL.FORRAS_04 = 'IGEN'
 and :KKDOCSTAR_CTRL.FORRAS_05 = 'IGEN'
 and :KKDOCSTAR_CTRL.FORRAS_06 = 'IGEN'
 and :KKDOCSTAR_CTRL.FORRAS_07 = 'IGEN'
 and :KKDOCSTAR_CTRL.FORRAS_08 = 'IGEN'
 and :KKDOCSTAR_CTRL.FORRAS_09 = 'IGEN'
 and :KKDOCSTAR_CTRL.FORRAS_10 = 'IGEN' 
 and :KKDOCSTAR_CTRL.FORRAS_11 = 'IGEN' 
 and :KKDOCSTAR_CTRL.FORRAS_12 = 'IGEN' 
 ) or 
 ( :KKDOCSTAR_CTRL.FORRAS_01 = 'NEM'
 and :KKDOCSTAR_CTRL.FORRAS_02 = 'NEM'
 and :KKDOCSTAR_CTRL.FORRAS_03 = 'NEM'
 and :KKDOCSTAR_CTRL.FORRAS_04 = 'NEM'
 and :KKDOCSTAR_CTRL.FORRAS_05 = 'NEM' 
 and :KKDOCSTAR_CTRL.FORRAS_06 = 'NEM'
 and :KKDOCSTAR_CTRL.FORRAS_07 = 'NEM'
 and :KKDOCSTAR_CTRL.FORRAS_08 = 'NEM'
 and :KKDOCSTAR_CTRL.FORRAS_09 = 'NEM'
 and :KKDOCSTAR_CTRL.FORRAS_10 = 'NEM'
 and :KKDOCSTAR_CTRL.FORRAS_11 = 'NEM'
 and :KKDOCSTAR_CTRL.FORRAS_12 = 'NEM'
 ) 
 then
 :KKDOCSTAR_CTRL.FORRAS_01 := 'NEM';
 :KKDOCSTAR_CTRL.FORRAS_02 := 'NEM';
 :KKDOCSTAR_CTRL.FORRAS_03 := 'NEM';
 :KKDOCSTAR_CTRL.FORRAS_04 := 'NEM';
 :KKDOCSTAR_CTRL.FORRAS_05 := 'NEM';
 :KKDOCSTAR_CTRL.FORRAS_06 := 'NEM';
 :KKDOCSTAR_CTRL.FORRAS_07 := 'NEM';
 :KKDOCSTAR_CTRL.FORRAS_08 := 'NEM';
 :KKDOCSTAR_CTRL.FORRAS_09 := 'NEM';
 :KKDOCSTAR_CTRL.FORRAS_10 := 'NEM';
 :KKDOCSTAR_CTRL.FORRAS_11 := 'NEM';
 :KKDOCSTAR_CTRL.FORRAS_12 := 'NEM';
 :KKDOCSTAR_CTRL.FORRAS_00 := 'IGEN'; 
 end if;
 
 set_record_property(1,'KKDOCSTAR_CTRL',status,query_status);
 
 qry := 'U_PARTNER=''' || :KKPARTNER_CORE.U_PARTNER || ''' and U_FORRAS <> ''JOGI HD''';

 if :KKDOCSTAR_CTRL.SZINT = 'SZERZODES' then
 qry := qry || ' and U_SZERSZAM=''' || :KKSZERZODES_CORE.L_SZERSZAM || '''';
 end if;

 if :KKDOCSTAR_CTRL.SZINT = 'ESZKOZ' then
 qry := qry || ' and U_SZERAZON=''' || :KKESZKOZ_CORE.L_SZERAZON || '''';
 end if;

 if :KKDOCSTAR_CTRL.FORRAS_00 = 'NEM' then
 qry := qry || ' and U_FORRAS IN (';
 lis := ',';
 if :KKDOCSTAR_CTRL.FORRAS_01 = 'IGEN' then
 lis := lis || '''KKTUSZ'',';
 end if;
 if :KKDOCSTAR_CTRL.FORRAS_02 = 'IGEN' then
 lis := lis || '''KKBO'',';
 end if; 
 if :KKDOCSTAR_CTRL.FORRAS_03 = 'IGEN' then
 lis := lis || '''KKBEH'',';
 end if; 
 if :KKDOCSTAR_CTRL.FORRAS_04 = 'IGEN' then
 lis := lis || '''KKER'',';
 end if; 
 if :KKDOCSTAR_CTRL.FORRAS_05 = 'IGEN' then
 lis := lis || '''KKJOG'',';
 end if;

 if :KKDOCSTAR_CTRL.FORRAS_06 = 'IGEN' then
 lis := lis || '''BEHAJTO'',';
 end if;
 if :KKDOCSTAR_CTRL.FORRAS_07 = 'IGEN' then
 lis := lis || '''SZAKERT'',';
 end if; 
 if :KKDOCSTAR_CTRL.FORRAS_08 = 'IGEN' then
 lis := lis || '''ERTHELY'',';
 end if; 
 if :KKDOCSTAR_CTRL.FORRAS_09 = 'IGEN' then
 lis := lis || '''EDR'',';
 end if; 
 if :KKDOCSTAR_CTRL.FORRAS_10 = 'IGEN' then
 lis := lis || '''ARCHIVUM'',';
 end if;
 if :KKDOCSTAR_CTRL.FORRAS_11 = 'IGEN' then
 lis := lis || '''DM'',';
 end if;
 if :KKDOCSTAR_CTRL.FORRAS_12 = 'IGEN' then
 lis := lis || '''OKKO'',';
 end if;

 lis := substr(lis,2,length(lis)-2);
 qry := qry || lis || ')';
 end if;
 
 tag := globals.TAG;
 if globals.TAGCHECK = 'IGEN' and globals.TAG <> '*' then
 qry := qry || ' and U_ID in (select U_KULSOID from KKTAGLINKS_V where U_TAGTABLE = ''KKDOCSTAR'' and U_TAGID = ' || tag || ' )';
 end if;
 
 set_block_property('KKDOCSTAR',default_where,qry);
 go_item('KKDOCSTAR.U_STATUS');
 execute_query;
 last_record;
END;

ProgramUnit.Name: KKDOCSTAR_FELTOLT
ProgramUnit.ProgramUnitText:
PROCEDURE KKDOCSTAR_FELTOLT IS
 i number;
begin 
 GO_ITEM('KKDOCSTAR.U_ID');
 i := :KKDOCSTAR.U_ID;
 if i is not null and :KKDOCSTAR.U_FOLDER is null then
 web.show_document(:GLOBAL.KKUPLOAD || to_char(:KKDOCSTAR.U_ID),'_BLANK');
 end if;
end;

ProgramUnit.Name: KKDOCSTAR_MEGTEKINT
ProgramUnit.ProgramUnitText:
PROCEDURE KKDOCSTAR_MEGTEKINT IS
 i number;
 url varchar2(2000);
 ret pls_integer;
begin
 GO_BLOCK('KKDOCSTAR');
 if :KKDOCSTAR.U_ID is not null then
 if :KKDOCSTAR.U_FOLDER is null then
 i := :KKDOCSTAR.U_ID; 
 execute_query;
 loop
 if :system.last_record = 'TRUE' or :KKDOCSTAR.U_ID = i then
 exit;
 end if;
 next_record; 
 end loop;
 end if;
 if :KKDOCSTAR.U_FOLDER is not null and :KKDOCSTAR.U_STATUS = 'FELTOLTVE' then
 --if instr(nvl(:KKDOCSTAR.U_MGJ,'X'),'ALAP') = 0 then
 if :KKDOCSTAR.U_URL is null then
 --kit := upper(substr(:KK
 
 if :KKDOCSTAR.D_DOCID is null then
 if :KKDOCSTAR.U_DOCTYPE = 'KK_FMH_XML' then
 web.show_document('http://mordor.lombard.hu/kk/docs/' || :KKDOCSTAR.U_FOLDER || '/' || :KKDOCSTAR.U_DOCID || UPPER(SUBSTR(:KKDOCSTAR.U_DOCNAME,LENGTH(:KKDOCSTAR.U_DOCNAME)-3,4)),'_BLANK');
 else
 --web.show_document(:GLOBAL.KKDOCURL || :KKDOCSTAR.U_FOLDER || '/' || :KKDOCSTAR.U_DOCID || UPPER(SUBSTR(:KKDOCSTAR.U_DOCNAME,LENGTH(:KKDOCSTAR.U_DOCNAME)-3,4)),'_BLANK');
 ret := "report.GET_KKDOCSTAR_URL_SP"( :KKDOCSTAR.U_DOCID, url); 
 web.show_document(url,'_BLANK');
 end if; 
 else
 web.show_document(:GLOBAL.DOCURL || :KKDOCSTAR.U_FOLDER || '/' || :KKDOCSTAR.U_DOCNAME,'_BLANK');
 end if;
 else
 --if nvl(globals.JOGIRODA,'NONE') = 'SULYOK' then 
 --if nvl(globals.JOGIRODA,'NONE') not in ('NONE', 'LOMBARD') then 
 -- web.show_document(replace(:KKDOCSTAR.U_URL,'mordor.lombard.hu','127.0.0.1:8081'),'_BLANK'); 
 --else 
 web.show_document(:KKDOCSTAR.U_URL,'_BLANK');
 --end if; 
 end if;
 end if;
 end if;
end;

ProgramUnit.Name: KKDOCSTAR_TOROL
ProgramUnit.ProgramUnitText:
PROCEDURE KKDOCSTAR_TOROL IS
 i number;
begin
 if :KKDOCSTAR.U_ID is null then
 return;
 end if;

 if :KKDOCSTAR.U_STATUS = 'UJ' then
 i := :KKDOCSTAR.U_ID; 
 KKDOCSTAR_QUERY;
 First_Record;
 loop
 if :system.last_record = 'TRUE' or :KKDOCSTAR.U_ID = i then
 exit;
 end if;
 next_record; 
 end loop;
 end if;
 
 if :KKDOCSTAR.U_STATUS = 'UJ' then 
 if :KKDOCSTAR.U_ID is not null then
 delete from KKDOCSTAR where U_ID = :KKDOCSTAR.U_ID and U_STATUS = 'UJ';
 commit;
 KKDOCSTAR_QUERY;
 end if;
 /*
 set_block_property('KKDOCSTAR',update_allowed,property_true);
 set_block_property('KKDOCSTAR',delete_allowed,property_true);
 delete_record;
 commit_form;
 set_block_property('KKDOCSTAR',update_allowed,property_false);
 set_block_property('KKDOCSTAR',delete_allowed,property_false);
 */
 elsif :KKDOCSTAR.U_FOLDER is not null and :KKDOCSTAR.U_STATUS = 'FELTOLTVE' then
 set_alert_property('NEMIGEN',alert_message_text,'Biztos, hogy törli a tételt ?');
 if show_alert('NEMIGEN')=ALERT_BUTTON1 then
 /*
 if :KKDOCSTAR.FMHMELL is not null then
 i := "report.KK_FMH_MELLEKLET_UPD"(:KKDOCSTAR.U_UGYID, :KKDOCSTAR.U_ID, :KKDOCSTAR.FMHMELL, 'DELETE');
 commit;
 end if;
 */
 i := "report.EDR_EXEC"('update KKDOCSTAR set U_STATUS=''TOROLT'', DATE_MODIFIED=GETDATE(), MODIFIED_BY=''' || :GLOBAL.USERID || ''' where U_ID=' || to_char(:KKDOCSTAR.U_ID),'' );
 commit;
 KKDOCSTAR_QUERY;
/*
 set_block_property('KKDOCSTAR',UPDATE_ALLOWED,PROPERTY_TRUE);
 :KKDOCSTAR.U_STATUS := 'TOROLT';
 --:KKDOCSTAR.U_TORLDAT := SYSDATE;
 commit_form;
 set_block_property('KKDOCSTAR',UPDATE_ALLOWED,PROPERTY_FALSE);
*/ 
 end if;
 
 end if;
end;

ProgramUnit.Name: KKESZKOZ_GO_SZERAZON
ProgramUnit.ProgramUnitText:
PROCEDURE KKESZKOZ_GO_SZERAZON IS
BEGIN
 Go_Item('KKESZKOZ_CORE.M_L_SZERAZON');
 if :KKESZKOZ_CORE.L_SZERAZON <> globals.SZERAZON then
 First_Record;
 Loop
 if :KKESZKOZ_CORE.L_SZERAZON = globals.SZERAZON or upper(:system.LAST_RECORD)='TRUE' then
 exit;
 end if;
 Next_Record;
 End Loop;
 End If;
END;

ProgramUnit.Name: KKKONTAKT_POST
ProgramUnit.ProgramUnitText:
PROCEDURE KKKONTAKT_POST IS
 ret number;
 
 cursor c (p_partner varchar2) is
 select U_ID, U_JELLEMZES, U_IGERET, U_PARTNER, U_STATUS
 from "report".KKKONTAKT_V
 where U_PARTNER = p_partner
 order by U_ID DESC;
 
 v c%rowtype;
 al number; 
 hiba varchar2(10);
BEGIN 
 commit_form;
 
 hiba := '00';
 if nvl(:KKKONTAKT.U_ID,0) = 0 then
 go_item('KKKONTAKT.U_STATUS');
 set_block_property('KKKONTAKT',default_where,'U_PARTNER = ''' || :KKPARTNER_CORE.U_PARTNER || '''');
 execute_query;
 last_record;
 end if; 
 hiba := '01';
 --al := get_alert('STOP', to_char(:KKKONTAKT.U_ID)); 
 ret := "report.KKKONTAKT_KKUGYLET_SET" (:KKKONTAKT.U_ID, :global.USERID);
 commit; 

 go_item('KKUGYLET.U_UGYID_SZERAZON');
 execute_query;
 
 go_item('KKKONTAKT.U_STATUS');

 hiba := '02';
 
 open c (:KKPARTNER_CORE.U_PARTNER);
 fetch c into v;
 close c;
 hiba := '03';
 
 if v.U_ID is null then
 return;
 end if;
 hiba := '04';
 
 v.U_STATUS := :KKPARTNER_KART.U_KKTUSZ_ST;
 set_alert_property('NEMIGEN',alert_message_text,'A partner maradjon még ' || :KKPARTNER_KART.U_KKTUSZ_ST || ' státuszban ?');
 if v.U_STATUS in ( 'FELHIVNI', 'FOGLINFOKELL' ) then
 if show_alert('NEMIGEN') = ALERT_BUTTON2 then
 v.U_STATUS := 'NEM FELH';
 end if;
 end if;
 hiba := '05';
 
 if nvl(:KKPARTNER_KART.U_KKTUSZ_ST,'X')<>nvl(v.U_STATUS ,'Y')
 or nvl(:KKPARTNER_KART.U_IGERET ,'X')<>nvl(v.U_IGERET ,'Y')
 or nvl(:KKPARTNER_KART.U_JELLEMZES,'X')<>nvl(v.U_JELLEMZES,'Y') 
 then
 update KKPARTNER_KART
 set U_IGERET = v.U_IGERET,
 U_JELLEMZES = v.U_JELLEMZES,
 U_KKTUSZ_ST = v.U_STATUS
 where U_PARTNER = v.U_PARTNER;
 commit;
 hiba := '06';
 
 go_item('KKPARTNER_KART.U_CSALAS');
 execute_query;
 go_item('KKPARTNER_CORE.U_PARTNER');
 
-- go_item('KKPARTNER_CORE.U_PARTNER');
-- execute_query;
 hiba := '07'; 
 KKVARTBEFIZ_POST;
 hiba := '08'; 
 go_item('KKKONTAKT.U_STATUS');
 end if;
 
 hiba := '09';
 
 if :KKKONTAKT.U_KOMMOD = 'SMS' and :KKKONTAKT.DATE_CREATED = :KKKONTAKT.DATE_MODIFIED and :KKKONTAKT.U_KOMCIM is not null then
 SEND_SMS (:KKKONTAKT.U_TARGY, :KKKONTAKT.U_KOMCIM);
 msg('SMS: '||:KKKONTAKT.U_KOMCIM||' '||:KKKONTAKT.U_TARGY);
 end if;
 
 hiba := '10';
 
 if :KKKONTAKT.U_KOMMOD = 'MAIL' and instr(:KKKONTAKT.U_KOMCIM,'@') > 0 then
 if IGENNEM('Elküldi a mail-t?')=ALERT_BUTTON1 then
 KKKONTAKT_MAIL;
 msg('MAIL: '||:KKKONTAKT.U_KOMCIM||' '||:KKKONTAKT.U_TARGY);
 end if;
 end if;
 
 hiba := '11'; 
exception when others then
 rollback;
 al := get_alert('STOP', 'Hiba: ' || hiba) ;
END;

ProgramUnit.Name: SET_PARTNER_KKBO_ST
ProgramUnit.ProgramUnitText:
PROCEDURE SET_PARTNER_KKBO_ST IS
 cursor c is
 select distinct 'TRUE' VAN
 from "report".KKSZERZODES s, "report".KOD k
 where s.L_VEVO = :KKPARTNER_CORE.U_PARTNER
 and s.U_KKBO_ST = k.L_LOMBKOD
 and k.L_KODCSOP = 'KKBO SZER ST'
 and k.L_JELLEG = 'KKBO';
 
 v c%rowtype;
 st varchar2(13);
BEGIN
 
 open c;
 fetch c into v;
 close c;
 
 if nvl(v.VAN,'FALSE') = 'TRUE' then
 st := 'VAN FELADAT';
 else
 st := 'NINCS FELADAT';
 end if;
 
 if :KKPARTNER_KART.U_KKBO_ST <> st then
 update "report".KKPARTNER
 set U_KKBO_ST = st
 where U_PARTNER = :KKPARTNER_CORE.U_PARTNER;
 commit;
 end if;
END;

ProgramUnit.Name: SET_CTRL_ENABLE
ProgramUnit.ProgramUnitText:
PROCEDURE SET_CTRL_ENABLE (p_blk varchar2, p_value varchar2 ) IS
 b varchar2(30);
 i varchar2(61);
 l varchar2(61);
BEGIN
 b := p_blk || '_CTRL';
 i := get_block_property(b,FIRST_ITEM);
 l := get_block_property(b,LAST_ITEM);
 loop
 
 if p_value = 'FALSE' then
 set_item_property(b || '.' || i,enabled,property_false);
 else
 set_item_property(b || '.' || i,enabled,property_true);
 set_item_property(b || '.' || i,navigable,property_true);
 if get_item_property(b || '.' || i,item_type) in ('CHECKBOX','LIST','RADIO GROUP','TEXT ITEM') then
 set_item_property(b || '.' || i,insert_allowed,property_true);
 set_item_property(b || '.' || i,update_allowed,property_true);
 end if;
 end if;
 
 if i = l then
 exit;
 else
 i := get_item_property(b || '.' || i, NEXTITEM);
 end if;
 end loop; 
END;

ProgramUnit.Name: KKVARTBEFIZ_POST
ProgramUnit.ProgramUnitText:
PROCEDURE KKVARTBEFIZ_POST IS
 ret number;
 
 cursor b (p_partner varchar2) is
 select U_ID, U_PARTNER, U_STATUS 
 from "report".KKVARTBEFIZ_V 
 where U_PARTNER = p_partner 
 order by U_ID DESC;
 
 f b%rowtype;
 
BEGIN
 open b (:KKPARTNER_CORE.U_PARTNER);
 fetch b into f;
 close b;
 
 if f.U_ID is null then
 return;
 end if;

 if nvl(:KKPARTNER_KART.U_IGERET,'NINCS') <> 'PENZ' then
 f.U_STATUS := 'NINCS';
 end if;
 
 if nvl(:KKPARTNER_KART.U_BEFIGERST ,'X')<>nvl(f.U_STATUS ,'Y') 
 then
 
 update "report".KKPARTNER
 set U_BEFIGERST = f.U_STATUS
 where U_PARTNER = f.U_PARTNER;
 commit;

 go_item('KKPARTNER_CORE.U_PARTNER');
 execute_query;
 
 go_item('KKVARTBEFIZ.U_FORRAS');
 end if;
 
END;

ProgramUnit.Name: SET_ITEM
ProgramUnit.ProgramUnitText:
PROCEDURE SET_ITEM (P_BLOCKITEM varchar2, P_EVNIUD varchar2) IS
 blk varchar2(30);
 i number;
 ml varchar2(5);
BEGIN 
 ml := :system.message_level;
 :system.message_level := '25';
 
 blk := substr(P_BLOCKITEM,1,instr(P_BLOCKITEM,'.')-1);
 
 
 if substr(P_EVNIUD,2,1)='I' then
 set_item_property(P_BLOCKITEM, VISIBLE, PROPERTY_TRUE);
 else
 if get_item_property(P_BLOCKITEM, ITEM_TYPE) in ('CHECKBOX','TEXT ITEM','RADIO GROUP') then
 set_item_property(P_BLOCKITEM, REQUIRED, PROPERTY_FALSE);
 end if;
 set_item_property(P_BLOCKITEM, VISIBLE, PROPERTY_FALSE);
 end if;
 
 if substr(P_EVNIUD,1,1)='I' then
 set_item_property(P_BLOCKITEM, ENABLED, PROPERTY_TRUE);
 else
 if get_item_property(P_BLOCKITEM, ITEM_TYPE) in ('CHECKBOX','TEXT ITEM','RADIO GROUP') then
 set_item_property(P_BLOCKITEM, REQUIRED, PROPERTY_FALSE);
 end if;
 set_item_property(P_BLOCKITEM, ENABLED, PROPERTY_FALSE);
 end if;

 if substr(P_EVNIUD,3,1)='I' then
 set_item_property(P_BLOCKITEM, NAVIGABLE, PROPERTY_TRUE);
 else
 set_item_property(P_BLOCKITEM, NAVIGABLE, PROPERTY_FALSE);
 end if;

 if get_item_property(P_BLOCKITEM, ITEM_TYPE) in ('CHECKBOX','TEXT ITEM','RADIO GROUP') then
 --if get_block_property(blk,INSERT_ALLOWED)='TRUE' then
 if substr(P_EVNIUD,4,1)='I' then
 set_item_property(P_BLOCKITEM, INSERT_ALLOWED, PROPERTY_TRUE);
 else
 set_item_property(P_BLOCKITEM, INSERT_ALLOWED, PROPERTY_FALSE);
 end if;
 --end if; 
 --if get_block_property(blk,UPDATE_ALLOWED)='TRUE' then
 if substr(P_EVNIUD,5,1)='I' then
 set_item_property(P_BLOCKITEM, UPDATE_ALLOWED, PROPERTY_TRUE);
 else
 set_item_property(P_BLOCKITEM, UPDATE_ALLOWED, PROPERTY_FALSE);
 end if;
 --end if;
 if get_item_property(P_BLOCKITEM, ITEM_TYPE) = 'TEXT ITEM' then
 if (substr(P_EVNIUD,4,1)='I' or substr(P_EVNIUD,5,1)='I') then
 set_item_property(P_BLOCKITEM,VISUAL_ATTRIBUTE,'CG$ITEM');
 else
 --:system.message_level := '0';
 set_item_property(P_BLOCKITEM,REQUIRED,PROPERTY_FALSE);
 --:system.message_level := ml; 
 set_item_property(P_BLOCKITEM,VISUAL_ATTRIBUTE,'CG$DISPLAY_ITEM');
 end if;
 end if;
 end if;
 :system.message_level := ml;
EXCEPTION WHEN OTHERS THEN
 raise form_trigger_failure; 
END;

ProgramUnit.Name: PRINT_KKFORGALMI
ProgramUnit.ProgramUnitText:
PROCEDURE PRINT_KKFORGALMI (p_tipus varchar2, p_mode varchar2, p_dev varchar2) IS
 pid number;
 ret pls_integer;
 repid REPORT_OBJECT;
 rep varchar2(255);
 rep_status varchar2(30);
 doctype varchar2(60);
 doctypen varchar2(60);
 docname varchar2(500);
 repname varchar2(60);
 docid number;
 url varchar2(4000);
 folder varchar2(30);
 ceg varchar2(13);
 formatum number;
 params varchar2(255);
BEGIN
 repname := 'KKFORGALMI';
 doctype := p_tipus; 
 doctypen:= 'Forgalmi kimutatás';

 if :KKPUGYALL.U_CEG in ('LIZING RT', 'FINANSZ RT', 'BERLET KFT', 'INGATLAN RT', 'VBLIZING RT', 'VBFINANSZ RT', 'VBBERLET KFT', 'VBBERLET2 KFT') then 
 ceg := :KKPUGYALL.U_CEG; 
 else
 return; 
 end if; 

 if p_tipus = 'KKFORGALMI' then
 repname := 'KKFORGALMI'; 
 doctype := 'FORGKIMUT'; 
 doctypen:= 'Forgalmi kimutatás';
 elsif p_tipus in ( 'KKFORGALMIV', 'KKFORGALMIVSZ', 'KKFORGALMIV_UJ') then
 repname := 'KKFORGALMI_VISSZA_A'; 
 doctype := 'KKFORGALMIV_UJ'; 
 doctypen:= 'Részletező visszaállításhoz (új)'; 
 elsif p_tipus in ('KKFORGALMIL', 'KKFORGALMILSZ', 'KKFORGALMIL_UJ') then 
 repname := 'KKFORGALMI_LEZAR_A';
 --repname := 'KKFORGALMI_LEZAR_A_02';
 doctype := 'KKFORGALMIL_UJ';
 doctypen:= 'Részletező lezáráshoz (új)';
 elsif p_tipus = 'KKFORGALMIF' then
 repname := 'KKFORGALMI_FORRAS'; 
 doctype := 'KKFORGALMIF';
 doctypen:= 'Forgalmi kimutatás (Forrás)';
 elsif p_tipus in ( 'KKFORGALMIA_UJ') then
 repname := 'KKFORGALMI_ATUTEM_A'; 
 doctype := 'KKFORGALMIA_UJ'; 
 doctypen:= 'Részletező átütemezéshez (új)'; 
 end if;

/*
 if p_tipus = 'KKFORGALMI' then
 repname := 'KKFORGALMI'; 
 doctype := 'FORGKIMUT'; 
 doctypen:= 'Forgalmi kimutatás';
 elsif p_tipus = 'KKFORGALMIV' then
 repname := 'KKFORGALMI_VISSZA'; 
 doctype := 'FORGKIMUTV'; 
 doctypen:= 'Részletező visszaállításhoz';
 elsif p_tipus = 'KKFORGALMIV_UJ' then
 repname := 'KKFORGALMI_VISSZA_A'; 
 doctype := 'FORGKIMUTV_UJ'; 
 doctypen:= 'Részletező visszaállításhoz (új)'; 
 elsif p_tipus = 'KKFORGALMIVSZ' then
 repname := 'KKFORGALMI_VISSZA_SZ'; 
 doctype := 'FORGKIMUTVSZ'; 
 doctypen:= 'Részletező visszaállításhoz (sz)';
 elsif p_tipus = 'KKFORGALMIL' then
 repname := 'KKFORGALMI_LEZAR'; 
 doctype := 'FORGKIMUTL';
 doctypen:= 'Részletező lezáráshoz';
 elsif p_tipus = 'KKFORGALMILSZ' then
 repname := 'KKFORGALMI_LEZAR_SZ'; 
 doctype := 'FORGKIMUTLSZ';
 doctypen:= 'Részletező lezáráshoz (sz)'; 
 elsif p_tipus = 'KKFORGALMIF' then
 repname := 'KKFORGALMI_FORRAS'; 
 doctype := 'FORGKIMUTF';
 doctypen:= 'Forgalmi kimutatás (Forrás)';
 end if;
*/
 docname := doctype || '_' || to_char(sysdate,'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS') || '.PDF';
 params := 'P_PARTNER=''' || :KKPUGYALL.U_PARTNER || ''' P_CEG=''' || ceg || ''' P_DEV=''' || nvl(p_dev,'FT') || '''' ;
 -- docname := 'KKFORGALMI' || '_' || :GLOBAL.USERID || '_' || :KKPUGYALL.U_PARTNER || '_' || replace(:KKPUGYALL.U_CEG,' ','') || '.PDF';

 insert into KKDOCSTAR (
 U_FORRAS, U_DOCTYPE, U_DOCTYPEN, U_DOCNAME, U_STATUS, 
 U_PARTNER, U_UGYID, U_SZERSZAM, U_SZERAZON, 
 DATE_CREATED, CREATED_BY, DATE_MODIFIED, MODIFIED_BY)
 values (
 :PARAMETER.KK, doctype, doctypen, docname, 'UJ', 
 :KKPARTNER_CORE.U_PARTNER, :KKSZERZODES_CORE.U_UGYID, :KKSZERZODES_CORE.L_SZERSZAM, null,
 sysdate, :GLOBAL.USERID, sysdate, :GLOBAL.USERID
 );
 ret := "report.GET_KKDOCSTAR_IDENTITY"(docid);
 commit;

 if p_mode='EDRMON' then
 ret := "report.EDRMON_KKJOB" (
 :GLOBAL.USERID -- JOB-t indító Forrás SQL felhasználó kódja
 ,pid -- Porcessz ID OUTPUT --> ezzel kell hivatkozni a továbbiakban 
 ,repname -- Dokumentum típusa
 ,repname -- Dokumentum típus verzió
 ,docname -- Dokumentum neve
 ,docid -- Dokumentum azonosító
 ,params -- Paraméterek
 ,:KKPARTNER_CORE.U_PARTNER -- Partner 
 );
 commit;
 else
 repid := find_report_object('R1'); 
 SET_REPORT_OBJECT_PROPERTY(repid, REPORT_FILENAME , :GLOBAL.REPORTS || repname ); -- || '.RDF'
 SET_REPORT_OBJECT_PROPERTY(repid, REPORT_DESNAME , :GLOBAL.DOCTMP || docname ); 
 SET_REPORT_OBJECT_PROPERTY(repid, REPORT_DESFORMAT, 'PDF');
 SET_REPORT_OBJECT_PROPERTY(repid, REPORT_SERVER , :GLOBAL.REPSERVER);
 SET_REPORT_OBJECT_PROPERTY(repid, REPORT_OTHER , params );
 
 rep := RUN_REPORT_OBJECT(repid);
 
 url := :GLOBAL.CURL || ' -F "userfile=@' || :GLOBAL.DOCTMP || docname || '" -F "P_DOCID=' || docid || '" ' || replace(:GLOBAL.KKUPLOAD,'kk.php?P_DOCID=','upload.php');

 host(url,NO_SCREEN);
 
 ret := "report.GET_KK_FOLDER"(docid,folder);
 
 web.show_document(:GLOBAL.KKDOCURL || folder || '/' || docid || UPPER(SUBSTR(docname,LENGTH(docname)-3,4)),'_BLANK');
 --web.show_document(:GLOBAL.KKDOCTMPURL || docname, '_BLANK');
 end if;
END;

ProgramUnit.Name: KK_AUDIT
ProgramUnit.ProgramUnitText:
PACKAGE KK_AUDIT IS
 call_item varchar2(61);

 procedure ok;
 procedure show;
END;

ProgramUnit.Name: KK_AUDIT
ProgramUnit.ProgramUnitText:
PACKAGE BODY KK_AUDIT IS
 procedure ok as
 begin
 go_item ( call_item );
 end;
 
 procedure show as
 blk varchar2(30); 
 id item;
 cn varchar2(100);
 mn varchar2(100);
 begin
 blk := name_in('system.trigger_block'); 
 call_item := name_in('system.trigger_item');

 if id_null( find_item ( blk || '.DATE_CREATED' ) ) then 
 return;
 end if;

 cn := GET_USERNAME ( name_in(blk || '.CREATED_BY') );
 mn := GET_USERNAME ( name_in(blk || '.MODIFIED_BY') );

 set_block_property('AUDIT',INSERT_ALLOWED,PROPERTY_TRUE);
 go_item ( 'AUDIT.OK') ;
 clear_block; 
 
 copy(name_in(blk || '.DATE_CREATED' ),'AUDIT.DATE_CREATED') ;
 copy(name_in(blk || '.CREATED_BY' ),'AUDIT.CREATED_BY_U');
 copy(cn,'AUDIT.CREATED_BY_N');
 --copy(name_in(blk || '.CREATED_SUB_ID' ),'AUDIT.CREATED_SUB_ID');
 -- copy(name_in(blk || '.CREATED_MOD_ID' ),'AUDIT.CREATED_MOD_ID');

 copy(name_in(blk || '.DATE_MODIFIED' ),'AUDIT.DATE_MODIFIED') ;
 copy(name_in(blk || '.MODIFIED_BY' ),'AUDIT.MODIFIED_BY_U') ;
 copy(mn,'AUDIT.MODIFIED_BY_N');
 --copy(name_in(blk || '.MODIFIED_SUB_ID'),'AUDIT.MODIFIED_SUB_ID');
 --copy(name_in(blk || '.MODIFIED_MOD_ID'),'AUDIT.MODIFIED_MOD_ID');

 set_block_property('AUDIT',INSERT_ALLOWED,PROPERTY_FALSE);
 end;
END;

ProgramUnit.Name: GET_USERNAME
ProgramUnit.ProgramUnitText:
FUNCTION GET_USERNAME ( P_USERID varchar2 )RETURN varchar IS
 cursor c is select NAME1 from DOCUSERS where USERID = P_USERID;
 v c%rowtype; 
BEGIN
 open c;
 fetch c into v;
 close c;
 return v.NAME1;
END;

ProgramUnit.Name: KKKOLTSEG_QUERY
ProgramUnit.ProgramUnitText:
PROCEDURE KKKOLTSEG_QUERY IS
 qry varchar2(1000);
 lis varchar2(500);
 tag varchar2(255);
BEGIN
 qry := 'U_PARTNER=''' || :KKPARTNER_CORE.U_PARTNER || '''';

 if :KKKOLTSEG_CTRL.SZINT = 'SZERZODES' then
 qry := qry || ' and U_SZERSZAM=''' || :KKSZERZODES_CORE.L_SZERSZAM || '''';
 end if;

 if :KKKOLTSEG_CTRL.SZINT = 'ESZKOZ' then
 qry := qry || ' and U_SZERAZON=''' || :KKESZKOZ_CORE.L_SZERAZON || '''';
 end if;

 if :KKKOLTSEG_CTRL.FORRAS_00 = 'NEM' then
 qry := qry || ' and U_FORRAS IN (';
 lis := ',';
 if :KKKOLTSEG_CTRL.FORRAS_01 = 'IGEN' then
 lis := lis || '''KKTUSZ'',';
 end if;
 if :KKKOLTSEG_CTRL.FORRAS_02 = 'IGEN' then
 lis := lis || '''KKBO'',';
 end if; 
 if :KKKOLTSEG_CTRL.FORRAS_03 = 'IGEN' then
 lis := lis || '''KKBEH'',';
 end if; 
 if :KKKOLTSEG_CTRL.FORRAS_04 = 'IGEN' then
 lis := lis || '''KKER'',';
 end if; 
 if :KKKOLTSEG_CTRL.FORRAS_05 = 'IGEN' then
 lis := lis || '''KKJOG'',';
 end if;
 if :KKKOLTSEG_CTRL.FORRAS_06 = 'IGEN' then
 lis := lis || '''OKKO'',';
 end if;
 lis := substr(lis,2,length(lis)-2);
 qry := qry || lis || ')';
 end if;
 
 if :KKKOLTSEG_CTRL.STATUS_00 = 'NEM' then
 qry := qry || ' and U_STATUS IN (';
 lis := ',';
 if :KKKOLTSEG_CTRL.STATUS_01 = 'IGEN' then
 lis := lis || '''TERV'',';
 end if;
 if :KKKOLTSEG_CTRL.STATUS_02 = 'IGEN' then
 lis := lis || '''TENY'',';
 end if; 
 if :KKKOLTSEG_CTRL.STATUS_03 = 'IGEN' then
 lis := lis || '''ENGEDELYT VAR'',';
 end if; 
 if :KKKOLTSEG_CTRL.STATUS_04 = 'IGEN' then
 lis := lis || '''ENGEDELYEZVE'',';
 end if; 
 if :KKKOLTSEG_CTRL.STATUS_05 = 'IGEN' then
 lis := lis || '''ELUTASITVA'',';
 end if;
 if :KKKOLTSEG_CTRL.STATUS_06 = 'IGEN' then
 lis := lis || '''TOROLT'',';
 end if;
 if :KKKOLTSEG_CTRL.STATUS_07 = 'IGEN' then
 lis := lis || '''IMPORTALVA'',';
 end if; 
 if :KKKOLTSEG_CTRL.STATUS_08 = 'IGEN' then
 lis := lis || '''UTALVA'',';
 end if; 
 lis := substr(lis,2,length(lis)-2);
 qry := qry || lis || ')';
 end if;

 if :KKKOLTSEG_CTRL.STATUS_00 = 'IGEN' and :KKKOLTSEG_CTRL.STATUS_06 = 'NEM' then
 qry := qry || ' and U_STATUS <> ''TOROLT''';
 end if;


 if :KKKOLTSEG_CTRL.STATUS_00 = 'IGEN' and :KKKOLTSEG_CTRL.STATUS_07 = 'NEM' then
 qry := qry || ' and U_STATUS <> ''IMPORTALVA''';
 end if;

 tag := globals.TAG;
 if globals.TAGCHECK = 'IGEN' and globals.TAG <> '*' then
 qry := qry || ' and U_ID in (select U_KULSOID from KKTAGLINKS_V where U_TAGTABLE = ''KKKOLTSEG'' and U_TAGID = ' || tag || ' )';
 end if;
 
 set_block_property('KKKOLTSEG',default_where,qry);
 go_item('KKKOLTSEG.U_STATUS');
 execute_query;
END;

ProgramUnit.Name: SET_PUGYALL_0
ProgramUnit.ProgramUnitText:

BEGIN
 :GLOBALS_BLK.LIZING_RT_U_LEJART := 0;

 :GLOBALS_BLK.BERLET_KFT_U_VISSZAALL := 0;
 :GLOBALS_BLK.BERLET_KFT_U_LEZAR := 0;

 :GLOBALS_BLK.INGATLAN_RT_U_LEJART := 0;
 :GLOBALS_BLK.INGATLAN_RT_U_VISSZAALL := 0;

ProgramUnit.Name: PRINT_KKINFOLAP
ProgramUnit.ProgramUnitText:
PROCEDURE PRINT_KKINFOLAP (u_verazon varchar2)IS
 pid number;
 ret pls_integer;
 repid REPORT_OBJECT;
 rep varchar2(255);
 rep_status varchar(30);
 docname varchar2(500); 
 docid number;
 url varchar2(4000);
 folder varchar2(30);
 params varchar2(255);
BEGIN
 docname := 'KKINFOLAP' || '_' || to_char(sysdate,'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS') || '.PDF';
 params := 'P_UVERAZON=''' || u_verazon || ''' P_VERAZON=''' || :KKSZERZODES_CORE.L_VERAZON || '''' ;

 insert into KKDOCSTAR (
 U_FORRAS, U_DOCTYPE, U_DOCTYPEN, U_DOCNAME, U_STATUS, 
 U_PARTNER, U_UGYID, U_SZERSZAM, U_SZERAZON, 
 DATE_CREATED, CREATED_BY, DATE_MODIFIED, MODIFIED_BY)
 values (
 :PARAMETER.KK, 'KKINFOLAP', 'Infólap behajtóknak', docname, 'UJ', 
 :KKPARTNER_CORE.U_PARTNER, :KKSZERZODES_CORE.U_UGYID, :KKSZERZODES_CORE.L_SZERSZAM, null,
 sysdate, :GLOBAL.USERID, sysdate, :GLOBAL.USERID
 );
 ret := "report.GET_KKDOCSTAR_IDENTITY"(docid); 
 commit; 

 ret := "report.EDRMON_KKJOB" (
 :GLOBAL.USERID -- JOB-t indító Forrás SQL felhasználó kódja
 ,pid -- Porcessz ID OUTPUT --> ezzel kell hivatkozni a továbbiakban 
 ,'KKINFOLAP' -- Dokumentum típusa
 ,'KK2_KKINFOLAP_09' -- Dokumentum típus verzió
 ,docname -- Dokumentum neve
 ,docid -- Dokumentum azonosító
 ,params -- Paraméterek
 ,:KKPARTNER_CORE.U_PARTNER -- Partner 
 );
 commit;
 
 /* 
 repid := find_report_object('R1'); 
 SET_REPORT_OBJECT_PROPERTY(repid, REPORT_FILENAME , :GLOBAL.REPORTS || 'KKINFOLAP' ); -- || '.RDF'
 SET_REPORT_OBJECT_PROPERTY(repid, REPORT_DESNAME , :GLOBAL.DOCTMP || docname ); 
 SET_REPORT_OBJECT_PROPERTY(repid, REPORT_DESFORMAT, 'PDF');
 SET_REPORT_OBJECT_PROPERTY(repid, REPORT_SERVER , :GLOBAL.REPSERVER);
 SET_REPORT_OBJECT_PROPERTY(repid, REPORT_OTHER , params );
 rep := RUN_REPORT_OBJECT(repid);
 
 url := :GLOBAL.CURL || ' -F "userfile=@' || :GLOBAL.DOCTMP || docname || '" -F "P_DOCID=' || docid || '" ' || replace(:GLOBAL.KKUPLOAD,'kk.php?P_DOCID=','upload.php');
 
 host(url,NO_SCREEN);
 
 ret := "report.GET_KK_FOLDER"(docid,folder);
 
 web.show_document(:GLOBAL.KKDOCURL || folder || '/' || docid || UPPER(SUBSTR(docname,LENGTH(docname)-3,4)),'_BLANK'); 
 --web.show_document(:GLOBAL.KKDOCTMPURL || docname, '_BLANK');
 */
END;

*/
