ProgramUnit.Name: PRINT_ATADKER
ProgramUnit.ProgramUnitText:
PROCEDURE PRINT_ATADKER IS
 pid number;
 ret pls_integer;
 repid REPORT_OBJECT;
 rep varchar2(255);
 rep_status varchar(30);
 docname varchar2(500);
 params varchar2(255);
 
 docid number;
 url varchar2(4000);
 folder varchar2(30);
BEGIN
 docname := 'ATADKER' || '_' || to_char(sysdate,'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS') || '.PDF';
 params := 'P_CEG=''' || :PRINT.L_CEG 
 || ''' P_SZERSZAM=''' || :KKSZERZODES_CORE.L_SZERSZAM 
 || ''' P_SZERAZON=''' || :KKESZKOZ_CORE.L_SZERAZON 
 || ''' P_UVERAZON=''' || :KKSZERZODES_KART.U_UGYID
 || ''' P_DATUM=''' || TO_CHAR(:PRINT.L_DATUM,'YYYY.MM.DD') 
 || ''''; 

 ret := "report.INS_KKDOCSTAR" (
 :PARAMETER.KK, 'ATADKER', 'Átadás-átvételi kereskedésnek', docname, 'UJ', 
 :KKPARTNER_CORE.U_PARTNER, :KKSZERZODES_CORE.U_UGYID, :KKSZERZODES_CORE.L_SZERSZAM, null,
 sysdate, :GLOBAL.USERID, sysdate, :GLOBAL.USERID, docid
 );
 commit; 
 
/*
 ret := "report.EDRMON_KKJOB" (
 :GLOBAL.USERID -- JOB-t indító Forrás SQL felhasználó kódja
 ,pid -- Porcessz ID OUTPUT --> ezzel kell hivatkozni a továbbiakban 
 ,'ATADKER' -- Dokumentum típusa
 ,'ATADKER' -- Dokumentum típus verzió
 ,docname -- Dokumentum neve
 ,docid -- Dokumentum azonosító
 ,params -- Paraméterek
 ,:KKPARTNER_CORE.U_PARTNER -- Partner 
 );
 commit;
*/ 
 
 repid := find_report_object('R1'); 
 SET_REPORT_OBJECT_PROPERTY(repid, REPORT_FILENAME , :GLOBAL.REPORTS || 'KK2_ATADKER' ); -- || '.RDF'
 SET_REPORT_OBJECT_PROPERTY(repid, REPORT_DESNAME , :GLOBAL.DOCTMP || docname ); 
 SET_REPORT_OBJECT_PROPERTY(repid, REPORT_DESFORMAT, 'PDF');
 SET_REPORT_OBJECT_PROPERTY(repid, REPORT_SERVER , :GLOBAL.REPSERVER);
 params := 'P_CEG=''' || :PRINT.L_CEG 
 || ''' P_SZERSZAM=''' || :KKSZERZODES_CORE.L_SZERSZAM 
 || ''' P_SZERAZON=''' || :KKESZKOZ_CORE.L_SZERAZON 
 || ''' P_UVERAZON=''' || :KKSZERZODES_KART.U_UGYID
 || ''' P_DATUM=''' || TO_CHAR(:PRINT.L_DATUM,'YYYY.MM.DD') 
 || ''''; 
 
 --msg(params);
 
 SET_REPORT_OBJECT_PROPERTY(repid, REPORT_OTHER , params );
 rep := RUN_REPORT_OBJECT(repid);
 
 url := :GLOBAL.CURL || ' -F "userfile=@' || :GLOBAL.DOCTMP || docname || '" -F "P_DOCID=' || docid || '" ' || replace(:GLOBAL.KKUPLOAD,'kk.php?P_DOCID=','upload.php');
 
 host(url,NO_SCREEN);
 
 ret := "report.GET_KK_FOLDER"(docid,folder);
 
 web.show_document(:GLOBAL.KKDOCURL || folder || '/' || docid || UPPER(SUBSTR(docname,LENGTH(docname)-3,4)),'_BLANK');
 
END;

ProgramUnit.Name: SEND_MAIL
ProgramUnit.ProgramUnitText:
PROCEDURE send_mail ( p_cim varchar2) IS
 bname varchar2(255);
 bpath varchar2(255);
 fname varchar2(255);
 furl varchar2(2000);
 elso varchar2(5) := 'TRUE';
 out_file Text_IO.File_Type;
 fil varchar2(1000);
 dir varchar2(1000);
 cmd varchar2(2000);
 lst varchar2(4000);
 iktatoszam varchar2(30);
BEGIN
 bpath := :GLOBAL.USERID || '_' || to_char(sysdate,'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS');
 bname := bpath || '.BAT';
 iktatoszam := bpath;
 go_item('KKDOCSTAR.CHECK'); 
 first_record;
 loop
 if :KKDOCSTAR.CHECK = 'I' then
 if elso = 'TRUE' then
 out_file := Text_IO.Fopen(:GLOBAL.DOCPATH || 'mail\' || bname, 'w'); 
 Text_IO.Put_Line(out_file,'REM =====================================================================');
 Text_IO.Put_Line(out_file,'REM Címzett : ' || p_cim);
 Text_IO.Put_Line(out_file,'REM Küldő : ' || :GLOBAL.USERID);
 Text_IO.Put_Line(out_file,'REM Partner : ' || :KKPARTNER_CORE.L_NEV || ' (' || :KKPARTNER_CORE.U_PARTNER || ')' );
 Text_IO.Put_Line(out_file,'REM Dátum,idő: ' || to_char(sysdate,'YYYY.MM.DD HH24:MI:SS'));
 Text_IO.Put_Line(out_file,'REM =====================================================================');
 Text_IO.Put_Line(out_file,'CD \OraApp\Docs\mail');
 Text_IO.Put_Line(out_file,'MD ' || bpath );
 Text_IO.Put_Line(out_file,'CD ' || bpath ); 
 elso := 'FALSE';
 end if;
 
 if :KKDOCSTAR.U_FORRAS <> 'DM' then
 if length(nvl(:KKDOCSTAR.U_DOCNAME,' ')) > '4' then
 fname := :KKDOCSTAR.U_DOCID || :KKDOCSTAR.U_DOCNAME;
 else
 fname := :KKDOCSTAR.U_DOCID || UPPER(SUBSTR(:KKDOCSTAR.U_DOCNAME,LENGTH(:KKDOCSTAR.U_DOCNAME)-3,4));
 end if;
 else
 fname := :KKDOCSTAR.U_DOCID ||:KKDOCSTAR.U_DOCNAME;
 if instr(:KKDOCSTAR.U_DOCNAME,'.')=0 then
 fname := :KKDOCSTAR.U_DOCNAME || '.TIF';
 end if;
 end if; 
 
 if :KKDOCSTAR.U_URL is null then
 if :KKDOCSTAR.D_DOCID is null then
 furl := :GLOBAL.KKDOCURL || :KKDOCSTAR.U_FOLDER || '/' || :KKDOCSTAR.U_DOCID || UPPER(SUBSTR(:KKDOCSTAR.U_DOCNAME,LENGTH(:KKDOCSTAR.U_DOCNAME)-3,4));
 else 
 furl := :GLOBAL.DOCURL || :KKDOCSTAR.U_FOLDER || '/' || :KKDOCSTAR.U_DOCID || :KKDOCSTAR.U_DOCNAME;
 end if; 
 else
 --if nvl(globals.JOGIRODA,'NONE') = 'SULYOK' then 
 -- furl := replace(:KKDOCSTAR.U_URL,'mordor.lombard.hu','127.0.0.1:8081');
 --else 
 furl := :KKDOCSTAR.U_URL;
 --end if;
 furl := replace(furl,'noblob=1','noblob=0');
 furl := replace(furl,'%','%%');
 end if; 
 
 cmd := 'c:\oraapp\bin\curl -o "' || fname || '" "' || furl || '"';
 Text_IO.Put_Line(out_file, cmd );
 
 if lst is not null then
 lst := lst || ' -attach "' || fname || '"';
 else
 lst := ' -attach "' || fname || '"';
 end if; 
 end if; 
 if upper(:system.last_record)='FALSE' then
 next_record;
 else
 exit;
 end if;
 end loop;
 if elso = 'FALSE' then 
 --Text_IO.Put_Line(out_file,'CD ' || bpath );
 cmd := 'echo Lombard kintlévőségi dukumentumok - ' || :KKPARTNER_CORE.L_NEV || ' (' || :KKPARTNER_CORE.U_PARTNER || ')' || ' > subject.txt'; 
 Text_IO.Put_Line(out_file, cmd );
 cmd := :GLOBAL.BLAT || ' ' || :GLOBAL.BLATLEVEL; 
 --cmd := 'C:\OraApp\Blat262\full\Blat.exe' || ' ' || :GLOBAL.BLATLEVEL;
 cmd := cmd || ' -i ' || globals.KK_NAME || '@szeged.lombard.hu';
 cmd := cmd || ' -f ' || globals.KK_NAME || '@szeged.lombard.hu'; 
 cmd := cmd || ' -html -t ' || p_cim;
-- cmd := cmd || ' -bcc ' || globals.KK_NAME || '@szeged.lombard.hu'; 
-- cmd := cmd || ' -s ' || '"' || '=?ISO-8859-2?q?Lombard kintlévőségi dukumentumok - ' || :KKPARTNER_CORE.L_NEV || ' (' || :KKPARTNER_CORE.U_PARTNER || ')' || '?="';
 cmd := cmd || ' -sf subject.txt';
-- cmd := cmd || ' -r -d '; 
 cmd := cmd || lst || ' -q'; 
 cmd := cmd || ' -x "X-REGID: ' || iktatoszam || '"';
 Text_IO.Put_Line(out_file, cmd ); 
 Text_IO.Put_Line(out_file, 'CD ..' );
 Text_IO.Put_Line(out_file, 'RD /S /Q ' || bpath ); 
 Text_IO.Fclose (out_file); 
 
 host(:GLOBAL.DOCPATH || 'mail\' || bname,NO_SCREEN);
 end if;
 
END;

ProgramUnit.Name: PRINT_KKBEHESETI
ProgramUnit.ProgramUnitText:
PROCEDURE PRINT_KKBEHESETI (u_verazon varchar2) IS
 pid number;
 ret pls_integer;
 repid REPORT_OBJECT;
 rep varchar2(255);
 rep_status varchar(30);
 docname varchar2(500);
 docid number;
 url varchar2(4000);
 folder varchar2(30);
 params varchar2(255);
 j number;
 i number;
 u varchar2(18);
 cursor c_korai_penzbeh is
 select UGYL_ID
 from KKUGYLET
 where L_VEVO = :KKPARTNER_CORE.U_PARTNER
 and U_UGYID = :KKSZERZODES_CORE.U_UGYID
 and UGYL_TIPUS = 'KORAI PENZBEH'
 and UGYL_ST <> 'INDITAS'
 order by UGYL_ID desc; 
 v_korai_penzbeh c_korai_penzbeh%rowtype;
 
 
BEGIN 
 if :KKSZERZODES_CORE.L_SZSTATUS <> 'HATALYOS' or (:KKSZERZODES_CORE.L_FINTIP='BERLET' and :KKSZERZODES_CORE.L_SZLEJAR <= trunc(sysdate)) then
 docname := 'KKBEHESETI' || '_' || to_char(sysdate,'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS') || '.PDF';
 params := 'P_UGYVERZIO=''' || u_verazon || ''' P_SZERAZON=''' || :KKESZKOZ_CORE.L_SZERAZON || ''' P_IKTATOSZAM=''' || 'KK-01' || '''';
 insert into KKDOCSTAR (
 U_FORRAS, U_DOCTYPE, U_DOCTYPEN, U_DOCNAME, U_STATUS, 
 U_PARTNER, U_UGYID, U_SZERSZAM, U_SZERAZON, 
 DATE_CREATED, CREATED_BY, DATE_MODIFIED, MODIFIED_BY)
 values (
 :PARAMETER.KK, 'KKBEHESETI', 'Megbízás a behajtóknak', docname, 'UJ', 
 :KKPARTNER_CORE.U_PARTNER, :KKSZERZODES_CORE.U_UGYID, :KKSZERZODES_CORE.L_SZERSZAM, null,
 sysdate, :GLOBAL.USERID, sysdate, :GLOBAL.USERID
 );
 ret := "report.GET_KKDOCSTAR_IDENTITY"(docid); 
 commit;
 
 
 ret := "report.EDRMON_KKJOB" (
 :GLOBAL.USERID -- JOB-t indító Forrás SQL felhasználó kódja
 ,pid -- Porcessz ID OUTPUT --> ezzel kell hivatkozni a továbbiakban 
 ,'KKBEHESETI' -- Dokumentum típusa
 ,'KK2_KKBEHESETI_07' -- Dokumentum típus verzió
 ,docname -- Dokumentum neve
 ,docid -- Dokumentum azonosító
 ,params -- Paraméterek
 ,:KKPARTNER_CORE.U_PARTNER -- Partner 
 );
 commit;
 
 
 
 else
 if :KKUGYLET.UGYL_TIPUS <> 'KORAI PENZBEH' then
 open c_korai_penzbeh;
 fetch c_korai_penzbeh into v_korai_penzbeh;
 close c_korai_penzbeh;
 u := v_korai_penzbeh.UGYL_ID;
 else
 u := :KKUGYLET.UGYL_ID;
 end if;
 if u is not null then
 ret := "report.KK2_DOCUMENT_GEN"('KKBEH', :GLOBAL.USERID, :KKPARTNER_CORE.U_PARTNER, :KKSZERZODES_CORE.L_SZERSZAM, :KKSZERZODES_CORE.U_UGYID, :KKESZKOZ_CORE.L_SZERAZON, u, 'KKBEHESETI001', NULL, j, i, url);
 commit; 
 end if;
 end if;
/* 
 repid := find_report_object('R1'); 
 SET_REPORT_OBJECT_PROPERTY(repid, REPORT_FILENAME , :GLOBAL.REPORTS || 'KKBEHESETI_01' ); -- || '.RDF'
 SET_REPORT_OBJECT_PROPERTY(repid, REPORT_DESNAME , :GLOBAL.DOCTMP || docname ); 
 SET_REPORT_OBJECT_PROPERTY(repid, REPORT_DESFORMAT, 'PDF');
 SET_REPORT_OBJECT_PROPERTY(repid, REPORT_SERVER , :GLOBAL.REPSERVER);
 SET_REPORT_OBJECT_PROPERTY(repid, REPORT_OTHER , params );
 rep := RUN_REPORT_OBJECT(repid);
*/
 
 /*
 message(:GLOBAL.REPORTS || 'KKBEHESETI_01');
 message(:GLOBAL.DOCTMP || docname );
 message(:GLOBAL.REPSERVER);
 message('P_UGYVERZIO=''' || :KKESZKOZ_KART.U_UGYID || ''' P_SZERAZON=''' || :KKESZKOZ_CORE.L_SZERAZON || ''' P_IKTATOSZAM=''' || 'KK-01' || '''');
 */

/* 
 url := :GLOBAL.CURL || ' -F "userfile=@' || :GLOBAL.DOCTMP || docname || '" -F "P_DOCID=' || docid || '" ' || replace(:GLOBAL.KKUPLOAD,'kk.php?P_DOCID=','upload.php');
 
 host(url,NO_SCREEN);
 
 ret := "report.GET_KK_FOLDER"(docid,folder);
 
 web.show_document(:GLOBAL.KKDOCURL || folder || '/' || docid || UPPER(SUBSTR(docname,LENGTH(docname)-3,4)),'_BLANK');
 */
END;

ProgramUnit.Name: TOC
ProgramUnit.ProgramUnitText:
FUNCTION TOC (p varchar2) RETURN varchar2 IS
BEGIN
 return replace(p,'''','''''');
END;

ProgramUnit.Name: MSG
ProgramUnit.ProgramUnitText:
PROCEDURE msg (p_text varchar2) IS

n number;

BEGIN
 set_alert_property ('STOP', alert_message_text, p_text);
 n := show_alert('STOP'); 
END;

ProgramUnit.Name: NAV_KKLSZKAR_CTRL
ProgramUnit.ProgramUnitText:
PROCEDURE NAV_KKLSZKAR_CTRL (p_itm varchar2) IS
BEGIN
 if p_itm = 'GO_VISSZA' then
 Hide_Window( :System.Event_Window );
 go_item(GLOBALS.KKLSZKAR_HIVO);
 end if;
END;

ProgramUnit.Name: ERTMOD_SET
ProgramUnit.ProgramUnitText:
PROCEDURE ertmod_set IS
 idegenbiz_fld1 varchar2(200):= 'EM_IB_PARTNER,EM_IB_NEV,EM_IB_ERTKEZD,EM_IB_HATIDO';
 idegenbiz_fld2 varchar2(200):= 'EM_IB_PARTNER,EM_IB_NEV,EM_IB_ERTKEZD,EM_IB_HATIDO,EM_IB_ERTVEGE';
 sajatbiz_fld varchar2(200):= 'EM_SB_BIZOM,EM_SB_ERTKEZD,EM_SB_HATIDO';
 idegenopcio_fld varchar2(200):= 'EM_OI_JOGOSULT,EM_OI_LEHIVDAT,EM_OI_ELSZKEZD,EM_OI_ELSZHIDO';
 sajatopcio_fld varchar2(200):= 'EM_OS_JOGOSULT,EM_OS_LEHIVDAT,EM_OS_ELSZKEZD,EM_OS_ELSZHIDO';
 feltadasvhat_fld varchar2(200):= 'EM_FA_JOGOSULT,EM_FA_AVHATALY,EM_FA_ELSZKEZD,EM_FA_ELSZHIDO';
 blk varchar2(30);
 em varchar(30);
BEGIN 
 
 blk := 'KKESZKOZ_KART';
 em := :KKESZKOZ_KART.EM_ERTMOD;

 set_fldgrp_req_off (blk, 'EM_ERTMOD');
 set_fldgrp_req_off (blk, idegenbiz_fld1);
 set_fldgrp_req_off (blk, idegenbiz_fld2);
 set_fldgrp_req_off (blk, sajatbiz_fld);
 set_fldgrp_req_off (blk, idegenopcio_fld);
 set_fldgrp_req_off (blk, sajatopcio_fld);
 set_fldgrp_req_off (blk, feltadasvhat_fld);

 if get_item_property('KKESZKOZ_KART.EM_ERTMOD',UPDATE_ALLOWED) = 'FALSE' or nvl(:KKSZERZODES_CORE.L_FINTIP,'X') <> 'HITEL' then
 return;
 end if;
 
 if nvl(em,'!') > '!' then
 set_fldgrp_get(blk, idegenopcio_fld); 
 set_fldgrp_get(blk, sajatopcio_fld);
 set_fldgrp_get(blk, feltadasvhat_fld);
 end if;

 if em = 'IDEGENBIZ' then
 set_fldgrp_get (blk, idegenbiz_fld1); 
 set_fldgrp_req (blk, idegenbiz_fld1);
 set_fldgrp_null (blk, sajatbiz_fld,idegenopcio_fld,sajatopcio_fld,feltadasvhat_fld);
 
 elsif em = 'SAJATBIZ' then
 set_fldgrp_get (blk, sajatbiz_fld);
 set_fldgrp_req (blk, sajatbiz_fld);
 set_fldgrp_null (blk, idegenbiz_fld2,idegenopcio_fld,sajatopcio_fld,feltadasvhat_fld);
 
 elsif em = 'IDEGENOPCIO' then
 set_fldgrp_get (blk, idegenopcio_fld);
 set_fldgrp_req (blk, idegenopcio_fld);
 set_fldgrp_null (blk, sajatbiz_fld,idegenbiz_fld2,sajatopcio_fld,feltadasvhat_fld);
 
 elsif em = 'SAJATOPCIO' then
 set_fldgrp_get (blk, sajatopcio_fld);
 set_fldgrp_req (blk, sajatopcio_fld);
 set_fldgrp_null (blk, sajatbiz_fld,idegenbiz_fld2,idegenopcio_fld,feltadasvhat_fld);
 if :EM_OS_LEHIVDAT is null then
 :EM_OS_LEHIVDAT := :KKSZERZODES_CORE.L_FELMDAT;
 end if;
 
 elsif em = 'FELTADASVHAT' then
 set_fldgrp_get (blk, feltadasvhat_fld);
 set_fldgrp_req (blk, feltadasvhat_fld);
 set_fldgrp_null (blk, sajatbiz_fld,idegenbiz_fld2,idegenopcio_fld,sajatopcio_fld);
 
 elsif nvl(em,'!') <= '!' then
 set_fldgrp_null (blk, idegenbiz_fld1,idegenbiz_fld2,sajatbiz_fld,idegenopcio_fld);
 set_fldgrp_null (blk, sajatopcio_fld,feltadasvhat_fld,'','');
 --KK2 :SETSTATUS.ERTMODNEV := null;
 end if; 
 
END;

ProgramUnit.Name: SET_FLDGRP_REQ
ProgramUnit.ProgramUnitText:
PROCEDURE set_fldgrp_req (blk varchar2, field_list varchar2) IS

aktfld varchar2(50);
vfield_list varchar2(500);

BEGIN
 vfield_list := field_list || ',';
 
 while length(vfield_list) > 1 loop
 aktfld := blk || '.' ||substr(vfield_list,1,instr(vfield_list,',')-1);
 
 -- msg(aktfld);
 
 set_item_property (aktfld, enabled, property_true);
 set_item_property (aktfld, navigable, property_true);
 set_item_property (aktfld, required, property_true);
 set_item_property (aktfld, background_color, 'r255g224b128');
 set_item_property (aktfld, prompt_foreground_color, 'r255g0b0');
 
 -- msg(vfield_list);
 
 vfield_list := substr(vfield_list, length(aktfld)-length(blk)+1, length(vfield_list)-length(aktfld)+length(blk));
 
 -- msg(vfield_list);
 
 end loop; 
 
END;

ProgramUnit.Name: SET_FLDGRP_NULL
ProgramUnit.ProgramUnitText:
PROCEDURE set_fldgrp_null (blk varchar2, field_list1 varchar2, field_list2 varchar2, field_list3 varchar2, field_list4 varchar2 ) IS

aktfld varchar2(50);
vfield_list varchar2(500);

BEGIN
 /*
 for i in 1..4 loop
 msg (name_in('field_list' || to_char(i,'FM9')));
 
 copy (name_in('field_list' || to_char(i,'FM9')), vfield_list);*/
 
 vfield_list := field_list1 || ',';
 
 while length(vfield_list) > 1 loop
 aktfld := blk || '.' || substr(vfield_list,1,instr(vfield_list,',')-1);
-- copy (NULL, aktfld);
 set_item_property (aktfld, required, property_false);
 set_item_property (aktfld, enabled, property_false);
 set_item_property (aktfld, prompt_foreground_color, 'r0g0b0');
 set_item_property (aktfld, background_color, 'r255g255b255');
 vfield_list := substr(vfield_list, length(aktfld)-length(blk)+1, length(vfield_list)-length(aktfld)+length(blk));
 end loop;
 
 vfield_list := field_list2 || ',';
 
 while length(vfield_list) > 1 loop
 aktfld := blk || '.' || substr(vfield_list,1,instr(vfield_list,',')-1);
-- copy (NULL, aktfld);
 set_item_property (aktfld, required, property_false);
 set_item_property (aktfld, enabled, property_false);
 set_item_property (aktfld, prompt_foreground_color, 'r0g0b0');
 set_item_property (aktfld, background_color, 'r255g255b255');
 vfield_list := substr(vfield_list, length(aktfld)-length(blk)+1, length(vfield_list)-length(aktfld)+length(blk)); 
 end loop; 
 
 vfield_list := field_list3 || ',';
 
 while length(vfield_list) > 1 loop
 aktfld := blk || '.' || substr(vfield_list,1,instr(vfield_list,',')-1);
-- copy (NULL, aktfld);
 set_item_property (aktfld, required, property_false);
 set_item_property (aktfld, enabled, property_false);
 set_item_property (aktfld, prompt_foreground_color, 'r0g0b0');
 set_item_property (aktfld, background_color, 'r255g255b255');
 vfield_list := substr(vfield_list, length(aktfld)-length(blk)+1, length(vfield_list)-length(aktfld)+length(blk)); 
 end loop; 
 
 vfield_list := field_list4 || ',';
 
 while length(vfield_list) > 1 loop
 aktfld := blk || '.' || substr(vfield_list,1,instr(vfield_list,',')-1);
-- copy (NULL, aktfld);
 set_item_property (aktfld, required, property_false);
 set_item_property (aktfld, enabled, property_false);
 set_item_property (aktfld, prompt_foreground_color, 'r0g0b0');
 set_item_property (aktfld, background_color, 'r255g255b255');
 vfield_list := substr(vfield_list, length(aktfld)-length(blk)+1, length(vfield_list)-length(aktfld)+length(blk)); 
 end loop; 
 
 --end loop; 
 
END;

ProgramUnit.Name: CMDGLB
ProgramUnit.ProgramUnitText:
PACKAGE BODY CMDGLB IS
 --
 -- Pre trigger item
 --

 procedure pre_tri_item as
 blk varchar2(30);
 blkitm varchar2(61);
 begin
 if rec.editmode is null then
 return;
 end if; 

 blk := name_in('system.trigger_block');
 if get_block_property(blk,INSERT_ALLOWED) = 'FALSE' and get_block_property(blk,UPDATE_ALLOWED) = 'FALSE' then
 return;
 end if;
 blkitm := name_in('system.trigger_item');
 
 if get_item_property(blkitm,VISIBLE)='TRUE' and get_item_property(blkitm,ENABLED)='TRUE' then
 set_item_instance_property( blkitm, CURRENT_RECORD, VISUAL_ATTRIBUTE, 'CG$SELECTED_ITEM' );
 end if;
 end; 

 --
 -- Post trigger item
 --

 procedure post_tri_item as
 blk varchar2(30);
 blkitm varchar2(61); 
 begin
 blk := name_in('system.trigger_block'); 
 blkitm := :system.trigger_item;
 if get_item_property(blkitm,VISIBLE)='TRUE' and get_item_property(blkitm,ENABLED)='TRUE' then
 set_item_instance_property( blkitm, CURRENT_RECORD, VISUAL_ATTRIBUTE, '' ); -- get_item_property(blkitm, VISUAL_ATTRIBUTE)
 end if;
 end; 


 --
 -- Pre cursor item
 --

 procedure pre_cur_item as
 blk varchar2(30);
 blkitm varchar2(61);
 begin 
 if rec.editmode is null then
 return;
 end if; 

 blk := name_in('system.cursor_block');
 if get_block_property(blk,INSERT_ALLOWED) = 'FALSE' and get_block_property(blk,UPDATE_ALLOWED) = 'FALSE' then
 return;
 end if;
 blkitm := name_in('system.cursor_item');
 
 if get_item_property(blkitm,VISIBLE)='TRUE' and get_item_property(blkitm,ENABLED)='TRUE' then
 set_item_instance_property( blkitm, CURRENT_RECORD, VISUAL_ATTRIBUTE, 'CG$SELECTED_ITEM' );
 end if;
 end; 

 --
 -- Post cursor item
 --

 procedure post_cur_item as
 blk varchar2(30);
 blkitm varchar2(61);
 begin
 blk := name_in('system.cursor_block');
 
 blkitm := name_in('system.cursor_item');
 if get_item_property(blkitm,VISIBLE)='TRUE' and get_item_property(blkitm,ENABLED)='TRUE' then
 set_item_instance_property( blkitm, CURRENT_RECORD, VISUAL_ATTRIBUTE, '' ); -- get_item_property(blkitm, VISUAL_ATTRIBUTE)
 end if;
 end; 

 -- 
 -- Következő item
 --

 procedure key_next_item as
 a varchar2(61);
 i varchar2(61); 
 r varchar2(5) := 'FALSE';
 n varchar2(5) := 'FALSE';
 g varchar2(5) := 'TRUE';
 begin
 -- Csak akkor ha karbantartásban vagyunk
 --if (name_in('system.mode') IN ('QUERY' , 'ENTER-QUERY'))
 -- or (name_in('system.record_status') = 'QUERY')
 -- or (name_in('system.record_status') = 'NEW' and get_block_property(rec.aktblk,INSERT_ALLOWED)='FALSE' ) then
 if rec.editmode is null then
 next_item;
 rec.set_new_cur;
 rec.set_akt_new; 
 return; 
 end if;

 -- Ha az aktuális item kötelező és nincs kitöltve kilépünk
 if rec.aktreq = 'TRUE' then
 if name_in(rec.aktitm) is null then
 raise form_trigger_failure;
 end if;
 end if;
 
 if cmdfrm.item_post(rec.aktitm) = 'FALSE' then
 raise form_trigger_failure;
 end if; 
 
 -- Ha az aktuális item kötelező volt akkor azt visszaállítjuk
 rec.set_reqakt_on;
 
 -- Kiválasztjuk a következő navigálható és karbantartható item-et 
 i := GET_NEXTITEM(rec.aktitm);
 if i is not null then
 loop
 n := 'FALSE';
 g := 'FALSE';
 if get_item_property(i,ITEM_TYPE) in ('BUTTON','CHECKBOX','LIST','RADIO GROUP','TEXT ITEM') then
 if get_item_property(i,NAVIGABLE)='TRUE' and get_item_property(i,ENABLED)='TRUE' then
 r := rec.get_prevreq(i);
 g := cmdfrm.item_get(i);
 n := 'TRUE'; 
 end if;
 end if; 
 
 if r = 'FALSE' and n = 'TRUE' and g = 'TRUE' then
 a := i;
 exit;
 end if;
 if i = GET_LASTITEM(rec.aktblk) then
 exit;
 end if;
 i := GET_NEXTITEM(i);
 end loop;
 end if;
 
 -- Aktuálissá tesszük az a-t
 if a is not null then
 go_item(a); 
 --rec.set_new_cur;
 --rec.set_akt_new; 
 --rec.set_reqakt_off;
 else
 if r = 'FALSE' then
 --go_item(GET_LASTITEM(rec.aktblk));
 --if name_in('system.record_status') in ('CHANGED','INSERT') then
 if CMDFRM.item_post(rec.aktitm) = 'TRUE' then
-- message('key_next_itemf'); 
 do_key('COMMIT_FORM'); 
 else
 raise form_trigger_failure;
 end if;
 --end if;
 next_item;
 else
 rec.set_reqakt_off;
 raise form_trigger_failure;
 end if;
 end if;
 
 end; 

 -- 
 -- Előző item
 --

 procedure key_prev_item as 
 a varchar2(61);
 i varchar2(61);
 r varchar2(5) := 'FALSE';
 n varchar2(5) := 'FALSE';
 g varchar2(5) := 'TRUE'; 
 begin
 -- Csak akkor ha karbantartásban vagyunk
 --if (name_in('system.mode') IN ('QUERY' , 'ENTER-QUERY'))
 -- or (name_in('system.record_status') = 'QUERY')
 -- or (name_in('system.record_status') = 'NEW' and get_block_property(rec.aktblk,INSERT_ALLOWED)='FALSE' ) then
 if rec.editmode is null then
 previous_item;
 rec.set_new_cur;
 rec.set_akt_new;
 return;
 end if;
 
 -- Kiválasztjuk a következő navigálható és karbantartható item-et 
 i := GET_PREVITEM(rec.aktitm);
 if i is not null then
 loop 
 n := 'FALSE';
 g := 'FALSE';
 if get_item_property(i,ITEM_TYPE) in ('BUTTON','CHECKBOX','LIST','RADIO GROUP','TEXT ITEM') then
 if get_item_property(i,NAVIGABLE)='TRUE' and get_item_property(i,ENABLED)='TRUE' then
 r := rec.get_prevreq(i);
 g := cmdfrm.item_get(i);
 n := 'TRUE';
 end if;
 end if; 
 
 if r = 'FALSE' and n = 'TRUE' and g = 'TRUE' then
 a := i;
 exit;
 end if;
 if i = GET_FIRSTITEM(rec.aktblk) then
 exit;
 end if;
 i := GET_PREVITEM(i);
 end loop;
 end if;
 
 -- Aktuálissá tesszük az a-t, ha van
 if a is not null then 
 go_item(a);
 rec.set_reqakt_on; -- Az előző itemet visszaállítjuk kötelezővé
 rec.set_new_cur;
 rec.set_akt_new; 
 rec.set_reqakt_off;
 else
 --go_item(GET_FIRSTITEM(rec.aktblk));
 rec.set_reqakt_on; -- Az előző itemet visszaállítjuk kötelezővé
 previous_item;
 end if;
 
 end;
 
 
 --
 -- Következő rekord
 --
 
 procedure key_next_record as
 begin
 if rec.editmode is not null then 
-- message('key_next_record'); 
 do_key('COMMIT_FORM');
 end if;
 next_record;
 mnu.dml_off;
 end;

 --
 -- Előző rekord
 --
 
 procedure key_prev_record as
 begin
 if rec.editmode is not null then 
-- message('key_prev_record');
 do_key('COMMIT_FORM');
 end if;
 previous_record;
 mnu.dml_off;
 end;

 --
 -- Következő block
 --


 procedure key_next_block as
 begin
 if rec.editmode is not null then
-- message('key_next_block'); 
 do_key('COMMIT_FORM');
 end if;
 next_block;
 end;

 --
 -- Előző block
 --

 procedure key_prev_block as
 begin
 if rec.editmode is not null then
-- message('key_prev_block'); 
 do_key('COMMIT_FORM');
 end if;
 previous_block;
 end;

 --
 -- Kilépés a form-ból
 --

 procedure key_exit as
 begin
 mnu.query_off;
 exit_form; 
 end;
 
 -- 
 -- Új block
 --
 
 procedure when_new_block as
 blk varchar2(30);
 begin
 blk := name_in('system.trigger_block');
 if rec.editmode is not null then --name_in('system.form_status')='CHANGED' then
 go_item(rec.aktitm);
 raise form_trigger_failure;
 /*
 do_key('COMMIT_FORM');
 if not FORM_SUCCESS then
 go_block(rec.aktblk);
 raise form_trigger_failure;
 end if; 
 */
 end if;
 rec.set_itmlst;
 set_block_property(blk,insert_allowed,property_false);
 set_block_property(blk,update_allowed,property_false);
 set_block_property(blk,delete_allowed,property_false); 
 mnu.dml_off;
 end;

 -- 
 -- Új record
 --

 procedure when_new_record as
 begin
 if rec.editmode is not null then --name_in('system.form_status') = 'CHANGED' then
/* 
message('aktblk : ' || nvl(rec.aktblk,'NULL')); 
message('system.cursor_block : ' || nvl(name_in('system.cursor_block'),'NULL'));
message('system.record_status : ' || nvl(name_in('system.record_status'),'NULL'));
message('rec.editmode : ' || nvl(rec.editmode,'NULL'));
*/
 if rec.aktblk <> name_in('system.cursor_block') then
 go_item(rec.aktitm);
 raise form_trigger_failure;
 end if;
 
 if rec.editmode = 'FELVITEL' 
 and name_in('system.record_status') in ('NEW','INSERT') 
 and to_number(name_in('system.trigger_record')) = rec.aktrec 
 then
 return;
 end if;

 if rec.editmode = 'MODOSITAS' 
 and rec.aktblk = name_in('system.cursor_block')
 and to_number(name_in('system.trigger_record')) = rec.aktrec 
 then
 return;
 end if;
 
 if name_in('system.trigger_block') <> rec.aktblk or to_number(name_in('system.trigger_record')) <> rec.aktrec then
 go_item(rec.aktitm);
 if :system.cursor_record <> rec.aktrec then
 go_record(rec.aktrec);
 end if;
 raise form_trigger_failure; 
 return;
 end if; 
 
 if FORM_SUCCESS then 
--message('when_new_record');
 do_key('COMMIT_FORM'); 
/*
 else
 if rec.aktblk is not null then
 if name_in('system.trigger_block') <> rec.aktblk then
 go_block(rec.aktblk);
 end if;
 if to_number(name_in('system.trigger_record')) <> rec.aktrec then
 go_record(rec.aktrec);
 end if;
 end if;
 raise form_trigger_failure; 
*/ 
 end if; 
 end if;
 
 if :system.record_status = 'QUERY' then
 rec.save;
 end if; 
 mnu.dml_off;
 if rec.editmode is null then 
 set_edit_menu;
 end if;
 end;
 
 -- 
 -- Új item
 --
 
 procedure when_new_item as
 begin 
 --
 -- Ha nem abban a blokkban vagyunk mint az akt akkor vissza
 --

 if rec.editmode is not null and rec.aktblk <> name_in('system.cursor_block') then
 go_item(rec.aktitm);
 raise form_trigger_failure;
 end if;

 -- Ha az előző item kötelező volt akkor azt visszaállítjuk
 rec.set_reqakt_on;

 -- Beállítjuk a new változókat
 rec.set_new_tri;
 
 -- Ha nem karbantartásban vagyunk kilépünk
 if rec.editmode is null then
 rec.set_akt_new;
 return;
 end if;
 
 --
 -- Post aktitm
 --
 
 if rec.aktitm <> rec.newitm and cmdfrm.item_post(rec.aktitm) = 'FALSE' then
 rec.set_reqnew_off;
 go_item(rec.aktitm);
 rec.set_reqnew_on;
 rec.set_new_akt;
 raise form_trigger_failure;
 end if;

 --
 -- Pre newitm
 --
 
 if cmdfrm.item_pre(rec.newitm) = 'FALSE' then
 rec.set_reqnew_off;
 go_item(rec.aktitm);
 rec.set_reqnew_on;
 rec.set_new_akt;
 raise form_trigger_failure;
 end if;
 
 -- Megnézzük, hogy az új item :
 -- 1. navigálható-e (van-e előtte ki nem töltött kötelező mező)
 -- 2. karbantartható-e
 -- ha fentiek közül valamelyik nem teljesül visszalépünk az aktitm-re
 
 if rec.get_prevreq = 'TRUE' then
 rec.set_reqnew_off;
 go_item(rec.aktitm);
 rec.set_reqnew_on;
 rec.set_new_akt;
 raise form_trigger_failure;
 end if;
 
 if cmdfrm.item_get(rec.newitm) = 'FALSE' then
 rec.set_reqnew_off;
 go_item(rec.aktitm);
 rec.set_reqnew_on;
 rec.set_new_akt;
 raise form_trigger_failure;
 end if; 
 
 -- Aktuálissá tesszük a newitm-et
 rec.set_akt_new;
 
 -- Kikapcsoljuk a kötelező opciót
 rec.set_reqakt_off;
 end;
 
 -- 
 -- Rekord elhagyása
 --
 
 procedure post_record as
 begin
 if rec.editmode is null then
 return;
 end if;
 if rec.editmode = 'FELVITEL' and name_in('system.record_status')='NEW' and rec.aktblk = name_in('system.cursor_block') then
 raise form_trigger_failure;
 end if;
 rec.set_reqakt_on; 
 if name_in('system.form_status') = 'CHANGED' then
 rec.validate_record;
 Validate(record_scope);
 if not Form_Success then 
 raise form_trigger_failure;
 end if;
 end if; 
 end;

 --
 -- Rekord felvitel
 --
 
 procedure key_crerec as
 itm varchar2(61);
 ok varchar2(61);
 begin
 if rec.editmode is not null then
 raise form_trigger_failure;
 return;
 end if; 
 if CMDFRM.func_enabled('FELVITEL') = 'TRUE' then
 last_record;
 set_block_property(name_in('system.trigger_block'),insert_allowed,property_true);
 if name_in('system.record_status')<>'NEW' then
 create_record;
 end if;
 rec.editmode := 'FELVITEL';
 rec.set_new_cur;
 itm := GET_FIRSTITEM(rec.newitm);
 loop
 if CMDFRM.item_get(itm) = 'TRUE' then
 ok := itm;
 exit;
 end if; 
 if itm = GET_LASTITEM(itm) then
 exit;
 end if;
 itm := GET_NEXTITEM(itm); 
 end loop;
 if nvl(ok,rec.newitm) <> rec.newitm then 
 go_item(ok);
 end if;
 rec.set_new_cur;
 rec.set_akt_new;
 pre_cur_item;
 mnu.dml_on;
 if CMDFRM.record_init ( rec.aktblk ) = 'FALSE' then
 undo_record;
 end if; 
 set_edit_spec_menu;
 --if CMDFRM.item_get(rec.newitm) = 'FALSE' then
 -- key_next_item;
 --end if;
 --when_new_item; 
 end if;
 end;
 
 --
 -- Rekord editálása
 --
 
 procedure edit_record as
 itm varchar2(61);
 elso varchar2(5) := 'TRUE';
 ok varchar2(61); 
 i number := 0;
 begin
 if rec.editmode is not null then
 raise form_trigger_failure;
 return;
 end if; 
 if CMDFRM.func_enabled('MODOSITAS') = 'TRUE' then
 set_block_property(:system.cursor_block,update_allowed,property_true);
 rec.editmode := 'MODOSITAS';
 --set_record_property(:system.cursor_record,:system.cursor_block,status,CHANGED_STATUS);
 rec.set_new_cur;
 rec.set_akt_new;
 itm := rec.newitm;
 loop
 i := i + 1;
 if i > 1000 then
 message('Hiba: edit_record itm = ' || nvl(itm,'NULL') || '!');
 exit;
 end if; 
 if CMDFRM.item_get(itm) = 'TRUE' then
 ok := itm;
 exit;
 end if; 
 if elso = 'TRUE' then 
 itm := GET_FIRSTITEM(itm);
 end if;
 if itm = GET_LASTITEM(itm) then
 exit;
 end if;
 if elso = 'TRUE' then
 elso := 'FALSE';
 else
 itm := GET_NEXTITEM(itm);
 end if;
 end loop;
 if i > 1000 then
 raise form_trigger_failure;
 return;
 end if;
 
 if nvl(ok,rec.newitm) <> rec.newitm then
 go_item(ok);
 rec.set_new_cur;
 rec.set_akt_new;
 end if;
 pre_cur_item;
 mnu.dml_on;
 if CMDFRM.record_init ( rec.aktblk ) = 'FALSE' then
 undo_record;
 end if;
 set_edit_spec_menu;
 else
 raise form_trigger_failure;
 end if;
 end;
 
 
 
 --
 -- Rekord törlése
 --
 
 procedure key_delrec as
 blk varchar2(30);
 tbl varchar2(30);
 cmd varchar2(200);
 rid rowid;
 begin
 if rec.editmode is not null then
 raise form_trigger_failure;
 return;
 end if; 
 blk := name_in('system.trigger_block');
 if name_in('system.record_status') in ('NEW','INSERT') then
 raise form_trigger_failure;
 end if;
 if CMDFRM.func_enabled('TORLES') = 'TRUE' then
 if GET_ALERT('NEMIGEN','Biztos, hogy törli a tételt ?') = ALERT_BUTTON1 then 
 set_block_property(blk,update_allowed,property_true);
 set_block_property(blk,delete_allowed,property_true); 
 if get_block_property(blk,query_data_source_type)='TABLE' then
 tbl := get_block_property(blk,query_data_source_name);
 --rid := name_in( blk || '.' || 'ROWID');
 --cmd := 'delete from ' || tbl || ' where rowid = ''' || name_in( blk || '.' || 'ROWID') || '''';
 --forms_ddl( cmd );
 delete_record;
 if not FORM_SUCCESS then
 rollback;
 set_block_property(blk,update_allowed,property_false);
 set_block_property(blk,delete_allowed,property_false);
 message('Hiba: A rekord nem törölhető (létezik hozzá élő hivatkozás) !'); 
 raise form_trigger_failure; 
 else
-- message('key_delrec'); 
 commit_form;
 end if;
 end if;
 rec.editmode := null;
 post_cur_item;
 set_block_property(blk,update_allowed,property_false);
 set_block_property(blk,delete_allowed,property_false);
 set_edit_spec_menu;
 end if; 
 end if;
 end;

 --
 -- Rekord duplikálása
 --

 procedure key_duprec as
 i number;
 ii number;
 vv varchar2(2000);
 aa varchar2(4000);
 itm varchar2(30);
 blk varchar2(30);
 fldlst varchar2(2000);
 aktval varchar2(4000);
 begin 
 blk := name_in('system.trigger_block');
 if CMDFRM.func_enabled ('FELVITEL') = 'TRUE' then
 fldlst := CMDFRM.get_duprec_fld ( blk );
 if fldlst = 'NONE' or fldlst is null then
 raise form_trigger_failure;
 elsif fldlst = 'ALL' then
 fldlst := rec.itmlst; 
 end if;
 --rec.set_itmlst;
 --rec.save;
 
 aktval := rec.aktval1; 
 key_crerec;
 rec.aktval := aktval;
 fldlst := fldlst || ',';
 aa := replace(rec.aktval,'¤',',');
 rec.aktval := aa;
 loop
 i := instr(nvl(fldlst,' '),',');
 if i <= 1 then
 exit;
 end if;
 itm := substr(fldlst,1,i-1);
 ii := VLIST.getindex ( rec.itmlst, itm );
 vv := VLIST.getchar ( aa, ii);
 if itm not in ('DATE_CREATED','CREATED_BY','CREATED_SUB_ID','CREATED_MOD_ID',
 'DATE_MODIFIED','MODIFIED_BY','MODIFIED_SUB_ID','MODIFIED_MOD_ID') then
 copy ( vv, itm ); 
 set_record_property(name_in('system.cursor_record'),rec.aktblk,STATUS,NEW_STATUS);
 end if;
 fldlst := substr(fldlst,i+1); 
 end loop;
 else
 raise form_trigger_failure;
 end if;
 set_record_property(name_in('system.cursor_record'),rec.aktblk,STATUS,NEW_STATUS);
 end;

 
 --
 -- Rekord rögzítése
 --
 
 procedure commit_record as
 fs varchar2(15);
 hiba number;
 begin 
 fs := name_in('system.form_status');
 if rec.editmode is not null or fs = 'CHANGED' then
 rec.set_reqakt_on;
 -- msg(fs);
 if fs = 'CHANGED' then
 begin
 rec.validate_record; 
 exception 
 when others then
 raise form_trigger_failure;
 return;
 end;
 end if;
 
 -- msg('validated');
 
 if fs = 'CHANGED' then
 begin 
 commit_form; 
 exception
 when others then 
 return;
 end;
 if not FORM_SUCCESS or name_in('system.form_status') in ('CHANGED','NEW') then 
 /*
 if not FORM_SUCCESS then
 msg('not FORM_SUCCESS');
 end if;
 msg(name_in('system.form_status'));*/
 rec.set_reqakt_off;
 hiba := get_alert('STOP',
 'Hiba : ' || ERROR_TYPE || '-' || TO_CHAR(ERROR_CODE) || ' ' || ERROR_TEXT 
 || ' ' || DBMS_ERROR_CODE || ' ' || DBMS_ERROR_TEXT 
 );
 raise form_trigger_failure;
 end if; 
 end if;
 set_block_property(:system.trigger_block,insert_allowed,property_false);
 set_block_property(:system.trigger_block,update_allowed,property_false);
 set_block_property(:system.trigger_block,delete_allowed,property_false); 
 post_cur_item;
 rec.editmode := NULL; 
 rec.save;
 mnu.dml_off;
 set_edit_menu;
 end if;
 end;

 procedure undo_record as
 begin
 if rec.editmode is null then
 return;
 end if;

 rec.undo;
 post_cur_item;
 mnu.dml_off;
 set_edit_menu;
 end;

 procedure enter_qry as
 begin
 if rec.editmode is null then
 mnu.query_on;
 enter_query;
 mnu.dml_off;
 end if; 
 end;
 
 procedure execute_qry as
 begin
 if rec.editmode is null then
 execute_query;
 mnu.query_off;
 mnu.dml_off;
 end if; 
 end;


 --
 -- set_enabled_functions
 --


 procedure set_enabled_functions ( funclist varchar2 ) as
 begin
 enabled_functions := funclist;
 end;
 
 
 --
 -- Is function enabled
 --

 function is_func_enabled ( func varchar2 ) return varchar2 as -- Funkció hívás engedélyezés / tiltás 
 al number;
 r varchar2(5) := 'FALSE';
 begin
 --if app_session.get_func_enabled ( func ) = 'TRUE' then
 if instr(enabled_functions,','||func||',') > 0 then 
 r := CMDFRM.func_enabled ( func );
 if instr(r,'FALSE:')>0 then
 al := GET_ALERT('STOP',substr(r,instr(r,':')+1));
 r := 'FALSE';
 end if;
 end if;
 return r; 
 end;

 --
 -- Set standard + spec edit menu item enabled / disabled
 --

 procedure set_edit_menu as
 ii menuitem;
 i varchar2(61);
 x number;
 begin
 ii := find_menu_item('EDIT.R_INSERT');
 if not id_null(ii) then 
 if is_func_enabled('FELVITEL')='TRUE' then 
 set_menu_item_property(ii,enabled,property_true);
 else
 set_menu_item_property(ii,enabled,property_false); 
 end if;
 end if;
 ii := find_menu_item('EDIT.R_EDIT');
 if not id_null(ii) then 
 if is_func_enabled('MODOSITAS')='TRUE' and name_in('system.record_status')<>'NEW' then
 set_menu_item_property(ii,enabled,property_true);
 else
 set_menu_item_property(ii,enabled,property_false); 
 end if;
 end if;
 ii := find_menu_item('EDIT.R_REMOVE');
 if not id_null(ii) then 
 --if is_func_enabled('TORLES')='TRUE' and name_in('system.record_status')<>'NEW' then
 IF instr(enabled_functions,',TORLES,') > 0 and name_in('system.record_status')<>'NEW' then 
 set_menu_item_property(ii,enabled,property_true);
 else
 set_menu_item_property(ii,enabled,property_false); 
 end if;
 end if;
 ii := find_menu_item('EDIT.R_DUPLICATE');
 if not id_null(ii) then 
 if cmdfrm.get_duprec_fld ( rec.aktblk ) <> 'NONE' and name_in('system.record_status')<>'NEW' then
 set_menu_item_property(ii,enabled,property_true);
 else
 set_menu_item_property(ii,enabled,property_false); 
 end if;
 end if; 
 set_edit_spec_menu;
 end;
 

 --
 -- Set spec edit menu item enabled / disabled
 --
 
 procedure set_edit_spec_menu as
 ii menuitem;
 i varchar2(61);
 x number;
 z number;
 begin
 for z in 1..4 loop 
 ii := find_menu_item('MAIN.SPEC' || to_char(z));
 if not id_null(ii) then 
 if get_menu_item_property('MAIN.SPEC' || to_char(z),VISIBLE)='TRUE' then
 for x in 1..25 loop
 i := 'SPEC' || to_char(z) || '.SPEC'||to_char(x,'FM09'); 
 if get_menu_item_property(i,VISIBLE)='TRUE' then
 if is_func_enabled(i)='TRUE' then
 --if instr(enabled_functions,','||i||',') > 0 then
 set_menu_item_property(i,enabled,property_true);
 else
 set_menu_item_property(i,enabled,property_false); 
 end if;
 end if;
 end loop;
 end if;
 end if; 
 end loop;
 end;
 
END;

ProgramUnit.Name: SET_FLDGRP_REQ_OFF
ProgramUnit.ProgramUnitText:
PROCEDURE set_fldgrp_req_off (blk varchar2, field_list varchar2) IS
aktfld varchar2(50);
vfield_list varchar2(500);

BEGIN
vfield_list := field_list || ',';
 
 while length(vfield_list) > 1 loop
 aktfld := blk || '.' ||substr(vfield_list,1,instr(vfield_list,',')-1);
 
 -- msg(aktfld);
 
 set_item_property (aktfld, required, property_false);
 set_item_property (aktfld, background_color, 'white');
 set_item_property (aktfld, prompt_foreground_color, 'black');
 
 -- msg(vfield_list);
 
 vfield_list := substr(vfield_list, length(aktfld)-length(blk)+1, length(vfield_list)-length(aktfld)+length(blk));
 
 -- msg(vfield_list);
 
 end loop; 
 
END;

ProgramUnit.Name: STATUS_VALID
ProgramUnit.ProgramUnitText:
FUNCTION STATUS_VALID return varchar2 IS

cursor c_status (CP_U_STATUS varchar2, CP_L_SZSTATUS varchar2, 
CP_S_KKBEH_ST varchar2, CP_S_KKER_ST varchar2, CP_E_KKBEH_ST varchar2,
CP_E_KKER_ST varchar2) is select rtrim(U_VALID) U_VALID from "report".KKSTATUS
where U_STATUS = CP_U_STATUS
and L_SZSTATUS = CP_L_SZSTATUS
and S_KKBEH_ST = CP_S_KKBEH_ST
and S_KKER_ST = CP_S_KKER_ST
and E_KKBEH_ST = CP_E_KKBEH_ST
and E_KKER_ST = CP_E_KKER_ST;

v_status c_status%rowtype;

VS_KKBEH_ST varchar2(13);
VS_KKER_ST varchar2(13);
VE_KKBEH_ST varchar2(13);
VE_KKER_ST varchar2(13);

n number;

BEGIN
 if globals.KK_NAME = 'KKBEH' then
 --KK2 VS_KKBEH_ST := :SETSTATUS.U_SZERST;
 VS_KKER_ST := :KKSZERZODES_KART.U_KKER_ST;
 --KK2 VE_KKBEH_ST := :SETSTATUS.U_ESZST;
 VE_KKER_ST := :KKESZKOZ_KART.U_KKER_ST;
 elsif globals.KK_NAME = 'KKER' then
 VS_KKBEH_ST := :KKSZERZODES_KART.U_KKBEH_ST;
 --KK2 VS_KKER_ST := :SETSTATUS.U_SZERST;
 VE_KKBEH_ST := :KKESZKOZ_KART.U_KKBEH_ST;
 --KK2 VE_KKER_ST := :SETSTATUS.U_ESZST;
 end if;
 
 open c_status (:KKSZERZODES_CORE.U_STATUS, :KKSZERZODES_CORE.L_SZSTATUS, VS_KKBEH_ST , VS_KKER_ST , 
 VE_KKBEH_ST , VE_KKER_ST);
 
 fetch c_status into v_status;
 
 if c_status%notfound then
 /*msg('Nincs ilyen státusz kombináció a törzsben. Ügy st.: ' || :KKSZERZODES_CORE.U_STATUS
 || ' Szer. st.: ' || :KKSZERZODES_CORE.L_SZSTATUS || ' Szerz. KKBEH St.: ' 
 || VS_KKBEH_ST || ' Szerz. KKER St.: ' || VS_KKER_ST 
 || ' Eszk. KKBEH St.: ' ||VE_KKBEH_ST || ' Eszk. KKER St.: ' || VE_KKER_ST);*/
 return 'VALID';
 end if;
 
 if v_status.U_VALID in ('ENGEDELYEZVE','UJ') then
 return 'VALID';
 end if;
 
 if v_status.U_VALID = 'FIGYELMEZTET' then
 set_alert_property ('OKMEGSEM', alert_message_text,
 'Kérem, ellenőrizze a státuszokat!' || :KKSZERZODES_CORE.U_STATUS
 || ' Szerz. st: ' || :KKSZERZODES_CORE.L_SZSTATUS || ' Szerz. KKBEH St: ' 
 || VS_KKBEH_ST || ' Szerz. KKER St.: ' || VS_KKER_ST 
 || ' Eszk. KKBEH St.: ' ||VE_KKBEH_ST || ' Eszk. KKER St.: ' || VE_KKER_ST);
 n := show_alert ('OKMEGSEM');
 if n = ALERT_BUTTON1 then 
 return 'VALID';
 else 
 return 'INVALID';
 end if;
 end if;
 
 if v_status.U_VALID = 'TILTVA' then
 msg('Tiltott státusz kombináció. Ügy st.: ' || :KKSZERZODES_CORE.U_STATUS
 || ' Szer. st.: ' || :KKSZERZODES_CORE.L_SZSTATUS || ' Szerz. KKBEH St.: ' 
 || VS_KKBEH_ST || ' Szerz. KKER St.: ' || VS_KKER_ST 
 || ' Eszk. KKBEH St.: ' ||VE_KKBEH_ST || ' Eszk. KKER St.: ' || VE_KKER_ST);
 return 'INVALID';
 end if;
 
END;

ProgramUnit.Name: PRINT_KKJELENTES_JOG
ProgramUnit.ProgramUnitText:
PROCEDURE PRINT_KKJELENTES_JOG IS
 pid number;
 ret pls_integer;
 repid REPORT_OBJECT;
 rep varchar2(255);
 rep_status varchar(30);
 docname varchar2(500); 
 docid number;
 url varchar2(4000);
 folder varchar2(30);
BEGIN
 docname := 'KKJELENTES_JOG' || '_' || to_char(sysdate,'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS') || '.PDF';
 
 insert into KKDOCSTAR (
 U_FORRAS, U_DOCTYPE, U_DOCTYPEN, U_DOCNAME, U_STATUS, 
 U_PARTNER, U_UGYID, U_SZERSZAM, U_SZERAZON, 
 DATE_CREATED, CREATED_BY, DATE_MODIFIED, MODIFIED_BY)
 values (
 :PARAMETER.KK, 'KKJELENTES_JOG', 'Ügyvédi irodák negyedéves jelentése', docname, 'UJ', 
 :KKPARTNER_CORE.U_PARTNER, :KKSZERZODES_CORE.U_UGYID, :KKSZERZODES_CORE.L_SZERSZAM, null,
 sysdate, :GLOBAL.USERID, sysdate, :GLOBAL.USERID
 );
 ret := "report.GET_KKDOCSTAR_IDENTITY"(docid);
 commit;
 
 repid := find_report_object('R1'); 
 SET_REPORT_OBJECT_PROPERTY(repid, REPORT_FILENAME , :GLOBAL.REPORTS || 'KKJELENTES_JOG' ); -- || '.RDF'
 SET_REPORT_OBJECT_PROPERTY(repid, REPORT_DESNAME , :GLOBAL.DOCTMP || docname ); 
 SET_REPORT_OBJECT_PROPERTY(repid, REPORT_DESFORMAT, 'PDF');
 SET_REPORT_OBJECT_PROPERTY(repid, REPORT_SERVER , :GLOBAL.REPSERVER);
 SET_REPORT_OBJECT_PROPERTY(repid, REPORT_OTHER , 'P_IRODA=''' || globals.JOGIRODA);
 rep := RUN_REPORT_OBJECT(repid);
 
 url := :GLOBAL.CURL || ' -F "userfile=@' || :GLOBAL.DOCTMP || docname || '" -F "P_DOCID=' || docid || '" ' || replace(:GLOBAL.KKUPLOAD,'kk.php?P_DOCID=','upload.php');
 
 host(url,NO_SCREEN);
 
 ret := "report.GET_KK_FOLDER"(docid,folder);
 
 web.show_document(:GLOBAL.KKDOCURL || folder || '/' || docid || UPPER(SUBSTR(docname,LENGTH(docname)-3,4)),'_BLANK'); 
 --web.show_document(:GLOBAL.KKDOCTMPURL || docname, '_BLANK');
END;

ProgramUnit.Name: NVLSTR
ProgramUnit.ProgramUnitText:
FUNCTION NVLSTR (p varchar2, e varchar2) return varchar2 IS
BEGIN
 if nvl(p,' ')<'!' then
 return e;
 else
 return p;
 end if;
END;

ProgramUnit.Name: FORRAS_FRISSITES
ProgramUnit.ProgramUnitText:
PROCEDURE FORRAS_FRISSITES (p_mit varchar2) IS
 ret pls_integer;
 l_kkinf varchar2(13); 
 bc_kijeldat varchar2(10);
 l_edert number;
 cursor c is select L_JELLEG from KOD where L_KODCSOP = 'BEHINFO'; --KK2 and L_LOMBKOD = :SETSTATUS.U_BEHINFO
 v c%rowtype;
 
 cursor c_eszkertkat (p_ertkat varchar2) is
 select L_TILTAS UJ, L_JELLEG HASZNALT from KOD_V where L_KODCSOP = 'ESZKERTKAT' and L_LOMBKOD = p_ertkat;
 
 v_eszkertkat c_eszkertkat%rowtype;
 
BEGIN

 ret := "report.KKESZKOZ_FRISSIT"(:KKSZERZODES_CORE.L_CEG, :KKSZERZODES_CORE.L_SZERSZAM, :KKESZKOZ_CORE.L_SZERAZON, l_kkinf, bc_kijeldat, l_edert); 
 --KK2 
 
 if nvl(:KKESZKOZ_CORE.L_KKINF,'') <> nvl(l_kkinf,'')
 or nvl( :KKESZKOZ_CORE.BC_KIJELDAT,to_date('1990.01.01','YYYY.MM.DD')) <> nvl(to_date(bc_kijeldat,'YYYY.MM.DD'),to_date('1990.01.01','YYYY.MM.DD'))
 or nvl(:KKESZKOZ_CORE.L_EDERT,0) <> nvl(l_edert,0)
 then
 set_block_property('KKESZKOZ_CORE',update_allowed,property_true);
 :KKESZKOZ_CORE.L_KKINF := l_kkinf;
 :KKESZKOZ_CORE.BC_KIJELDAT := to_date(bc_kijeldat,'YYYY.MM.DD');
 :KKESZKOZ_CORE.L_EDERT := l_edert;
 commit_form;
 set_block_property('KKESZKOZ_CORE',update_allowed,property_false);
 end if;

 if nvl(:KKESZKOZ_KART.G_ERTEKBEC,0)=0 and l_edert>0 then
 set_block_property('KKESZKOZ_KART',update_allowed,property_true);
 :KKESZKOZ_KART.G_ERTEKBEC := l_edert;
 :KKESZKOZ_KART.G_ERTEKBEC_BEH := l_edert;
 :KKESZKOZ_KART.G_ERTEKBEC_KER := l_edert;
 commit_form;
 set_block_property('KKESZKOZ_KART',update_allowed,property_false);
 end if;
 
 if nvl(:KKESZKOZ_CORE.L_KKINF,' ')<>'NINCS ESZKOZ' then
 if :KKESZKOZ_KART.U_BEHINFO is not null then
 open c;
 fetch c into v;
 close c;
 if v.L_JELLEG = 'NINCS ESZKOZ' then
 set_block_property('KKESZKOZ_KART',update_allowed,property_true);
 :KKESZKOZ_KART.U_BEHINFO := null;
 commit_form;
 set_block_property('KKESZKOZ_KART',update_allowed,property_false);
 end if;
 end if;
 end if;

 if :KKSZERZODES_CORE.L_IGAZGATO in ('GEFI','VBLGEFI','LFLOTTA','KESZLET','VBLFLOTTA') and :KKESZKOZ_KART.U_ESZKERTKAT is not null then
 open c_eszkertkat(:KKSZERZODES_CORE.L_IGAZGATO || '-' || :KKESZKOZ_KART.U_ESZKERTKAT);
 fetch c_eszkertkat into v_eszkertkat;
 close c_eszkertkat;
 
 if :KKESZKOZ_CORE.L_ESTATUS = 'UJ' then
 if v_eszkertkat.UJ is not null then
 set_block_property('KKESZKOZ_KART',update_allowed,property_true);
 :KKESZKOZ_CORE.L_EDERT_CALC := :KKESZKOZ_CORE.L_ESZKPE * to_number(v_eszkertkat.UJ) / 100;
 set_block_property('KKESZKOZ_KART',update_allowed,property_false);
 end if;
 end if;
 if :KKESZKOZ_CORE.L_ESTATUS = 'HASZNALT' then
 if v_eszkertkat.HASZNALT is not null then
 set_block_property('KKESZKOZ_KART',update_allowed,property_true);
 :KKESZKOZ_CORE.L_EDERT_CALC := :KKESZKOZ_CORE.L_ESZKPE * to_number(v_eszkertkat.HASZNALT) / 100;
 set_block_property('KKESZKOZ_KART',update_allowed,property_false);
 end if;
 end if; 
 end if; 

END;

ProgramUnit.Name: KKFELADAT_SMS
ProgramUnit.ProgramUnitText:
PROCEDURE KKFELADAT_SMS IS
 cursor c_mobil (p_partner varchar2) is
 select MOBIL from KKERPART_MOBIL where F_PARTNER = p_partner;
 v_mobil c_mobil%rowtype;

 cursor c_eszkoz (p_ugyid varchar2, p_szerazon varchar2) is 
 select s.L_BEH, e.L_ERTHELY, e.L_RENDSZAM
 from KKSZERZODES_2 s, KKESZKOZ_2 e
 where s.U_UGYID = e.U_UGYID
 and s.U_UTOLSO = 'IGEN'
 and s.U_UGYID = p_ugyid
 and e.L_SZERAZON = p_szerazon;
 v_eszkoz c_eszkoz%rowtype;
 
 ugyid varchar2(16);
 szerazon varchar2(12);
 partner varchar2(9); 
 rendszam varchar2(10);
BEGIN
 ugyid := :KKFELADAT.U_UGYID;
 szerazon := :KKFELADAT.U_SZERAZON;
 
 if szerazon is null then
 szerazon := :KKFELADAT.U_SZERSZAM || '01';
 end if;

 if ugyid is not null and szerazon is not null then
 open c_eszkoz (ugyid, szerazon);
 fetch c_eszkoz into v_eszkoz;
 close c_eszkoz;
 
 if :KKFELADAT.U_FELELOS = 'BEHAJTO' then
 partner := v_eszkoz.L_BEH;
 open c_mobil (partner);
 fetch c_mobil into v_mobil;
 close c_mobil;
 if v_mobil.MOBIL is not null then
 if substr(v_mobil.MOBIL,1,2)='06' then
 v_mobil.MOBIL := substr(v_mobil.MOBIL,3,10);
 end if;
 SEND_SMS (rendszam || substr(nvl(:KKFELADAT.U_SZOVEG,nvl(:KKFELADAT.U_TARGY,'Feladat!')),1,140) || ' (LOMBARD)', v_mobil.MOBIL);
 end if;
 end if;
 
 if :KKFELADAT.U_FELELOS = 'ERTHELY' then
 partner := v_eszkoz.L_ERTHELY;
 open c_mobil (partner);
 fetch c_mobil into v_mobil;
 close c_mobil;
 if v_mobil.MOBIL is not null then
 if substr(v_mobil.MOBIL,1,2)='06' then
 v_mobil.MOBIL := substr(v_mobil.MOBIL,3,10);
 end if;
 SEND_SMS (rendszam || substr(nvl(:KKFELADAT.U_SZOVEG,nvl(:KKFELADAT.U_TARGY,'Feladat!')),1,140) || ' (LOMBARD)', v_mobil.MOBIL);
 end if;
 end if;
 
 end if;
END;

ProgramUnit.Name: SEND_SMS
ProgramUnit.ProgramUnitText:
PROCEDURE SEND_SMS (txt varchar2, telszam varchar2) IS
 ret pls_integer;
 cim varchar2(100);
 f Text_Io.File_Type;
 ff varchar2(100); 
 cmd varchar2(4000); 
BEGIN
 --ret := "report.SENDSMS"(txt,telszam);
 --commit;
 
 ff := 'SMS_' || telszam || '_' || to_char(sysdate,'YYYYMMDDHH24MMSS') || '.txt' ;
 f := Text_Io.fopen( :GLOBAL.DOCPATH || 'mail\' || ff, 'W');
 Text_io.Put_Line ( f, txt );
 Text_io.fclose (f);
 
 cmd := :GLOBAL.BLAT || ' ' || :GLOBAL.DOCPATH || 'mail\' || ff; 
 cmd := cmd || ' -i ' || globals.KK_NAME || '@szeged.lombard.hu';
 cmd := cmd || ' -f ' || globals.KK_NAME || '@szeged.lombard.hu'; 
 cmd := cmd || ' -t 36' || telszam ||'@sms.lombard'; 
 cmd := cmd || ' -s ' || '"' || nvl(txt,'Lombard SMS') || '"';
 
 host(cmd,NO_SCREEN);

END;

ProgramUnit.Name: LIMITAR_SMS
ProgramUnit.ProgramUnitText:
PROCEDURE LIMITAR_SMS IS
 cursor c_mobil (p_partner varchar2) is
 select MOBIL from KKERPART_MOBIL where F_PARTNER = p_partner;
 v_mobil c_mobil%rowtype;

 cursor c_eszkoz (p_ugyid varchar2, p_szerazon varchar2) is 
 select s.L_BEH, e.L_ERTHELY, e.L_RENDSZAM
 from KKSZERZODES_2 s, KKESZKOZ_2 e
 where s.U_UGYID = e.U_UGYID
 and s.U_UTOLSO = 'IGEN'
 and s.U_UGYID = p_ugyid
 and e.L_SZERAZON = p_szerazon;
 v_eszkoz c_eszkoz%rowtype;
 
 ugyid varchar2(16);
 szerazon varchar2(12);
 partner varchar2(9); 
 rendszam varchar2(10);
BEGIN 
 ugyid := :KKSZERZODES_CORE.U_UGYID;
 szerazon := :KKESZKOZ_CORE.L_SZERAZON;
 rendszam := :KKESZKOZ_CORE.L_RENDSZAM;
 if ugyid is not null and szerazon is not null then
 open c_eszkoz (ugyid, szerazon);
 fetch c_eszkoz into v_eszkoz;
 close c_eszkoz;
 
 partner := v_eszkoz.L_ERTHELY;
 open c_mobil (partner);
 fetch c_mobil into v_mobil;
 close c_mobil;
 if v_mobil.MOBIL is not null then
 if substr(v_mobil.MOBIL,1,2)='06' then
 v_mobil.MOBIL := substr(v_mobil.MOBIL,3,10);
 end if;
 --KK2 SEND_SMS ('Az ' || rendszam || ' limit ara ' || to_char(:SETSTATUS.G_LIMIT,'9999999990') || 'Ft-ra valtozott (LOMBARD)', v_mobil.MOBIL); 
 end if; 
 end if;
END;

-- message('2');

 else

 if instr(U_WEBHIRDET,'NEM')=0 then

 P_FIGYELEM := 'TRUE';
 else

 end if; 

 if P_FIGYELEM = 'TRUE' then

 end if;
 
 if P_TILTAS = 'TRUE' then

 end if;

 if P_VALID = 'TILTAS' then -- and instr(:GLOBAL.USERGROUPS,'KKERVEZ' )>0 then
 P_VALID := 'FIGYELEM';
 end if;

 if P_VALID <> 'OK' then
 MSGLIST.CLEARLIST;
 MSGLIST.RET(I); 
 MSGLIST.INITLIST('Ügy átadása a visszaállításra a KKBO-nak'); 
 MSGLIST.ADDLINE('Kötelező elemek:',2);
 MSGLIST.ADDSINGLELINE;
 
 if instr(U_UG ,' ok ')=0 then MSGLIST.ADDLINE(U_UG,P); end if;
 if instr(E_KKER_ST ,' ok ')=0 then MSGLIST.ADDLINE(E_KKER_ST,P); end if;
 if instr(L_ERTHELY ,' ok ')=0 then MSGLIST.ADDLINE(L_ERTHELY,P); end if;
 if instr(U_ESZKHELY ,' ok ')=0 then MSGLIST.ADDLINE(U_ESZKHELY,P); end if;
 if instr(U_ESZKALL ,' ok ')=0 then MSGLIST.ADDLINE(U_ESZKALL,P); end if;
 if instr(U_ALLAPOT ,' ok ')=0 then MSGLIST.ADDLINE(U_ALLAPOT,P); end if;
 if instr(U_WEBHIRDET ,' ok ')=0 then MSGLIST.ADDLINE(U_WEBHIRDET,P); end if;
 if instr(L_ERTEKDAT ,' ok ')=0 then MSGLIST.ADDLINE(L_ERTEKDAT,P); end if;
 if instr(L_ADASVETELID ,' ok ')=0 then MSGLIST.ADDLINE(L_ADASVETELID,P); end if;
 if instr(L_VETELARJOVD ,' ok ')=0 then MSGLIST.ADDLINE(L_VETELARJOVD,P); end if;
 if instr(L_TENYELA ,' ok ')=0 then MSGLIST.ADDLINE(L_TENYELA,P); end if;
 if instr(L_ERTFIZMOD ,' ok ')=0 then MSGLIST.ADDLINE(L_ERTFIZMOD,P); end if;
 if instr(L_ERTPAR ,' ok ')=0 then MSGLIST.ADDLINE(L_ERTPAR,P); end if;
 if instr(L_ERTSZER ,' ok ')=0 then MSGLIST.ADDLINE(L_ERTSZER,P); end if;
 if instr(L_EDERT ,' ok ')=0 then MSGLIST.ADDLINE(L_EDERT,P); end if;
 if instr(L_KKINF ,' ok ')=0 then MSGLIST.ADDLINE(L_KKINF,P); end if;
 
 MSGLIST.ADDNULLLINE;
 MSGLIST.ADDLINE('Opcionális elemek:',2);
 MSGLIST.ADDSINGLELINE; 
 
 if instr(BC_KIJELDAT ,' ok ')=0 then MSGLIST.ADDLINE(BC_KIJELDAT,P); end if;

 MSGLIST.ENABLE_OK; 
 end if; 
 */
-- message('Vége'); 
END;

 -- uj mező L_BIZVAKONYD -- Bizományosi értékesítés felkönyvelés dátuma

 if instr(L_ERTFIZMOD,'URES')=0 then

 P_TILTAS := 'TRUE';
 else

 end if; 
 
 begin
 select count(*) into db 
 from KKDOCSTAR 
 where U_PARTNER = :KKSZERZODES_CORE.L_VEVO 
 and U_UGYID = :KKSZERZODES_CORE.U_UGYID 
 and U_SZERAZON = :KKESZKOZ_CORE.L_SZERAZON
 and U_DOCTYPE = 'OKM NYILAT';
 exception 
 when no_data_found then

 end; 

 if instr(DOK_OKM_NYILAT,' 0')>0 then

 else

 end if; 
 

 if P_FIGYELEM = 'TRUE' then 
 P_VALID := 'FIGYELEM';
 end if;
 
 if P_TILTAS = 'TRUE' then
 P_VALID := 'TILTAS';
 end if;

 if P_VALID = 'TILTAS' then -- and instr(:GLOBAL.USERGROUPS,'KKERVEZ' )>0 then
 P_VALID := 'FIGYELEM';
 end if;

 if P_VALID <> 'OK' then
 MSGLIST.CLEARLIST;
 MSGLIST.RET(I); 
 MSGLIST.INITLIST('Ügy átadása a lezárásra a KKBO-nak'); 
 MSGLIST.ADDLINE('Kötelező elemek:',2);
 MSGLIST.ADDSINGLELINE;
 
 if instr(U_UG ,' ok ')=0 then MSGLIST.ADDLINE(U_UG,P); end if;
 if instr(E_KKER_ST ,' ok ')=0 then MSGLIST.ADDLINE(E_KKER_ST,P); end if;
 if instr(L_ERTHELY ,' ok ')=0 then MSGLIST.ADDLINE(L_ERTHELY,P); end if;
 if instr(U_ESZKHELY ,' ok ')=0 then MSGLIST.ADDLINE(U_ESZKHELY,P); end if;
 if instr(U_ESZKALL ,' ok ')=0 then MSGLIST.ADDLINE(U_ESZKALL,P); end if;
 if instr(U_ALLAPOT ,' ok ')=0 then MSGLIST.ADDLINE(U_ALLAPOT,P); end if;
 if instr(U_WEBHIRDET ,' ok ')=0 then MSGLIST.ADDLINE(U_WEBHIRDET,P); end if;
 if instr(L_ERTEKDAT ,' ok ')=0 then MSGLIST.ADDLINE(L_ERTEKDAT,P); end if;
 if instr(L_ADASVETELID ,' ok ')=0 then MSGLIST.ADDLINE(L_ADASVETELID,P); end if;
 if instr(L_VETELARJOVD ,' ok ')=0 then MSGLIST.ADDLINE(L_VETELARJOVD,P); end if;
 if instr(L_TENYELA ,' ok ')=0 then MSGLIST.ADDLINE(L_TENYELA,P); end if;
 if instr(L_ERTFIZMOD ,' ok ')=0 then MSGLIST.ADDLINE(L_ERTFIZMOD,P); end if;
 if instr(L_ERTPAR ,' ok ')=0 then MSGLIST.ADDLINE(L_ERTPAR,P); end if;
 if instr(L_ERTSZER ,' ok ')=0 then MSGLIST.ADDLINE(L_ERTSZER,P); end if;
 if instr(L_EDERT ,' ok ')=0 then MSGLIST.ADDLINE(L_EDERT,P); end if;
 if instr(L_KKINF ,' ok ')=0 then MSGLIST.ADDLINE(L_KKINF,P); end if;
 if instr(BC_STATUSZ ,' ok ')=0 then MSGLIST.ADDLINE(BC_STATUSZ,P); end if;
 if instr(BC_KIJELDAT ,' ok ')=0 then MSGLIST.ADDLINE(BC_KIJELDAT,P); end if;
 if instr(DOK_OKM_NYILAT ,' ok ')=0 then MSGLIST.ADDLINE(DOK_OKM_NYILAT,P); end if;
 
-- MSGLIST.ADDNULLLINE;
-- MSGLIST.ADDLINE('Opcionális elemek:',2);
-- MSGLIST.ADDSINGLELINE;
 
 

 MSGLIST.ENABLE_OK; 
 end if; 
 */ 
-- message('Vége'); 
END;

ProgramUnit.Name: CHECK_KKER_KKBO_ELSZ
ProgramUnit.ProgramUnitText:
PROCEDURE CHECK_KKER_KKBO_ELSZ (P_VALID out varchar2) IS 
 P number := 5;
 W number := 80;
 I varchar2(61) := 'SETSTATUS.OK';
 
 U_UG varchar2(150);
 E_KKER_ST varchar2(150);
 EM_ERTMOD varchar2(150);
 L_ERTHELY varchar2(150); 
 L_HIRDATK varchar2(150); 
 L_HIRDATV varchar2(150);
 U_ESZKHELY varchar2(150);
 U_ESZKJUTKAT varchar2(150);
 U_ESZKALL varchar2(150);
 U_ALLAPOT varchar2(150);
 U_WEBHIRDET varchar2(150);
 G_HIRDETES varchar2(150);
 G_LIMIT varchar2(150); 
 G_VILLAMAR varchar2(150); 
 L_ERTEKDAT varchar2(150);
 L_ADASVETELID varchar2(150);
 L_VETELARJOVD varchar2(150); 
 -- uj mező L_BIZVAKONYD -- Bizományosi értékesítés felkönyvelés dátuma
 L_TENYELA varchar2(150);
 L_ERTFIZMOD varchar2(150);
 L_ERTPAR varchar2(150);
 L_ERTAFATIP varchar2(150); 
 L_ERTSZER varchar2(150);
 L_EDERT varchar2(150);
 L_KKINF varchar2(150); 
 BC_STATUSZ varchar2(150);
 BC_KIJELDAT varchar2(150);
 L_FVERSTAT varchar2(150);
 
 DOK_ATAD_J_ERT varchar2(150);
 DOK_ESETIERTMB varchar2(150);
 DOK_EUROTAX_OPC varchar2(150);
 DOK_ENGEDM_SZERZ varchar2(150);
 DOK_TAJ_ERT_MEGK varchar2(150);
 DOK_GIRO_ERT varchar2(150);
 DOK_ADASV_KKER varchar2(150);
 DOK_UJRAFINSZERZ varchar2(150); 
 DOK_OKM_NYILAT varchar2(150);
 
 db number := 0;
 
 P_TILTAS varchar2(5) := 'FALSE';
 P_FIGYELEM varchar2(5) := 'FALSE';
BEGIN 
 P_VALID := 'OK';
 -- KK2
 /*
 if not (:SETSTATUS.U_SZERST = 'ELSZAMRA VAR' and :KKSZERZODES_KART.U_KKER_ST <> 'ELSZAMRA VAR' ) then
 return;
 end if;

-- message('start');
-- message('1');
 -- Kötelező
 U_UG := 'Ügygazda ....................................... @ ' || nvlstr(:SETSTATUS.U_UG,'URES');
 E_KKER_ST := 'Eszköz státusz.................................. @ ' || nvlstr(:SETSTATUS.U_ESZST,'URES');
 EM_ERTMOD := 'Értékesítés módja............................... @ ' || nvlstr(:SETSTATUS.EM_ERTMOD,'URES');
 L_ERTHELY := 'Értékesítési hely............................... @ ' || nvlstr(:SETSTATUS.L_ERTHELY,'URES');
 L_HIRDATK := 'Értékesítés kezdete............................. @ ' || nvlstr(to_char(:SETSTATUS.L_HIRDATK,'YYYY.MM.DD'),'URES'); 
 L_HIRDATV := 'Értékesítés vége................................ @ ' || nvlstr(to_char(:SETSTATUS.L_HIRDATV,'YYYY.MM.DD'),'URES');
 U_ESZKHELY := 'Eszköz helye.................................... @ ' || nvlstr(:SETSTATUS.U_ESZKHELY,'URES');
 U_ESZKJUTKAT := 'Jutalék kategória............................... @ ' || nvlstr(:SETSTATUS.U_ESZKJUTKAT,'URES');
-- U_ESZKALL := 'Eszköz állapota................................. @ ' || nvlstr(:SETSTATUS.U_ESZKALL,'URES');
 U_ALLAPOT := 'Állapot......................................... @ ' || nvlstr(:SETSTATUS.U_ALLAPOT,'URES');
 U_WEBHIRDET := 'Hirdetés a WEB-en............................... @ ' || nvlstr(:SETSTATUS.U_WEBHIRDET,'URES');
 G_HIRDETES := 'Hirdetési ár.................................... @ ' || nvlstr(to_char(:SETSTATUS.G_HIRDETES),'0'); 
 G_LIMIT := 'Limit ár........................................ @ ' || nvlstr(to_char(:SETSTATUS.G_LIMIT),'0');
 L_ERTEKDAT := 'Értékesítés dátuma.............................. @ ' || nvlstr(to_char(:SETSTATUS.L_ERTEKDAT,'YYYY.MM.DD'),'URES');
 L_ADASVETELID := 'Adásvételi dátuma............................... @ ' || nvlstr(to_char(:SETSTATUS.L_ADASVETELID,'YYYY.MM.DD'),'URES');
 L_VETELARJOVD := 'Vételár jóváírás dátuma......................... @ ' || nvlstr(to_char(:SETSTATUS.L_VETELARJOVD,'YYYY.MM.DD'),'URES');
 L_TENYELA := 'Tényleges eladási ár............................ @ ' || nvlstr(to_char(:SETSTATUS.L_TENYELA),'0');
 L_ERTFIZMOD := 'Fizetési mód.................................... @ ' || nvlstr(:SETSTATUS.L_ERTFIZMOD,'URES');
 L_ERTPAR := 'Vevő............................................ @ ' || nvlstr(:SETSTATUS.L_ERTPAR,'URES');

 L_ERTSZER := 'Szerződés....................................... @ ' || nvlstr(:SETSTATUS.L_ERTSZER,'URES');
 L_EDERT := 'Eszköz direkt értéke............................ @ ' || nvlstr(to_char(:SETSTATUS.L_EDERT),'0');
 L_KKINF := 'Kintlévőség kezelési információ ................ @ ' || nvlstr(:SETSTATUS.L_KKINF,'URES');
 BC_STATUSZ := 'Biztosítás karton státusza...................... @ ' || nvlstr(:KKESZKOZ.BC_STATUSZ,'URES'); 
 BC_KIJELDAT := 'Biztosítás kijelentés dátuma.................... @ ' || nvlstr(to_char(:SETSTATUS.BC_KIJELDAT,'YYYY.MM.DD'),'URES'); 
 L_FVERSTAT := 'Felmondás verzió státusza....................... @ ' || nvlstr(:SETSTATUS.L_FVERSTAT,'URES'); 

 DOK_ATAD_J_ERT := 'Átadás-átvételi jegyzk. k.ért.................... @ ' || to_char(nvl(db,0)); 
 DOK_ESETIERTMB := 'Eseti értékesítési megbízás...................... @ ' || to_char(nvl(db,0)); 
 DOK_EUROTAX_OPC := 'Eurotax vételi (opciós ügy)...................... @ ' || to_char(nvl(db,0)); 
 DOK_ENGEDM_SZERZ := 'Engedményezési szerződés......................... @ ' || to_char(nvl(db,0)); 
 DOK_TAJ_ERT_MEGK := 'Tájékoztatás ért.megkezdéséről................... @ ' || to_char(nvl(db,0)); 
 DOK_GIRO_ERT := 'GIRO kontroll ért előtt.......................... @ ' || to_char(nvl(db,0)); 
 DOK_ADASV_KKER := 'Adásvételi szerz. KKER........................... @ ' || to_char(nvl(db,0)); 
 DOK_UJRAFINSZERZ := 'Újrafinanzírozás szerződése...................... @ ' || to_char(nvl(db,0)); 
 DOK_OKM_NYILAT := 'OKM nyilatkozat ................................. @ ' || to_char(nvl(db,0)); 
 
-- message('2'); 

 if instr(U_UG,'URES')>0 then
 U_UG := replace(U_UG,'@','<< Hiányzik! >>');
 P_TILTAS:= 'TRUE';
 else
 U_UG := replace(U_UG,'@',' ok ');
 end if; 

-- message('3');

 if instr(E_KKER_ST,'ERTEKESITVE')=0 then
 E_KKER_ST := replace(E_KKER_ST,'@','<< Nem ERTEKESITVE! >>');
 P_TILTAS:= 'TRUE';
 else
 E_KKER_ST := replace(E_KKER_ST,'@',' ok ');
 end if; 

 if instr(EM_ERTMOD,'URES')>0 and :KKSZERZODES.L_FINTIP = 'HITEL' then
 EM_ERTMOD := replace(EM_ERTMOD,'@','<< Hiányzik! >>');
 P_TILTAS:= 'TRUE';
 else
 EM_ERTMOD := replace(EM_ERTMOD,'@',' ok ');
 end if; 

-- message('4');

 if instr(L_ERTHELY,'URES')>0 then
 L_ERTHELY := replace(L_ERTHELY,'@','<< Hiányzik! >>');
 P_TILTAS := 'TRUE';
 else
 L_ERTHELY := replace(L_ERTHELY,'@',' ok ');
 end if; 
 
 if instr(L_HIRDATK,'URES')>0 then
 L_HIRDATK := replace(L_HIRDATK,'@','<< Hiányzik! >>');
 P_TILTAS := 'TRUE';
 else
 L_HIRDATK := replace(L_HIRDATK,'@',' ok ');
 end if; 
 
 if instr(L_HIRDATV,'URES')>0 then
 L_HIRDATV := replace(L_HIRDATV,'@','<< Hiányzik! >>');

 else
 L_HIRDATV := replace(L_HIRDATV,'@',' ok ');
 end if; 

-- message('5');

 if instr(U_ESZKHELY,'ERTEKESITVE')=0 then
 U_ESZKHELY := replace(U_ESZKHELY,'@','<< Nem ERTEKESITVE! >>');
 P_TILTAS := 'TRUE';
 else
 U_ESZKHELY := replace(U_ESZKHELY,'@',' ok ');
 end if; 
 
 if instr(U_ESZKJUTKAT,'URES')>0 then

 else

 end if; 
 
 if instr(U_ALLAPOT,'ERTEKESITVE')=0 then

 P_TILTAS := 'TRUE';
 else
 U_ALLAPOT := replace(U_ALLAPOT,'@',' ok ');
 end if; 

 if instr(U_WEBHIRDET,'NEM')=0 then
 U_WEBHIRDET := replace(U_WEBHIRDET,'@','<< Nem NEM! >>');
 P_TILTAS := 'TRUE';
 else
 U_WEBHIRDET := replace(U_WEBHIRDET,'@',' ok ');
 end if; 

 if instr(L_ERTEKDAT,'URES')>0 then
 L_ERTEKDAT := replace(L_ERTEKDAT,'@','<< Hiányzik! >>');
 P_TILTAS := 'TRUE';
 else
 L_ERTEKDAT := replace(L_ERTEKDAT,'@',' ok ');
 end if; 
 
 if instr(L_ADASVETELID,'URES')>0 then
 L_ADASVETELID := replace(L_ADASVETELID,'@','<< Hiányzik! >>');
 P_TILTAS := 'TRUE';
 else
 L_ADASVETELID := replace(L_ADASVETELID,'@',' ok ');
 end if; 

 if instr(L_VETELARJOVD,'URES')>0 then
 L_VETELARJOVD := replace(L_VETELARJOVD,'@','<< Hiányzik! >>');
 P_TILTAS := 'TRUE';
 else
 L_VETELARJOVD := replace(L_VETELARJOVD,'@',' ok ');
 end if; 

 -- uj mező L_BIZVAKONYD -- Bizományosi értékesítés felkönyvelés dátuma

 if instr(L_TENYELA,' 0')>0 then
 L_TENYELA := replace(L_TENYELA,'@','<< Hiányzik! >>');
 P_TILTAS := 'TRUE';
 else
 L_TENYELA := replace(L_TENYELA,'@',' ok ');
 end if; 

 if instr(L_ERTFIZMOD,'URES')>0 then
 L_ERTFIZMOD := replace(L_ERTFIZMOD,'@','<< Hiányzik! >>');
 P_TILTAS := 'TRUE';
 else
 L_ERTFIZMOD := replace(L_ERTFIZMOD,'@',' ok ');
 end if; 

 if instr(L_ERTPAR,'URES')>0 then
 L_ERTPAR := replace(L_ERTPAR,'@','<< Hiányzik! >>');
 P_TILTAS := 'TRUE';
 else
 L_ERTPAR := replace(L_ERTPAR,'@',' ok ');
 end if; 
 
 if instr(L_ERTAFATIP,'URES')>0 then
 L_ERTAFATIP := replace(L_ERTAFATIP,'@','<< Hiányzik! >>');
 P_TILTAS := 'TRUE';
 else
 L_ERTAFATIP := replace(L_ERTPAR,'@',' ok ');
 end if; 

 if instr(L_ERTSZER,'URES')>0 and :SETSTATUS.L_ERTFIZMOD = 'FINANSZIROZAS' then
 L_ERTSZER := replace(L_ERTSZER,'@','<< Hiányzik! >>');

 else

 end if; 

 if instr(G_HIRDETES,' 0')>0 then

 else
 G_HIRDETES := replace(G_HIRDETES,'@',' ok ');
 end if; 

 if instr(G_LIMIT,' 0')>0 then
 G_LIMIT := replace(G_LIMIT,'@','<< Hiányzik! >>');
 P_TILTAS := 'TRUE';
 else
 G_LIMIT := replace(G_LIMIT,'@',' ok ');
 end if; 
 
 if :KKSZERZODES.L_FINTIP = 'LIZING' and :SETSTATUS.L_EDERT<>0 then
 L_EDERT := replace(L_EDERT,'@','<< Nem 0! >>');
 P_TILTAS := 'TRUE';
 elsif :KKSZERZODES.L_FINTIP = 'HITEL' and :SETSTATUS.EM_ERTMOD in ('SAJATOPCIO', 'IDEGENOPCIO', 'FELTADASVHAT' ) and :SETSTATUS.L_EDERT<=1 then
 L_EDERT := replace(L_EDERT,'@','<< Nem nagyobb mint 1! >>');
 P_TILTAS := 'TRUE';
 elsif :KKSZERZODES.L_FINTIP = 'HITEL' and :SETSTATUS.EM_ERTMOD in ('SAJATBIZ', 'IDEGENBIZ') and :SETSTATUS.L_EDERT<>1 then
 L_EDERT := replace(L_EDERT,'@','<< Nem 1! >>');
 P_TILTAS := 'TRUE';
 else
 L_EDERT := replace(L_EDERT,'@',' ok ');
 end if; 
 
 if instr(L_KKINF,'URES')=0 then
 L_KKINF := replace(L_KKINF,'@','<< Kitöltve! >>');
 P_TILTAS := 'TRUE';
 else
 L_KKINF := replace(L_KKINF,'@',' ok ');
 end if; 

 if instr(BC_STATUSZ,'LEZART')=0 and nvl(:KKESZKOZ.BC_BKARTON,' ')>'!' then
 BC_STATUSZ := replace(BC_STATUSZ,'@','<< Nem LEZART! >>');
 P_TILTAS := 'TRUE';
 else
 BC_STATUSZ := replace(BC_STATUSZ,'@',' ok ');
 end if;
 
 if instr(BC_KIJELDAT,'URES')>0 and nvl(:KKESZKOZ.BC_BKARTON,' ')>'!' then
 BC_KIJELDAT := replace(BC_KIJELDAT,'@','<< Hiányzik! >>');
 P_TILTAS := 'TRUE';
 else
 BC_KIJELDAT := replace(BC_KIJELDAT,'@',' ok ');
 end if; 

 if :SETSTATUS.L_FVERSTAT not in ('ERTEKESITVE','ERTEKESITLIZ','ADASVETELERV') then
 L_FVERSTAT := replace(L_FVERSTAT,'@','<< Nem megfelelő! >>');
 P_TILTAS := 'TRUE';
 else
 L_FVERSTAT := replace(L_FVERSTAT,'@',' ok ');
 end if;

 where U_PARTNER = :KKSZERZODES_CORE.L_VEVO
