BEGIN
 globals.VERAZON := p_verazon;
 globals.SZERAZON := p_szerazon;
 KKESZKOZ_GO_SZERAZON;
END;

ProgramUnit.Name: PRINT_KKBEHELSZUT
ProgramUnit.ProgramUnitText:
PROCEDURE PRINT_KKBEHELSZUT IS

 pid number;
 ret pls_integer;
 repid REPORT_OBJECT;
 rep varchar2(255);
 rep_status varchar(30);
 docname varchar2(500);
 docid number;
 url varchar2(4000);
 folder varchar2(30);
 params varchar2(255);
 alap number;
 keska number;
 egyeb number;
 ceg varchar2(13);
BEGIN
 docname := 'KKBEHELSZUT' || '_' || to_char(sysdate,'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS') || '.PDF';
 params := 'P_UGYVERZIO=''' || :KKESZKOZ_KART.U_UGYID || ''' P_SZERAZON=''' || :KKESZKOZ_CORE.L_SZERAZON || ''' P_IKTATOSZAM=''' || 'KK-01' || '''';
 insert into KKDOCSTAR (
 U_FORRAS, U_DOCTYPE, U_DOCTYPEN, U_DOCNAME, U_STATUS, 
 U_PARTNER, U_UGYID, U_SZERSZAM, U_SZERAZON, 
 DATE_CREATED, CREATED_BY, DATE_MODIFIED, MODIFIED_BY)
 values (
 :PARAMETER.KK, 'KKBEHELSZUT', 'Megbízás a behajtóknak elsz. ut. részletfiz.', docname, 'UJ', 
 :KKPARTNER_CORE.U_PARTNER, :KKSZERZODES_CORE.U_UGYID, :KKSZERZODES_CORE.L_SZERSZAM, null,
 sysdate, :GLOBAL.USERID, sysdate, :GLOBAL.USERID
 );
 ret := "report.GET_KKDOCSTAR_IDENTITY"(docid); 
 commit;
 
 

 ret := "report.T_ELSZUTNJOGBEH_TOLT" (:KKSZERZODES_CORE.L_CEG,:KKSZERZODES_CORE.L_VEVO,:KKSZERZODES_CORE.L_SZERSZAM, alap, keska, egyeb, ceg,'SZERZODES');
 commit;
 
 /*
 msg(alap);
 msg(keska);
 msg(egyeb);
 msg(:KKSZERZODES_CORE.U_UGYID);
 */

 update KKSZERZODES 
 set L_ELSZBEHTOKE = alap
 ,L_ELSZBEHKESKA= keska
 ,L_ELSZBEHEGYEB= egyeb
 where U_UGYID = :KKSZERZODES_CORE.U_UGYID
 and U_UTOLSO = 'IGEN';
 commit;
 
 --msg('KKSZERZODES-be írva');

 ret := "report.EDRMON_KKJOB" (
 :GLOBAL.USERID -- JOB-t indító Forrás SQL felhasználó kódja
 ,pid -- Porcessz ID OUTPUT --> ezzel kell hivatkozni a továbbiakban 
 ,'KKBEHELSZUT' -- Dokumentum típusa
 ,'KK2_KKBEHELSZUT_19' -- Dokumentum típus verzió
 ,docname -- Dokumentum neve
 ,docid -- Dokumentum azonosító
 ,params -- Paraméterek
 ,:KKPARTNER_CORE.U_PARTNER -- Partner 
 );
 commit;
END;

ProgramUnit.Name: PRINT_KIADAS_BEHAJTASRA
ProgramUnit.ProgramUnitText:
PROCEDURE PRINT_KIADAS_BEHAJTASRA (szerz varchar2, eszk varchar2) IS
-- cursor c is
-- select U_VERAZON from KKSZERZODES_V where U_UGYID = :KKSZERZODES_CORE.U_UGYID and U_UTOLSO = 'IGEN';
-- v c%rowtype;
 u varchar2(30);
 d varchar2(3);

 cursor c (ugyid varchar2) is
 select L_SZERAZON, L_TKSTATUS, L_TK
 from KKESZKOZ_CORE_V
 where --L_TK is not null
 -- and L_TKSTATUS = 'KIKERVE'
 U_UGYID = ugyid
 order by L_SZERAZON;
 
 v c%rowtype;
 
 
 cursor b (ugyid varchar2) is
 select UGYL_MODOZATOK
 from KKUGYLET
 where U_UGYID = ugyid
 and UGYL_TIPUS = 'BEHAJTASI MB'
 order by UGYL_ID desc;
 
 bb b%rowtype;
 
 j number;
 i number;
 url varchar2(4000);
 ugyl varchar2(18);
 ret pls_integer;
 lejar date;
 cursor c_korai_penzbeh is
 select UGYL_ID
 from KKUGYLET
 where L_VEVO = :KKPARTNER_CORE.U_PARTNER
 and U_UGYID = :KKSZERZODES_CORE.U_UGYID
 and UGYL_TIPUS = 'KORAI PENZBEH'
 and UGYL_ST <> 'INDITAS'
 order by UGYL_ID desc; 
 v_korai_penzbeh c_korai_penzbeh%rowtype; 
 
 ELO_FOGLALAS number;
 INGOJZGEPJM number; 
 MEGALLZALOG number;
 ZALPILBELTU number;
 INGOJZGHBNY number;
 
BEGIN
 if :KKSZERZODES_CORE.L_SZSTATUS <> 'HATALYOS' or (:KKSZERZODES_CORE.L_FINTIP='BERLET' and :KKSZERZODES_CORE.L_SZLEJAR <= trunc(sysdate)) then
 u := szerz; -- :KKSZERZODES_CORE.U_UGYID;
 PRINT_KKINFOLAP (u);
 PRINT_ATADBEHAJT (u);
 PRINT_KKBEHESETI (u);
 -- Lízing ügylet esetén ha a szerződés tárgya jármű, vagy több eszközös esetén van jármű és ahhoz tartozóan a törzskönyv mező nem üres
 open c (u);
 loop
 fetch c into v;
 if c%notfound then
 close c;
 exit;
 end if; 
 if :KKSZERZODES_CORE.L_FINTIP = 'LIZING' then -- and v.L_TK > '!'
 PRINT_ELOTORLP005 (u, v.L_SZERAZON); 
 end if;
 if v.L_TKSTATUS = 'MK UTALVANY' then 
 PRINT_GEPJARTAM001 (u , v.L_SZERAZON);
 end if; 
 end loop; 
 PRINT_KKMUNKA (u);
 KKESZKOZ_GO (szerz, eszk);
 NAV_KKPARTNER_CTRL('GO_KKPARTNER_KKPUALL');
 GO_ITEM('KKPUGYALL.U_CEG');
 first_record;
 loop
 if :KKPUGYALL.U_CEG <> :KKSZERZODES_CORE.L_CEG and :system.last_record = 'FALSE' then
 next_record;
 else
 exit;
 end if;
 end loop; 
 
 open b (u);
 fetch b into bb;
 close b;
 
 ret := "report.GET_HATALYOS_SZLEJAR_SP"(:KKSZERZODES_CORE.U_UGYID,lejar);
 if lejar is null then
 lejar := to_date('2030.01.01','YYYY.MM.DD');
 end if;
 
 if :KKPUGYALL.U_CEG = :KKSZERZODES_CORE.L_CEG and nvl(bb.UGYL_MODOZATOK,'X') <> 'LEJART SZERZ' and lejar >= sysdate then 
 if substr(:KKSZERZODES_CORE.L_FINKTIP,2,1) = 'D' then
 d := :KKSZERZODES_CORE.L_DNEMV; 
 else
 d := 'FT';
 end if;
 PRINT_KKFORGALMI('KKFORGALMIV_UJ','EDRMON',d);
 end if;

 if :KKPUGYALL.U_CEG = :KKSZERZODES_CORE.L_CEG then 
 if substr(:KKSZERZODES_CORE.L_FINKTIP,2,1) = 'D' then
 d := :KKSZERZODES_CORE.L_DNEMV; 
 else
 d := 'FT';
 end if;
 PRINT_KKFORGALMI('KKFORGALMIF' ,'EDRMON',d);
 PRINT_KKFORGALMI('KKFORGALMIL_UJ','EDRMON',d);
 end if;

 select count(*) into INGOJZGEPJM from KKMFED where U_FEDTIP = 'INGOJZGEPJM' and U_FEDSTAT='HATALYOS' and U_FEDSZER=:KKSZERZODES_CORE.L_SZERSZAM; 
 select count(*) into MEGALLZALOG from KKMFED where U_FEDTIP = 'MEGALLZALOG' and U_FEDSTAT='HATALYOS' and U_FEDSZER=:KKSZERZODES_CORE.L_SZERSZAM; 
 select count(*) into INGOJZGHBNY from KKMFED where U_FEDTIP = 'INGOJZGHBNY' and U_FEDSTAT='HATALYOS' and U_FEDSZER=:KKSZERZODES_CORE.L_SZERSZAM; 
 
 INGOJZGEPJM := nvl(INGOJZGEPJM,0);
 MEGALLZALOG := nvl(MEGALLZALOG,0);
 INGOJZGHBNY := nvl(INGOJZGHBNY,0);
 
 if :KKSZERZODES_CORE.L_FINTIP = 'HITEL' and :KKPARTNER_CORE.L_JOGALL in ('MAGANSZEMELY','OSTERMELO','MAGÁNSZEMÉLY') and :KKSZERZODES_CORE.L_IGAZGATO in ('GEFI', 'VBL GEFI') then 
 select count(*) 
 into ZALPILBELTU
 from LSZERZF_L_ADI x
 where L_ADI5 = 'ZALPILBELTU' 
 and L_SZERSZAM = :KKSZERZODES_CORE.L_SZERSZAM;
 
 ZALPILBELTU := nvl(ZALPILBELTU,0); 
 select count(*) into ELO_FOGLALAS from KK_FOGLALAS where L_SZERAZON = :KKESZKOZ_CORE.L_SZERAZON and L_FFELDAT is null;
 
 if ((MEGALLZALOG > 0 and ZALPILBELTU > 0 ) or (ELO_FOGLALAS = 0 and MEGALLZALOG = 0 )) then
 ret := "report.KK2_DOCUMENT_GEN" ('KKBEH', :global.USERID, :KKSZERZODES_CORE.L_VEVO, :KKSZERZODES_CORE.L_SZERSZAM, :KKSZERZODES_CORE.U_UGYID, :KKESZKOZ_CORE.L_SZERAZON, null, 'FX_FHP_ERT_MEGHAT', NULL,j, i, url);
 end if;
 
 if ELO_FOGLALAS = 0 and MEGALLZALOG = 0 then
 ret := "report.KK2_DOCUMENT_GEN" ('KKBEH', :global.USERID, :KKSZERZODES_CORE.L_VEVO, :KKSZERZODES_CORE.L_SZERSZAM, :KKSZERZODES_CORE.U_UGYID, :KKESZKOZ_CORE.L_SZERAZON, null, 'RTP_KOZOSERT', NULL,j, i, url);
 end if;
 
 if ELO_FOGLALAS = 0 and INGOJZGEPJM = 0 and MEGALLZALOG = 0 then
 ret := "report.KK2_DOCUMENT_GEN" ('KKBEH', :global.USERID, :KKSZERZODES_CORE.L_VEVO, :KKSZERZODES_CORE.L_SZERSZAM, :KKSZERZODES_CORE.U_UGYID, :KKESZKOZ_CORE.L_SZERAZON, null, 'RTP_KEZIZALOG', NULL,j, i, url);
 end if;
 
 if ELO_FOGLALAS = 0 and INGOJZGEPJM > 0 and MEGALLZALOG = 0 then
 ret := "report.KK2_DOCUMENT_GEN" ('KKBEH', :global.USERID, :KKSZERZODES_CORE.L_VEVO, :KKSZERZODES_CORE.L_SZERSZAM, :KKSZERZODES_CORE.U_UGYID, :KKESZKOZ_CORE.L_SZERAZON, null, 'ZALTORLNYILUF001', NULL,j, i, url); 
 end if; 
 commit; 
 end if; 
 
 if :KKSZERZODES_CORE.L_FINTIP = 'HITEL' and :KKSZERZODES_CORE.L_FELMDAT > '2015.06.30' and INGOJZGEPJM=0 and INGOJZGHBNY=0 and :KKSZERZODES_CORE.L_SZSTATUS = 'FELMONDOTT' then
 ret := "report.KK2_DOCUMENT_GEN"( 'KKBEH', :global.USERID, :KKSZERZODES_CORE.L_VEVO, :KKSZERZODES_CORE.L_SZERSZAM, :KKSZERZODES_CORE.U_UGYID, :KKESZKOZ_CORE.L_SZERAZON, null, 'KK_TAJ_ZALOGJOG', NULL, j, i, url);
 ret := "report.KK2_DOCUMENT_GEN"( 'KKBEH', :global.USERID, :KKSZERZODES_CORE.L_VEVO, :KKSZERZODES_CORE.L_SZERSZAM, :KKSZERZODES_CORE.U_UGYID, :KKESZKOZ_CORE.L_SZERAZON, null, 'INGOJELZVISSZ001', NULL, j, i, url); 
 commit;
 end if;
 else
 if :KKUGYLET.UGYL_TIPUS <> 'KORAI PENZBEH' then
 open c_korai_penzbeh;
 fetch c_korai_penzbeh into v_korai_penzbeh;
 close c_korai_penzbeh;
 ugyl := v_korai_penzbeh.UGYL_ID;
 else
 ugyl := :KKUGYLET.UGYL_ID;
 end if;
 if ugyl is not null then
 ret := "report.KK2_DOCUMENT_GEN"('KKBEH', :GLOBAL.USERID, :KKPARTNER_CORE.U_PARTNER, :KKSZERZODES_CORE.L_SZERSZAM, :KKSZERZODES_CORE.U_UGYID, :KKESZKOZ_CORE.L_SZERAZON, ugyl, 'KKINFOLAP', NULL, j, i, url);
 ret := "report.KK2_DOCUMENT_GEN"('KKBEH', :GLOBAL.USERID, :KKPARTNER_CORE.U_PARTNER, :KKSZERZODES_CORE.L_SZERSZAM, :KKSZERZODES_CORE.U_UGYID, :KKESZKOZ_CORE.L_SZERAZON, ugyl, 'ATADBEHAJT', NULL, j, i, url);
 ret := "report.KK2_DOCUMENT_GEN"('KKBEH', :GLOBAL.USERID, :KKPARTNER_CORE.U_PARTNER, :KKSZERZODES_CORE.L_SZERSZAM, :KKSZERZODES_CORE.U_UGYID, :KKESZKOZ_CORE.L_SZERAZON, ugyl, 'KKMUNKA', NULL, j, i, url);
 ret := "report.KK2_DOCUMENT_GEN"('KKBEH', :GLOBAL.USERID, :KKPARTNER_CORE.U_PARTNER, :KKSZERZODES_CORE.L_SZERSZAM, :KKSZERZODES_CORE.U_UGYID, :KKESZKOZ_CORE.L_SZERAZON, ugyl, 'KKFORGALMIF', NULL, j, i, url);
 ret := "report.KK2_DOCUMENT_GEN"('KKBEH', :GLOBAL.USERID, :KKPARTNER_CORE.U_PARTNER, :KKSZERZODES_CORE.L_SZERSZAM, :KKSZERZODES_CORE.U_UGYID, :KKESZKOZ_CORE.L_SZERAZON, ugyl, 'KKBEHESETI001', NULL, j, i, url);
 commit; 
 end if; 
 end if; 
 go_item('KKSZERZODES.L_CEG'); 
END;

ProgramUnit.Name: KKJOGKARTF_SET_ITEM
ProgramUnit.ProgramUnitText:
PROCEDURE KKJOGKARTF_SET_ITEM IS
 t varchar2(13);
 s varchar2(13);

 U_PARTNER varchar2(5) := 'FALSE';
 
 U_KARTONTIP varchar2(5) := 'TRUE';
 U_KARTONST varchar2(5) := 'TRUE';
 U_ELOZMENY varchar2(5) := 'TRUE';
 U_KKJOG_ST varchar2(5) := 'TRUE';
 U_ELJARKEZD varchar2(5) := 'TRUE';
 U_ELJARVEGE varchar2(5) := 'TRUE';
 U_BEFEJEZMOD varchar2(5) := 'TRUE';
 U_SZUNETKEZD varchar2(5) := 'TRUE';
 U_SZUNETVEGE varchar2(5) := 'TRUE';
 U_SZUNETOKA varchar2(5) := 'TRUE';
 U_UGYTARGYA varchar2(5) := 'TRUE';
 U_ELJARERTEK varchar2(5) := 'TRUE';
 U_ELJARKTG varchar2(5) := 'TRUE';
 U_ELJARCTEV varchar2(5) := 'TRUE';
 U_PERVESZTSZ varchar2(5) := 'TRUE';
 U_FAKTORALAS varchar2(5) := 'TRUE';
 U_JOGKOD1 varchar2(5) := 'TRUE';
 U_JOGKOD2 varchar2(5) := 'TRUE';
 U_JOGKOD3 varchar2(5) := 'TRUE';

 U_JOGKOD4 varchar2(5) := 'TRUE';
 U_JOGKOD5 varchar2(5) := 'TRUE';
 U_JOGKOD6 varchar2(5) := 'TRUE';
 U_JOGKOD7 varchar2(5) := 'TRUE';
 U_JOGKOD8 varchar2(5) := 'TRUE';
 
 U_NEXTTRIAL varchar2(5) := 'TRUE';
 U_NEXTDEADLINE varchar2(5) := 'TRUE';

 U_MGJ varchar2(5) := 'TRUE';
 
 itm varchar2(61);
 
 cursor c is
 select L_LOMBKOD, L_LOMBKNEV
 from KOD_V
 where L_KODCSOP = 'JOGKODNEV'
 order by L_LOMBKOD; 
 
 v_c c%rowtype;
BEGIN
 
 open c;
 loop
 fetch c into v_c;
 if c%notfound then
 close c;
 exit;
 end if;
 if v_c.L_LOMBKOD = 'U_JOGKOD1' then
 set_item_property('KKJOGKARTF.U_JOGKOD1',prompt_text,v_c.L_LOMBKNEV);
 elsif v_c.L_LOMBKOD = 'U_JOGKOD2' then
 set_item_property('KKJOGKARTF.U_JOGKOD2',prompt_text,v_c.L_LOMBKNEV);
 elsif v_c.L_LOMBKOD = 'U_JOGKOD3' then
 set_item_property('KKJOGKARTF.U_JOGKOD3',prompt_text,v_c.L_LOMBKNEV);
 elsif v_c.L_LOMBKOD = 'U_FAKTORALAS' then
 set_item_property('KKJOGKARTF.U_FAKTORALAS',prompt_text,v_c.L_LOMBKNEV); 
 elsif v_c.L_LOMBKOD = 'U_JOGKOD4' then
 set_item_property('KKJOGKARTF.U_JOGKOD4',prompt_text,v_c.L_LOMBKNEV);
 elsif v_c.L_LOMBKOD = 'U_JOGKOD5' then
 set_item_property('KKJOGKARTF.U_JOGKOD5',prompt_text,v_c.L_LOMBKNEV);
 elsif v_c.L_LOMBKOD = 'U_JOGKOD6' then
 set_item_property('KKJOGKARTF.U_JOGKOD6',prompt_text,v_c.L_LOMBKNEV);
 elsif v_c.L_LOMBKOD = 'U_JOGKOD7' then
 set_item_property('KKJOGKARTF.U_JOGKOD7',prompt_text,v_c.L_LOMBKNEV);
 elsif v_c.L_LOMBKOD = 'U_JOGKOD8' then
 set_item_property('KKJOGKARTF.U_JOGKOD8',prompt_text,v_c.L_LOMBKNEV);
 end if;
 end loop;
 
 
 if globals.KK_NAME<>'KKJOG' 
 or ( instr(:GLOBAL.USERGROUPS,'KKJOGVEZ')=0
 and instr(:GLOBAL.USERGROUPS,'KKJOGUGY')=0
 and instr(:GLOBAL.USERGROUPS,'KKJOGIRODA')=0
 and instr(:GLOBAL.USERGROUPS,'KKJOGNEZ')>0
 and instr(:GLOBAL.USERGROUPS,'ADMIN')=0
 )
 or :KKJOGKARTF.U_VERZIOST <> 'DRAFT'
 then
 return;
 end if;
 
 if instr(:GLOBAL.USERGROUPS,'KKJOGVEZ')=0
 and instr(:GLOBAL.USERGROUPS,'KKJOGUGY')=0
 and instr(:GLOBAL.USERGROUPS,'KKJOGIRODA')>0
 and instr(:GLOBAL.USERGROUPS,'ADMIN')=0
 then
 U_KARTONST := 'FALSE';
 end if;
 
 t := :KKJOGKARTF.U_KARTONTIP;
 s := :KKJOGKARTP.U_SZEREPKOR;
 
 if :system.cursor_block = 'KKJOGKARTF' then
 KKJOGKART_SET_ITEM_VISIBLE ( 'KKJOGKARTF', 'U_KARTONST' , U_KARTONST );
 KKJOGKART_SET_ITEM_VISIBLE ( 'KKJOGKARTF', 'U_ELOZMENY' , U_ELOZMENY ); 
 KKJOGKART_SET_ITEM_VISIBLE ( 'KKJOGKARTF', 'U_KKJOG_ST' , U_KKJOG_ST );
 KKJOGKART_SET_ITEM_VISIBLE ( 'KKJOGKARTF', 'U_ELJARKEZD' , U_ELJARKEZD );
 KKJOGKART_SET_ITEM_VISIBLE ( 'KKJOGKARTF', 'U_ELJARVEGE' , U_ELJARVEGE );
 KKJOGKART_SET_ITEM_VISIBLE ( 'KKJOGKARTF', 'U_BEFEJEZMOD' , U_BEFEJEZMOD );
 KKJOGKART_SET_ITEM_VISIBLE ( 'KKJOGKARTF', 'U_SZUNETKEZD' , U_SZUNETKEZD );
 KKJOGKART_SET_ITEM_VISIBLE ( 'KKJOGKARTF', 'U_SZUNETVEGE' , U_SZUNETVEGE );
 KKJOGKART_SET_ITEM_VISIBLE ( 'KKJOGKARTF', 'U_SZUNETOKA' , U_SZUNETOKA ); 
 KKJOGKART_SET_ITEM_VISIBLE ( 'KKJOGKARTF', 'U_UGYTARGYA' , U_UGYTARGYA ); 
 KKJOGKART_SET_ITEM_VISIBLE ( 'KKJOGKARTF', 'U_ELJARERTEK' , U_ELJARERTEK );
 KKJOGKART_SET_ITEM_VISIBLE ( 'KKJOGKARTF', 'U_ELJARKTG' , U_ELJARKTG );
 KKJOGKART_SET_ITEM_VISIBLE ( 'KKJOGKARTF', 'U_ELJARCTEV' , U_ELJARCTEV );
 KKJOGKART_SET_ITEM_VISIBLE ( 'KKJOGKARTF', 'U_PERVESZTSZ' , U_PERVESZTSZ );
 KKJOGKART_SET_ITEM_VISIBLE ( 'KKJOGKARTF', 'U_FAKTORALAS' , U_FAKTORALAS );
 KKJOGKART_SET_ITEM_VISIBLE ( 'KKJOGKARTF', 'U_MGJ' , U_MGJ ); 
 KKJOGKART_SET_ITEM_VISIBLE ( 'KKJOGKARTF', 'U_JOGKOD1' , U_JOGKOD1 );
 KKJOGKART_SET_ITEM_VISIBLE ( 'KKJOGKARTF', 'U_JOGKOD2' , U_JOGKOD2 );
 KKJOGKART_SET_ITEM_VISIBLE ( 'KKJOGKARTF', 'U_JOGKOD3' , U_JOGKOD3 );
 KKJOGKART_SET_ITEM_VISIBLE ( 'KKJOGKARTF', 'U_JOGKOD4' , U_JOGKOD4 );
 KKJOGKART_SET_ITEM_VISIBLE ( 'KKJOGKARTF', 'U_JOGKOD5' , U_JOGKOD5 );
 KKJOGKART_SET_ITEM_VISIBLE ( 'KKJOGKARTF', 'U_JOGKOD6' , U_JOGKOD6 );
 KKJOGKART_SET_ITEM_VISIBLE ( 'KKJOGKARTF', 'U_JOGKOD7' , U_JOGKOD7 );
 KKJOGKART_SET_ITEM_VISIBLE ( 'KKJOGKARTF', 'U_JOGKOD8' , U_JOGKOD8 ); 

 KKJOGKART_SET_ITEM_VISIBLE ( 'KKJOGKARTF', 'U_NEXTTRIAL' , U_NEXTTRIAL);
 KKJOGKART_SET_ITEM_VISIBLE ( 'KKJOGKARTF', 'U_NEXTDEADLINE' , U_NEXTDEADLINE); 
 
 if t = 'VEGREHAJTAS' then
 KKJOGKART_SET_ITEM_VISIBLE ( 'KKJOGKARTF_EVENT' , 'U_DATUM', 'TRUE' );
 KKJOGKART_SET_ITEM_VISIBLE ( 'KKJOGKARTF_EVENT' , 'U_EVENT', 'TRUE' );
 KKJOGKART_SET_ITEM_VISIBLE ( 'KKJOGKARTF_EVENT' , 'U_MGJ' , 'TRUE' );
 else
 KKJOGKART_SET_ITEM_VISIBLE ( 'KKJOGKARTF_EVENT' , 'U_DATUM', 'FALSE' );
 KKJOGKART_SET_ITEM_VISIBLE ( 'KKJOGKARTF_EVENT' , 'U_EVENT', 'FALSE' );
 KKJOGKART_SET_ITEM_VISIBLE ( 'KKJOGKARTF_EVENT' , 'U_MGJ' , 'FALSE' );
 end if;
 end if;
 
-- if (t in ('FMH', 'BUNTETO', 'ALTALANOS', 'VEGREHAJTAS' ) and s = 'KOTELEZETT')
-- or (t in ('IGENYPER','PER','PASSZIV','ALTALANOS') and s = 'ALPERES' ) 
-- or (t in ('PASSZIV') and s = 'FELPERES' ) 

 if s in ('FELPERES', 'ALPERES', 'JOGOSULT', 'KOTELEZETT')
 then
 KKJOGKART_SET_ITEM_VISIBLE ( 'KKJOGKARTPD' , 'U_JOGCIM' , 'TRUE');
 KKJOGKART_SET_ITEM_VISIBLE ( 'KKJOGKARTPD' , 'U_OSSZEG' , 'TRUE'); 
 KKJOGKART_SET_ITEM_VISIBLE ( 'KKJOGKARTPD' , 'U_KAMATALAP', 'TRUE');
 KKJOGKART_SET_ITEM_VISIBLE ( 'KKJOGKARTPD' , 'U_TOL' , 'TRUE');
 KKJOGKART_SET_ITEM_VISIBLE ( 'KKJOGKARTPD' , 'U_IG' , 'TRUE');
 KKJOGKART_SET_ITEM_VISIBLE ( 'KKJOGKARTPD' , 'U_MERTEK' , 'TRUE');
 else 
 KKJOGKART_SET_ITEM_VISIBLE ( 'KKJOGKARTPD' , 'U_JOGCIM' , 'FALSE');
 KKJOGKART_SET_ITEM_VISIBLE ( 'KKJOGKARTPD' , 'U_OSSZEG' , 'FALSE'); 
 KKJOGKART_SET_ITEM_VISIBLE ( 'KKJOGKARTPD' , 'U_KAMATALAP', 'FALSE');
 KKJOGKART_SET_ITEM_VISIBLE ( 'KKJOGKARTPD' , 'U_TOL' , 'FALSE');
 KKJOGKART_SET_ITEM_VISIBLE ( 'KKJOGKARTPD' , 'U_IG' , 'FALSE');
 KKJOGKART_SET_ITEM_VISIBLE ( 'KKJOGKARTPD' , 'U_MERTEK' , 'FALSE'); 
 end if;
 
 KKJOGKART_SET_ITEM_VISIBLE ( 'KKJOGKARTP' , 'U_ELJARVEGE' , 'FALSE');
 KKJOGKART_SET_ITEM_VISIBLE ( 'KKJOGKARTP' , 'U_BEFEJEZMOD' , 'FALSE'); 
 KKJOGKART_SET_ITEM_VISIBLE ( 'KKJOGKARTP' , 'U_UGYSZAM' , 'FALSE');
 KKJOGKART_SET_ITEM_VISIBLE ( 'KKJOGKARTP' , 'U_UGYINTEZO' , 'FALSE');
 KKJOGKART_SET_ITEM_VISIBLE ( 'KKJOGKARTP' , 'U_JOGERODATUM' , 'FALSE');
 
 if (t in ( 'FMH', 'BUNTETO', 'ALTALANOS' ) and s = 'KOTELEZETT')
 or (t in ('IGENYPER','PER','PASSZIV','ALTALANOS') and s = 'ALPERES' )
 then
 KKJOGKART_SET_ITEM_VISIBLE ( 'KKJOGKARTP' , 'U_ELJARVEGE' , 'TRUE');
 end if;
 
 if (t in ( 'FMH', 'BUNTETO', 'ALTALANOS' ) and s = 'KOTELEZETT')
 or (t in ('IGENYPER','PER','PASSZIV','ALTALANOS') and s = 'ALPERES' )
 then
 KKJOGKART_SET_ITEM_VISIBLE ( 'KKJOGKARTP' , 'U_BEFEJEZMOD' , 'TRUE');
 end if;
 
 if (t = 'FMH' and s in ('KOZJEGYZO', 'BIROSAG', 'JOGIIRODA'))
 or (t = 'IGENYPER' and s in ('BIROSAG', 'JOGIIRODA', 'UGYGONDNOK'))
 or (t = 'PASSZIV' and s in ('BIROSAG', 'JOGIIRODA','KOZJEGYZO'))
 or (t = 'PER' and s in ('BIROSAG', 'JOGIIRODA', 'UGYGONDNOK'))
 or (t = 'VEGREHAJTAS' and s in ('KOTELEZETT', 'KOZJEGYZO', 'BIROSAG', 'JOGIIRODA', 'UGYGONDNOK', 'VEGREHAJTO')) 
 or (t = 'BUNTETO' and s in ('BIROSAG', 'JOGIIRODA', 'NYOMOZO HAT')) 
 or t = 'ALTALANOS'
 then
 KKJOGKART_SET_ITEM_VISIBLE ( 'KKJOGKARTP' , 'U_UGYSZAM' , 'TRUE');
 end if;
 
 if (t = 'FMH' and s in ('JOGOSULT', 'KOZJEGYZO', 'BIROSAG', 'JOGIIRODA'))
 or (t = 'IGENYPER' and s in ('FELPERES', 'BIROSAG', 'JOGIIRODA', 'UGYGONDNOK'))
 or (t = 'PASSZIV' and s in ('ALPERES', 'BIROSAG', 'JOGIIRODA', 'FELPERES', 'KOZJEGYZO'))
 or (t = 'PER' and s in ('FELPERES', 'ALPERES', 'BIROSAG', 'JOGIIRODA'))
 or (t = 'VEGREHAJTAS' and s in ('JOGOSULT', 'KOZJEGYZO', 'BIROSAG', 'JOGIIRODA', 'UGYGONDNOK', 'VEGREHAJTO')) 
 or (t = 'BUNTETO' and s in ('JOGOSULT', 'BIROSAG', 'JOGIIRODA', 'NYOMOZO HAT')) 
 or t = 'ALTALANOS'
 then
 KKJOGKART_SET_ITEM_VISIBLE ( 'KKJOGKARTP' , 'U_UGYINTEZO' , 'TRUE');
 end if;
 
 if (t in ( 'FMH', 'BUNTETO', 'ALTALANOS' ) and s = 'KOTELEZETT')
 or (t in ('IGENYPER','PER','PASSZIV','ALTALANOS') and s = 'ALPERES' )
 then 
 KKJOGKART_SET_ITEM_VISIBLE ( 'KKJOGKARTP' , 'U_JOGERODATUM' , 'TRUE');
 end if;
 
 
 if :KKJOGKARTP.U_SZEREPKOR = 'JOGIIRODA' then
 set_item_property('KKJOGKARTP.U_UGYINTEZO', LOV_NAME, 'LOV_KKJOGKARTP_UGYINTEZO_I'); 
 set_item_property('KKJOGKARTP.U_UGYINTEZO', validate_from_list, property_true);
 else
 set_item_property('KKJOGKARTP.U_UGYINTEZO', LOV_NAME, 'LOV_KKJOGKARTP_UGYINTEZO_P'); 
 set_item_property('KKJOGKARTP.U_UGYINTEZO', validate_from_list, property_false); 
 end if;
END;

ProgramUnit.Name: KKJOGKARTF_SET_ITEM_VISIBLE
ProgramUnit.ProgramUnitText:
PROCEDURE KKJOGKARTF_SET_ITEM_VISIBLE (itm varchar2, vis varchar2) IS
 i varchar2(70);
BEGIN
 i := 'KKJOGKARTF.' || itm;

 if vis = 'FALSE' then
 --if get_item_property(i, UPDATE_ALLOWED) = 'TRUE' then 
 SET_ITEM (i, 'IINNN' ); -- EVNIUD 
 --end if;
 else
 --if get_item_property(i, UPDATE_ALLOWED) = 'FALSE' then 
 SET_ITEM (i, 'IIIII' ); -- EVNIUD 
 --end if;
 end if;
END;

ProgramUnit.Name: KKJOGKARTP_SET_ITEM_VISIBLE
ProgramUnit.ProgramUnitText:
PROCEDURE KKJOGKARTP_SET_ITEM_VISIBLE (itm varchar2, vis varchar2) IS
 i varchar2(70);
BEGIN
 i := 'KKJOGKARTP.' || itm;
 if vis = 'FALSE' then
 -- if get_item_property(i, UPDATE_ALLOWED) = 'TRUE' then 
 SET_ITEM (i, 'IIINN' ); -- EVNIUD 
 -- end if;
 else
 -- if get_item_property(i, UPDATE_ALLOWED) = 'FALSE' then 
 SET_ITEM (i, 'IIIII' ); -- EVNIUD 
 -- end if;
 end if;
END;

ProgramUnit.Name: DOKUMENTUM_MEGTEKINT
ProgramUnit.ProgramUnitText:
PROCEDURE DOKUMENTUM_MEGTEKINT (p_id number) IS
 cursor d (p_id number) is
 select U_ID, U_FOLDER, U_URL, D_DOCID, U_STATUS, U_DOCNAME, U_DOCID
 from KKDOCSTAR_V
 where U_ID = p_id;
 dd d%rowtype;
 i number;
 kit varchar2(4);
BEGIN
 if p_id is not null then
 open d (p_id);
 fetch d into dd;
 close d;
--msg(dd.U_URL); 
 if dd.U_FOLDER is not null and dd.U_STATUS = 'FELTOLTVE' then
 --if instr(nvl(dd.U_MGJ,'X'),'ALAP') = 0 then
 if dd.U_URL is null then
 if dd.D_DOCID is null then 
 kit := UPPER(SUBSTR(dd.U_DOCNAME,LENGTH(dd.U_DOCNAME)-3,4));
 if substr(kit,1,1)<>'.' then
 kit := '.PDF';
 end if;
 web.show_document(:GLOBAL.KKDOCURL || dd.U_FOLDER || '/' || dd.U_DOCID || kit ,'_BLANK');
 else
 web.show_document(:GLOBAL.DOCURL || dd.U_FOLDER || '/' || dd.U_DOCNAME,'_BLANK');
 end if;
 else
--msg(nvl(globals.JOGIRODA,'NONE')); 
 --if nvl(globals.JOGIRODA,'NONE') = 'SULYOK' then 
 -- web.show_document(replace(dd.U_URL,'mordor.lombard.hu','127.0.0.1:8081'),'_BLANK'); 
 --else 
 web.show_document(dd.U_URL,'_BLANK');
 --end if; 
 end if;
 end if;
 end if;
END;

ProgramUnit.Name: PRINT_MERGE_CHECK
ProgramUnit.ProgramUnitText:
PROCEDURE PRINT_MERGE_CHECK IS
 pid number;
 repid REPORT_OBJECT;
 rep varchar2(255);
 rep_status varchar(30);
 mergefile varchar2(500);
 
 docid number;
 url varchar2(4000);
 folder varchar2(30);
 
 bname varchar2(255);
 bpath varchar2(255);
 fname varchar2(255);
 furl varchar2(2000);
 fext varchar2(10);
 elso varchar2(5) := 'TRUE';
 out_file Text_IO.File_Type;
 in_file Text_IO.File_Type;
 fil varchar2(1000);
 dir varchar2(1000);
 cmd varchar2(2000);
 
 tifname varchar(50);
 ktifname varchar(4001);
 
 lst_tif varchar2(4000);
 lst_img varchar2(4000);
 lst_pdf varchar2(4000);
 lst_other varchar2(4000);
 
 sor varchar2(80);
 
 i number;
 rec number;
 ret number;
 db number := 0;
 dw varchar2(4000);
begin
 dw :=get_block_property('KKDOCSTAR',default_where);
 set_block_property('KKDOCSTAR',default_where,'U_SORREND > 0');
 set_block_property('KKDOCSTAR',order_by,'U_SORREND,U_ID');
 go_item('KKDOCSTAR.U_ID');
 execute_query;
 set_block_property('KKDOCSTAR',default_where,dw);
 set_block_property('KKDOCSTAR',order_by,'U_ID');
 if :KKDOCSTAR.U_ID is null then
 KKDOCSTAR_QUERY;
 return;
 end if;
 
 globals.docmerge := 'TRUE';
 SET_BLOCK_PROPERTY('DSTATUS',INSERT_ALLOWED,PROPERTY_TRUE); 
 MERGE_HEADER;
 
 DSTATUS_PROCESS ('Dokumentumok összefűzése ...');
 
 mergefile := :GLOBAL.USERID || '_' || to_char(sysdate,'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS') || '.PDF';
 
 lst_pdf := ''; 
 
 DSTATUS_PROCESS ('Merge file: ' || mergefile);

 DSTATUS_PROCESS ('Letöltés előkészítése...');
 
 /*****************************************************************************************
 * BAT fájl készítése
 /****************************************************************************************/
 
 bpath := :GLOBAL.USERID || '_' || to_char(sysdate,'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS');
 bname := bpath || '.BAT'; 
 
--msg(:GLOBAL.KKMERGEPATH || bname);
 
 out_file := Text_IO.Fopen(:GLOBAL.KKMERGEPATH || bname, 'w'); 
 Text_IO.Put_Line(out_file,'REM =====================================================================');
 Text_IO.Put_Line(out_file,'REM Dokumentumcsomag előállítása');
 Text_IO.Put_Line(out_file,'REM Generálta : ' || :GLOBAL.USERID);
 Text_IO.Put_Line(out_file,'REM Partner : ' || :KKPARTNER_CORE.L_NEV || ' (' || :KKPARTNER_CORE.U_PARTNER || ')' );
 Text_IO.Put_Line(out_file,'REM Ügy verzió : ' || :KKSZERZODES_KART.U_UGYID );
 Text_IO.Put_Line(out_file,'REM Dátum,idő: ' || to_char(sysdate,'YYYY.MM.DD HH24:MI:SS'));
 Text_IO.Put_Line(out_file,'REM =====================================================================');
 Text_IO.Put_Line(out_file,'CD ' || :GLOBAL.KKMERGEPATH);
 --Text_IO.Put_Line(out_file,'CD \OraApp\TDocs\merge'); 
 Text_IO.Put_Line(out_file,'MD ' || bpath );
 Text_IO.Put_Line(out_file,'CD ' || bpath ); 
 
 /*****************************************************************************************
 * Dokumentum letöltő rész
 *****************************************************************************************/
 DSTATUS_PROCESS ('Dokumentumok letöltése...');
 --msg('Dokumentum letöltő rész');
 
 --cmd := 'c:\oraapp\bin\curl -o "' || mergefile || '" "' || :GLOBAL.KKDOCTMPURL || mergefile || '"';
 --Text_IO.Put_Line(out_file, cmd ); 
 go_item('KKDOCSTAR.U_ID');
 first_record;
 loop
 if :KKDOCSTAR.CHECK = 'I' then 
 db := db + 1; 
--synchronize; 
 if instr(nvl(:KKDOCSTAR.U_DOCNAME,''),'.')=0 or length(nvl(:KKDOCSTAR.U_DOCNAME,''))<4 then
 fext := '.TIF';
 else 
 fext := substr(:KKDOCSTAR.U_DOCNAME,length(:KKDOCSTAR.U_DOCNAME)-3,4);
 end if; 
 fname := '0000000000' || to_char(:KKDOCSTAR.U_ID) || fext;
 fname := substr(fname,length(fname)-13);
--msg(fname);
 furl := :KKDOCSTAR.U_URL; 
 if furl is null then
 ret := "report.GET_KKDOCSTAR_URL_SP"(:KKDOCSTAR.U_ID, furl);
 end if; 
 furl := replace(furl,'noblob=1','noblob=0');
 furl := replace(furl,'%','%%'); 
--msg(furl); 
 DSTATUS_PROCESS (fname); 
 cmd := 'c:\oraapp\bin\curl -o "' || fname || '" "' || furl || '"';
 Text_IO.Put_Line(out_file, cmd ); 

 if upper(substr(fname, length(fname)-3, 4)) = '.TIF' then -- ezeket kell majd PDF-fé konvertálni
 if lst_tif is null then
 lst_tif := fname;
 else 
 lst_tif := lst_tif || ',' || fname;
 end if;
 end if;
 
 if upper(substr(fname, length(fname)-3, 4)) in ( '.JPG', '.GIF' ) then -- ezeket kell majd PDF-fé konvertálni
 if lst_img is null then
 lst_img := fname;
 else 
 lst_img := lst_img || ',' || fname;
 end if;
 end if;
 
 end if; 
 if :system.last_record = 'FALSE' then
 next_record; 
 else
 exit;
 end if;
 end loop; 
 Text_IO.Fclose (out_file); 
 if db > 1 then
 DSTATUS_PROCESS ('Dokumentumok letöltése.....' || :GLOBAL.KKMERGEPATH || bpath); 
 host(:GLOBAL.KKMERGEPATH || bname,NO_SCREEN); 
 else
 DSTATUS_PROCESS ('Nincs kijelölve dokumentum!'); 
 return;
 end if;
 
 /*****************************************************************************************
 * Formátum ellenőrzés
 *
 * első körben megnézzük, hogy PDF vagy TIF-e a kiterjesztés nélküli fájl, ha van olyan
 *
 * lst_tif-be gyűjtjük a PDF-fé konvertálandó TIF-eket
 *
 * lst_pdf-be gyűjtjük az összefűzendő PDF-eket, így ezek a megfelelő sorrendben lesznek
 *
 *****************************************************************************************/
 
 
 DSTATUS_PROCESS ('Formátum ellenőrzése...');
 
 go_item('KKDOCSTAR.U_ID');
 first_record;
 loop
 if :KKDOCSTAR.CHECK = 'I' then
 if instr(:KKDOCSTAR.U_DOCNAME,'.')=0 or length(:KKDOCSTAR.U_DOCNAME)<4 then
 fext := '.TIF';
 else 
 fext := substr(:KKDOCSTAR.U_DOCNAME,length(:KKDOCSTAR.U_DOCNAME)-3,4);
 end if;
 fname := '0000000000' || to_char(:KKDOCSTAR.U_ID) || fext;
 fname := substr(fname,length(fname)-13);
 
 if instr(fname,'.') = 0 or instr(fname,'.')=length(rtrim(fname)) then
 DSTATUS_PROCESS (:GLOBAL.KKMERGEPATH || bpath || '\'|| fname); 
 in_file := Text_IO.Fopen(:GLOBAL.KKMERGEPATH || bpath || '\'|| fname , 'r'); 
 Text_IO.Get_Line(in_file,sor);
 if substr(sor,1,3) = 'II*' then -- ez egy TIF fájl, ezért kiegészítjük a kiterjesztéssel
 if Text_IO.Is_Open(out_file) = FALSE then
 out_file := Text_IO.Fopen(:GLOBAL.KKMERGEPATH || bpath || '\konvert.bat', 'w'); 
 Text_IO.Put_Line(out_file,'CD ' || :GLOBAL.KKMERGEPATH || bpath);
 end if; 
 if instr(fname,'.') = 0 then 
 tifname := fname || '.TIF' ;
 cmd := 'rename ' || fname || ' ' || tifname;
 else
 tifname := fname || 'TIF' ;
 cmd := 'rename ' || fname || ' ' || tifname;
 end if;
 Text_IO.Put_Line(out_file, cmd ); 
 -- ezeket kell majd PDF-fé konvertálni
 if lst_tif is null then
 lst_tif := tifname;
 else 
 lst_tif := lst_tif || ',' || tifname;
 end if; 
 DSTATUS_PROCESS ('------>' || :GLOBAL.KKMERGEPATH || bpath || '\'|| tifname); 
 lst_pdf := lst_pdf || ' -f ' || substr(tifname,1,length(tifname)-4) || '.PDF'; -- ez lesz a PDF neve 
 else 
 DSTATUS_PROCESS ('------> Nem konvertálható. ' || fname ||' ' || to_char(:KKDOCSTAR.U_ID));
 end if; 
 Text_IO.Fclose(in_file); 
 else
 lst_pdf := lst_pdf || ' -f ' || substr(fname,1,length(fname)-4) || '.PDF'; -- eleve TIF vagy PDF
 end if; 
 
 if upper(substr(fname, length(fname)-3,4)) = '.TIF' then 
 --cmd := 'c:\oraapp\bin\tif_to_pdf\bin\tiff2pdf -o ' || substr(fname, 1, length(fname)-4) || '.PDF ' || fname;
 --cmd := 'c:\oraapp\bin\tif_to_pdf\bin\nconvert -in tiff -out pdf ' || fname ;
 cmd := 'c:\oraapp\bin\tif_to_pdf\bin\TiffToPdf ' || fname ; 
 Text_IO.Put_Line(out_file, cmd ); 
 end if;
 
-- if upper(substr(fname, length(fname)-3,4)) in ( '.JPG', '.GIF' ) then 
-- cmd := 'c:\oraapp\bin\tif_to_pdf\bin\img2pdf ' || fname || substr(fname, 1, length(fname)-4) || '.PDF ' ;
-- Text_IO.Put_Line(out_file, cmd ); 
-- end if; 
 end if;
 if :system.last_record = 'FALSE' then
 next_record; 
 else
 exit;
 end if;
 end loop;

 
 /*****************************************************************************************
 * Konvertáló rész
 *****************************************************************************************/
 
 DSTATUS_PROCESS ('Konvertálás előkészítése...');
 
 if nvl(lst_tif,'!') > '!' then
 
 if Text_IO.Is_Open(out_file) = FALSE then
 out_file := Text_IO.Fopen(:GLOBAL.KKMERGEPATH || bpath || '\konvert.bat', 'w'); 
 Text_IO.Put_Line(out_file,'CD ' || :GLOBAL.KKMERGEPATH || bpath); 
 end if;
 
 ktifname := lst_tif || ',';
 
 while length(ktifname) > 0 loop 
 tifname := substr(ktifname,1,instr(ktifname,',')-1);
 --cmd := 'c:\oraapp\bin\tif_to_pdf\bin\tiff2pdf -o ' || substr(tifname, 1, length(tifname)-4) || '.PDF' || ' ' || tifname ;
 --cmd := 'c:\oraapp\bin\tif_to_pdf\bin\nconvert -in tiff -out pdf ' || tifname ;
 cmd := 'c:\oraapp\bin\tif_to_pdf\bin\TiffToPdf ' || tifname ; 
 Text_IO.Put_Line(out_file, cmd ); 
 DSTATUS_PROCESS (tifname); 
 if ktifname = tifname then
 exit;
 end if;
 ktifname := substr(ktifname,1+instr(ktifname,','),length(ktifname)-length(tifname)-1); 
 --msg(ktifname); 
 end loop;

 end if; 
 
 if nvl(lst_img,'!') > '!' then
 
 if Text_IO.Is_Open(out_file) = FALSE then
 out_file := Text_IO.Fopen(:GLOBAL.KKMERGEPATH || bpath || '\konvert.bat', 'w'); 
 Text_IO.Put_Line(out_file,'CD ' || :GLOBAL.KKMERGEPATH || bpath); 
 end if;
 
 ktifname := lst_img || ',';
 
 while length(ktifname) > 0 loop 
 tifname := substr(ktifname,1,instr(ktifname,',')-1);
 cmd := 'c:\oraapp\bin\tif_to_pdf\bin\img2pdf ' || tifname || ' ' || substr(tifname, 1, length(tifname)-4) || '.PDF ' ; 
 Text_IO.Put_Line(out_file, cmd ); 
 DSTATUS_PROCESS (tifname); 
 if ktifname = tifname then
 exit;
 end if;
 ktifname := substr(ktifname,1+instr(ktifname,','),length(ktifname)-length(tifname)-1); 
 --msg(ktifname); 
 end loop;
 
 end if; 

 /*****************************************************************************************
 * Összefűző rész
 *****************************************************************************************/ 
 
 DSTATUS_PROCESS ('Konvertálás és összefűzés...');
 
 if Text_IO.Is_Open(out_file) = FALSE then
 out_file := Text_IO.Fopen(:GLOBAL.KKMERGEPATH || bpath || '\konvert.bat', 'w'); 
 Text_IO.Put_Line(out_file,'CD ' || :GLOBAL.KKMERGEPATH || bpath); 
 end if;
 
 cmd := 'java -Dlog4j.configuration=console-log4j.xml -jar /oraapp\Pdfsam/lib/pdfsam-console-1.1.5e.jar ' || lst_pdf || ' -o ' || :GLOBAL.KKMERGEPATH || bpath || '\' || bpath || '.PDF concat ';
 Text_IO.Put_Line(out_file, cmd ); 
 
 Text_IO.Fclose(out_file); 

 host(:GLOBAL.KKMERGEPATH || bpath || '\konvert.bat' ,NO_SCREEN); 
 
 DSTATUS_PROCESS ('Dokumentumcsomag megjelenítése...');
 
 web.show_document(:GLOBAL.KKMERGEURL || bpath || '/' || bpath || '.PDF', '_BLANK');
 
 GO_BLOCK( 'DSTATUS' );
 
 SET_BLOCK_PROPERTY('DSTATUS',INSERT_ALLOWED,PROPERTY_FALSE); 
 -- KKDOCSTAR_QUERY; 
exception when others then
 if Text_IO.Is_Open(out_file) = TRUE then
 Text_IO.Fclose(out_file); 
 end if;
 GO_BLOCK( 'DSTATUS' ); 
 SET_BLOCK_PROPERTY('DSTATUS',INSERT_ALLOWED,PROPERTY_FALSE); 
 message('Hiba történt a feldolgozásban! Kérem ellenőrizze a beválasztott dokumentumokat!');
end;

ProgramUnit.Name: MERGE_HEADER
ProgramUnit.ProgramUnitText:
PROCEDURE MERGE_HEADER IS
 blk varchar2(30);
BEGIN
 blk := :SYSTEM.CURSOR_BLOCK;
 
 GO_BLOCK( 'DSTATUS' );
 CLEAR_BLOCK;
 IF :DSTATUS.TXT IS NOT NULL THEN
 LAST_RECORD;
 CREATE_RECORD;
 END IF;
 
 :DSTATUS.TXT := LPAD('=',99,'='); 
 CREATE_RECORD; 
 :DSTATUS.TXT := 'Dokumentomok összefűzése';
 
 CREATE_RECORD;
 :DSTATUS.TXT := :KKPARTNER_CORE.L_NEV || ' (' || :KKPARTNER_CORE.U_PARTNER || ') ' ;
 
 CREATE_RECORD;
 :DSTATUS.TXT := :KKSZERZODES_CORE.U_UGYID;
 
 CREATE_RECORD;
 :DSTATUS.TXT := LPAD('-',99,'-'); 
 
 SYNCHRONIZE;
 GO_BLOCK (blk);
END;

ProgramUnit.Name: PRINT_KKBEHSPEC
ProgramUnit.ProgramUnitText:
PROCEDURE PRINT_KKBEHSPEC IS

 pid number;
 ret pls_integer;
 repid REPORT_OBJECT;
 rep varchar2(255);
 rep_status varchar(30);
 docname varchar2(500);
 docid number;
 url varchar2(4000);
 folder varchar2(30);
 params varchar2(255);
 alap number;
 keska number;
 egyeb number;
 ceg varchar2(13);
BEGIN
---- ilyen report nincs is!
 
 docname := 'KKBEHSPEC' || '_' || to_char(sysdate,'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS') || '.PDF';
 params := 'P_BEHAJTO=''' || 'KK2 :KKSZERZODES.L_ELSZBEH' || ''' P_VEVO=''' || :KKSZERZODES_CORE.L_VEVO || ''' P_ERTEKNAP=''' || to_char(:PRINT_KKBEHSPEC.L_DATUM,'YYYY.MM.DD') || ''' P_IKTATOSZAM=''' || 'KK-01' || '''';
 insert into KKDOCSTAR (
 U_FORRAS, U_DOCTYPE, U_DOCTYPEN, U_DOCNAME, U_STATUS, 
 U_PARTNER, U_UGYID, U_SZERSZAM, U_SZERAZON, 
 DATE_CREATED, CREATED_BY, DATE_MODIFIED, MODIFIED_BY)
 values (
 :PARAMETER.KK, 'KKBEHSPEC', 'Speciális megb. a behajtóknak elsz. ut. részl.', docname, 'UJ', 
 :KKPARTNER_CORE.U_PARTNER, :KKSZERZODES_CORE.U_UGYID, :KKSZERZODES_CORE.L_SZERSZAM, null,
 sysdate, :GLOBAL.USERID, sysdate, :GLOBAL.USERID
 );
 
 ret := "report.GET_KKDOCSTAR_IDENTITY"(docid); 
 commit; 

 ret := "report.EDRMON_KKJOB" (
 :GLOBAL.USERID -- JOB-t indító Forrás SQL felhasználó kódja
 ,pid -- Porcessz ID OUTPUT --> ezzel kell hivatkozni a továbbiakban 
 ,'KKBEHSPEC' -- Dokumentum típusa
 ,'KK2_KKBEHSPEC_01' -- Dokumentum típus verzió
 ,docname -- Dokumentum neve
 ,docid -- Dokumentum azonosító
 ,params -- Paraméterek
 ,:KKPARTNER_CORE.U_PARTNER -- Partner 
 );
 commit;
END;

ProgramUnit.Name: PRINT_KKFMH_XML
ProgramUnit.ProgramUnitText:
PROCEDURE PRINT_KKFMH_XML IS

 cursor c_szerzdb (cp_pid number) is select count(*) darab from FMH_SZERZLIST where PID = cp_pid and FMH = 'I';
 v_szerzdb c_szerzdb%rowtype;
 
 cursor c_szerz (cp_pid number) is select * from FMH_SZERZLIST where PID = cp_pid and FMH = 'I';
 v_szerz c_szerz%rowtype;


 pid number;
 repid REPORT_OBJECT;
 rep varchar2(255);
 rep_status varchar(30);
 fmhdocname varchar2(500);
 
 docid number;
 url varchar2(4000);
 folder varchar2(30);
 
 bname varchar2(255);
 bpath varchar2(255);
 fname varchar2(255);
 furl varchar2(2000);
 elso varchar2(5) := 'TRUE';
 out_file Text_IO.File_Type;
 in_file Text_IO.File_Type;
 fil varchar2(1000);
 dir varchar2(1000);
 cmd varchar2(2000);
 
 tifname varchar(50);
 ktifname varchar(4001);
 
 
 lst_tif varchar2(4000);
 lst_pdf varchar2(4000);
 lst_other varchar2(4000);
 
 sor varchar2(80);
 
 elszdat date;
 
 i number;
 rec number;
 
 vbsgen varchar2(1000);
 
begin
 
 open c_szerzdb (:KKFMH_CTRL.FMH_PID);
 fetch c_szerzdb into v_szerzdb;
 close c_szerzdb;
 
 if nvl(v_szerzdb.darab,0) = 0 then
 msg('Nincsenek kijelölt szerződések, a generálás nem lehetséges.');
 return;
 end if;
 
 SET_BLOCK_PROPERTY('DSTATUS',INSERT_ALLOWED,PROPERTY_TRUE); 
 DSTATUS_HEADER;
 
 DSTATUS_PROCESS ('FMH dokumentum generálása elektronikus benyújtáshoz...');
 /*****************************************************************************************
 * 
 * Fizetési meghagyás XML generálása
 *
 *****************************************************************************************/
 
 if v_szerzdb.darab > 1 then 
 fmhdocname := 'FMH' || '_' || clean_string(:KKSZERZODES_CORE.L_VEVONEV) || '_' ||rtrim(:KKSZERZODES_CORE.L_VEVO) || '_' || to_char(:KKFMH_CTRL.FMH_PID) || to_char(sysdate,'MISS') || '.XML'; 
 else
 open c_szerz (:KKFMH_CTRL.FMH_PID);
 fetch c_szerz into v_szerz;
 close c_szerz; 
 fmhdocname := 'FMH' || '_' || clean_string(:KKSZERZODES_CORE.L_VEVONEV) || '_' || rtrim(:KKSZERZODES_CORE.L_VEVO) || '_' || v_szerz.L_SZERSZAM || '_' || to_char(:KKFMH_CTRL.FMH_PID) || to_char(sysdate,'MISS') || '.XML';
 end if; 
 
 
 --fmhdocname := 'FIZMEGHAGY' || '_' || rtrim(:KKSZERZODES_CORE.L_VEVO) || '_' || :KKSZERZODES_CORE.L_SZERSZAM || '_' || to_char(sysdate,'MISS') || '.XML';
 
 --lst_pdf := ' -f '|| fmhdocname; 
 
 DSTATUS_PROCESS (fmhdocname);
 
 DSTATUS_PROCESS (vbsgen);
 
 DSTATUS_PROCESS ('FMH XML generálása...');
 
 vbsgen := '\oraapp\bin\fmh_xml_teszt.vbs ' || :GLOBAL.DOCPATH || 'fmhxml\' || fmhdocname || ' ' || to_char(:KKFMH_CTRL.FMH_PID) || ' ' || :KKSZERZODES_CORE.L_VEVO ||' ' || :KKFMH_CTRL.KESKAM ;
 
 --vbsgen := '\oraapp\bin\fmh_xml_teszt.vbs ' || :GLOBAL.DOCPATH || 'fmhxml\' || fmhdocname || ' ' || to_char(:KKFMH_CTRL.FMH_PID) || ' ' || :KKSZERZODES_CORE.L_VEVO ||' ' || :KKFMH_CTRL.KESKAM ;
 
 DSTATUS_PROCESS (vbsgen);
 
-- msg(vbsgen);
-- msg(:GLOBAL.KKFMHXMLURL || fmhdocname);
 
-- DSTATUS_PROCESS ('');
 
 host(vbsgen,NO_SCREEN); 
 
 DSTATUS_PROCESS ('FMH XML megjelenítése...');
 
 --web.show_document(:GLOBAL.KKFMHXMLURL || fmhdocname, '_BLANK');
 
 
 --web.show_document('http://' || :GLOBAL.P_SERVER || '/oraapp/docs/fmhxml/' || fmhdocname, '_BLANK');
 
 web.show_document( :GLOBAL.KKFMHXMLURL || fmhdocname, '_BLANK'); 
 
 GO_BLOCK( 'DSTATUS' );
 
 --SET_BLOCK_PROPERTY('DSTATUS',INSERT_ALLOWED,PROPERTY_FALSE); 
 
 
 
 if :KKFMH_CTRL.FELTOLT = 'I' then
 
 /*
 begin 
 in_file := Text_IO.Fopen(:GLOBAL.DOCPATH || 'fmhxml\' || fmhdocname , 'r'); 
 Text_IO.Get_Line(in_file,sor); 
 Text_IO.Fclose(in_file);
 
 
 EXCEPTION
 WHEN Others THEN
 msg('Az XML állomány generálása sikertelen volt.');
 RAISE;
 
 end;
 */
 
 
 
 -- ha eddig ok, akkor feltöltjük a dokumentum tárba, de csak az XML dokumentumot
 
 
 /*
 msg(:PARAMETER.KK);
 msg( fname);
 msg(:KKPARTNER_CORE.U_PARTNER);
 msg(:KKSZERZODES_CORE.U_UGYID);
 msg(:KKSZERZODES_CORE.L_SZERSZAM);
 msg(sysdate);
 msg(:GLOBAL.USERID);
 */
 
 
 insert into KKDOCSTAR (
 U_FORRAS, U_DOCTYPE, U_DOCTYPEN, U_DOCNAME, U_STATUS, 
 U_PARTNER, U_UGYID, U_SZERSZAM, U_SZERAZON, 
 DATE_CREATED, CREATED_BY, DATE_MODIFIED, MODIFIED_BY)
 values (:PARAMETER.KK, 'KK_FMH_XML', 'Fizetési meghagyás XML', fmhdocname, 'UJ', 
 :KKPARTNER_CORE.U_PARTNER, :KKSZERZODES_CORE.U_UGYID, :KKSZERZODES_CORE.L_SZERSZAM, null,
 sysdate, :GLOBAL.USERID, sysdate, :GLOBAL.USERID);
 
 
 commit;
 
 DSTATUS_PROCESS ('FMH XML letárolása...');
 
 
 select max(U_ID) 
 into docid 
 from KKDOCSTAR 
 where U_PARTNER = :KKPARTNER_CORE.U_PARTNER
 and U_DOCTYPE = 'KK_FMH_XML'
 and U_UGYID = :KKSZERZODES_CORE.U_UGYID
 and U_DOCNAME = fmhdocname;
 
 
 --url := :GLOBAL.CURL || ' -F "userfile=@' || :GLOBAL.DOCPATH || 'fmhxml\' || bpath || '\'|| fmhdocname || '" -F "P_DOCID=' || docid || '" ' || replace(:GLOBAL.KKUPLOAD,'kk.php?P_DOCID=','upload.php');
 
 url := :GLOBAL.CURL || ' -F "userfile=@' || :GLOBAL.DOCPATH || 'fmhxml\' || fmhdocname || '" -F "P_DOCID=' || docid || '" ' || replace(:GLOBAL.KKUPLOAD,'kk.php?P_DOCID=','upload.php');
 
 --msg(url);
 
 host(url,NO_SCREEN);
 
 DSTATUS_PROCESS ('Letárolás kész.'); 
 
 end if;
 
 
end;

ProgramUnit.Name: KKPARTNER_TREE_INIT
ProgramUnit.ProgramUnitText:
PROCEDURE KKPARTNER_TREE_INIT IS
 htree ITEM;
 v_ignore NUMBER;
 rg_apps RECORDGROUP;
 ret pls_integer;
 spid varchar2(10);
 sql_qry varchar2(4000);
 sql_db varchar2(255);
 qry_mode varchar2(30);
BEGIN
 set_block_property('KKPARTNER_TREE',update_allowed,property_true);
 set_block_property('KKPARTNER_TREE',insert_allowed,property_true);
 
 spid := :GLOBAL.SPID;

 htree := FIND_ITEM('KKPARTNER_TREE.TREE');
 
 rg_apps := FIND_GROUP('rg_apps'); 
 IF NOT ID_NULL(rg_apps) THEN
 DELETE_GROUP(rg_apps);
 END IF;
 
 -- Create the record group.
 sql_qry := 'select INITIAL_STATE, DEPTH, LABEL, ICON, DATA';
 sql_qry := sql_qry || ' from report.KKPARTNER_TREE';
 sql_qry := sql_qry || ' order by TREE_PARENT';
 
 rg_apps := CREATE_GROUP_FROM_QUERY( 'rg_apps', sql_qry ); 
 
 -- Populate the record group with data.
 v_ignore := POPULATE_GROUP(rg_apps); 
 
 -- Transfer the data from the record group to the hierarchical
 -- tree and cause it to display.
 
 FTREE.SET_TREE_PROPERTY(htree, FTREE.RECORD_GROUP, rg_apps); 
 KKPARTNER_TREE_EXPAND_ALL;
END;

ProgramUnit.Name: KKPARTNER_TREE_COLLAPSED_ALL
ProgramUnit.ProgramUnitText:
PROCEDURE KKPARTNER_TREE_COLLAPSED_ALL IS
 htree ITEM;
 node Ftree.NODE;
 state number;
 depth number;
 data varchar2(255);
 i number := 0;
 p number := 0;
 s number := 0;
 e number := 0;
 f number := 0; 
begin
 htree := FIND_ITEM('KKPARTNER_TREE.TREE');
 node := Ftree.Find_Tree_Node(htree, '');
 WHILE NOT Ftree.ID_NULL(node) LOOP 
 state := Ftree.Get_Tree_Node_Property(htree, node, Ftree.NODE_STATE);
 --data := Ftree.Get_Tree_Node_Property(htree, node, Ftree.NODE_VALUE);
 depth := Ftree.Get_Tree_Node_Property(htree, node, Ftree.NODE_DEPTH); 
 IF state = Ftree.EXPANDED_NODE THEN
 --Ftree.Set_Tree_Node_Property(htree, node, Ftree.NODE_STATE, Ftree.EXPANDED_NODE);
 Ftree.Set_Tree_Node_Property(htree, node, Ftree.NODE_STATE, Ftree.COLLAPSED_NODE);
 END IF;
 -- node := Ftree.Find_Tree_Node(htree, '', search_root => node);
 node := Ftree.Find_Tree_Node(htree, '', Ftree.FIND_NEXT,Ftree.NODE_LABEL, '', node); 
 END LOOP; 
END;

ProgramUnit.Name: KKPARTNER_TREE_EXPAND_ALL
ProgramUnit.ProgramUnitText:
PROCEDURE KKPARTNER_TREE_EXPAND_ALL IS
 htree ITEM;
 node Ftree.NODE;
 state number;
 label varchar2(4000);
 depth number;
 tdata varchar2(4000);
 i number := 0;
 v_szint number := 2;
begin
 go_item('KKPARTNER_TREE.TREE');
 htree := FIND_ITEM('KKPARTNER_TREE.TREE');
 node := Ftree.Find_Tree_Node(htree, '');
 WHILE NOT Ftree.ID_NULL(node) LOOP 
 state := Ftree.Get_Tree_Node_Property(htree, node, Ftree.NODE_STATE); 
 label := Ftree.Get_Tree_Node_Property(htree, node, Ftree.NODE_LABEL);
 depth := to_number(Ftree.Get_Tree_Node_Property(htree, node, Ftree.NODE_DEPTH));
 --tdata := Ftree.Get_Tree_Node_Property(htree, node, Ftree.NODE_VALUE);
 IF state = Ftree.COLLAPSED_NODE and ( depth <= v_szint) THEN
 Ftree.Set_Tree_Node_Property(htree, node, Ftree.NODE_STATE, Ftree.EXPANDED_NODE);
 Ftree.Set_Tree_Selection(htree, node, Ftree.SELECT_ON);
 Ftree.Set_Tree_Selection(htree, node, Ftree.SELECT_OFF); 
 END IF;
 node := Ftree.Find_Tree_Node(htree, '', Ftree.FIND_NEXT, Ftree.NODE_LABEL, '', node);
 END LOOP; 
 --synchronize;
 node := Ftree.Find_Tree_Node(htree, ''); 
 node := Ftree.Find_Tree_Node(htree, '', Ftree.FIND_NEXT, Ftree.NODE_LABEL, '', node); 
 Ftree.Set_Tree_Selection(htree, node, Ftree.SELECT_ON);
 Ftree.Set_Tree_Selection(htree, node, Ftree.SELECT_OFF); 
 node := Ftree.Find_Tree_Node(htree, '');
 Ftree.Set_Tree_Selection(htree, node, Ftree.SELECT_ON);
 Ftree.Set_Tree_Selection(htree, node, Ftree.SELECT_OFF);
 --synchronize;
end;

ProgramUnit.Name: KKUGYLET_SET
ProgramUnit.ProgramUnitText:
PROCEDURE KKUGYLET_SET IS
 cursor c_kkugylet_tipus is
 select * 
 from KKUGYLET_TIPUS 
 where UGYL_TIPUS = :KKUGYLET.UGYL_TIPUS;
 
 v_kkugylet_tipus c_kkugylet_tipus%rowtype;
 
 cursor c_kezdo_statusz is
 select *
 from KKUGYLET_TIPUS_KOD
 where UGYL_TIPUS = :KKUGYLET.UGYL_TIPUS
 and UGYL_KODCSOPORT = 'STATUSZ'
 and UGYL_KOD_JELLEG = 'KEZDO';
 
 v_kezdo_statusz c_kezdo_statusz%rowtype;
 
 cursor c_kkugylet_tipus_col (p_ugyl_tipus varchar2) is
 select c.*, 
 t.UGYL_TIPUS_INDITO_OSZ, t.UGYL_TIPUS_INDITO_SZE, 
 t.UGYL_TIPUS_FOGADO_OSZ, t.UGYL_TIPUS_FOGADO_SZE, 
 t.UGYL_TIPUS_INDFOG_OSZ, t.UGYL_TIPUS_INDFOG_SZE, 
 t.UGYL_TIPUS_SZINT, t.UGYL_TIPUS_KEZELES
 from KKUGYLET_TIPUS_COL_V c, KKUGYLET_TIPUS t
 where c.TABLEID = 'KKUGYLET' 
 and c.COLUMNID <> 'UGYL_TIPUS'
 and c.UGYL_TIPUS = p_ugyl_tipus
 and t.UGYL_TIPUS = c.UGYL_TIPUS
 and c.COLUMNID not like '%(%';
 
 v_kkugylet_tipus_col c_kkugylet_tipus_col%rowtype;
 aktitm varchar2(80);
 itm varchar2(80);
 ret pls_integer;
 ma date;
 nap number;
 jogosult varchar2(5) := 'FALSE';
 nevitm varchar2(1000);
 init_value varchar2(2000);
 t_1 date;
 t_2 date;
 t_3 date;
 t_4 date;
 t_5 date;
 t_6 date;
 t_7 date;
 t_8 date;
 t_9 date;
 t_10 date;

BEGIN
-- t_1 := sysdate;
 open c_kkugylet_tipus;
 fetch c_kkugylet_tipus into v_kkugylet_tipus;
 close c_kkugylet_tipus;
 
 open c_kezdo_statusz;
 fetch c_kezdo_statusz into v_kezdo_statusz;
 close c_kezdo_statusz;
 
 nevitm := ',KKUGYLET.UGYL_UG_NEV,KKUGYLET.UGYL_OSZTALY_NEV,KKUGYLET.UGYL_SZEREGY_NEV,KKUGYLET.UGYL_TIPUS_NEV,KKUGYLET.UGYL_FAJTA_NEV,';
 
 if nvl(rec.editmode,'NONE') <> 'FELVITEL' then 
 ret := "report.KKSPID_SET_UGYL"(:KKUGYLET.UGYL_ID,:GLOBAL.USERID);
 commit;
 
 if ( nvl(:KKUGYLET.UGYL_OSZTALY,'') = globals.KK_NAME
 and (((:KKUGYLET.UGYL_SZEREGY is not null and instr(:GLOBAL.USERGROUPS,:KKUGYLET.UGYL_SZEREGY)>0) or nvl(:KKUGYLET.UGYL_SZEREGY,'URES') = 'URES') or v_kkugylet_tipus.UGYL_TIPUS_KEZELES = 'OSZTALY')
 and ((nvl(:KKUGYLET.UGYL_UG,:GLOBAL.USERID) = :GLOBAL.USERID or :KKUGYLET.UGYL_UG = 'URES') or v_kkugylet_tipus.UGYL_TIPUS_KEZELES in ('SZEREGY', 'OSZTALY') )
-- and :KKUGYLET.UGYL_AIT = 'AKTIV'
 )
 or 
 ( instr(v_kkugylet_tipus.UGYL_TIPUS_INDITO_OSZ, globals.KK_NAME)>0
-- and nvl(:KKUGYLET.UGYL_SZEREGY,'URES') = nvl(v_kkugylet_tipus.UGYL_TIPUS_INDITO_SZE,'URES')
 and :KKUGYLET.UGYL_ST = v_kezdo_statusz.UGYL_KOD
-- and :KKUGYLET.UGYL_AIT = 'AKTIV'
 )
 or 
 ( nvl(:KKUGYLET.UGYL_OSZTALY,'') = globals.KK_NAME and instr(:GLOBAL.USERGROUPS, globals.KK_NAME || 'VEZ')>0
-- and :KKUGYLET.UGYL_AIT = 'AKTIV'
 )
 or instr(:GLOBAL.USERGROUPS, 'ADMIN')>0 
 then
 jogosult := 'TRUE'; 
 end if;

 if jogosult = 'FALSE' 
 and nvl(:KKUGYLET.UGYL_OSZTALY,'') = 'CENZ'
 and instr(:KKUGYLET.UGYL_SZEREGY, globals.KK_NAME) > 0
 and instr(:GLOBAL.USERGROUPS,:KKUGYLET.UGYL_SZEREGY) > 0
 --and ((nvl(:KKUGYLET.UGYL_UG,:GLOBAL.USERID) = :GLOBAL.USERID or :KKUGYLET.UGYL_UG = 'URES')) 
 then
 jogosult := 'TRUE'; 
 end if;

 else
 ret := "report.KKSPID_SET_UGYL_TIPUS"(:KKUGYLET.UGYL_ID,:KKUGYLET.UGYL_TIPUS,:GLOBAL.USERID);
 commit;
 end if;
 
 if jogosult = 'TRUE' or rec.editmode = 'FELVITEL' then
 set_item ('KKUGYLET_SZEREPLO_V.SZEREPLO_TIPUS', 'IIIII'); -- EVNIU
 set_item ('KKUGYLET_SZEREPLO_V.SZEREPLO_TOL', 'IIIII'); -- EVNIU
 set_item ('KKUGYLET_SZEREPLO_V.SZEREPLO_IG', 'IIIII'); -- EVNIU
 set_item ('KKUGYLET_SZEREPLO_V.SZEREPLO_KOD', 'IIIII'); -- EVNIU
 set_item ('KKUGYLET_SZEREPLO_V.SZEREPLO_ID', 'IIIII'); -- EVNIU
 set_item ('KKUGYLET_SZEREPLO_V.SZEREPLO_ST', 'IIIII'); -- EVNIU
 set_item ('KKUGYLET_SZEREPLO_V.SZEREPLO_MGJ', 'IIIII'); -- EVNIU
 
 set_item ('KKUGYLET_JEGYZET.UGYL_JEGYZET_ST', 'IIIII'); -- EVNIU
 set_item ('KKUGYLET_JEGYZET.UGYL_JEGYZET_TIP', 'IIIII'); -- EVNIU
 set_item ('KKUGYLET_JEGYZET.UGYL_JEGYZET', 'IIIII'); -- EVNIU 
 else
 set_item ('KKUGYLET_SZEREPLO_V.SZEREPLO_TIPUS', 'IIFFF'); -- EVNIU
 set_item ('KKUGYLET_SZEREPLO_V.SZEREPLO_TOL', 'IIFFF'); -- EVNIU
 set_item ('KKUGYLET_SZEREPLO_V.SZEREPLO_IG', 'IIFFF'); -- EVNIU
 set_item ('KKUGYLET_SZEREPLO_V.SZEREPLO_KOD', 'IIFFF'); -- EVNIU
 set_item ('KKUGYLET_SZEREPLO_V.SZEREPLO_ID', 'IIFFF'); -- EVNIU
 set_item ('KKUGYLET_SZEREPLO_V.SZEREPLO_ST', 'IIFFF'); -- EVNIU
 set_item ('KKUGYLET_SZEREPLO_V.SZEREPLO_MGJ', 'IIFFF'); -- EVNIU

 set_item ('KKUGYLET_JEGYZET.UGYL_JEGYZET_ST', 'IIFFF'); -- EVNIU
 set_item ('KKUGYLET_JEGYZET.UGYL_JEGYZET_TIP', 'IIFFF'); -- EVNIU
 set_item ('KKUGYLET_JEGYZET.UGYL_JEGYZET', 'IIFFF'); -- EVNIU 
 end if; 
 
 aktitm := :system.cursor_item;
-- message(aktitm); 
-- t_2 := sysdate;

-- t_3 := sysdate;
 
 if rec.editmode = 'FELVITEL' and :KKUGYLET.UGYL_TIPUS is not null then -- and :system.trigger_item = 'KKUGYLET.UGYL_TIPUS' 
-- t_4 := sysdate;
 jogosult := 'TRUE';
 /*
 if v_kkugylet_tipus.UGYL_TIPUS_SZINT in ('UGY','ESZKOZ') then
 :KKUGYLET.U_UGYID := :KKSZERZODES_CORE.U_UGYID;
 :KKUGYLET.L_SZERSZAM := :KKSZERZODES_CORE.L_SZERSZAM;
 end if;
 if v_kkugylet_tipus.UGYL_TIPUS_SZINT = 'ESZKOZ' then
 :KKUGYLET.L_SZERAZON := :KKESZKOZ_CORE.L_SZERAZON;
 end if; 
 */
-- t_5 := sysdate; 
 open c_kkugylet_tipus_col (:KKUGYLET.UGYL_TIPUS);
 loop
 fetch c_kkugylet_tipus_col into v_kkugylet_tipus_col;
 if c_kkugylet_tipus_col%notfound then
 close c_kkugylet_tipus_col;
 exit;
 end if;
 itm := 'KKUGYLET.' || v_kkugylet_tipus_col.COLUMNID;
 init_value := v_kkugylet_tipus_col.INIT_VALUE;
 if init_value = 'DEFAULT()' then
 init_value := v_kkugylet_tipus_col.COL_INIT_VALUE;
 end if;
 if init_value is not null then
 -- -- message(v_kkugylet_tipus_col.COLUMNID || ' ' || init_value);
 if instr(init_value,'MA()')>0 then -- MA()
 ma := trunc(sysdate); 
 if instr(init_value,'+')>0 then
 ma := ma + to_number(substr(init_value,5,100));
 elsif instr(init_value,'-')>0 then
 ma := ma - to_number(substr(init_value,5,100));
 end if;
 copy(to_char(ma,'YYYY.MM.DD'),itm);
 elsif instr(init_value,'MOST()')>0 then -- MOST()
 ma := sysdate; 
 copy(to_char(ma,'YYYY.MM.DD HH24:MI:SS'),itm); 
 elsif instr(init_value,'CEG()')>0 then -- CEG()
 copy(:KKSZERZODES_CORE.L_CEG,itm);
 elsif instr(init_value,'VEVO()')>0 then -- VEVO()
 copy(:KKSZERZODES_CORE.L_VEVO,itm);
 elsif instr(init_value,'UGYID()')>0 then -- UGYID()
 copy(:KKSZERZODES_CORE.U_UGYID,itm);
 elsif instr(init_value,'SZERSZAM()')>0 then -- SZERSZAM()
 copy(:KKSZERZODES_CORE.L_SZERSZAM,itm);
 elsif instr(init_value,'SZERAZON()')>0 then -- SZERAZON()
 copy(:KKESZKOZ_CORE.L_SZERAZON,itm);
 elsif instr(init_value,'EN()')>0 then -- EN()
 copy(:GLOBAL.USERID, itm); 
 elsif instr(init_value,'INDITO_OSZ()')>0 then -- INDITO_OSZ()
 copy(:KKUGYLET.UGYL_IOSZTALY, itm); 
 elsif instr(init_value,'INDITO_SZE()')>0 then -- INDITO_SZE()
 copy(:KKUGYLET.UGYL_ISZEREGY, itm); 
 elsif instr(init_value,'INDITO_UG()')>0 then -- INDITO_UG()
 copy(:KKUGYLET.UGYL_IUG, itm); 
 elsif instr(init_value,'FOGADO_OSZ()')>0 then -- FOGADO_OSZ()
 if nvl(v_kkugylet_tipus_col.UGYL_TIPUS_INDFOG_OSZ,'NEM') = 'NEM' then
 copy(v_kkugylet_tipus_col.UGYL_TIPUS_FOGADO_OSZ, itm); 
 else
 copy(globals.KK_NAME, itm);
 end if;
 elsif instr(init_value,'FOGADO_SZE()')>0 then -- FOGADO_SZE()
 if nvl(v_kkugylet_tipus_col.UGYL_TIPUS_INDFOG_SZE,'NEM') = 'NEM' then
 copy(v_kkugylet_tipus_col.UGYL_TIPUS_FOGADO_SZE, itm); 
 else
 copy(v_kkugylet_tipus_col.UGYL_TIPUS_INDITO_SZE, itm); 
 end if;
 elsif instr(init_value,'OKKOKKTUSZ()')>0 then -- OKKOKKTUSZ() 
 if nvl(:KKPARTNER_KART.U_OKKO_UG,' ')=' ' or nvl(:KKPARTNER_KART.U_OKKO_UG,' ')='URES' 
 then copy('KKTUSZ',itm);
 else copy('OKKO',itm);
 end if; 
 else
 copy(init_value, itm);
 end if;
 end if; 
 end loop;
-- t_6 := sysdate;
 if :KKUGYLET.UGYL_ST is null then
 if v_kezdo_statusz.UGYL_KOD is not null then
 :KKUGYLET.UGYL_ST := v_kezdo_statusz.UGYL_KOD;
 end if;
 end if;
-- t_7 := sysdate;
 end if;

-- message('2');
 
 if nvl(rec.editmode,'NONE') <> 'FELVITEL' then
-- message('2a');
 go_item('TOOLBAR.U_UGYID');
-- message('2b'); 
 end if;
-- message('3'); 
-- t_8 := sysdate;
 open c_kkugylet_tipus_col (:KKUGYLET.UGYL_TIPUS);
-- message('4'); 
 loop
-- message('4a'); 
 fetch c_kkugylet_tipus_col into v_kkugylet_tipus_col;
-- message('4b'); 
 if c_kkugylet_tipus_col%notfound then
 close c_kkugylet_tipus_col;
 exit;
 end if;
-- message('4c'); 
 itm := 'KKUGYLET.' || v_kkugylet_tipus_col.COLUMNID;
-- if get_item_property(itm, visible)='TRUE' then
 if get_item_property(itm, ITEM_CANVAS) is not null and get_item_property(itm, ITEM_TAB_PAGE) is not null then
 if v_kkugylet_tipus_col.ISVISIBLE_SET = 'NEM' then
 set_item (itm, 'FIFFF'); -- EVNIU
 set_item_property(itm,VISUAL_ATTRIBUTE,'CG$INACTIVE_ITEM');
 if instr(nevitm,','||itm||',')>0 then
 set_item (itm || '_NEV', 'FIFFF'); -- EVNIU
 set_item_property(itm || '_NEV',VISUAL_ATTRIBUTE,'CG$INACTIVE_ITEM'); 
 end if;
 else
 set_item (itm, 'FIFFF'); -- EVNIU
 if instr(nevitm,','||itm||',')>0 then
 set_item (itm || '_NEV', 'FIFFF'); -- EVNIU
 end if;
 end if;
 
 if v_kkugylet_tipus_col.ISVISIBLE_SET = 'IGEN' and jogosult = 'FALSE' then
 set_item (itm, 'IIFFF'); -- EVNIU
 if instr(nevitm,','||itm||',')>0 then
 set_item (itm || '_NEV', 'IIFFF'); -- EVNIU
 end if;
 end if;
 
 --
 -- Speciális működés !
 --
 -- BEHAJTASI MB - OKKO BEH MB téma
 if v_kkugylet_tipus_col.UGYL_TIPUS = 'BEHAJTASI MB' and :KKUGYLET.UGYL_MODOZATOK = 'SPECIALIS' and itm = 'KKUGYLET.UGYL_TELJST' then
 v_kkugylet_tipus_col.ISGETABLE_SET := 'NEM';
 end if;
 --
 --
 --
 
 if v_kkugylet_tipus_col.ISVISIBLE_SET = 'IGEN' and v_kkugylet_tipus_col.ISGETABLE_SET = 'NEM' and jogosult = 'TRUE' then
 set_item (itm, 'IIFFF'); -- EVNIU
 end if;
 
 if v_kkugylet_tipus_col.ISVISIBLE_SET = 'IGEN' and v_kkugylet_tipus_col.ISGETABLE_SET = 'IGEN' and jogosult = 'TRUE' then
 set_item (itm, 'IIIII'); -- EVNIU
 end if;
 
 if v_kkugylet_tipus_col.ISVISIBLE_SET = 'IGEN' and v_kkugylet_tipus_col.ISGETABLE_SET = 'IGEN' and v_kkugylet_tipus_col.ISREQUIRED_SET = 'IGEN' and jogosult = 'TRUE' then 
 set_item (itm, 'IIIII'); -- EVNIU 
 set_item_property (itm, required, property_true);
 -- set_item_property (itm, background_color, 'r255g224b128');
 set_item_property (itm, prompt_foreground_color, 'r255g0b0'); 
 else
 set_item_property (itm, required, property_false); 
 set_item_property (itm, prompt_foreground_color, 'r0g0b0'); 
 end if;
 
 if v_kkugylet_tipus_col.ISVISIBLE_SET = 'IGEN' then
 if v_kkugylet_tipus_col.UGYL_COLUMNDESC is not null then
 if nvl(get_item_property (itm, prompt_text),'') <> nvl(v_kkugylet_tipus_col.UGYL_COLUMNDESC,'') then
 set_item_property (itm, prompt_text, v_kkugylet_tipus_col.UGYL_COLUMNDESC);
 end if;
 else
 if nvl(get_item_property (itm, prompt_text),'') <> nvl(v_kkugylet_tipus_col.DESCXLS,'') then
 set_item_property (itm, prompt_text, v_kkugylet_tipus_col.DESCXLS);
 end if;
 end if;
 else
 set_item_property (itm, prompt_text, ' '); 
 end if;
 
 end if;
 end loop;
 --message('5');
-- t_9 := sysdate;
 if nvl(rec.editmode,'NONE') <> 'FELVITEL' then
 go_item(aktitm); 
 end if;
 --message('6'); 
-- t_10 := sysdate;
/*
 -- message(
 't1: ' || to_char(t_1,'MI:SS.SSSSS') 
 || ' t2: ' || to_char(t_2,'MI:SSSSS')
 || ' t3: ' || to_char(t_3,'MI:SSSSS') 
 || ' t4: ' || to_char(t_4,'MI:SSSSS') 
 || ' t5: ' || to_char(t_5,'MI:SSSSS') 
 || ' t6: ' || to_char(t_6,'MI:SSSSS')
 || ' t7: ' || to_char(t_7,'MI:SSSSS') 
 || ' t8: ' || to_char(t_8,'MI:SSSSS') 
 || ' t9: ' || to_char(t_9,'MI:SSSSS')
 || ' t10: ' || to_char(t_10,'MI:SSSSS') 
 ); 
*/
END;

ProgramUnit.Name: KKPARTNER_TREE_NAV
ProgramUnit.ProgramUnitText:
PROCEDURE KKPARTNER_TREE_NAV IS
 htree ITEM;
 current_node FTREE.NODE;
 find_node FTREE.NODE;
 num_selected number;
 ret pls_integer; 
 d number;
 e varchar2(255);
 p varchar2(9);
 s varchar2(16);
 k varchar2(12);
 f number;
BEGIN 
 :GLOBAL.KKTREE := ''; 
 htree := FIND_ITEM('KKPARTNER_TREE.TREE');
 num_selected := Ftree.Get_Tree_Property(htree, Ftree.SELECTION_COUNT);

 if num_selected = 1 then
 current_node := Ftree.Get_Tree_Selection(htree, 1); 
 d := Ftree.GET_TREE_NODE_PROPERTY(htree,current_node, Ftree.NODE_DEPTH);
 if d > 0 then 
 e := Ftree.GET_TREE_NODE_PROPERTY(htree,current_node, Ftree.NODE_VALUE);
 end if;
 end if;
 message(e);
 if instr(e,'PARTNER:')>0 then
 go_item('KKPARTNER_CORE.U_PATNER');
 end if;
 
 if instr(e,'UGY:')>0 or instr(e,'ESZKOZ:')>0 then
 go_item('KKSZERZODES_CORE.M_L_CEG');
 first_record;
 loop
 if :system.last_record = 'TRUE' or instr(e,:KKSZERZODES_CORE.U_UGYID)>0 then
 exit;
 end if;
 next_record;
 end loop;
 go_item('KKSZERZODES_CORE.U_UGYID');
 end if;

 if instr(e,'ESZKOZ:')>0 then
 go_item('KKESZKOZ_CORE.M_L_SZERAZON');
 first_record;
 loop
 if :system.last_record = 'TRUE' or instr(e,:KKESZKOZ_CORE.L_SZERAZON)>0 then
 exit;
 end if;
 next_record;
 end loop;
 go_item('KKESZKOZ_CORE.L_SZERAZON');
 end if;

 if instr(e,'UGYLET:')>0 then
 go_item('KKUGYLET.M_UGYL_ID');
 first_record;
 loop
 if :system.last_record = 'TRUE' or instr(e,:KKUGYLET.UGYL_ID)>0 then
 exit;
 end if;
 next_record;
 end loop;
 go_item('KKUGYLET.UGYL_ID');
 end if;
 
 
END;

ProgramUnit.Name: KKUGYLET_VAL_ITEM
ProgramUnit.ProgramUnitText:
PROCEDURE KKUGYLET_VAL_ITEM IS
begin 
 SET_VAL_ITEM('KKUGYLET',:KKUGYLET.UGYL_TIPUS);
end;

ProgramUnit.Name: KKUGYLET_QUERY
ProgramUnit.ProgramUnitText:
PROCEDURE KKUGYLET_QUERY (p_ugyl_id varchar2, p_itm varchar2) IS
 aw varchar2(2000);
 dw varchar2(2000);
 v_itm varchar2(80);
BEGIN
 if :KKPARTNER_CORE.U_PARTNER is null then
 return;
 end if;
/*
 if :KKSZERZODES_CORE.U_UGYID is null then
 --:KKUGYLET_GRID_CTRL.SZINT := 'PARTNER';
 return;
 end if;
*/ 
 if rec.editmode is not null then
 return;
 end if;
 
 aw := get_block_property('KKUGYLET',default_where);
 KKUGYLET_WHERE;
 go_item('KKUGYLET.M_UGYL_ID');
 execute_query; 
 --set_block_property('KKUGYLET',default_where,aw);

 v_itm := p_itm;
 if v_itm is null then
 v_itm := 'KKUGYLET.U_UGYID_SZERAZON';
 end if;
 -- go_item(v_itm);
 
 if p_ugyl_id is not null then
 loop
 if :KKUGYLET.UGYL_ID = p_ugyl_id or :system.LAST_RECORD = 'TRUE' then
 exit;
 else
 next_record;
 end if;
 end loop; 
 else
 last_record; 
 end if;
 
 go_item('KKJOGKARTF.M_U_JOGIKARTON');
 execute_query;
 
 --go_item('KKUGYLET.U_UGYID_SZERAZON');
 go_item(v_itm);
--message(dw || ' 3'); 
END;

ProgramUnit.Name: KKUGYLET_WHERE
ProgramUnit.ProgramUnitText:
procedure KKUGYLET_WHERE IS
 aw varchar2(2000);
 dw varchar2(2000);
BEGIN 
 --if :KKUGYLET_GRID_CTRL.SZINT = 'SZERZODES' then
 
 dw := 'L_VEVO=''' || :KKPARTNER_CORE.U_PARTNER || '''';
 --end if;
 if :KKUGYLET_GRID_CTRL.SZINT = 'SZERZODES' then
 dw := dw || ' and (L_SZERSZAM=''' || :KKSZERZODES_CORE.L_SZERSZAM || ''' or L_SZERSZAM is null)';
 end if;

 if :KKUGYLET_GRID_CTRL.SZINT = 'UGY' then
 dw := dw || ' and (U_UGYID=''' || :KKSZERZODES_CORE.U_UGYID || ''' or U_UGYID is null)';
 end if;

 if :KKUGYLET_GRID_CTRL.SZINT = 'ESZKOZ' then
 dw := dw || ' and U_UGYID=''' || :KKSZERZODES_CORE.U_UGYID || ''' and L_SZERAZON=''' || :KKESZKOZ_CORE.L_SZERAZON || '''';
 end if;

 if not (:KKUGYLET_GRID_CTRL.AKTIV = 'IGEN' and :KKUGYLET_GRID_CTRL.INAKTIV = 'IGEN' and :KKUGYLET_GRID_CTRL.TOROLT = 'IGEN') 
 and not (:KKUGYLET_GRID_CTRL.AKTIV = 'NEM' and :KKUGYLET_GRID_CTRL.INAKTIV = 'NEM' and :KKUGYLET_GRID_CTRL.TOROLT = 'NEM') 
 then
 dw := dw || ' and UGYL_AIT in (' ;
 if :KKUGYLET_GRID_CTRL.AKTIV = 'IGEN' then
 dw := dw || ', ''AKTIV''';
 end if;
 if :KKUGYLET_GRID_CTRL.INAKTIV = 'IGEN' then
 dw := dw || ', ''INAKTIV''';
 end if; 
 if :KKUGYLET_GRID_CTRL.TOROLT = 'IGEN' then
 dw := dw || ', ''TOROLT''';
 end if; 
 dw := replace(dw,'(,','(') || ' )';
 end if;

 if :KKUGYLET_GRID_CTRL.OSZTALY is not null then -- '*' 
 dw := dw || ' and UGYL_OSZTALY=''' || :KKUGYLET_GRID_CTRL.OSZTALY || '''';
 end if;

 if :KKUGYLET_GRID_CTRL.SZEREGY is not null then -- <> '*' 
 dw := dw || ' and UGYL_SZEREGY=''' || :KKUGYLET_GRID_CTRL.SZEREGY || '''';
 end if;

 if :KKUGYLET_GRID_CTRL.UGYL_UG is not null then -- <> '*' 
 dw := dw || ' and UGYL_UG=''' || :KKUGYLET_GRID_CTRL.UGYL_UG || '''';
 end if;

 if :KKUGYLET_GRID_CTRL.UTOLSO = 'IGEN' and :KKUGYLET_GRID_CTRL.ELOUGY = 'NEM' then
 dw := dw || ' and (U_UGYID in (select distinct a.U_UGYID from KKKEYGO_AKTIV a (nolock) where a.U_UTOLSOUGY=''IGEN'' or a.AKTIV=''IGEN'') or (U_UGYID is null))';
 --dw := dw || ' and U_UGYID in (select distinct sc.U_UGYID from KKSZERZODES_CORE_V sc (nolock), KKUGYLET u (nolock) where sc.U_UTOLSOUGY=''IGEN'' or (sc.U_UGYID=u.U_UGYID and u.UGYL_AIT=''AKTIV''))';
 elsif :KKUGYLET_GRID_CTRL.UTOLSO = 'NEM' and :KKUGYLET_GRID_CTRL.ELOUGY = 'IGEN' then
 dw := dw || ' and (U_UGYID in (select distinct a.U_UGYID from KKKEYGO_AKTIV a (nolock) where a.U_STATUS=''ELO UGY'' or a.AKTIV=''IGEN'') or (U_UGYID is null and UGYL_AIT=''AKTIV''))';
 --dw := dw || ' and U_UGYID in (select sc.U_UGYID from KKSZERZODES_CORE_V sc (nolock), KKUGYLET u (nolock) where sc.U_STATUS=''ELO UGY'' or (sc.U_UGYID=u.U_UGYID and u.UGYL_AIT=''AKTIV''))';
 elsif :KKUGYLET_GRID_CTRL.UTOLSO = 'IGEN' and :KKUGYLET_GRID_CTRL.ELOUGY = 'IGEN' then
 dw := dw || ' and (U_UGYID in (select distinct a.U_UGYID from KKKEYGO_AKTIV a (nolock) where (a.U_UTOLSOUGY=''IGEN'' and a.U_STATUS=''ELO UGY'') or a.AKTIV=''IGEN'') or (U_UGYID is null))'; -- and UGYL_AIT=''AKTIV''
 --dw := dw || ' and U_UGYID in (select sc.U_UGYID from KKSZERZODES_CORE_V sc (nolock), KKUGYLET u (nolock) where ((sc.U_STATUS=''ELO UGY'' and sc.U_UTOLSOUGY=''IGEN'') or (sc.U_UGYID=u.U_UGYID and u.UGYL_AIT=''AKTIV'')))';
 end if;

 set_block_property('KKUGYLET',default_where,dw);
 
END;

ProgramUnit.Name: SET_VAL_ITEM
ProgramUnit.ProgramUnitText:
PROCEDURE SET_VAL_ITEM (p_tbl varchar2, p_ugyl_tipus varchar2) IS
 cursor c (cc varchar2, vv varchar2) 
 is
 select * 
 from KKUGYLET_TIPUS_COL_SET
 where UGYL_TIPUS = p_ugyl_tipus
 and TABLEID = p_tbl
 and SET_TABLEID = TABLEID
 and COLUMNID = cc
 and (COLUMN_VALUE = vv or COLUMN_VALUE = '*');
 
 v c%rowtype;
 
 tipus varchar2(30);
 ertek varchar2(2000);
 beir varchar2(2000);
 mezitm varchar2(1000);
begin 
 if rec.editmode is not null then
 if name_in(:system.trigger_item) is not null then
 tipus := get_item_property(:system.trigger_item, datatype);
 if tipus = 'CHAR' then
 ertek := name_in(:system.trigger_item);
 elsif tipus = 'DATE' then
 ertek := to_char(to_date(name_in(:system.trigger_item)),'YYYY.MM.DD');
 elsif tipus = 'DATETIME' then
 ertek := to_char(to_date(name_in(:system.trigger_item)),'YYYY.MM.DD HH24:MI:SS');
 elsif tipus = 'NUMBER' then
 ertek := to_char(to_number(name_in(:system.trigger_item)));
 end if;
 
 open c (replace(:system.trigger_item,p_tbl || '.',''), ertek );
 loop
 fetch c into v;
 if c%notfound then
 close c;
 exit;
 end if;
 
 beir := v.SET_COLUMN_VALUE;
 if beir = 'MA()' then
 beir := to_char(sysdate,'YYYY.MM.DD');
 elsif substr(beir,1,5) = 'MA()+' then
 beir := to_char(sysdate+to_number(substr(beir,6,10)),'YYYY.MM.DD');
 elsif substr(beir,1,5) = 'MA()-' then
 beir := to_char(sysdate-to_number(substr(beir,6,10)),'YYYY.MM.DD');
 elsif beir = 'ERTEK()' then 
 beir := ertek;
 elsif substr(beir,1,8) = 'ERTEK()+' then
 if tipus = 'DATE' then
 beir := to_char(to_date(ertek,'YYYY.MM.DD')+to_number(substr(beir,9,10)),'YYYY.MM.DD');
 elsif tipus = 'DATETIME' then
 beir := to_char(to_date(ertek,'YYYY.MM.DD HH24:MI:SS')+to_number(substr(beir,9,10)),'YYYY.MM.DD HH24:MI:SS');
 elsif tipus = 'NUMBER' then
 beir := to_char(to_number(ertek)+to_number(substr(beir,9,10)));
 elsif tipus = 'VARCHAR' then
 beir := ertek || substr(beir,9,2000);
 end if; 
 elsif substr(beir,1,8) = 'ERTEK()-' then
 if tipus = 'DATE' then
 beir := to_char(to_date(ertek,'YYYY.MM.DD')-to_number(substr(beir,9,10)),'YYYY.MM.DD');
 elsif tipus = 'DATETIME' then
 beir := to_char(to_date(ertek,'YYYY.MM.DD HH24:MI:SS')-to_number(substr(beir,9,10)),'YYYY.MM.DD HH24:MI:SS');
 elsif tipus = 'NUMBER' then
 beir := to_char(to_number(ertek)-to_number(substr(beir,9,10)));
 elsif tipus = 'VARCHAR' then
 beir := replace(ertek,substr(beir,9,2000),'');
 end if; 
 elsif beir = 'MOST()' then
 beir := to_char(sysdate,'YYYY.MM.DD HH24:MI:SS');
 elsif beir = 'EN()' then
 beir := :GLOBAL.USERID;
 elsif beir = 'CEG()' then
 beir := :KKSZERZODES_CORE.L_CEG;
 elsif beir = 'VEVO()' then
 beir := :KKSZERZODES_CORE.L_VEVO;
 elsif beir = 'UGYID()' then
 beir := :KKSZERZODES_CORE.U_UGYID;
 elsif beir = 'SZERSZAM()' then
 beir := :KKSZERZODES_CORE.L_SZERSZAM;
 elsif beir = 'SZERAZON()' then
 beir := :KKESZKOZ_CORE.L_SZERAZON;
 elsif beir = 'INDITO_OSZ()' then
 beir := nvl(:KKUGYLET.UGYL_IOSZTALY,globals.KK_NAME); 
 elsif beir = 'INDITO_SZE()' then
 beir := :KKUGYLET.UGYL_ISZEREGY; 
 elsif beir = 'INDITO_UG()' then
 beir := nvl(:KKUGYLET.UGYL_IUG,:GLOBAL.USERID);
 elsif beir = 'OKKOKKTUSZ()' then
 if nvl(:KKPARTNER_KART.U_OKKO_UG,' ')=' ' or nvl(:KKPARTNER_KART.U_OKKO_UG,' ')='URES' 
 then beir := 'KKTUSZ';
 else beir := 'OKKO';
 end if; 
 elsif instr(v.SET_COLUMN_VALUE,'MEZO(')>0 then
 mezitm := replace(replace(v.SET_COLUMN_VALUE,'MEZO(',''),')','');
 if mezitm is not null then
 beir := name_in(mezitm);
 end if; 
 end if; 
 copy(beir,v.SET_TABLEID || '.' || v.SET_COLUMNID);
 end loop; 
 end if;
 end if;
end;

ProgramUnit.Name: SET_VAL_RECORD
ProgramUnit.ProgramUnitText:
PROCEDURE SET_VAL_RECORD (p_tbl varchar2, p_ugyl_tipus varchar2) IS
 cursor c 
 is
 select * 
 from KKUGYLET_TIPUS_COL_SET
 where UGYL_TIPUS = p_ugyl_tipus
 and TABLEID = p_tbl
 and SET_TABLEID <> TABLEID
 and SET_TABLEID is not null
 order by SET_TABLEID;
-- and COLUMNID = cc
-- and (COLUMN_VALUE = vv or COLUMN_VALUE = '*');
 
 v c%rowtype;
 
 itm_tipus varchar2(30);
 set_tipus varchar2(30);
 set_ertek varchar2(2000); 
 ertek varchar2(2000);
 beir varchar2(2000);
 valtozott varchar2(10) := 'FALSE';
 tabla varchar2(60);
 valitm varchar2(90);
 setitm varchar2(90);
 mezitm varchar2(90);
 szereplo varchar2(30);
 
 cursor c_szereplo (p_ugyl_id varchar2, p_szereplo_tipus varchar2) is
 select * 
 from KKUGYLET_SZEREPLO_V 
 where UGYL_ID = p_ugyl_id 
 and SZEREPLO_TIPUS = p_szereplo_tipus;
 
 v_szereplo c_szereplo%rowtype;
begin 
 tabla := ' ';
 if rec.editmode is null then 
 open c; --(replace(p_tbl || '.',''), ertek );
--message('start');
--message(p_tbl);
--message(p_ugyl_tipus);
 loop
 fetch c into v;
--message(v.COLUMNID);
--message(v.SET_TABLEID);
 
--message('tabla 1: ' || nvl(tabla,'NULL'));
 if tabla = ' ' and c%found then
 tabla := v.SET_TABLEID;
 valtozott := 'FALSE';
 set_block_property(tabla,update_allowed,property_true);
 end if;
--message('tabla 2: ' || nvl(tabla,'NULL')); 
 if tabla <> ' ' and v.SET_TABLEID <> tabla and c%found then
 if valtozott = 'TRUE' then 
 commit_form;
 end if;
 set_block_property(tabla,update_allowed,property_false);
 valtozott := 'FALSE';
 tabla := v.SET_TABLEID; 
 set_block_property(tabla,update_allowed,property_true);
 end if;
--message('tabla 3: ' || nvl(tabla,'NULL')); 
 if c%notfound then
 if valtozott = 'TRUE' then 
 commit_form;
 end if;
 if tabla <> ' ' then
 set_block_property(tabla,update_allowed,property_false);
 end if; 
 close c;
 exit;
 end if;
--message('tabla 4: ' || nvl(tabla,'NULL'));
 valitm := p_tbl || '.' || v.COLUMNID;
 setitm := v.SET_TABLEID || '.' || v.SET_COLUMNID;
 itm_tipus := get_item_property(valitm, datatype);
 set_tipus := get_item_property(setitm, datatype);
 if instr(v.SET_COLUMN_VALUE,'MEZO(')>0 then
 mezitm := replace(replace(v.SET_COLUMN_VALUE,'MEZO(',''),')','');
 else
 mezitm := null;
 end if;
 if instr(v.SET_COLUMN_VALUE,'SZEREPLO_ID(')>0 or instr(v.SET_COLUMN_VALUE,'SZEREPLO_NEV(')>0 then
--message(v.SET_COLUMN_VALUE ); 
 szereplo := replace(replace(replace(v.SET_COLUMN_VALUE,'SZEREPLO_ID(',''),'SZEREPLO_NEV(',''),')','');
--message(szereplo);
 open c_szereplo (:KKUGYLET.UGYL_ID, szereplo);
 fetch c_szereplo into v_szereplo;
 close c_szereplo;
 if instr(v.SET_COLUMN_VALUE,'SZEREPLO_ID(')>0 then
 v.SET_COLUMN_VALUE := v_szereplo.SZEREPLO_ID;
 elsif instr(v.SET_COLUMN_VALUE,'SZEREPLO_NEV(')>0 then
 v.SET_COLUMN_VALUE := v_szereplo.SZEREPLO_NEV; 
 end if;
--message(v.SET_COLUMN_VALUE ); 
 end if;
--message( v.SET_COLUMN_VALUE );

 if itm_tipus = 'CHAR' then
 ertek := name_in(valitm);
 set_ertek := name_in(setitm);
 if mezitm is not null then
 v.SET_COLUMN_VALUE := name_in(mezitm);
 end if; 
 elsif itm_tipus = 'DATE' then
 ertek := to_char(to_date(name_in(valitm)),'YYYY.MM.DD');
 set_ertek := to_char(to_date(name_in(setitm)),'YYYY.MM.DD');
 if mezitm is not null then
 v.SET_COLUMN_VALUE := to_char(to_date(name_in(mezitm),'YYYY.MM.DD'));
 end if; 
 elsif itm_tipus = 'DATETIME' then
 ertek := to_char(to_date(name_in(valitm)),'YYYY.MM.DD HH24:MI:SS');
 set_ertek := to_char(to_date(name_in(setitm)),'YYYY.MM.DD HH24:MI:SS');
 if mezitm is not null then
 v.SET_COLUMN_VALUE := to_char(to_date(name_in(mezitm),'YYYY.MM.DD HH24:MI:SS'));
 end if; 
 elsif itm_tipus = 'NUMBER' then
 ertek := to_char(to_number(name_in(valitm)));
 set_ertek := to_char(to_number(name_in(setitm)));
 if mezitm is not null then
 v.SET_COLUMN_VALUE := to_char(to_number(name_in(mezitm)));
 end if; 
 end if;

--message('ertek = ' || nvl(ertek,'NULL'));
--message('set_ertek = ' || nvl(set_ertek,'NULL'));
--message( v.SET_COLUMN_VALUE );

 beir := v.SET_COLUMN_VALUE;

--message('beir = ' || nvl(beir,'NULL')); 
 
 if beir = 'MA()' then
 beir := to_char(sysdate,'YYYY.MM.DD');
 elsif substr(beir,1,5) = 'MA()+' then
 beir := to_char(sysdate+to_number(substr(beir,6,10)),'YYYY.MM.DD');
 elsif substr(beir,1,5) = 'MA()-' then
 beir := to_char(sysdate-to_number(substr(beir,6,10)),'YYYY.MM.DD');
 elsif beir = 'ERTEK()' then
 beir := ertek;
 elsif substr(beir,1,8) = 'ERTEK()+' then
 if itm_tipus = 'DATE' then
 beir := to_char(to_date(ertek,'YYYY.MM.DD')+to_number(substr(beir,9,10)),'YYYY.MM.DD');
 elsif itm_tipus = 'DATETIME' then
 beir := to_char(to_date(ertek,'YYYY.MM.DD HH24:MI:SS')+to_number(substr(beir,9,10)),'YYYY.MM.DD HH24:MI:SS');
 elsif itm_tipus = 'NUMBER' then
 beir := to_char(to_number(ertek)+to_number(substr(beir,9,10)));
 elsif itm_tipus = 'VARCHAR' then
 beir := ertek || substr(beir,9,2000);
 end if; 
 elsif substr(beir,1,8) = 'ERTEK()-' then
 if itm_tipus = 'DATE' then
 beir := to_char(to_date(ertek,'YYYY.MM.DD')-to_number(substr(beir,9,10)),'YYYY.MM.DD');
 elsif itm_tipus = 'DATETIME' then
 beir := to_char(to_date(ertek,'YYYY.MM.DD HH24:MI:SS')-to_number(substr(beir,9,10)),'YYYY.MM.DD HH24:MI:SS');
 elsif itm_tipus = 'NUMBER' then
 beir := to_char(to_number(ertek)-to_number(substr(beir,9,10)));
 elsif itm_tipus = 'VARCHAR' then
 beir := replace(ertek,substr(beir,9,2000),'');
 end if; 
 elsif beir = 'MOST()' then
 beir := to_char(sysdate,'YYYY.MM.DD HH24:MI:SS');
 elsif beir = 'EN()' then
 beir := :GLOBAL.USERID;
 elsif beir = 'CEG()' then
 beir := :KKSZERZODES_CORE.L_CEG;
 elsif beir = 'VEVO()' then
 beir := :KKSZERZODES_CORE.L_VEVO;
 elsif beir = 'UGYID()' then
 beir := :KKSZERZODES_CORE.U_UGYID;
 elsif beir = 'SZERSZAM()' then
 beir := :KKSZERZODES_CORE.L_SZERSZAM;
 elsif beir = 'SZERAZON()' then
 beir := :KKESZKOZ_CORE.L_SZERAZON;
 elsif beir = 'INDITO_OSZ()' then
 beir := globals.KK_NAME;
 elsif beir = 'OKKOKKTUSZ()' then
 if nvl(:KKPARTNER_KART.U_OKKO_UG,' ')=' ' or nvl(:KKPARTNER_KART.U_OKKO_UG,' ')='URES' 
 then beir := 'KKTUSZ';
 else beir := 'OKKO';
 end if; 
 end if;
 
--message('ertek = ' || nvl(ertek,'NULL'));
--message('v.COLUMN_VALUE = ' || nvl(v.COLUMN_VALUE,'NULL')); 
--message('set_ertek = ' || nvl(set_ertek,'NULL'));
--message('beir = ' || nvl(beir,'NULL'));
--message('setitm = ' || nvl(setitm,'NULL')); 
 
 if nvl(ertek,' ') = v.COLUMN_VALUE or v.COLUMN_VALUE = '*' then 
 if nvl(set_ertek,' ')<>nvl(beir,' ') then
 --message('Tabla 5: ' || nvl(tabla,'NULL'));
 --message(get_block_property(tabla,update_allowed));
 --message('beir = ' || nvl(beir,'NULL'));
 --message('setitm = ' || nvl(setitm,'NULL')); 
 copy(beir,setitm);
 valtozott := 'TRUE';
 end if;
 end if;
 end loop; 
 end if;
end;

ProgramUnit.Name: KKJOGKART_SET_ITEM_VISIBLE
ProgramUnit.ProgramUnitText:
PROCEDURE KKJOGKART_SET_ITEM_VISIBLE (blk varchar2, itm varchar2, vis varchar2) IS
 i varchar2(70);
BEGIN
 i := blk || '.' || itm;

 if vis = 'FALSE' then
 --if get_item_property(i, UPDATE_ALLOWED) = 'TRUE' then 
 SET_ITEM (i, 'IINNN' ); -- EVNIUD 
 --end if;
 else
 --if get_item_property(i, UPDATE_ALLOWED) = 'FALSE' then 
 SET_ITEM (i, 'IIIII' ); -- EVNIUD 
 --end if;
 end if;
END;

ProgramUnit.Name: PRINT_KKERTLIZLIZ
ProgramUnit.ProgramUnitText:
PROCEDURE PRINT_KKERTLIZLIZ IS
 pid number;
 ret pls_integer;
 repid REPORT_OBJECT;
 rep varchar2(255);
 rep_status varchar(30);
 docname varchar2(500);
 docid number;
 url varchar2(4000);
 folder varchar2(30);
 params varchar2(255);
BEGIN
 docname := 'KKERTLIZ' || '_' || to_char(sysdate,'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS') || '.PDF';
 params := 'P_UVERAZON=''' || :KKESZKOZ_CORE.U_UGYID|| ''' P_SZERAZON=''' || :KKESZKOZ_CORE.L_SZERAZON || ''' P_ERTMOD=''' || 'LIZING' || '''';
 insert into KKDOCSTAR (
 U_FORRAS, U_DOCTYPE, U_DOCTYPEN, U_DOCNAME, U_STATUS, 
 U_PARTNER, U_UGYID, U_SZERSZAM, U_SZERAZON, 
 DATE_CREATED, CREATED_BY, DATE_MODIFIED, MODIFIED_BY)
 values (
 :PARAMETER.KK, 'KKERTLIZ', 'Értékesítés lízingből lízingbe', docname, 'UJ', 
 :KKPARTNER_CORE.U_PARTNER, :KKSZERZODES_CORE.U_UGYID, :KKSZERZODES_CORE.L_SZERSZAM, null,
 sysdate, :GLOBAL.USERID, sysdate, :GLOBAL.USERID
 );
 ret := "report.GET_KKDOCSTAR_IDENTITY"(docid);
 commit;
 
 ret := "report.EDRMON_KKJOB" (
 :GLOBAL.USERID -- JOB-t indító Forrás SQL felhasználó kódja
 ,pid -- Porcessz ID OUTPUT --> ezzel kell hivatkozni a továbbiakban 
 ,'KKERTLIZ' -- Dokumentum típusa
 ,'KK2_KKERTLIZ_03' -- Dokumentum típus verzió
 ,docname -- Dokumentum neve
 ,docid -- Dokumentum azonosító
 ,params -- Paraméterek
 ,:KKPARTNER_CORE.U_PARTNER -- Partner 
 );
 commit;
/* 
 --docname := 'ATADBEHAJT' || '_' || :GLOBAL.USERID || '_' || replace(:KKSZERZODES.U_VERAZON,'/','-') || '.PDF';
 
 repid := find_report_object('R1'); 
 SET_REPORT_OBJECT_PROPERTY(repid, REPORT_FILENAME , :GLOBAL.REPORTS || 'KKSZALLMEGBIZ_02' ); -- || '.RDF'
 SET_REPORT_OBJECT_PROPERTY(repid, REPORT_DESNAME , :GLOBAL.DOCTMP || docname ); 
 SET_REPORT_OBJECT_PROPERTY(repid, REPORT_DESFORMAT, 'PDF');
 SET_REPORT_OBJECT_PROPERTY(repid, REPORT_SERVER , :GLOBAL.REPSERVER);
 SET_REPORT_OBJECT_PROPERTY(repid, REPORT_OTHER , params );
 rep := RUN_REPORT_OBJECT(repid);
 
 url := :GLOBAL.CURL || ' -F "userfile=@' || :GLOBAL.DOCTMP || docname || '" -F "P_DOCID=' || docid || '" ' || replace(:GLOBAL.KKUPLOAD,'kk.php?P_DOCID=','upload.php');
 
 host(url,NO_SCREEN);
 
 ret := "report.GET_KK_FOLDER"(docid,folder);
 
 web.show_document(:GLOBAL.KKDOCURL || folder || '/' || docid || UPPER(SUBSTR(docname,LENGTH(docname)-3,4)),'_BLANK');
 */
end;
