RecordGroup.Name: RG_KKJOGLSZEREP_V_NEV
RecordGroup.RecordGroupQuery:
select U_NEV, U_PARTNER, U_CIM, U_KOD
from KKJOGLSZEREP_V
where U_SZEREPKOR = :KKJOGKARTP.U_SZEREPKOR
order by U_NEV, U_PARTNER

RecordGroup.Name: RG_KESZLNEKAT
RecordGroup.RecordGroupQuery: select L_LOMBKOD, L_LOMBKNEV from KOD_V where L_KODCSOP = 'KESZLNEKAT'

RecordGroup.Name: RG_UGYL_OSZTALY
RecordGroup.RecordGroupQuery:
select L_LOMBKOD, L_LOMBKNEV
from KOD_V
where L_KODCSOP='KK MODUL'

RecordGroup.Name: RG_UGYL_SZEREGY
RecordGroup.RecordGroupQuery:
SELECT g.GRPID, g.GRPNAME 
FROM KKGROUPS g
WHERE g.GRPCSOP = :KKUGYLET.UGYL_OSZTALY
 AND ( :KKUGYLET.UGYL_UG is null 
 or :KKUGYLET.UGYL_UG = 'URES'
 or exists (
 select 'X'
 from USERUSERS u
 where u.USERID = :KKUGYLET.UGYL_UG
 and replace(u.GROUPS,g.GRPID,'X')<>u.GROUPS
 )
 )

RecordGroup.Name: RG_UGYL_SZEREGY_NEW
RecordGroup.RecordGroupQuery:
SELECT g.GRPID, g.GRPNAME 
FROM KKGROUPS g
WHERE g.GRPCSOP = :TOOLBAR.UGYL_OSZTALY
 AND exists (
 select 'X'
 from USERUSERS u
 where u.USERID = :GLOBAL.USERID
 and replace(u.GROUPS,g.GRPID,'X')<>u.GROUPS
 )

RecordGroup.Name: RG_UGYL_UG
RecordGroup.RecordGroupQuery:
select USERID , NAME1
from KKUSERS_V 
where
 ((:KKUGYLET.UGYL_SZEREGY = 'URES' or :KKUGYLET.UGYL_SZEREGY is null) and replace(GROUPS,:KKUGYLET.UGYL_OSZTALY,'X')<>GROUPS)
 or replace(GROUPS,:KKUGYLET.UGYL_SZEREGY,'X')<>GROUPS

RecordGroup.Name: RG_UGYL_SZER_ST
RecordGroup.RecordGroupQuery:
select L_LOMBKOD, L_LOMBKNEV
from KOD_V
where L_KODCSOP = 'UGYL SZER ST'

RecordGroup.Name: RG_UGY_TARGYA
RecordGroup.RecordGroupQuery:
select L_LOMBKNEV
from KOD_V
where L_KODCSOP = 'UGY TARGYA'
 and (L_JELLEG is null or replace(L_JELLEG,:KKJOGKARTF.U_KARTONTIP,'')<>L_JELLEG)
order by L_LOMBKNEV

RecordGroup.Name: RG_U_OKKO_UG
RecordGroup.RecordGroupQuery: select USERID,NAME1 from USERUSERS where (GROUPS like '%,OKKO%' or GROUPS = 'OKKO%') and USERID <> 'zolo'

RecordGroup.Name: RG_U_VRJELLEG
RecordGroup.RecordGroupQuery:
select L_LOMBKOD,L_LOMBKNEV
from KOD_V
where L_KODCSOP = 'VRJELLEG'
order by L_LOMBKOD

RecordGroup.Name: RG_AFATIP
RecordGroup.RecordGroupQuery:
select L_LOMBKOD, L_LOMBKNEV
from KOD_V
where L_KODCSOP = 'AFATIP'
order by L_LOMBKOD

RecordGroup.Name: RG_TELEPHELY
RecordGroup.RecordGroupQuery: select F_PARTNER, F_NEV, F_HELYSEG, F_CIM, F_IRSZ from KKERPART where F_CSOPORT like '%TELEPHELY%'

RecordGroup.Name: RG_VEVOKOD
RecordGroup.RecordGroupQuery: select f_partner, f_nev1, f_nev1a from lombard_kozos_bony..partner order by f_partner

RecordGroup.Name: RG_JOGKOD1
RecordGroup.RecordGroupQuery: select L_LOMBKOD,L_LOMBKNEV from KOD_V where L_KODCSOP='JOGKOD1' order by L_LOMBKOD

RecordGroup.Name: RG_JOGKOD2
RecordGroup.RecordGroupQuery: select L_LOMBKOD,L_LOMBKNEV from KOD_V where L_KODCSOP='JOGKOD2' order by L_LOMBKOD

RecordGroup.Name: RG_JOGKOD3
RecordGroup.RecordGroupQuery: select L_LOMBKOD,L_LOMBKNEV from KOD_V where L_KODCSOP='JOGKOD3' order by L_LOMBKOD

RecordGroup.Name: RG_JOGKOD4
RecordGroup.RecordGroupQuery: select L_LOMBKOD,L_LOMBKNEV from KOD_V where L_KODCSOP='JOGKOD4' order by L_LOMBKOD

RecordGroup.Name: RG_JOGKOD5
RecordGroup.RecordGroupQuery: select L_LOMBKOD,L_LOMBKNEV from KOD_V where L_KODCSOP='JOGKOD5' order by L_LOMBKOD

RecordGroup.Name: RG_JOGKOD6
RecordGroup.RecordGroupQuery: select L_LOMBKOD,L_LOMBKNEV from KOD_V where L_KODCSOP='JOGKOD6' order by L_LOMBKOD

RecordGroup.Name: RG_JOGKOD7
RecordGroup.RecordGroupQuery: select L_LOMBKOD,L_LOMBKNEV from KOD_V where L_KODCSOP='JOGKOD7' order by L_LOMBKOD

RecordGroup.Name: RG_JOGKOD8
RecordGroup.RecordGroupQuery: select L_LOMBKOD,L_LOMBKNEV from KOD_V where L_KODCSOP='JOGKOD8' order by L_LOMBKOD

RecordGroup.Name: RG_MFESTATUS
RecordGroup.RecordGroupQuery: select L_LOMBKOD, L_LOMBKNEV from KOD_V where L_KODCSOP='MFESTATUS' order by L_LOMBKOD

RecordGroup.Name: RG_U_UGYINTEZO
RecordGroup.RecordGroupQuery:
select * 
from KKJOG_UGYINTEZO_PARTNER
where U_SZEREPKOR = :KKJOGKARTP.U_SZEREPKOR 
 and U_PARTNER = :KKJOGKARTP.U_PARTNER
order by U_UGYINTEZO

RecordGroup.Name: RG_JOGUGYINT
RecordGroup.RecordGroupQuery:
select U_UGYINTEZO, HOL, U_SZEREPKOR 
from KKJOG_UGYINTEZO_IRODA
where HOL = :KKJOGKARTP.U_KOD
order by U_UGYINTEZO

RecordGroup.Name: RG_JOGKOCKOK
RecordGroup.RecordGroupQuery:
select L_LOMBKOD,L_LOMBKNEV,L_TILTAS,L_JELLEG
from KOD_V 
where L_KODCSOP = 'JOGKOCKOK' 
 and L_LOMBKNEV not like 'Kockázat oka __' 
 and not exists (select 'X' from KKJOGKARTK where U_JOGIKARTON = :KKJOGKARTF.U_JOGIKARTON and U_JOGKOCKOK = L_LOMBKOD)
order by L_LOMBKNEV

RecordGroup.Name: RG_JOGKOCKJOG
RecordGroup.RecordGroupQuery: select L_LOMBKOD, L_LOMBKNEV from KOD_V where L_KODCSOP = 'JOGKOCKJOG' order by L_LOMBKOD

RecordGroup.Name: RG_JOGKOCKPUH
RecordGroup.RecordGroupQuery: select L_LOMBKOD, L_LOMBKNEV from KOD_V where L_KODCSOP = 'JOGKOCKPUH' order by L_LOMBKOD

RecordGroup.Name: RG_KKUGYLET
RecordGroup.RecordGroupQuery:
select UGYL_ID, UGYL_AIT, UGYL_OSZTALY, UGYL_TIPUS, UGYL_ST
from KKUGYLET
where L_VEVO = :KKPARTNER_CORE.U_PARTNER
order by UGYL_ID

RecordGroup.Name: RG_TERMINALKOD
RecordGroup.RecordGroupQuery:
select UGYL_KOD, UGYL_KOD_NEV 
from KKUGYLET_TIPUS_KOD (nolock)
where UGYL_TIPUS = 'TEL MEGKERES' 
 and UGYL_KODCSOPORT = 'TELJMOD' 
 and UGYL_KOD <> 'FOLYAMATBAN' 
order by UGYL_KOD

RecordGroup.Name: RG_KKWO_KART_KAT
RecordGroup.RecordGroupQuery:
select L_LOMBKOD, L_JELLEG, L_LOMBKNEV
from KOD_V
where L_KODCSOP = 'KKWO_KART_KAT'
order by L_LOMBKOD

RecordGroup.Name: RG_KOROSITO360
RecordGroup.RecordGroupQuery:
select L_LOMBKOD from KOD_V where L_KODCSOP = 'KOROSITO_360'
order by L_LOMBKOD

RecordGroup.Name: RG_TEL_MEGKERES_UGYL
RecordGroup.RecordGroupQuery:
select UGYL_ID, UGYL_FAJTA, UGYL_AIT, UGYL_KEZD, UGYL_VEGE
from KKUGYLET_V
where UGYL_TIPUS = 'TEL MEGKERES'
-- and UGYL_AIT = 'AKTIV'
order by UGYL_AIT, UGYL_ID desc

RecordGroup.Name: RG_WOSTATUS
RecordGroup.RecordGroupQuery:
select L_LOMBKOD
from KOD_V
where L_KODCSOP = 'WOSTATUS'
order by L_LOMBKOD

RecordGroup.Name: RG_WOVEGEOKA
RecordGroup.RecordGroupQuery:
select L_LOMBKOD, L_LOMBKNEV
from KOD_V
where L_KODCSOP = 'WOVEGEOKA'
order by L_LOMBKOD

RecordGroup.Name: RG_WOSTRATST
RecordGroup.RecordGroupQuery:
select L_LOMBKOD
from KOD_V
where L_KODCSOP = 'WOSTRATST'
order by L_LOMBKOD

Trigger.Name: KEY-EXIT
Trigger.TriggerText:
declare
 ret pls_integer;
 ml varchar2(3);
begin 
 ret := "report.KKDOCSTAR_SPID_DEL";
 commit; 
 ret := "report.KKSPID_DEL";
 commit;

 P_KKLOCKS_OFF; 
 if globals.kktree_open = 'TRUE' then
 CLOSE_FORM('KKTREE'); 
 end if;
 CMDGLB.key_exit; 
end;

Trigger.Name: PRE-FORM
Trigger.TriggerText:
BEGIN
 set_application_property(DATE_FORMAT_COMPATIBILITY_MODE, '5.0');
 set_application_property(PLSQL_DATE_FORMAT, 'YYYY.MM.DD HH24:MI:SS');
 set_application_property(BUILTIN_DATE_FORMAT, 'YYYY.MM.DD HH24:MI:SS');
 forms_ddl('ALTER SESSION SET NLS_DATE_FORMAT = ''YYYY.MM.DD HH24:MI:SS''');
 CMDFRM.spec_init_frm;
 :GLOBAL.SEL := '';
 :GLOBAL.SELOK := '';
 :GLOBAL.SEL_FLD := '';
 :global.sel_fut := 'FALSE';
 --:GLOBAL.KKTREE := '';
END;

Trigger.Name: ON-CLEAR-DETAILS
Trigger.TriggerText:
--
-- Begin default relation program section
--
BEGIN
 Clear_All_Master_Details;
END;
--
-- End default relation program section
--

Trigger.Name: WHEN-MOUSE-DOUBLECLICK
Trigger.TriggerText:
if :system.record_status = 'NEW' then
 execute_trigger('KEY-CREREC');
else
 execute_trigger('KEY-F5');
end if;

Trigger.Name: WHEN-NEW-FORM-INSTANCE
Trigger.TriggerText:
declare
 ret pls_integer;
begin
 :system.message_level := '20';
 :GLOBAL.P_SERVER := :PARAMETER.P_SERVER; 
 :GLOBAL.JOGI_HD := :PARAMETER.P_JOGIKARTON;
 ret := "report.KKJOGIRODA_SET"(null);
 commit; 
 -- :GLOBAL.USERGROUPS := NAME_IN('GLOBAL.USERGROUP');
end;

begin
 :KKUGYLET_GRID_CTRL.SZINT := 'UGY';
 :KKUGYLET_GRID_CTRL.AKTIV := 'IGEN';
 :KKUGYLET_GRID_CTRL.INAKTIV := 'IGEN';
 :KKUGYLET_GRID_CTRL.TOROLT := 'NEM';
 :KKUGYLET_GRID_CTRL.OSZTALY := null; -- '*';
 :KKUGYLET_GRID_CTRL.SZEREGY := null; -- '*';
 :KKUGYLET_GRID_CTRL.UGYL_UG := null; -- '*';
 :KKUGYLET_GRID_CTRL.UTOLSO := 'IGEN';
 :KKUGYLET_GRID_CTRL.ELOUGY := 'IGEN';
 
 :KKJOG_CTRL.UTOLSO := 'I';
 :KKJOG_CTRL.AKTIV := 'I';

 :KKDOCSTAR_CTRL.SORREND := 'DOK_DATUM,DATE_CREATED,U_ID';
 set_block_property('KKDOCSTAR',order_by,:KKDOCSTAR_CTRL.SORREND);
end;

-- KINTL
-- EFI, ELLENOR, FLO, GEFI, IFI, 
-- SUPERVISOR
--begin
-- :GLOBAL.USERID := 'zolo'; 
-- :GLOBAL.USERGROUPS := 'KKTUSZVEZ';
--end;

-- Globális beállítások közvetlen hívás esetén
/*
 begin
 if get_application_property(current_form_name) = 'KK_TESZT' then
 MSG('Légyszíves lépj ki a TESZT KK-ból! Köszönöm!');
 end if;
end; 
*/

Declare
 cursor p is
 select * from "report".DOCPARS; 
 pp p%ROWTYPE; 

 cursor u (id VARCHAR2) is
 select * from "report".DOCUSERS
 where USERID = id; 
 uu u%rowtype;
 
 cursor a (id VARCHAR2) is
 select * from "report".USERUSERS
 where upper(ADID) = upper(id); 
 
 aa a%rowtype; 
 
 sd date;
BEGIN
-- :system.message_level := '0';
 
--message('start ... 1'); 
--message(:PARAMETER.ADUSER);
 if nvl(:PARAMETER.USER,'URES') <> 'URES' OR nvl(:PARAMETER.ADUSER,'URES') <> 'URES' then
 
 FOR pp IN P LOOP
 if nvl(:GLOBAL.P_SERVER,'EDOK') = 'LAURA1' then
 COPY(replace(pp.D_VALSTR, '192.168.1.113', '192.168.0.175'),'GLOBAL.' || pp.D_PARID); 
 elsif nvl(:GLOBAL.P_SERVER,'EDOK') = 'LAURA2' then
 COPY(replace(pp.D_VALSTR, '192.168.1.113', '192.168.3.18'),'GLOBAL.' || pp.D_PARID); 
 else
 COPY(pp.D_VALSTR,'GLOBAL.' || pp.D_PARID); 
 end if;
 END LOOP; 
 
 :GLOBAL.USERID := :PARAMETER.USER;
 :GLOBAL.USERGROUPS := '';
 :GLOBAL.P_SERVER := :PARAMETER.P_SERVER; 
--message('start ... 2'); 
 if :PARAMETER.ADUSER <> 'URES' then
 open a ( :PARAMETER.ADUSER );
 fetch a into aa;
 close a;
--message('start ... 3'); 
 if aa.USERID is null and instr(:PARAMETER.ADUSER,'LOMBARD\')=0 then
 open a ( 'LOMBARD\' || :PARAMETER.ADUSER );
 fetch a into aa;
 close a;
 end if; 
--message('start ... 4'); 
 if aa.USERID is not null then
--message(aa.USERID); 
--message(aa.NAME1); 
 :PARAMETER.USER := aa.USERID;
 :GLOBAL.USERID := aa.USERID;
 :GLOBAL.USERNAME := aa.NAME1;
 :GLOBAL.CLERKID := aa.CLERKID;
 :GLOBAL.USERGROUPS := aa.GROUPS;
--message(:GLOBAL.USERGROUPS ); 
 end if;
 end if;

 if :PARAMETER.ADUSER = 'URES' then
 :GLOBAL.USERID := :PARAMETER.USER;
 open u (:GLOBAL.USERID);
 fetch u into uu;
 close u; 
 :GLOBAL.USERNAME := uu.NAME1;
 :GLOBAL.CLERKID := uu.CLERKID;
 :GLOBAL.USERGROUPS := uu.GROUPS; 
--message(:GLOBAL.USERGROUPS ); 
 end if; 
 
 :GLOBALS_BLK.USERGROUPS := :GLOBAL.USERGROUPS; 
 :GLOBAL.REPSERVER := :GLOBAL.KKREPSERVER;
 :GLOBAL.REPSRVURL := :GLOBAL.KKREPSRVURL;
 :GLOBAL.DOCTMP := :GLOBAL.KKDOCTMP;
 :GLOBAL.DOCPATH := :GLOBAL.KKDOCPATH;
 :GLOBAL.KKDOCTMPURL := replace(:GLOBAL.KKDOCTMPURL,'192.168.1.17','192.168.1.113');
 
 if nvl(:GLOBAL.P_SERVER,'EDOK') = 'LAURA1' then
 :GLOBAL.REPSERVER := replace(:GLOBAL.KKREPSERVER, 'EDOK', 'LAURA1'); 
 :GLOBAL.KKDOCTMPURL := replace(:GLOBAL.KKDOCTMPURL, '192.168.1.113', '192.168.0.175'); 
 end if; 
 
 if nvl(:GLOBAL.P_SERVER,'EDOK') = 'LAURA2' then
 :GLOBAL.REPSERVER := replace(:GLOBAL.KKREPSERVER, 'EDOK', 'LAURA2'); 
 :GLOBAL.KKDOCTMPURL := replace(:GLOBAL.KKDOCTMPURL, '192.168.1.113', '192.168.3.18'); 
 end if; 

 sd := SYSDATE;
 
 UPDATE "report".USERUSERS
 SET LOGIN_TIME = sd
 WHERE USERID = :GLOBAL.USERID;
 COMMIT;

 -- :GLOBAL.USERGROUPS := uu.GROUPS;
 end if;
 
-- open u (:GLOBAL.USERID);
-- fetch u into uu;
-- close u;
 
-- :GLOBAL.USERNAME := uu.NAME1;
-- :GLOBAL.CLERKID := uu.CLERKID;
 :GLOBAL.KK_FORM := get_application_property(current_form_name);
 globals.KK_NAME := :PARAMETER.KK;
 set_canvas_property('C_UGYLET_TB',visual_attribute, 'CANVAS_' || globals.KK_NAME);
 set_item_property('TOOLBAR.U_UGYID', visual_attribute, 'CANVAS_' || globals.KK_NAME);
 set_item_property('TOOLBAR.L_SZERAZON', visual_attribute, 'CANVAS_' || globals.KK_NAME);
 set_item_property('TOOLBAR.L_ESZKNEV1', visual_attribute, 'CANVAS_' || globals.KK_NAME);
 set_item_property('TOOLBAR.L_ESZKNEV2', visual_attribute, 'CANVAS_' || globals.KK_NAME);
 set_item_property('TOOLBAR.L_RENDSZAM', visual_attribute, 'CANVAS_' || globals.KK_NAME);
 
 :system.message_level := '5';
 --Message(globals.KK_NAME || ' ' || nvl(:GLOBAL.USERNAME,'X') || ' (' || nvl(:GLOBAL.USERID,'URES') || ' ' || :GLOBAL.USERGROUPS || ')');
 :system.message_level := '20';
end;
 

-- Lockok törlése közvetlen hívás esetén
DECLARE
 CURSOR C IS SELECT GRPID, GRPCEG FROM "report".USERGROUP;
 CC C%ROWTYPE;

 CURSOR L IS SELECT COUNT(*) DB 
 FROM KKLOCKS 
 WHERE U_USERID = :GLOBAL.USERID;
 
 LL L%ROWTYPE; 
 ret pls_integer;
BEGIN 
 if :PARAMETER.USER <> 'URES' then 
 OPEN L;
 FETCH L INTO LL;
 CLOSE L;
 
 IF LL.DB>0 THEN
 --IF SHOW_ALERT('KKLOCKS_OFF_ALL') = ALERT_BUTTON1 THEN
 ret := "report.KKLOCKS_OFF_ALL"(:GLOBAL.USERID);
 commit; 
 --END IF;
 END IF;
 end if;
END;


-- Normál indulás
 
declare
 spid pls_integer;
 ret pls_integer;
 
 cursor c_jogiroda (p_userid varchar2) is
 select k.L_LOMBKOD 
 from USERUSERS u, KOD_V k
 where k.L_KODCSOP = 'JOGIIRODA' 
 and u.USERID = p_userid
 and replace(u.GROUPS,k.L_LOMBKOD,'X')<>u.GROUPS;
 --and replace(k.L_TILTAS,u.USERID,'X')<>k.L_TILTAS;
 
 v_jogiroda c_jogiroda%rowtype; 
begin
 open c_jogiroda (:GLOBAL.USERID);
 fetch c_jogiroda into v_jogiroda;
 close c_jogiroda; 
 
 :GLOBALS_BLK.USERGROUPS := :GLOBAL.USERGROUPS; 
/*
ret := "GET_SPID"(spid); 
message ('NE HASZNALD A TESZTET ! ' || to_char(spid));
:GLOBAL.USERID := 'zolo'; 
:GLOBAL.USERGROUPS := 'KKBEHVEZ';
message ('NE HASZNALD A TESZTET ! ' || to_char(spid));
*/

 :system.message_level := '10';
--:system.message_level := '0';
 :KKPARTNER_CTRL.C_RESZLET := 'I';
 set_record_property(1,'KKPARTNER_CTRL',status,query_status);
 
 P_KKLOCKS_OFF;
 SET_FORM_PROPERTY(:System.Current_Form,SAVEPOINT_MODE,PROPERTY_FALSE);
 
 :GLOBAL.SEL := '';
 :GLOBAL.SELOK := '';
 :GLOBAL.SEL_FLD := '';
 :global.sel_fut := 'FALSE';
 
 if v_jogiroda.L_LOMBKOD is null then
 globals.JOGIRODA := 'NONE';
 :global.JOGIRODA := 'NONE';
 else
 globals.JOGIRODA := v_jogiroda.L_LOMBKOD;
 :global.JOGIRODA := v_jogiroda.L_LOMBKOD;
 end if;


 set_window_property('W_UGYLET' , TITLE, globals.KK_NAME );
 set_window_property('W_UGYLET' , WINDOW_STATE, MAXIMIZE );
 set_window_property('W_PUALL' , TITLE, globals.KK_NAME || ' - Ügy - Pénzügyi állapot');
 set_window_property('W_MFED' , TITLE, globals.KK_NAME || ' - Ügy - Másodlagos fedezetek');
 set_window_property('W_FELADAT' , TITLE, globals.KK_NAME || ' - Ügy - Feladatok');
 set_window_property('W_KOLTSEG' , TITLE, globals.KK_NAME || ' - Ügy - Költségek');
 set_window_property('W_KONTAKT' , TITLE, globals.KK_NAME || ' - Ügy - Kontaktusok');
 set_window_property('W_KKLSZKAR' , TITLE, globals.KK_NAME || ' - Ügy - Káresemények');
 set_window_property('W_FOGLALAS' , TITLE, globals.KK_NAME || ' - Ügy - Foglalások');
 set_window_property('W_LSZERINFO' , TITLE, globals.KK_NAME || ' - Ügy - Szerződés információk');
 set_window_property('W_DOCSTAR' , TITLE, globals.KK_NAME || ' - Ügy - Kapcsolt dokumentumok');
 set_window_property('W_KKJOGKARTK' , TITLE, globals.KK_NAME || ' - Jogi karton - Kockázazok');
 set_window_property('W_KKJOGKARCL' , TITLE, globals.KK_NAME || ' - Jogi karton - Check-list');
 set_window_property('W_UZLETSZAB' , TITLE, globals.KK_NAME || ' - Ügy - Üzletszabályzatok');

 set_window_property('W_KEYGO' , TITLE, globals.KK_NAME || ' - Pozícionálás'); 
 set_window_property('W_FORMS_SPEC' , TITLE, globals.KK_NAME || ' - Form beállítás');

 SET_WINDOW_CENTER('W_PUALL' );
 SET_WINDOW_CENTER('W_MFED' );
 SET_WINDOW_CENTER('W_FELADAT' );
 SET_WINDOW_CENTER('W_FELADAT_HISTORY');
 SET_WINDOW_CENTER('W_KOLTSEG' );
 SET_WINDOW_CENTER('W_KONTAKT' );
 SET_WINDOW_CENTER('W_DOCSTAR' );
 SET_WINDOW_CENTER('W_KKLSZKAR' );
 SET_WINDOW_CENTER('W_KKTAG' ); 
 SET_WINDOW_CENTER('W_KKJOGKARTK' );
 SET_WINDOW_CENTER('W_UZLETSZAB' );
 
 if globals.KK_NAME not in ( 'KKTUSZ', 'KKBO', 'OKKO' ) then
 set_item_property('KKPARTNER_CTRL.ELER_SIKER' , ENABLED, PROPERTY_FALSE);
 set_item_property('KKPARTNER_CTRL.ELER_SIKERTELEN', ENABLED, PROPERTY_FALSE);
 set_item_property('KKPARTNER_CTRL.ELER_TOROL' , ENABLED, PROPERTY_FALSE);
 set_item_property('KKPARTNER_CTRL.ELER_NINCSMEG' , ENABLED, PROPERTY_FALSE);
 end if;
 if globals.KK_NAME = 'KKTUSZ' then
 set_item_property('KKPARTNER_CTRL.ELER_NINCSMEG' , ENABLED, PROPERTY_FALSE);
 end if; 
 rendezo;
 
 --set_default_query;

 DECLARE
 tb_pg_id TAB_PAGE;
 BEGIN
 tb_pg_id := FIND_TAB_PAGE('OKKO');
 IF GET_TAB_PAGE_PROPERTY(tb_pg_id, enabled) = 'FALSE' and instr(:GLOBAL.USERGROUPS,'OKKO')>0 THEN
 SET_TAB_PAGE_PROPERTY(tb_pg_id, enabled, property_true);
 END IF;
 END;
 
 
 if globals.KK_NAME = 'KKTUSZ' then
 if instr(:GLOBAL.USERGROUPS,'KKTUSZUGY')>0 then
 CMDGLB.SET_ENABLED_FUNCTIONS (',FELVITEL,MODOSITAS,TORLES,SPEC1.SPEC01,SPEC1.SPEC02,SPEC1.SPEC03,SPEC1.SPEC04,SPEC1.SPEC06,SPEC2.SPEC01,SPEC2.SPEC01,SPEC2.SPEC02,SPEC2.SPEC03,SPEC2.SPEC04,SPEC2.SPEC05,SPEC2.SPEC06,SPEC2.SPEC07,SPEC2.SPEC08,SPEC2.SPEC09,SPEC2.SPEC10,SPEC2.SPEC11,SPEC2.SPEC12,SPEC2.SPEC13,SPEC1.SPEC07,SPEC1.SPEC08,SPEC3.SPEC11,SPEC3.SPEC12,');
 elsif instr(:GLOBAL.USERGROUPS,'KKTUSZVEZ')>0 then
 CMDGLB.SET_ENABLED_FUNCTIONS (',FELVITEL,MODOSITAS,TORLES,SPEC1.SPEC01,SPEC1.SPEC02,SPEC1.SPEC03,SPEC1.SPEC04,SPEC1.SPEC06,SPEC2.SPEC01,SPEC2.SPEC01,SPEC2.SPEC02,SPEC2.SPEC03,SPEC2.SPEC04,SPEC2.SPEC05,SPEC2.SPEC06,SPEC2.SPEC07,SPEC2.SPEC08,SPEC2.SPEC09,SPEC2.SPEC10,SPEC2.SPEC11,SPEC2.SPEC12,SPEC2.SPEC13,SPEC1.SPEC07,SPEC1.SPEC08,SPEC3.SPEC10,SPEC3.SPEC12,SPEC3.SPEC12,');
 else

 go_item('KKPARTNER_CORE.U_PARTNER');
end;

-- Pozícionálás a szerződésre közvetlen hívás esetén
declare 
 cursor p (p_partner varchar2) is 
 SELECT 
 L_NEV, 
 L_SZIGSZAM, L_AIASZ, L_HELYSEG, 
 L_CIM, L_IRSZ, U_PARTNER F_PARTNER
 FROM KKPARTNER_V_POZ 
 WHERE U_PARTNER = p_partner;

 pp p%rowtype;
 
 cursor s (p_szerszam varchar2) is 
 SELECT 
 sc.L_VERAZON, sc.U_UGYID, 
 sc.L_SZERSZAM, sc.L_VEVO, pc.L_NEV, 
 pc.L_SZIGSZAM, pc.L_AIASZ, pc.L_HELYSEG, 
 pc.L_CIM, pc.L_IRSZ, pc.U_PARTNER F_PARTNER
 FROM KKSZERZODES_CORE sc, KKPARTNER_CORE pc
 WHERE sc.L_SZERSZAM = p_szerszam
 and sc.U_UTOLSOUGY = 'IGEN'
 and sc.L_VEVO = pc.U_PARTNER;
 
 ss s%rowtype;

 cursor e (p_szerazon varchar2) is 
 SELECT L_RENDSZAM
 FROM KKESZKOZ_V_POZ 
 WHERE L_SZERAZON = p_szerazon;

 ee e%rowtype;

 p_partner varchar2(9);
 p_szerszam varchar2(20);
 p_szerazon varchar2(20);
 al number;
BEGIN
 p_partner := nvl(:PARAMETER.PARTNER ,'URES');
 p_szerszam := nvl(:PARAMETER.SZERSZAM,'URES');
 p_szerazon := nvl(:PARAMETER.SZERAZON,'URES');
 
 if p_partner <= ' ' then p_partner := 'URES'; end if;
 if p_szerszam <= ' ' then p_szerszam := 'URES'; end if;
 if p_szerazon <= ' ' then p_szerazon := 'URES'; end if;
 --if :PARAMETER.USER <> 'URES' then
 if p_partner <> 'URES' then
 :GLOBAL.KKTREE := '';
--al := get_alert('STOP',p_partner); 
 if nvl(p_partner,'URES') <> 'URES' then
 :KEYGO.U_PARTNER := p_partner;
 end if;
--al := get_alert('STOP',p_partner); 
 
 if nvl(p_szerszam,'URES') <> 'URES' then
 :KEYGO.L_SZERSZAM := p_szerszam; 
 open s (:KEYGO.L_SZERSZAM);
 fetch s into ss;
 close s;
 :KEYGO.L_NEV := ss.L_NEV;
 :KEYGO.U_PARTNER := ss.L_VEVO;
 :KEYGO.L_SZIGSZAM := ss.L_SZIGSZAM;
 :KEYGO.L_AIASZ := ss.L_AIASZ;
 :KEYGO.U_VERAZON := ss.L_VERAZON;
 :KEYGO.U_UGYID := ss.U_UGYID;
 :KEYGO.F_PARTNER := ss.F_PARTNER; 
 end if;
 
 if nvl(p_szerazon,'URES') <> 'URES' then 
 :KEYGO.L_SZERAZON := p_szerazon;
-- if :KEYGO.L_SZERSZAM = 'URES' then
 :KEYGO.L_SZERSZAM := substr(p_szerazon,1,10);
-- end if;
 open s (:KEYGO.L_SZERSZAM);
 fetch s into ss;
 close s;

 open e (:KEYGO.L_SZERAZON);
 fetch e into ee;
 close e;

 :KEYGO.L_NEV := ss.L_NEV;
 :KEYGO.U_PARTNER := ss.L_VEVO;
 :KEYGO.L_SZIGSZAM := ss.L_SZIGSZAM;
 :KEYGO.L_AIASZ := ss.L_AIASZ;
 :KEYGO.U_VERAZON := ss.L_VERAZON;
 :KEYGO.U_UGYID := ss.U_UGYID;
 :KEYGO.F_PARTNER := ss.F_PARTNER; 

 :KEYGO.L_RENDSZAM := ee.L_RENDSZAM; 

 end if;
 
 if :KEYGO.U_PARTNER is not null and :KEYGO.L_SZERSZAM is null then
 open p (:KEYGO.U_PARTNER);
 fetch p into pp;
 close p;

 :KEYGO.L_NEV := pp.L_NEV; 
 :KEYGO.L_SZIGSZAM := pp.L_SZIGSZAM;
 :KEYGO.L_AIASZ := pp.L_AIASZ;
 end if;
 --KEYGO_SET.CLEARVAR;
 --commit;

 :system.message_level := '10';

--message(:KEYGO.U_PARTNER);
--message(:KEYGO.L_SZERSZAM);
--al := get_alert('STOP',nvl(:KEYGO.U_PARTNER,'p'));
--al := get_alert('STOP',nvl(:KEYGO.L_SZERSZAM,'s')); 
 
 KEYGO_OPEN_KK; 
--al := get_alert('STOP','v'); 
 
 go_item('KKSZERZODES_CORE.M_L_CEG');
--al := get_alert('STOP','v'); 
 end if;
END;

declare
 cursor c_jogkartf (p_jogikarton varchar2) is
 select U_PARTNER
 from KKJOGKARTF
 where U_JOGIKARTON = p_jogikarton; 
 v_jogkartf c_jogkartf%rowtype;
begin
 if nvl(:GLOBAL.JOGI_HD,'') > ' ' then
 open c_jogkartf (:GLOBAL.JOGI_HD);
 fetch c_jogkartf into v_jogkartf;
 close c_jogkartf; 
 :KEYGO.U_PARTNER := v_jogkartf.U_PARTNER;
 KEYGO_OPEN_KK;
 go_item('KKJOGKARTF.U_JOGIKARTON');
 execute_query; 
 while :KKJOGKARTF.U_JOGIKARTON <> :GLOBAL.JOGI_HD and upper(:system.LAST_RECORD) = 'FALSE'
 loop
 next_record;
 end loop;
 globals.TAB_NEW_PAGE := 'JOGI_KART';
 end if; 
end;

declare
 cursor c_jogkartf is
 select U_PARTNER, U_JOGIKARTON
 from KKJOGKARTF
 where U_VERZIOST = 'DRAFT'
 and U_VERZIOUG = :GLOBAL.USERID; 
 v_jogkartf c_jogkartf%rowtype;
begin
 if globals.KK_NAME = 'KKJOG' then
 open c_jogkartf;
 fetch c_jogkartf into v_jogkartf;
 close c_jogkartf; 
 if v_jogkartf.U_PARTNER is not null then
 :KEYGO.U_PARTNER := v_jogkartf.U_PARTNER;
 KEYGO_OPEN_KK;
 go_item('KKJOGKARTF.U_JOGIKARTON');
 execute_query; 
 while :KKJOGKARTF.U_JOGIKARTON <> v_jogkartf.U_JOGIKARTON and upper(:system.LAST_RECORD) = 'FALSE'
 loop
 next_record;
 end loop; 
 go_item('KKJOGKARTF.U_JOGIKARTON');
 globals.TAB_NEW_PAGE := 'JOGI_KART';
 end if;
 end if; 
end;

-- KKTREE megnyitása
declare
 par_id paramlist;
 par_name varchar2(30) := 'kktree_pars';
begin
-- if :PARAMETER.USER = 'URES' then 
 if globals.kktree_open = 'FALSE' then
 par_id := Get_Parameter_List(par_name); 
 if Id_Null(par_id) THEN 
 :GLOBAL.KKTREE := '';
 par_id := Create_Parameter_List(par_name);
 Add_Parameter(par_id,'KK_VER',TEXT_PARAMETER,'KK2');
 Add_Parameter(par_id,'KK',TEXT_PARAMETER,globals.KK_NAME);
 Add_Parameter(par_id,'GROUPS',TEXT_PARAMETER,:GLOBAL.USERGROUPS);
 Add_Parameter(par_id,'USER',TEXT_PARAMETER,:GLOBAL.USERID); 
 if instr(upper(get_application_property(CURRENT_FORM)),'KK2_TESZT')>0 then
 open_form(:GLOBAL.FORMS || 'KKTREE_TESZT',NO_ACTIVATE,NO_SESSION,NO_SHARE_LIBRARY_DATA,par_id); 
 else
 open_form(:GLOBAL.FORMS || :GLOBAL.KKTREEMODUL,NO_ACTIVATE,NO_SESSION,NO_SHARE_LIBRARY_DATA,par_id); 
 end if; 
 globals.kktree_open := 'TRUE'; 
 -- :GLOBAL.SPID := '';
 end if;
 end if;
-- else
-- :GLOBAL.KKTREE := '';
-- CMDGLB.enabled_functions := replace(CMDGLB.enabled_functions,',SPEC1.SPEC01','');
-- CMDGLB.enabled_functions := replace(CMDGLB.enabled_functions,',SPEC1.SPEC02','');
-- end if;
--message(:GLOBAL.USERGROUPS);
--message(CMDGLB.enabled_functions );
--message(CMDGLB.enabled_functions ); 
end;

begin 
 :system.message_level := '10';
end;


begin
 if :GLOBAL.JOGIRODA <> 'LOMBARD' and nvl(:GLOBAL.JOGIRODA,'NONE') <> 'NONE' then
 set_lov_property('LOV_DOCSTAR_DOCTIPUS',group_name, 'RG_DOCTIPUS_JOGIIRODA');
 end if;
end;

Trigger.Name: WHEN-TAB-PAGE-CHANGED
Trigger.TriggerText:
DECLARE
 tp_nm VARCHAR2(30);
 tp_id TAB_PAGE;
 tp_lbl VARCHAR2(30);
 
BEGIN
 tp_nm := :SYSTEM.TAB_NEW_PAGE; 
 globals.TAB_NEW_PAGE := :SYSTEM.TAB_NEW_PAGE; 
 
 if tp_nm = 'PARTNER_CORE' THEN
 go_item ('KKPARTNER_CORE.U_PARTNER');
 elsif tp_nm = 'TREE' THEN
 go_item ('KKPARTNER_TREE.TREE');
 elsif tp_nm = 'NAVIGATOR' THEN
 go_item ('KKSZERZODES_CORE.M_L_CEG');
 elsif tp_nm = 'NAVIGATOR' THEN
 go_item ('KKSZERZODES_CORE.M_L_CEG');
 elsif tp_nm = 'UGY' THEN
 go_item ('KKSZERZODES_CORE.U_UGYID'); 
 elsif tp_nm = 'ESZKOZ1' THEN
 go_item ('KKESZKOZ_CORE.L_SZERAZON');
 elsif tp_nm = 'ESZKOZ2' THEN
 go_item ('KKESZKOZ_KART.EM_ERTMOD'); 
 elsif tp_nm = 'UGYLET_KART' THEN
 go_item ('KKUGYLET.UGYL_ST');
 elsif tp_nm = 'JOGI_KART' THEN
 go_item ('KKJOGKARTF.U_JOGIKARTON'); 
 elsif tp_nm = 'UGY_JOG' THEN
 go_item ('KKSZERZODES_JOG.U_UGYID'); 
 execute_query; 
 elsif tp_nm = 'OKKO' THEN
 go_item ('KKWO_KART.U_WOKARTON'); 
 execute_query; 
 end if;
END;

Trigger.Name: WHEN-WINDOW-ACTIVATED
Trigger.TriggerText:
declare 
 x varchar2(255);
begin
 :system.message_level := 25;
 x := name_in ('GLOBAL.KKTREE');
 :system.message_level := 10;
exception
 when others then
 :GLOBAL.KKTREE := '';
end;

Begin
 IF :GLOBAL.SEL_FUT = 'TRUE' THEN
 GO_FORM( 'SEL' );
 ELSE
 IF :GLOBAL.SELOK = 'TRUE' THEN
 COPY(:GLOBAL.SEL,:global.sel_fld );
 :GLOBAL.SEL := '';
 :GLOBAL.SELOK := '';
 :GLOBAL.SEL_FLD := '';
 END IF;
 END IF;

 if :GLOBAL.KKTREE > ' ' then
 TREE_OPEN_KK (:GLOBAL.KKTREE);
 :GLOBAL.KKTREE := '';
 end if; 
 
End;

Trigger.Name: WHEN-WINDOW-CLOSED
Trigger.TriggerText:
IF :SYSTEM.EVENT_WINDOW in ('W_UGYLET', 'W_UGYLET') THEN
 IF :SYSTEM.FORM_STATUS <> 'CHANGED' and rec.editmode is null then
 EXIT_FORM;
 END IF;
END IF;

Trigger.Name: ON-ERROR
Trigger.TriggerText:
declare
 errnum NUMBER := ERROR_CODE; 
 errtxt VARCHAR2(80) := ERROR_TEXT; 
 errtyp VARCHAR2(3) := ERROR_TYPE; 
begin 
 if errnum = 41052 and errtyp = 'FRM' then
 return;
 else
 Message(errtyp||'-'||TO_CHAR(errnum)||': '||errtxt); 
 RAISE Form_Trigger_Failure;
 end if;
end;

Trigger.Name: ON-MESSAGE
Trigger.TriggerText:
declare
 msgnum NUMBER := MESSAGE_CODE; 
 msgtxt VARCHAR2(80) := MESSAGE_TEXT; 
 msgtyp VARCHAR2(3) := MESSAGE_TYPE;
begin 
 if msgnum = 41052 and msgtyp = 'FRM' then --
 return;
 else
 Message(msgtyp||'-'||TO_CHAR(msgnum)||': '||msgtxt); 
 end if;
end;

Trigger.Name: WHEN-MOUSE-CLICK
Trigger.TriggerText:
declare
 itm varchar2(80);
 blk varchar2(30);
begin 
 if rec.editmode is not null then
 itm := :system.mouse_item;
 blk := substr(itm,1,instr(itm,'.')-1);
 if rec.aktrec <> :system.mouse_record or blk <> rec.aktblk then
 raise form_trigger_failure;
 end if; 
 end if;
end;

Window.Title: Kamatmentes részletfizetési megállapodás dokumentum előállítás paraméterei
